en: The error is introduced by directly modifying the coordinate system of geometry when recovering the wrapping of the figure .
zh: 该误差是通过直接修改几何坐标系统来恢复图形的包装。

en: Listing 1 : A simplified definition of the ChangeCoordSys Operator .
zh: 清单1: 简化了ChangeCoordSys操作符的定义.

en: This operator was applied to a mobile technology GIS application .
zh: 该操作器应用于一种移动技术GIS应用。

en: This application allows registering places of interest for the user .
zh: 这个应用程序允许用户注册感兴趣的地方。

en: These areas of interest are called Geofences .
zh: 这些感兴趣的领域称为地质学。

en: A Geofence is determined by a geographical location expressed in terms of latitude , longitude , and a radius around that location .
zh: 地理防护是由地理的位置决定的,以纬度 、 长度 、 和周围的半径表示。

en: By creating a Geofence with an erroneous location from its central location , the device will receive incorrect location notifications .
zh: 通过从其中央位置创建一个具有错误位置的地球防御器,该设备将收到错误位置通知。

en: As a result , the user will see in the application ’s map viewer the Geofences drawn in erroneous zones  .
zh: 结果,用户将在应用程序的地图查看器中看到在错误区域绘制的地标。

en: It introduces errors in the processing of geometries , manipulating the result of the operations that carry out the verification of different topological restrictions between geometries , such as intersects , covers or overlap .
zh: 它引入了处理几何的误差,操纵了进行几何间不同拓扑限制的验证操作的结果,例如截面、覆盖或重叠。

en: Listing 2 : A simplified definition of the BooleanPolygonConstraint Operator .
zh: 清单2: 简化了BooleanPolygonConstraint Operator的定义.

en: To test this operator it was applied to a land reparcelling system .
zh: 为了测试这个操作者,它被应用于陆地再整装系统。

en: The objective of the land reparcelling is to reunify the lands of an owner to facilitate their exploitation .
zh: 土地再分配的目的是统一所有者土地,以便利土地的开发。

en: In this application , the result of the operation between two polygons has been affected .
zh: 在这一应用中,影响了两个多边形之间的操作结果。

en: This error causes the incorrect display of the resulting geometry that should be drawn in the user interface after the operation applied to the two initial geometries  .
zh: 这个错误导致在对两个初始几何进行操作后在用户界面中应绘制的结果几何的错误显示。

en: In existing proposals , we can find both generic and specific mutation operators .
zh: 在现有的建议中,我们可以找到通用的和特定的突变演算子。

en: However , these are not adequate to cover errors in particular domains .
zh: 然而,这些不足以覆盖某些领域中的错误。

en: We have defined new operators specific to the GIS domain and a way to apply them to a SUT .
zh: 我们已经定义了新的特定于GIS域的操作者和一种应用它们于UT的方法。

en: In addition , we have tested the operators defined in two GIS applications .
zh: 此外,我们测试了两个GIS应用中定义的操作者。

en: As future work , we intend to extend this approach to other domains , as well as to use the developed operators for the automatic improvement of sets of test cases .
zh: 作为今后的工作,我们打算将这一方法扩展到其他领域,并利用已开发的操作员来自动改进测试案例。

en: Replication studies are considered by many to play a fundamental role in any scientific endeavor .
zh: 复制研究被许多人认为在任何科学努力中起着根本作用。

en: When using the same materials and procedures as a previous study , replication studies serve to test the reliability of the previous study ’s findings .
zh: 当使用与前一项研究相同的材料和程序时,复制研究有助于测试前一项研究结果的可靠性。

en: When altering specific methodological or participant characteristics of a previous study , they serve to test generalizability of the earlier findings under different conditions .
zh: 在改变以前研究的特定方法学特征或参与者特征时,它们有助于在不同的条件下测试早期发现的普遍性。

en: One indication of the importance of replication is found in the 50 or more calls for replication research in the field of second language  research alone  : from Santos  through Polio and Gass 1997 to very recent proposals for specific replication studies , such as Vandergrift and Cross 2017 and even a book - length treatment  .
zh: 从桑托斯到波利奥和加斯1997年到最近对具体的复制研究的提议,例如范德格里夫特和克罗斯2017年,甚至还有一本书长处理。

en: Beyond these calls , efforts to actively promote and facilitate replication studies have also emerged .
zh: 除了这些呼吁外,还出现了积极促进和促进复制研究的努力。

en: For example , the Instruments for Research into Second Languages  repository  was established in 2011 and holds , at the time of writing , over 3,800 materials that can be used for replication , among other purposes , in L2 research  .
zh: 例如,第二语言研究工具库于2011年成立,在编写时拥有超过3,800件可以用于复制的材料,除其他目的外,用于L2研究。

en: The Open Science Framework  , also established in 2011 , provides a web infrastructure to facilitate collaboration and has been used for large replication efforts in psychology  , which continue to make waves in academia  and the general media  .
zh: 开放科学框架(Open Science Framework)也于2011年成立,提供了一个网络基础设施,以促进协作,并用于心理学领域的大规模复制工作,继续在学术界和大众媒体中产生波浪。

en: In some fields , a flourishing metascience , that is , the scientific study of science  , has included syntheses assessing the quantity and nature of replication efforts , for example , in education  .
zh: 在某些领域,一个繁荣的元科学,即科学的科学研究,包括评价复制努力数量和性质的综合研究,例如在教育领域。

en: The driving force behind this battery of calls , commentaries , infrastructure , and metascience is a perceived crisis in the state of replication research .
zh: 这种电话 、 评论 、 基础建设和元科学的驱动力是复制研究状况中一种被理解的危机。

en: The severe concerns underpinning the alleged crisis have several dimensions relating to :  the  amount of published replication research ;  the  quality of replication research ; and  the  reproducibility , which refers to the extent to which findings can  be reproduced in replication attempts that have been undertaken .
zh: 所谓危机背后的严重关切有几个方面: 出版的复制研究的数量; 复制研究的质量; 以及可复制性,这指在已进行的复制尝试中能够复制出哪些结果的程度。

en: These concerns speak to the very core of science , raising fundamental questions about the validity and reliability of our work .
zh: 这些关切关系到科学的核心,引发了关于我们工作的有效性和可靠性的根本问题。

en: Indeed , some commentators have called replication the “ gold standard ” of research evidence  and a “ linchpin of the scientific process ”  .
zh: 事实上, 一些评论家称复制是研究证据的“ 金标准 ” 和“ 科学过程的支柱 ” 。

en: In the field of L2 research , given the importance of replication and the 50 calls for replication in L2 research that we identified , one might expect a substantial number of published replication studies by now .
zh: 在L2研究领域,考虑到复制的重要性和我们确定的50个要求在L2研究中复制,人们可以预期到目前已有大量发表的复制研究。

en: However , a perceived lack of prestige , excitement , and originality of replication plagues L2 research  , as it does other disciplines  , and these perceptions are thought to have caused , at least in part  , alleged low rates and a poor quality of published replication studies .
zh: 然而,对复制病的缺乏信誉、兴奋和独创性感 L2研究,正如其他学科一样,这些认识被认为是导致的,至少部分,声称的低率和出版的复制研究质量差。

en: However , a systematic metascience on replication research has not yet been established in the field of L2 research , leaving a poor understanding of the actual number and nature of replication studies that have been published .
zh: 然而,在L2研究领域还没有建立一种系统地复制研究的元科学,因此人们对已经发表的复制研究的实际数量和性质的理解还很差。

en: The current study begins to address this gap through narrative and systematic reviews .
zh: 目前的研究开始通过叙述和系统性审查来解决这一差距。

en: The narrative review considers challenges in replication research and is largely informed by commentaries and metascience from psychology , given that the cognitive and social subdomains of psychology are highly influential in L2 research , and also from education , another key sister discipline .
zh: 叙事综述了复制研究中的挑战,并主要从心理学的评论和元科学中获得信息,因为心理学的认知和社会分域在L2研究中具有很高的影响,同时也从教育中获得信息,另一个关键的姐妹学科。

en: The narrative review is organized around four broad themes :  the quantity of replication research ,  the nature of replication research ,  the relationship between initial and replication studies , and  the interpretation and extent of reproducibility of the findings of initial studies .
zh: 叙事回顾围绕四个广泛主题进行:复制研究的数量、复制研究的性质、初始研究与复制研究之间的关系、初始研究结果的解释和可复制程度。

en: To gain insight into these issues in the context of L2 research , the systematic review provides a synthesis of L2 studies in journal articles that self - labeled as replications .
zh: 为了在L2研究中获得对这些问题的洞察,系统性综述提供了在期刊文章中自标为复制品的L2研究的综合。

en: The research questions and methods of the systematic review were largely determined by the narrative review but also emerged through the design and piloting of the coding instrument .
zh: 系统性检讨的研究问题和方法主要由叙事性检讨决定,同时也通过编码器的设计和试验产生。

en: Finally , we offer further discussion and 16 recommendations for future replication work that draw on our narrative and systematic reviews and on our experience of carrying out multisite  1 and single site  replications .
zh: 最后,我们提出了进一步的讨论和16项建议,以便今后的复制工作,这些建议是基于我们的叙事性和系统性审查以及我们进行多点1和单点复制的经验。

en: We start from the widely agreed premise that testing the reproducibility of findings should have an essential role in the testing and refinement of theory , at least for hypothesis - testing epistemologies that seek to ascertain generalizability and for other epistemologies in which constructs are deemed to be definable and observable .
zh: 我们从广泛一致的前提出发,认为测试发现的可复制性应在理论的测试和改进中起着至关重要的作用,至少对于假设的测试--旨在确定可推广性的认识学和其他认识学,其中构造被认为是可定义和可观察的。

en: Thus , our overall aim is to provide conceptual clarification and an empirical base for future discussion and production of replication studies , with a view to improving the amount and quality of L2 replication research .
zh: 因此,我们总的目的是为今后的复制研究提供概念澄清和实证基础,以提高L2复制研究的数量和质量。

en: Salinity is one of the most important marine parameters , which controls many processes such as physical circulations , biogeochemistry dynamics from regional to global ocean  .
zh: 盐度是海洋中最重要的参数之一,它控制许多过程,如物理循环、区域到全球海洋生物化学动力学。

en: Although drifters and buoys , together with cruises , have accumulated large amount in - situ water salinity data in different regions , it is still difficult to monitor global ocean salinity with high temporal - spatial resolution by the in situ measurements .
zh: 虽然漂流船和浮游船和巡航船在不同地区积累了大量 实地 水盐度数据,但仍难以通过实地测量以高时空分辨率监测全球海洋盐度。

en: In the past decade , with the successful launch of the soil moisture and ocean salinity  satellite by the European Space Agency   , the Aquarius / SAC-D satellite  , and the soil moisture active passive  satellite  by the National Aeronautics and Space Administration  , global sea surface salinity  observations from space have become possible and a significant improvement has been made to understand the ocean dynamics and climate change .
zh: 在过去十年中,随着欧洲空间局成功发射的土壤湿度和海洋盐度卫星,以及国家航空航天局发射的土壤湿度主动消极卫星,全球海洋表面盐度的空间观测成为可能,为了解海洋动态和气候变化作出了重大改进。

en: The early concept of remote sensing of SSS has been demonstrated in the late 1970s with observations by Skylab  and two airborne L - band radiometry experiments  .
zh: SSS遥感的早期概念在70年代晚期通过Skylab的观测和两个空中L带无线电测量实验证明了.

en: At the end of 1990 , two airborne microwave interferometers , the electronically scanned thinned array radiometer  and the scanning low - frequency microwave radiometer  , successfully produced SSS maps in coastal areas in agreement with in - situ measurements with an accuracy of about 1 psu .
zh: 1990年底, 两台 空中 微波干涉仪 、 电子扫描薄型阵列雷达仪和扫描低频微波雷达仪, 成功地在沿岸地区与现场测量的配合下,制作了大约1 psu的SSS地图.

en: However , the sensitivity of satellite measured brightness temperature to SSS is quite low .
zh: 然而, 卫星测量的亮度温度对SSS的敏感度相当低.

en: For example , the sensitivity of vertically polarized brightness temperature to SSS variation is 0.4 to 0.8 K/psu for different observing angles and sea surface temperatures  , and it is only 0.2 to 0.6 K/psu for the horizontal polarization brightness temperature  .
zh: 例如,垂直偏振的亮度温度对SSS变异的敏感度为不同观测角度和海面温度0.4至0.8K/psu,水平偏振的亮度温度只有0.2至0.6K/psu。

en: Thus , remote sensing of SSS requires a highly accurate retrieval model .
zh: 因此, SSS遥感需要一种高精度的检索模型。

en: It is widely accepted that the corrections of the sea surface and atmospheric effects are essential for remote sensing of SSS , since these effects could alter the value of sensor - measured brightness temperature and introduce errors into the SSS retrieval process .
zh: 人们普遍认为海洋表面和大气效应的修正对于遥感SSS至关重要,因为这些效应可能改变传感器测定的亮度温度值,并使SSS检索过程产生误差。

en: Besides the atmospheric effects , the increasing of sea surface emissivity due to the sea surface roughness and foam effects is the main source of error , which could significantly hamper the accuracy of SSS retrieval  .
zh: 除大气效应外,由于海面粗糙度和泡沫效应导致海面发射率的增加是误差的主要原因,这可能严重阻碍了SSS检索的准确性。

en: Over the past decades , the correction for sea surface roughness effects were studied based on the in - situ and airborne measurements ; for example , the experiments made from a tower  , wind and salinity experiments   , airborne Passive - Active L - band Sensor  campaign  and Combined Airborne Radio instruments for Ocean and Land Studies  campaigns  .
zh: 过去几十年来, 对海面粗糙度的影响进行了基于现场和空中测量的修正研究; 例如, 从塔上进行的实验, 风和盐度实验, 空中进行的 passive - active L - band 传感器运动和海洋和陆地研究联合空中无线电仪器运动.

en: Many rough surface emission models have also been developed based on the theoretical and empirical methods .
zh: 基于理论和实证方法,开发了许多粗糙表面排放模型。

en: Among these models , the small - slope approximation / small perturbation model   , two scale model   and empirical / semi-empirical models  have been widely used by the research community and implemented in different satellite data processing systems .
zh: 在这些模型中,小坡近似/小扰动模型、二维尺度模型和实证/半实证模型被研究界广泛应用,并在不同卫星数据处理系统中实现。

en: As the foam effect is significant at high wind speed conditions  due to strong wave breaking , it has been corrected by numerous models ; for example , the semi-empirical models  and radiative transfer equation  based models  , which were developed to estimate the foam covered sea surface emissivity .
zh: 由于泡沫效应在高风速条件下由于强波破坏而显著,已经通过数种模型加以修正;例如,半empirical模型和放射性转移方程的模型,是用来估计泡沫覆盖海面发射率的。

en: Although many theoretical and empirical models have been developed , some problems are still unsolved .
zh: 虽然有许多理论和实证模型已经开发,但一些问题仍未解决。

en: For example , the TSM originally proposed to estimate brightness temperature at higher frequencies , uses the sea surface wave spectrum by multiplying a factor of 2 .
zh: 例如,TSM最初提议在较高频率估计亮度温度,利用海面波谱乘法2。

en: Moreover , the sea surface reflection of downwelling atmospheric emission is another contribution to satellite - observed brightness temperature  , thus the determination of the cutoff wavenumber is required not only for sea surface emission but also for reflection .
zh: 此外, 下游大气排放的海面反射是卫星观测的亮度温度的另一个贡献,因此对海面排放的断层波谱的测定不仅是海面辐射的测定,也是反射的测定。

en: The wind - roughened sea surface is associated with the increased brightness temperature  , which induces regional biases when applied to different areas  .
zh: 风变的海面与提高亮度温度有关, 在不同地区应用时会引起区域偏差。

en: Furthermore , the satellite measurements of SSS are hampered by the effect of radio frequency interference  in offshore areas of China  , which causes a large amount of data to be discarded  .
zh: 此外,卫星测定的SSS受到中国海滨地区无线电频干扰的影响,造成大量数据被丢弃。

en: Thus , the compatibility of these models in coastal area of China needs to be assessed and tested in order to achieve higher accuracies of SSS from the space - borne observations .
zh: 因此, 在我国沿海地区对这些模型的相容性需要评估和测试,以提高空间载体观测的SSS精度。

en: We have shown that the addition of an artificial tail during ontogeny can produce postural and locomotory changes in chickens , consistent with the posture and kinematics inferred for non-avian dinosaurs  ,  ,  .
zh: 我们已经证明,在生化过程中添加人工尾巴可以产生鸡的姿态和运动变化,符合非鸟类恐龙所推断的姿态和运动学。

en: The posterior displacement of the CoM produced a more vertically oriented femur during standing  , and increased femoral retraction and decreased knee flexion during walking .
zh: 腰椎后位移使腰椎在站立时更垂直,腰椎收缩增加,腰椎在走路时的弯曲减少。

en: These results indicate a shift from the standard bird , knee - driven bipedal locomotion to a more hip - driven locomotion , typical of crocodilians  , mammals , and hypothetically , bipedal non-avian dinosaurs .
zh: 这些结果表明,从标准的鸟类,双脚驱动的双脚运动转变为更强的臀部驱动的双脚运动,这是典型的鳄鱼, 哺乳动物, 以及假设的, 双脚非鸟类恐龙.

en: These postural and kinematics changes can not be attributed to an increased weight as subjects of the control - weight group did not show the same changes as the experimental group .
zh: 这些姿态和运动变化不能归因于体重增加,因为控制体重组的实验组没有表现出与实验组相同的变化。

en: Therefore , we conclude that the location of the CoM can be a key factor in defining limb posture and kinematics .
zh: 因此,我们认为坐标定位是确定肢体姿态和运动学的关键因素。

en: It has been proposed that the relative mass of the CFL can be used as a proxy to estimate the relative importance of femoral retraction during locomotion in extinct bipedal dinosaurs  .
zh: 研究表明,CFL的相对质量可以作为代数来估计灭绝双脚恐龙在运动过程中的肢体退缩的相对重要性。

en: Our data show that for a given CFL mass , femoral retraction can be greatly affected by the location of the CoM and limb postures .
zh: 我们的数据表明,对于一个特定的CFL质量,腰椎收缩可能受到CoM位置和肢体姿态的影响很大。

en: Differences in limb orientation can produce substantial differences in loading regimes on limb bones .
zh: 肢体定位的差异可能导致肢体骨头的负载方式发生重大差异。

en: The orientation of each limb element to the ground reaction force  indicates the relative contribution of axial and bending forces to external bone loading : a bone perpendicular to the GRF is expected experience greater bending forces than one parallel to the GRF .
zh: 每个肢体元素向地面反应力的方向表明轴向和弯曲力对外骨负荷的相对贡献:对GRF垂直的骨体应经历比GRF平行的骨体更大的弯曲力。

en: Because bone adapts to its loading environment  ,  ,  , geometric information from limb bones , such as lengths and cross-sectional geometry , are expected to reflect differences in loading regimes and consequently in behavior and locomotor patterns  ,  .
zh: 由于骨头适应其载荷环境,所以从肢体骨头的几何信息,如长度和截面几何,预计会反映载荷方式的差异,从而反映行为和运动模式的差异。

en: In this framework , scaling differences in femoral geometry between non-avian theropods and birds have been suggested to be the result of postural differences between these groups  ,  .
zh: 在这一框架中,非鸟类恐龙和鸟类的足形几何上的尺度差异被认为是这些群体的姿态差异的结果。

en: Birds have relatively shorter , stouter femora than non-avian theropods , presumed to be associated with more horizontal orientation .
zh: 鸟类的雌性比非鸟类的雌性较短,雌性比非鸟类的雌性较长,被认为是具有较水平的定位。

en: Experimental manipulations of femoral orientation in chickens suggest that torsional loads increase as the femur becomes more horizontal  supporting the idea that postural differences could be reflected in differences in limb cross-sectional geometry .
zh: 实验研究表明,在鸡身上的股骨定位上,随着股骨的水平化,扭曲负荷增加,从而支持 postural differences could be reflected in differences in limb cross-sectional geometry 。

en: To test if the postural differences observed in this study produced changes in limb morphology , we measured the length and mid-shaft cross-sectional properties of the femur in all our individuals .
zh: 为了测试本研究所观察的姿态差异是否产生肢体形态的变化,我们测量了所有个体的股骨的长度和中轴横断特性。

en: However , we found no differences in cross-sectional femoral geometry among groups .
zh: 然而,我们没有发现群体间断裂性股骨几何的差异。

en: Maybe this is not surprising considering that a recent study analyzing the relationship between posture and femur cross-sectional properties failed to find differences between birds and non-avian theropods  , suggesting that simple morphological correlates of limb posture should be used with caution .
zh: 也许这并不令人惊讶,因为最近的一项分析姿态与股骨横断特性的关系研究未能发现鸟类和非鸟类恐龙之间的差异,这表明肢体姿态的简单形态相关性应谨慎地使用。

en: Interestingly , femur length tended to be greater in the experimental group than in both the control - weight and the control group  , although not signifcant .
zh: 有趣的是, 实验组的阴茎长度比控制组和控制组的长度大, 虽然并不显著.

en: Longer limbs are expected to experience larger bending and torsional moments , so the fact that experimental animals had longer femora suggests that limb verticalization reduces these moments by orienting the bone more parallel to the GRF line of action .
zh: 较长的肢体预计会经历较大的弯曲和扭矩,因此实验动物具有较长的股骨的事实表明,肢体垂直化通过将骨头更平行地定位于GRF行动线,减少了弯曲和扭矩。

en: If this were the case , it would support the idea that non-avian theropods have relatively thinner femora than extant birds because of postural differences  .
zh: 如果这样的话,这将支持非鸟类恐龙由于其姿态不同而比现存的鸟类有相对较薄的雌性。

en: The present study was inspired by Carrano & Biewener  but our results differed markedly from theirs .
zh: 本研究是由卡拉诺和比维耶纳(Carrano&Biewener)的启发,但我们的结果与他们的结果有很大的不同。

en: We suggest that the different outcomes are due to the distinct rearing and exercising conditions used in each study , in addition to the different artificial tails used .
zh: 我们建议,不同的结果是由于在每次研究中使用的不同养育和运动条件,以及不同的人工尾巴。

en: First , our experimental subjects lived in a large enclosure under conditions that allowed them to exercise all day long .
zh: 首先,我们的实验对象生活在一个大屋子里,在 conditions that allowed them to exercise all day long。

en: In Carrano & Biewener 's study , experimental chickens were housed individually in smaller cages and were only allowed to exercise 20 minutes per day , 3 days per week , from the 6th to the 12th week .
zh: 在卡拉诺和比维耶纳的研究中,实验鸡被单独安置在较小的笼子里,只允许每天锻炼20分钟,每周3天,从第六到十二周。

en: Second , in their study , a lead mass was attached at the distal end of the experimental tail , probably generating excessive displacement of the CoM .
zh: 其次,在他们的研究中,在实验尾巴的远端安装了铅质,可能造成了CoM的过度位移。

en: During avian evolution , the loss of the CFL and reorganization of the pelvic musculature  ,  could have made birds unable to properly carry a postacetabular mass equivalent to that carried by non-avian theropods  ,  .
zh: 在鸟类进化过程中,CFL的损耗和骨盆肌肉的重组,可能使鸟类无法正确地携带与非鸟类特罗波德所携带的同等的邮筒体质量。

en: In our experimental setup , we attempted to more closely mimic non-avian theropod tail morphology , in which mass is distributed through a distally tapering tail .
zh: 在我们的实验装置中,我们试图更密切地模仿非鸟类恐龙尾巴形态学,在这种形态学中,物体通过不稳定的尾巴分布。

en: Thus , our study seems to have generated a more gradual and less pronounced change in the moment of inertia produced by the artificial tail , allowing experimental subjects to adjust to the posterior mass by adopting a more vertical position of the femur while standing .
zh: 因此,我们的研究似乎在人工尾巴产生的惯性时产生更渐进和更不明显的变化,使实验对象通过在站立时采取更垂直的腿部位置来适应后部质量。

en: Interestingly , the femur kinematics during walking in our control - weight group resembles the results reported in the experimental subjects of Carrano and Biewener .
zh: 有趣的是, 在我们的控制体重组中走路时的腿部运动与卡拉诺和比维斯纳的实验对象报告的结果相似。

en: This suggests that their results could be partially explained as a response to the increased loading rather than to the displacement of the CoM .
zh: 这表明,它们的结果可以部分解释为对加载增加的反应,而不是对M组的转移。

en: Due to the phylogenetic relatedness , extant birds have been used to inform functional aspects of non-avian dinosaur locomotion .
zh: 由于生物学相关性,现存的鸟类被用于 inform非鸟类恐龙运动的功能方面。

en: However , substantial differences in hindlimb morphology between these groups make difficult to assess the validity of inferences obtained from such studies .
zh: 然而,这些群组间的后肢形态的显著差异使得很难评估从这些研究中得出的结论的有效性。

en: It has even been proposed that , due to functional convergence , mammals might be a better system to study bipedal dinosaur locomotion  ,  , but the results reported here show that important aspects of non-avian theropod locomotion can be experimentally recreated in modern birds .
zh: 甚至有人提出,由于功能收敛,哺乳动物可能是研究双脚恐龙运动的更好的系统,但报告的结果表明,非鸟类恐龙运动的重要方面可以在现代鸟类中进行实验重建。

en: One caveat , however , is that our approach uses tail reduction as the mechanism for CoM displacement despite it has been recently shown that the evolutionary change in CoM position was driven instead by forelimb enlargement  .
zh: 然而,我们的方法采用尾部减小作为COM位移的机制,尽管最近已经表明,CoM位置的进化变化是由前肢的扩大所驱动。

en: Nonetheless , this does not mean that tail reduction had no effect on CoM displacement , but that it was not the most important factor .
zh: 尽管如此,这并不意味着尾部减少对COM迁移没有影响,但并不是最重要的因素。

en: Ideally we would have increased tail mass and reduced pectoral limb mass but , unfortunately , this is not experimentally feasible .
zh: 理想情况下,我们将增加尾巴质量和减少颈部肢体质量,但不幸的是,这在实验上是不可能的。

en: We argue that our experimental approach , although not perfect , was effective in displacing the CoM and recreating locomotor patterns expected in non-avian theropods .
zh: 我们认为我们的实验方法虽然并不完美,但能够有效地取代CoM并 recreating locomotor patterns expected in non-avian theropods。

en: Thus , we expect that careful phenotypic manipulation of extant birds can open new avenues of experimental investigation into unexplored facets of dinosaur locomotor mechanics and energetics , providing a more nuanced understanding of the relationship between form and function in dinosaur evolution .
zh: 因此,我们期望对现存的鸟类进行仔细的 fenotypic 操纵,能开辟新的实验研究途径,对恐龙运动力学和动力学的未知方面进行探索,为恐龙进化中形式与功能之间的关系提供更精细的理解。

en: It is no exaggeration to say that HBO ’s Game of Thrones is more than just a television series or a successful brand :
zh: 说HBO的“王位游戏”不仅仅是一个电视系列或成功的品牌是夸张的:

en: it is a transmedia system in the sense first used by Marsha Kinder  and popularized by Henry Jenkins  , in which media - hopping networks of intertextualities extend the “ storyworld ” of an original production .
zh: 它是马莎·基恩特首次使用并由亨利·詹金斯 popularized的跨媒体系统,其中媒体跳跃网络的跨文本性扩展了原产物的“故事世界 ”。

en: Given the volume of content this represents , it is easy to forget that the television series itself is an adaptation of a book series with a pre-existing fandom .
zh: 考虑到这个内容的数量,很容易忘记电视连续剧本身是一部带有原先的狂热的书系列的adaptation。

en: As such , the Game of Thrones storyworld represents a remarkably rich and challenging environment for fans old and new , who must negotiate an increasingly complex network of paratexts and intertexts in order to fully engage with its narratives .
zh: 因此,《王位游戏》的故事世界对于老和新迷来说是一个非常丰富而充满挑战的环境,他们必须谈判一个日益复杂的参数和语境网络,以便充分参与其叙事。

en: In this sense , fans of the series represent an emerging model for cultural consumption that should be carefully explored .
zh: 在这方面,系列的粉丝代表了一个新兴的文化消费模式,应该仔细研究。

en: Transmedia systems , like that exemplified by Game of Thrones , are becoming increasingly prevalent  ; these systems demonstrate , in microcosm , the global challenge of managing the fire - hose flow of information in contemporary postdigital society .
zh: 跨媒体系统,如《王位游戏》的例子,正日益普遍; 这些系统在微观空间中显示了管理现代后数字社会信息的消防管流动的全球挑战.

en: The study of how people , as fans , access and manage information within a transmedia system provides valuable insight that contributes not only to practitioners and scholars of the media industry , but to the wider context of cultural studies , by offering findings on this new model of the fan as consumer and information - user .
zh: 研究人们作为粉丝如何在跨媒体系统中获取和管理信息提供了宝贵的洞察力,不仅对媒体业的实践者和学者作出了贡献,而且对文化研究的更广泛范围作出了贡献,通过提供关于 fan 作为消费者和信息使用者的新模式的发现。

en: For us , as digital humanists , defining the “ transmedia fan ” is of particular relevance as we seek to understand contemporary social and cultural transformations engendered by digital technologies .
zh: 对于我们,作为数字人文主义者,定义“跨媒体爱好者”具有特殊意义,因为我们试图理解数字技术所产生的当代社会和文化转变。

en: As a first step in defining the “ transmedia fan ” , the current project undertakes a comparative discourse analysis of online conversations of Game of Thrones fans .
zh: 作为定义“跨媒体粉丝”的第一步,本项目对“王位游戏”粉丝的在线对话进行比较性讨论分析。

en: One of the most dramatic plot developments in the source material  was adapted to the screen in the penultimate episode of the third season , “ The Rains of Castamere ”  .
zh: 剧本中最戏剧性的情节之一在第三季的最后一集《卡斯塔米尔的雨》中被 adapted to the screen.

en: Readers of the book series had long anticipated and dreaded the events of the “ Red Wedding ” , while fans of the show unfamiliar with Martin ’s narrative were largely taken unawares by the pivotal episode .
zh: 本书系列的读者早已预料到和害怕“红婚礼”的事件,而对马丁的叙事不熟悉节目的粉丝则大体上没有意识到这一关键事件。

en: Since the television series ’ inception , writers at The AV Club have written two critical reviews for each episode :
zh: 自电视系列开始以来,AV俱乐部的编剧们对每一集都写了两个评论:

en: What results are two completely separate reviews of “ The Rains of Castamere ” which in turn document the fans ’ reactions to the episode in the form of user comment threads :
zh: 结果是“卡斯塔米尔的雨”的两个完全独立的评论,这反过来以用户评论线程的形式记录了粉丝对该集的反应:

en: As a pilot project , the current work takes the content of both comment threads — a corpus of approximately 5,600 comments — and analyzes each thread separately using a qualitative coding method aligned with constructivist grounded theory  .
zh: 作为一个试点项目,目前的工作将两个注释线程的内容 — — 约5,600个注释库 — — 分开分析每个线程,使用与建设主义基础理论一致的定性编码方法。

en: Through this analysis , a categorization of themes emerges illustrating tactics for negotiating intertexts and paratexts unique to each group of fans .
zh: 通过这一分析,提出一种主题分类,说明了对每个 Fan 群体独特的相互语文和副语文进行谈判的策略。

en: These themes fall under two broad categories :
zh: 这些主题属于两个广泛的范畴:

en: A comparison of categories and sub-categories between both groups provides preliminary findings to support an emergent model , or models , of the “ transmedia fan ” .
zh: 两组类别和分类别的比较为支持“跨媒体迷”的新兴模型提供了初步的发现。

en: The present research represents a first step in exploring the impact of transmedia systems , as exemplified by Game of Thrones , through the study of fans .
zh: 本研究是探索跨媒体系统的影响的第一步,以《王位游戏》为例,通过对粉丝的研究。

en: The question posed by this research is , fundamentally , an examination of how the problem of “ access ” is framed in postdigital society from the perspective of the consumer .
zh: 本文提出的问题是, 从消费者的角度来看,如何在后数字社会构造“访问”问题。

en: Future research should explore the negotiation tactics observed in transmedia fans using the principles of De Certeau ’s  everyday life practice , in order to extend its application to the broader context of modern - day consumers .
zh: 未来研究应探讨在跨媒体粉丝中观察到的谈判策略,使用德·塞特奥的日常生活实践原则,以便将其应用于现代消费者的更广泛的范围。

en: The current study will contribute to the development of further qualitative and quantitative research that will more clearly define the information behaviors of the transmedia fan .
zh: 本研究将有助于进一步的质量和定量研究,以更明确地界定跨媒体风扇的信息行为。

en: This project is of relevance to researchers in media studies , fan studies , information studies and digital humanities .
zh: 该项目对媒体研究 、 粉丝研究 、 信息研究和数字人文科学的研究者具有重要意义.

en: Daniel Bernoulli FRS  was a Swiss mathematician and physicist and was one of the many prominent mathematicians in the Bernoulli family .
zh: 丹尼尔·伯努利(Daniel Bernoulli)是瑞士数学家和物理学家,是伯努利家族的众多著名数学家之一。

en: He is particularly remembered for his applications of mathematics to mechanics , especially fluid mechanics , and for his pioneering work in probability and statistics .
zh: 他特别被铭记为数学应用于力学,特别是流体力学,以及他在概率和统计方面的先驱工作。

en: His name is commemorated in the Bernoulli 's principle , a particular example of the conservation of energy , which describes the mathematics of the mechanism underlying the operation of two important technologies of the 20th century : the carburetor and the airplane wing .
zh: 他的名字被记载在伯努利的原理中,是一个特别的能源节约的例子,它描述了20世纪两个重要的技术操作基础的机制的数学:碳化剂和飞机翼。

en: Daniel Bernoulli was born in Groningen , in the Netherlands , into a family of distinguished mathematicians .
zh: 丹尼尔·伯努利出生于荷兰的格罗宁格兰,在一个杰出的数学家家庭中。

en: The Bernoulli family came originally from Antwerp , at that time in the Spanish Netherlands , but emigrated to escape the Spanish persecution of the Huguenots .
zh: 伯努利家族最初来自安特卫普,当时在西班牙荷兰,但为了逃避西班牙人迫害而移民。

en: After a brief period in Frankfurt the family moved to Basel , in Switzerland .
zh: 在法兰克福短暂停留后,全家搬到瑞士巴塞尔。

en: Daniel was a son of Johann Bernoulli  and a nephew of Jacob Bernoulli  .
zh: 丹尼尔是约翰·伯努利的儿子,是雅各布·伯努利的侄子。

en: He had two brothers , Niklaus and Johann II .
zh: 他有两个兄弟,尼劳斯和约翰二世。

en: Daniel Bernoulli was described by W. W. Rouse Ball as " by far the ablest of the younger Bernoullis " .
zh: 丹尼尔·伯努利被W·W·鲁斯·鲍尔描述为“ 远比年轻的伯努利最能干 ” 。

en: He is said to have had a bad relationship with his father .
zh: 据说他和父亲的关系不好。

en: Upon both of them entering and tying for first place in a scientific contest at the University of Paris , Johann , unable to bear the " shame " of being compared Daniel 's equal , banned Daniel from his house .
zh: 在他们两个进入和绑定的第一次在巴黎大学的科学竞赛中,约翰,不能忍受与丹尼尔平等的“羞耻 ”, 禁止丹尼尔离开他的家。

en: Johann Bernoulli also plagiarized some key ideas from Daniel 's book Hydrodynamica in his own book Hydraulica which he backdated to before Hydrodynamica .
zh: 约翰·伯努利(Johann Bernoulli)也抄袭了丹尼尔的著作《水力学》中的一些关键思想,在他的著作《水力学》中,他将它追溯到水力学之前。

en: Despite Daniel 's attempts at reconciliation , his father carried the grudge until his death .
zh: 尽管丹尼尔试图和解,但他的父亲一直怀有怨恨直到他去世。

en: Around schooling age , his father , Johann , encouraged him to study business , there being poor rewards awaiting a mathematician .
zh: 大约在学龄时,他的父亲约翰鼓励他学习商业,等待数学家的报酬很差。

en: However , Daniel refused , because he wanted to study mathematics .
zh: 然而,丹尼尔拒绝了,因为他想学习数学。

en: He later gave in to his father 's wish and studied business .
zh: 后来他放弃了父亲的愿望,学习了商业。

en: His father then asked him to study in medicine , and Daniel agreed under the condition that his father would teach him mathematics privately , which they continued for some time .
zh: 他的父亲随后要求他学习医学,但丹尼尔同意他父亲会私下教他数学的条件下,他们继续了一段时间。

en: Daniel studied medicine at Basel , Heidelberg , and Strasbourg , and earned a PhD in anatomy and botany in 1721 .
zh: 丹尼尔在巴塞尔、海德堡和斯特拉斯堡学习医学,并在1721年获得解剖学和植物学博士学位。

en: He was a contemporary and close friend of Leonhard Euler .
zh: 他是莱昂哈德·欧勒的当代和亲密的朋友。

en: He went to St. Petersburg in 1724 as professor of mathematics , but was very unhappy there , and a temporary illness in 1733 gave him an excuse for leaving St. Petersburg .
zh: 他于1724年前往圣彼得堡担任数学教授,但在那里很不开心,而1733年暂时的病使他离开圣彼得堡的借口。

en: He returned to the University of Basel , where he successively held the chairs of medicine , metaphysics , and natural philosophy until his death .
zh: 他回到巴塞尔大学,在那里他连续担任医学、形体物理和自然哲学的主席,直到他去世。

en: In May , 1750 he was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society .
zh: 1750年5月,他当选为皇家学会院士。

en: His earliest mathematical work was the Exercitationes  , published in 1724 with the help of Goldbach .
zh: 他最早的数学作品是1724年以戈尔德巴赫的帮助出版的演习。

en: Two years later he pointed out for the first time the frequent desirability of resolving a compound motion into motions of translation and motion of rotation .
zh: 两年后,他首次指出了解决复合运动的经常性需要,即转换运动和旋转运动。

en: it resembles Joseph Louis Lagrange 's Mécanique Analytique in being arranged so that all the results are consequences of a single principle , namely , conservation of energy .
zh: 它与约瑟夫·路易斯·拉格朗(Joseph Louis Lagrange)的机械分析(Mecanique Analytique)相似,其安排使得所有结果都是单一原则的后果,即能量的节约。

en: This was followed by a memoir on the theory of the tides , to which , conjointly with the memoirs by Euler and Colin Maclaurin , a prize was awarded by the French Academy : these three memoirs contain all that was done on this subject between the publication of Isaac Newton 's Philosophiae Naturalis Principia Mathematica and the investigations of Pierre - Simon Laplace .
zh: 接着是关于潮汐理论的回忆录,与欧勒和科林·麦克劳林的回忆录一起,由法国学院颁发了奖品:这三个回忆录包含了 Isaac Newton's Philosophiae Naturalis Principia Mathematica和皮埃尔-西蒙·拉普拉斯的调查。

en: Bernoulli also wrote a large number of papers on various mechanical questions , especially on problems connected with vibrating strings , and the solutions given by Brook Taylor and by Jean le Rond d'Alembert .
zh: 伯努利还写了许多关于各种机械问题的论文,特别是有关振动弦的问题,以及布鲁克·泰勒(Brook Taylor)和让·勒·朗(Jean le Rond d'Alembert)给出的解决方案。

en: Together Bernoulli and Euler tried to discover more about the flow of fluids .
zh: 伯努利和欧勒一起尝试发现更多关于流体的流动。

en: In particular , they wanted to know about the relationship between the speed at which blood flows and its pressure .
zh: 他们特别想了解血流速度与血压之间的关系。

en: To investigate this , Daniel experimented by puncturing the wall of a pipe with a small open ended straw and noted that the height to which the fluid rose up the straw was related to fluid 's pressure in the pipe .
zh: 为了研究这一点,丹尼尔通过用一个小开端的稻草穿过管壁进行实验,并注意到流体上升的高度与管中的流体压力有关。

en: Soon physicians all over Europe were measuring patients ' blood pressure by sticking point - ended glass tubes directly into their arteries .
zh: 不久,在欧洲各地的医生们用尖端的玻璃管直接往动脉中测定病人的血压.

en: It was not until about 170 years later , in 1896 that an Italian doctor discovered a less painful method which is still in use today .
zh: 直到大约170年后,1896年,一位意大利医生发现了一种较少痛苦的方法,至今仍在使用。

en: However , Bernoulli 's method of measuring pressure is still used today in modern aircraft to measure the speed of the air passing the plane ; that is its air speed .
zh: 然而,伯努利的测量压力方法至今仍被用于现代飞机测量通过飞机的空气的速度;这就是它的空气速度。

en: Taking his discoveries further , Daniel Bernoulli now returned to his earlier work on Conservation of Energy .
zh: 继续他的发现, 丹尼尔·伯努利现在回到了他的早期的能量保存工作.

en: It was known that a moving body exchanges its kinetic energy for potential energy when it gains height .
zh: 人们知道,当身体升高时,运动的体能与潜在的体能交换。

en: Daniel realised that in a similar way , a moving fluid exchanges its kinetic energy for pressure .
zh: 丹尼尔意识到,类似地,一个流动的流体交换其运动能量以压力。

en: Mathematically this law is now written : ½ ρ u 2 + P = constant where P is pressure , ρ is the density of the fluid and u is its velocity .
zh: 数学上这个规律现在写成: 1⁄2 ρ u 2 + P = 常数,其中 P 是压力, ρ 是流体的密度, u 是其速度。

en: A consequence of this law is that if the velocity increases then the pressure falls .
zh: 这个规律的后果是,如果速度增加,那么压力就会下降。

en: This is exploited by the wing of an aeroplane which is designed to create an area above its surface where the air velocity increases .
zh: 这由飞机的翅膀利用,飞机的翅膀被设计为在其表面上创造一个区域,那里的空气速度增加。

en: The pressure in this area is lower than that under the wing , so the wing is pushed upwards by the relatively higher pressure under the wing .
zh: 这个区域的气压比翅膀的气压低,因此翅膀的气压相对较高。

en: Byron received his early formal education at Aberdeen Grammar School , and in August 1799 entered the school of Dr. William Glennie , in Dulwich .
zh: 1799年8月,拜伦进入杜尔维奇的威廉·格伦尼博士学校。

en: Placed under the care of a Dr. Bailey , he was encouraged to exercise in moderation but not restrain himself from " violent " bouts in an attempt to overcompensate for his deformed foot .
zh: 在贝利医生的照顾下, 他被鼓励以温和的姿态进行运动,但不要让自己受到“ 暴力 ” 的打击,以试图过分补偿他畸形的脚。

en: His mother interfered with his studies , often withdrawing him from school , with the result that he lacked discipline and his classical studies were neglected .
zh: 他的母亲干涉了他的学习,经常把他从学校撤退,结果他缺乏纪律,他的古典学习被忽视。

en: An undistinguished student and an unskilled cricketer , he did represent the school during the very first Eton v Harrow cricket match at Lord 's in 1805 .
zh: 1805年,他作为一名无名的学生和一个不熟练的板球运动员,在Lord's第一次埃顿对哈罗的板球比赛中确实代表了学校。

en: His lack of moderation was not restricted to physical exercise .
zh: 他缺乏节制并不局限于体育锻炼。

en: His mother wrote , " He has no indisposition that I know of but love , desperate love , the worst of all maladies in my opinion . In short , the boy is distractedly in love with Miss Chaworth . "
zh: 他的母亲写道, “ 他没有我所知道的任何迷恋,只有爱,绝望的爱, 在我看来是所有疾病中最坏的. 简言之, 这个男孩心不在焉地爱上了查沃斯小姐. ”

en: Byron finally returned in January 1804 ,  to a more settled period which saw the formation of a circle of emotional involvements with other Harrow boys , which he recalled with great vividness : " My school friendships were with me passions  . "
zh: 1804年1月,拜伦终于回到了更平静的时期,看到与其他哈罗男孩的情感交往的圈子形成,他用极大的生动性回忆道:“我的学校友谊与我有着激情。

en: The most enduring of those was with John FitzGibbon , 2nd Earl of Clare — four years Byron 's junior — whom he was to meet unexpectedly many years later in Italy  .
zh: 其中最持久的是约翰·菲茨·吉布本(John FitzGibbon), 克莱尔伯爵二世 — — 比伦的年仅四岁 — — 他不久后在意大利意外地会见他。

en: Letters to Byron in the John Murray archive contain evidence of a previously unremarked if short - lived romantic relationship with a younger boy at Harrow , John Thomas Claridge .
zh: 在约翰·莫雷的档案中写给拜伦的信中,有证据显示他与哈罗的一个小男孩约翰·托马斯·克莱里奇有过一段短暂的浪漫关系。

en: Sure some stronger impulse vibrates here , Which whispers friendship will be doubly dear To one , who thus for kindred hearts must roam , And seek abroad , the love denied at home .
zh: 当然有些更强烈的冲动在这儿颤动,这使友谊成为双重的亲人,因此对亲人的心灵必须漫游,在国外寻找,在家里被剥夺的爱。

en: The following autumn , he went up to Trinity College , Cambridge ,  where he met and formed a close friendship with the younger John Edleston .
zh: 接下来的秋天,他前往剑桥的特里尼蒂学院,在那里他与年轻的约翰·埃德勒斯顿结识并建立了亲密的友谊。

en: About his " protégé " he wrote , " He has been my almost constant associate since October , 1805 , when I entered Trinity College . His voice first attracted my attention , his countenance fixed it , and his manners attached me to him for ever . "
zh: 关于他的“ protégé ”, 他写道, “ 他是我从1805年10月进入三一学院以来的几乎连续的同伙人。 他的声音第一次引起了我的注意,他的面容 fixed it, and his manners attached me to him forever. ”

en: In his memory Byron composed Thyrza , a series of elegies .
zh: 在他的记忆中,拜伦创作了一系列的诗歌。

en: In later years , he described the affair as " a violent , though pure love and passion " .
zh: 后来, 他把这件事描述为“ 暴力, 虽然纯粹的爱和激情 ” 。

en: This statement , however , needs to be read in the context of hardening public attitudes toward homosexuality in England and the severe sanctions  against convicted or even suspected offenders .
zh: 然而,这一声明在加强公众对同性恋的态度以及对被定罪或甚至被怀疑的罪犯实施严厉的制裁的背景下需要阅读。

en: The liaison , on the other hand , may well have been " pure " out of respect for Edleston 's innocence , in contrast to the  more sexually overt relations experienced at Harrow School .
zh: 另一方面, 这种联系可能是“ 纯粹 ” 的“ 尊重爱德尔斯顿的无辜 ”, 与哈罗学校的更公开性关系相比。

en: Also while at Cambridge he formed lifelong friendships with men such as John Cam Hobhouse , who initiated him into the Cambridge Whig Club , which endorsed liberal politics ,  and Francis Hodgson , a Fellow at King 's College , with whom he corresponded on literary and other matters until the end of his life .
zh: 在剑桥期间,他与诸如约翰·卡姆·霍布豪斯(John Cam Hobhouse)、支持自由政治的剑桥威格俱乐部(Cambridge Whig Club)和国王学院的一名研究员弗朗西斯·霍格森(Francis Hodgson)等人建立了终身友谊,他与他们在文学和其他事务上一直通信,直到他生命的尽头。

en: Born in Tianjin with ancestry in Changzhou , Jiangsu province , Chao went to the United States with a Boxer Indemnity Scholarship in 1910 to study mathematics and physics at Cornell University , where he was a classmate and lifelong friend of Hu Shih , the leader of the New Culture Movement .
zh: 出生于天津,祖先于江蘇省长州,1910年赴美国获得拳击死刑奖学金,在康奈尔大学学习数学和物理,他是新文化运动领袖胡志华的同学和终身朋友。

en: He then became interested in philosophy , and earned a Ph.D. in philosophy from Harvard University in 1918 with a dissertation entitled " Continuity : Study in Methodology " .
zh: 后来他对哲学产生了兴趣,并于1918年从哈佛大学获得哲学博士学位,题为“ 连续性 : 方法学研究 ” 。

en: Already in college his interests had turned to music and languages .
zh: 在他大学期间,他对音乐和语言的兴趣已经转向了。

en: He spoke German and French fluently and some Japanese , and he had a reading knowledge of ancient Greek and Latin .
zh: 他流利地讲了德语和法语,还有一些日语,而且他对古希腊和拉丁语有阅读知识。

en: He served as Bertrand Russell 's interpreter when Russell visited China in 1920 .
zh: 1920年罗素访问中国时,他担任了贝特朗·罗素的口译员.

en: In his My Linguistic Autobiography , he wrote of his ability to pick up a Chinese dialect quickly , without much effort .
zh: 在《我的语言自传》中,他写道他能快速地掌握汉语方言, effortlessly。

en: Chao possessed a natural gift for hearing fine distinctions in pronunciation that was said to be " legendary for its acuity " , enabling him to record the sounds of various dialects with a high degree of accuracy .
zh: 卡奥拥有一种自然的听力特长,据说是“ 以其敏锐的特长 ”, 使他能够高精度地记录各种方言的声音。

en: He returned to China in 1920 , marrying the physician Yang Buwei there that year .
zh: 1920年,他回到中国,在那一年嫁给杨武伟医生。

en: The ceremony was simple , rather than the noisy traditional wedding , attended only by Hu Shih and one other friend .
zh: 婚礼很简单, 而不是吵闹的传统婚礼, 只有胡志和另一位朋友出席.

en: Hu 's account of it in the newspapers made the couple a model of modern marriage for China 's New Culture generation .
zh: 胡锦涛在报纸上的报道使这对夫妇成为中国新文化一代现代婚姻的典范。

en: Chao taught mathematics at Tsinghua University and , one year later , returned to the United States to teach at Harvard .
zh: 蔡教授清华大学数学,一年后回到美国,在哈佛教授。

en: He again returned to China in 1925 , teaching at Tsinghua , and beginning a survey of the Wu dialects in 1926 .
zh: 1925年,他又回到中国,在清华大学教书,1926年开始对吴方言进行调查。

en: He began to conduct linguistic fieldwork throughout China for the Institute of History and Philology of Academia Sinica from 1928 onwards .
zh: 自1928年起,他开始在中国各地为西尼卡学院历史与哲学研究所进行语言实地研究。

en: During this period of time , he collaborated with Luo Changpei and Li Fang - Kuei , the other two leading Chinese linguists of his generation , to edit and render into Chinese Bernhard Karlgren 's monumental Etudes sur la Phonologie Chinoise  .
zh: 在这段时间里,他与他的一代其他两位中国语言学家罗昌平和李方国合作,对汉堡卡尔格林的《中国语文史诗集》进行了编辑和渲染。

en: He left for the US in 1938 , and resided there afterwards .
zh: 他于1938年离开美国,并在之后居住在那里。

en: In 1945 , he served as president of the Linguistic Society of America , and a special issue of the society 's journal Language was dedicated to him in 1966 .
zh: 1945年,他担任美国语言学会主席,1966年,该学会出版了一份特别的期刊《语言》。

en: He became an American citizen in 1954 .
zh: 1954年,他成为美国公民。

en: In the 1950s he was among the first members of the Society for General Systems Research .
zh: 1950年代,他成为一般系统研究学会的第一位成员。

en: From 1947 to 1960 , he taught at the University of California at Berkeley , where in 1952 , he became Agassiz Professor of Oriental Languages .
zh: 从1947年到1960年,他在加州大学伯克利教授,1952年,他成为阿加西斯东方语言教授。

en: Both Chao and Yang were known for their good senses of humor , he particularly for his love of subtle jokes and language puns : they published a family history entitled , Life with Chaos : the autobiography of a Chinese family .
zh: 赵和杨都以幽默感而闻名,他尤其以他对微妙的笑话和语言短语的爱好著称:他们出版了一份家族史,题为《与赵生活:中国家庭自传》。

en: Late in his life , he was invited by Deng Xiaoping to return to China in 1981 .
zh: 晚些时候,他被邓小平邀请到1981年回到中国。

en: Previously at the invitation of Premier Zhou En - Lai , Chao and his wife returned to China in 1973 for the first time since the 1940s .
zh: 此前,在周恩莱总理的邀请下,蔡和妻子于1973年首次从1940年代返回中国。

en: He visited China again between May and June in 1981 after his wife died in March the same year .
zh: 1981年5月至6月期间,他再次访问中国,同年3月妻子去世后。

en: He died in Cambridge , Massachusetts .
zh: 他死于马萨诸塞州剑桥。

en: After Bedřich Smetana , he was the next Czech Romantic - era composer to achieve worldwide recognition .
zh: 贝德里希·斯梅塔纳之后, 他成为捷克浪漫主义时代下一个获得全球认可的作曲家.

en: Following Smetana 's nationalist example , Dvořák frequently employed aspects , specifically rhythms , of the folk music of Moravia and his native Bohemia .
zh: 在斯梅塔纳的民族主义榜样之后,德沃拉克经常使用摩拉维亚和他的母国波希米亚的民俗音乐的方面,特别是节奏。

en: Dvořák 's own style has been described as " the fullest recreation of a national idiom with that of the symphonic tradition , absorbing folk influences and finding effective ways of using them " .
zh: 德沃拉克的风格被描述为“与交响乐传统最充分的民族习俗的再现,吸收民俗影响并找到有效的使用方法”。

en: Dvořák displayed his musical gifts at an early age , being an apt violin student from age six .
zh: 德沃拉克在很小的时候展示了他的音乐才能,从六岁开始就成为一名适合小提琴的学生。

en: Seeking recognition beyond the Prague area , he submitted a score of his First Symphony to a prize competition in Germany , but did not win , and the unreturned manuscript was lost until rediscovered many decades later .
zh: 为了寻求在布拉格地区以外的认可,他提交了他的第一首交响曲的乐章给德国的奖品竞赛,但没有赢得,而未归还的手稿被丢失,直到数十年后才重新发现。

en: In 1874 he made a submission to the Austrian State Prize for Composition , including scores of two further symphonies and other works .
zh: 1874年,他提交了奥地利国家作曲奖,包括另外两首交响曲和其他作品。

en: Although Dvořák was not aware of it , Johannes Brahms was the leading member of the jury and was highly impressed .
zh: 尽管德沃拉克不知道这件事,但约翰内斯·布拉姆斯是陪审团的首任成员,他对此深感印象深刻。

en: The prize was awarded to Dvořák in 1874  and again in 1876 and in 1877 , when Brahms and the prominent critic Eduard Hanslick , also a member of the jury , made themselves known to him .
zh: 该奖于1874年授予德沃拉克,并于1876年和1877年再次授予他,当时布拉姆斯和著名评论家爱德华·汉斯利克(Eduard Hanslick),也是陪审团成员,向他宣称自己。

en: Brahms recommended Dvořák to his publisher , Simrock , who soon afterward commissioned what became the Slavonic Dances , Op. 46 .
zh: 布拉姆斯建议Dvořák向他的出版商,Simrock,不久后委托成为斯拉沃尼亚舞蹈,Op.46。

en: These were highly praised by the Berlin music critic Louis Ehlert in 1878 , the sheet music  had excellent sales , and Dvořák 's international reputation was launched at last .
zh: 这些作品在1878年被柏林音乐评论家路易斯·埃勒特(Louis Ehlert)高度赞扬,专辑的销量很高,德沃拉克的国际声誉终于开始了。

en: Dvořák 's first piece of a religious nature , his setting of Stabat Mater , was premiered in Prague in 1880 .
zh: 德沃拉克的第一部宗教作品,他的《Stabat Mater》场景,于1880年在布拉格首演。

en: It was very successfully performed in London in 1883 , leading to many other performances in the United Kingdom and United States .
zh: 它在1883年成功地在伦敦演出,导致在英国和美国许多其他演出。

en: In his career , Dvořák made nine invited visits to England , often conducting performances of his own works .
zh: 在他职业生涯中,德沃拉克曾访问英国九次,经常指挥自己的作品。

en: Visiting Russia in March 1890 , he conducted concerts of his own music in Moscow and Saint Petersburg .
zh: 他在1890年3月访问俄罗斯,在莫斯科和圣彼得堡举办自己的音乐会。

en: In 1891 Dvořák was appointed as a professor at the Prague Conservatory .
zh: 1891年,Dvořák被任命为布拉格音乐学院的教授。

en: In 1890 – 91 , he wrote his Dumky Trio , one of his most successful chamber music pieces .
zh: 1890年至91年,他创作了他的《Dumky Trio》,这是他最成功的室内乐作品之一。

en: In 1892 , Dvořák moved to the United States and became the director of the National Conservatory of Music of America in New York City .
zh: 1892年,德沃拉克搬到美国,成为纽约美国国家音乐学院的主任。

en: While in the United States , Dvořák wrote his two most successful orchestral works : the Symphony From the New World , which spread his reputation worldwide ,  and his Cello Concerto , one of the most highly regarded of all cello concerti .
zh: 在美国期间,德沃拉克创作了他的两个最成功的管弦乐作品:《新世界交响曲》,其声誉在全世界传播,以及他的《提琴协奏曲》,是所有提琴协奏曲中最受尊敬的之一。

en: He also wrote his most appreciated piece of chamber music , the American String Quartet , during this time .
zh: 在这段时间里,他还写了他最欣赏的室内乐作品,美国弦乐四重奏。

en: But shortfalls in payment of his salary , along with increasing recognition in Europe and an onset of homesickness , led him to leave the United States and return to Bohemia in 1895 .
zh: 但由于工资的欠缺,以及欧洲日益受到承认和家庭悲伤的开始,他不得不离开美国并于1895年返回波希米亚。

en: All of Dvořák 's nine operas but his first have librettos in Czech and were intended to convey Czech national spirit , as were some of his choral works .
zh: 所有德沃拉克的九首歌剧,但他的第一部有捷克的 librettos,并打算传达捷克民族精神,以及他的一些合唱作品。

en: Among his smaller works , the seventh Humoresque and the song " Songs My Mother Taught Me " are also widely performed and recorded .
zh: 在其小作品中, 第七部幽默剧和歌曲“ 我的母亲教我”也被广泛表演和录制.

en: He has been described as " arguably the most versatile ... composer of his time " .
zh: 他被描述为“  arguably the most versatile... composer of his time ”.

en: Joshua Abraham Norton  , known as Emperor Norton , was a citizen of San Francisco , California , who in 1859 proclaimed himself " Norton I , Emperor of the United States " .
zh: 约瑟夫·亚伯拉罕·诺顿(英语:Joshua Abraham Norton)是美国加利福尼亚州旧金山的公民,1859年自称“ 诺顿一世, 美国皇帝 ” 。

en: He later expanded his pretense by claiming to be " Protector of Mexico " as well .
zh: 他后来扩大了他的陈述,声称他是“ 墨西哥的保护者 ” 。

en: Born in England , Norton spent most of his early life in South Africa .
zh: 诺顿出生在英格兰,他大部分早期生活都在南非。

en: After the death of his mother in 1846 and his father in 1848 , he sailed west , arriving in San Francisco possibly in November 1849 .
zh: 在1846年他母亲和1848年父亲去世后,他航行到西部,可能于1849年11月抵达旧金山。

en: Norton initially made a living as a businessman , but he lost his fortune investing in Peruvian rice .
zh: 诺顿最初作为一名商人谋生,但由于投资于秘鲁的稻米,他失去了财富。

en: After he lost a lawsuit in which he tried to void his rice contract , Norton 's public prominence faded .
zh: 他输了一场诉讼,试图取消他的稻米合同, 诺顿的公众声望逐渐消退.

en: He reemerged in September 1859 , laying claim to the position of Emperor of the United States .
zh: 他在1859年9月再度登台,宣誓就任美国皇帝。

en: He had no political power , and his influence extended only so far as he was humored by those around him ;
zh: 他没有政治权力,他的影响力仅限于周围人对他的幽默感;

en: nevertheless , he was treated deferentially in San Francisco , and currency issued in his name was honored in the establishments he frequented .
zh: 尽管如此,他在旧金山受到推迟的待遇,并且以他名义发行的货币在他经常使用的机构中得到荣誉。

en: Though some considered him insane or eccentric , citizens of San Francisco celebrated his regal presence and his proclamations , such as his order that the United States Congress be dissolved by force and his numerous decrees calling for a bridge connecting San Francisco to Oakland , and a corresponding tunnel to be built under San Francisco Bay .
zh: 尽管有人认为他是个疯子或异端者,但旧金山的公民们都庆祝了他的王室的存在和他的宣言,例如他命令美国国会以武力解散,以及他的许多法令要求建造连接旧金山与奥克兰的桥梁,以及在旧金山湾下建造相应的隧道。

en: Long after his death , similar structures were built in the form of the San Francisco – Oakland Bay Bridge and the Transbay Tube , and there have been campaigns to rename the bridge " The Emperor Norton Bridge " .
zh: 在他去世后不久,类似的建筑在旧金山-奥克兰湾桥和特兰斯巴伊隧道(英语:Transbay Tube)的形式建成,并进行了“诺顿皇帝桥”的改名运动。

en: On January 8 , 1880 , Norton collapsed at the corner of California and Dupont  streets and died before he could be given medical treatment .
zh: 1880年1月8日,诺顿在加利福尼亚和杜邦街角倒塌,在接受医疗之前去世。

en: Nearly 30,000 people packed the streets of San Francisco to pay him homage at his funeral .
zh: 近30万人聚集在旧金山的街道上,向他致敬。

en: Norton has been immortalized as the basis of characters in the literature of writers Mark Twain , Robert Louis Stevenson , Christopher Moore , Morris and Goscinny , Selma Lagerlöf , and Neil Gaiman .
zh: 诺顿是作家马克·吐温 、 罗伯特·路易斯·史蒂文森 、 克里斯托弗·摩尔 、 莫里斯和戈斯辛尼 、 塞尔玛·拉格罗夫夫 、 尼尔·盖曼 的文学人物的基石.

en: By 1859 , Norton had become completely disgruntled with what he considered the inadequacies of the legal and political structures of the United States .
zh: 到1859年,诺顿对他认为美国法律和政治结构的不足感到完全不满。

en: On September 17 , 1859 , he took matters into his own hands and distributed letters to the various newspapers in the city , proclaiming himself " Emperor of these United States " :
zh: 1859年9月17日,他把事情交给自己的手,向市内的各个报纸发了信,宣称自己是“这些美国皇帝”:

en: At the peremptory request and desire of a large majority of the citizens of these United States , I , Joshua Norton , formerly of Algoa Bay , Cape of Good Hope , and now for the last 9 years and 10 months past of S. F. , Cal. , declare and proclaim myself Emperor of these U. S. ;
zh: 在这些美国公民的默许要求和愿望下,我,约书亚·诺顿,前是阿戈亚湾的,是希望之角的,现在是旧金山的过去9年和10个月,宣布和宣布自己是这些美国皇帝;

en: and in virtue of the authority thereby in me vested , do hereby order and direct the representatives of the different States of the Union to assemble in Musical Hall , of this city , on the 1st day of Feb. next , then and there to make such alterations in the existing laws of the Union as may ameliorate the evils under which the country is laboring , and thereby cause confidence to exist , both at home and abroad , in our stability and integrity .
zh: 并根据由我行使的权力, hereby order and direct the representatives of the different States of the Union to assemble in Musical Hall, of this city, on the 1st day of Feb. next, then and there to make such alterations in the existing laws of the Union as may improve the evils under which the country is laboring, and thereby cause confidence to exist, both at home and abroad, in our stability and integrity 。

en: The announcement was first reprinted for humorous effect by the editor of the San Francisco Bulletin .
zh: 该公告最初由《旧金山通讯》的编辑为幽默效果重新印制。

en: Norton would later add " Protector of Mexico " to this title .
zh: 诺顿后来将“ 墨西哥的保护者 ” 加入这个标题.

en: After assuming absolute control over the country , he saw no further need for a legislature , and on October 12 , 1859 , he issued a decree formally abolishing the United States Congress .
zh: 1859年10月12日,他颁布了正式废除美国国会的法令。

en: that open violation of the laws are constantly occurring , caused by mobs , parties , factions and undue influence of political sects ;
zh: 不断发生公开违反法律的行为,由暴徒、党派、派别和政治派别的滥用影响造成;

en: that the citizen has not that protection of person and property which he is entitled .
zh: 公民没有他有权的个人和财产的保护。

en: Norton ordered all interested parties to assemble at Platt 's Music Hall in San Francisco in February 1860 to " remedy the evil complained of " .
zh: 诺顿命令所有有关各方在1860年2月在旧金山的普拉特音乐厅聚集,“ 纠正抱怨的坏事 ” 。

en: In an imperial decree the following month , Norton summoned the Army to depose the elected officials of the U.S. Congress :
zh: 在下个月的帝国法令中,诺顿召唤军队推翻美国国会的当选官员:

en: WHEREAS , a body of men calling themselves the National Congress are now in session in Washington City , in violation of our Imperial edict of the 12th of October last , declaring the said Congress abolished ;
zh: 同时,一群自称全国大会的男子正在华盛顿市举行会议,违反我们去年10月12日的帝国法令,宣布该大会已经废止;

en: WHEREAS , it is necessary for the repose of our Empire that the said decree should be strictly complied with ;
zh: 鉴于我们帝国的复苏需要严格遵守上述法令;

en: NOW , THEREFORE , we do hereby Order and Direct Major - General Scott , the Command - in - Chief of our Armies , immediately upon receipt of this , our Decree , to proceed with a suitable force and clear the Halls of Congress .
zh: 现在, 为此, 我们 命令 将军 史考特, 我国 陆军 总司令, 在收到 这项 法令 后 立即 采取 适当 的 部队, 清理 国会大厅 。

en: Pierre Charles L'Enfant  , self - identified as Peter Charles L'Enfant while living in the United States , was a French - born American military engineer who designed the basic plan for Washington , D.C.  known today as the L'Enfant Plan  .
zh: 皮埃尔·查尔斯·伦芬(英语:Pierre Charles L'Enfant)是法国出生的美国军事工程师,他为华盛顿设计了今天的“伦芬计划”。

en: In 1758 , his brother Pierre Joseph died at the age of six , and Pierre Charles became the eldest son .
zh: 1758年,他的弟弟皮埃尔·约瑟夫在6岁时去世,皮埃尔·查尔斯成为他的长子。

en: He studied art at the Royal Academy in the Louvre , as well as with his father at the Royal Academy of Painting and Sculpture .
zh: 他在卢浮宫皇家学院学习艺术,同父亲一起在皇家美术学院学习绘画和雕塑。

en: He left school in France to enlist in the American Revolutionary War on the side of the rebelling colonials .
zh: 他离开法国学校,加入了美国革命战争,站在反抗的殖民者一边。

en: L'Enfant was recruited by Pierre Augustin Caron de Beaumarchais to serve in the American Revolutionary War in the United States .
zh: L’Enfant被皮埃尔·奥古斯丁·卡隆·德·博马歇斯(Pierre Augustin Caron de Beaumarchais)征召参加美国革命战争。

en: He arrived in 1777 at the age of 23 , and served as a military engineer in the Continental Army with Major General Lafayette .
zh: 他在1777年23岁时抵达欧洲大陆,并在拉法耶特少将的领导下担任陆军工程师。

en: He was commissioned as a captain in the Corps of Engineers on April 3 , 1779 to rank from February 18 , 1778 .
zh: 他于1779年4月3日被任命为工程师军团队长,从1778年2月18日升为军官。

en: Despite his aristocratic origins , L'Enfant closely identified with the United States , changing his first name from Pierre to Peter when he first came to the rebelling colonies in 1777 .
zh: 尽管他有贵族血统,他与美国有着密切的联系,在1777年第一次来到叛乱的殖民地时,他从皮埃尔改名为彼得。

en: L'Enfant served on General George Washington 's staff at Valley Forge .
zh: L'Enfant在ValleyForge的乔治·华盛顿将军中服役.

en: While there , the Marquis de Lafayette commissioned L'Enfant to paint a portrait of Washington .
zh: 在此期间, 拉法耶特侯爵委托L’Enfant画一幅华盛顿的肖像.

en: He was wounded at the Siege of Savannah on October 9 , 1779 .
zh: 他于1779年10月9日在萨凡纳的围攻中受伤。

en: He recovered and became a prisoner of war at surrender of Charleston , South Carolina on May 12 , 1780 .
zh: 在1780年5月12日南卡罗莱纳州查尔斯顿投降后,他恢复并成为战俘。

en: He was exchanged in November 1780 and served on General George Washington 's staff for the remainder of the American Revolution .
zh: 他于1780年11月被交换,并担任乔治·华盛顿将军的参谋,直到美国革命的剩余时期。

en: L'Enfant was promoted by brevet to Major in the Corps of Engineers on May 2 , 1783 , in recognition of his service to the cause of American liberty .
zh: 1783年5月2日,他因为美国自由事业服务而被授予工程师军中少校的专利。

en: He was discharged when the Continental Army was disbanded in December 1783 .
zh: 1783年12月,大陆军解散后,他被解雇。

en: After the war , L'Enfant designed the badge of the Society of the Cincinnati , an organization of former officers of the Continental Army , shaped as an eagle , at the request of Washington .
zh: 战争结束后,L’Enfant根据华盛顿的要求设计了辛辛那提协会的徽章,该协会是大陆军前军官的组织,形状为鹰。

en: He was sent to France to have insignias made for members of the Society , a group of veterans of the war .
zh: 他被派往法国,为战争老兵团的成员制作了徽章。

en: Following the American Revolutionary War , L'Enfant established a successful and highly profitable civil engineering firm in New York City .
zh: 美国革命战争后,L’Enfant在纽约建立了一个成功的高利润的土木工程公司。

en: He achieved some fame as an architect by redesigning the City Hall in New York for the First Congress of the United States  .
zh: 作为一名建筑师,他为美国第一届国会重新设计了纽约市政厅。

en: He also designed furniture and houses for the wealthy as well as coins and medals , including the insignia of the Society of the Cincinnati .
zh: 他还为富人设计家具和房屋,以及硬币和奖章,包括辛辛那提协会的徽章。

en: He was also a friend of Alexander Hamilton , and some of their correspondances from 1790 to 1801 now reside in the National Archives .
zh: 他也是亚历山大·汉密尔顿的朋友,从1790年到1801年他们的一些信件现存于国家档案馆。

en: While L'Enfant was in New York City , he was initiated into Freemasonry .
zh: L’Enfant在纽约的时候,他开始了自由修建。

en: His initiation took place on April 17 , 1789 , at Holland Lodge No. 8 , F&AM , which the Grand Lodge of New York F&AM had chartered in 1787 .
zh: 他于1789年4月17日在荷兰 Lodge No. 8, F&AM, 纽约大 Lodge F&AM于1787年租借。

en: L'Enfant took only the first of three degrees offered by the Lodge and did not progress further in Freemasonry .
zh: L'Enfant只获得了 Lodge提供的三个学位中的第一学位,并没有进一步进修自由修士。

en: Charles J. Fillmore  was an American linguist and Professor of Linguistics at the University of California , Berkeley .
zh: 查尔斯·J·菲尔莫尔(Charles J. Fillmore)是一位美国语言学家和加州大学伯克利语言学教授。

en: He received his Ph.D. in Linguistics from the University of Michigan in 1961 .
zh: 1961年,他从密歇根大学获得语言学博士学位。

en: Fillmore spent ten years at The Ohio State University and a year as a Fellow at the Center for Advanced Study in the Behavioral Sciences at Stanford University before joining Berkeley 's Department of Linguistics in 1971 .
zh: 菲尔摩在俄亥俄州立大学工作十年,并在斯坦福大学高级行为科学研究中心工作一年,然后于1971年加入伯克利语言学系。

en: Fillmore was extremely influential in the areas of syntax and lexical semantics .
zh: 菲尔莫尔在语法和词义语义领域具有极大的影响力。

en: A three–day conference was held at UC Berkeley in celebration of his 80th birthday in 2009 .
zh: 2009年,他在加州大学伯克利举行了为期三天的会议,庆祝他的80岁生日。

en: Fillmore received the 2012 Lifetime Achievement Award of the Association for Computational Linguistics .
zh: 2012年,菲尔莫尔获得计算机语言学协会终身成就奖。

en: He died in 2014 .
Following his discharge , he taught English at a Buddhist girls ' school while also taking classes at Kyoto University .
zh: 畢業後,他在京都大學學習英語,同時在佛教女子學校學習英語。

en: He returned to the US , receiving his doctorate at the University of Michigan and then teaching at The Ohio State University in Columbus .
zh: 他回到美国,在密歇根大学获得博士学位,然后在哥伦布的俄亥俄州立大学教授。

en: At the time , he was still a proponent of Noam Chomsky 's theory of generative grammar during its earliest transformational grammar phase .
zh: 当时,他仍然是Noam Chomsky的生成语法理论的拥护者,在其最早的转换语法阶段。

en: In 1963 , his seminal article The position of embedding transformations in a Grammar introduced the transformational cycle .
zh: 1963年,他 seminal article The position of embedding transformations in a Grammar introduced the transformational cycle。

en: The central idea is to first apply rules to the smallest applicable unit , then to the smallest unit containing that one , and so on .
zh: 中心思想是首先对最小适用的单元适用规则,然后对包含这个单元的最小单元适用规则,等等。

en: This principle has been a foundational insight for theories of syntax since that time .
zh: 自那时起,这一原则一直是语法理论的基础。

en: By 1965 , Fillmore had come to acknowledge that semantics plays a crucial role in grammar .
zh: 1965年,菲尔摩尔认识到语义在语法中起着至关重要的作用。

en: In 1968 , he published his theory of Case Grammar  , which highlighted the fact that syntactic structure can be predicted by semantic participants .
zh: 1968年,他发表了他的案例语法理论,指出语法结构可以由语义参与者预测。

en: These participants were called " cases " in his original paper , but later came to be known as semantic roles or thematic relations , which are similar to theta roles in generative grammar .
zh: 这些参与者在他的原文中被称为“案例”,但后来被称作语义角色或主题关系,与生成语法中的语义角色类似。

en: Following his move to the University of California , Berkeley , in 1971 , this theory eventually evolved into a broader cognitive linguistic theory called Frame Semantics  .
zh: 1971年,他搬到加州大学伯克利,这一理论最终演化为一种更广泛的认知语言理论,称为框架语义。

en: A commercial event , for instance , crucially involved elements such as a seller , a buyer , some good , and some money .
zh: 例如,一个商业事件的关键因素包括卖方、买方、一些商品和一些钱。

en: In language , such an event can be expressed in a variety of different ways , e.g. using the verb ' to sell ' or the verb ' to buy ' .
zh: 在语言中,这种事件可以以各种不同的方式表达,例如使用动词“卖”或动词“买”。

en: According to frame semantics , meaning is best studied in terms of the mental concepts and participants in the minds of the speaker and addressee .
zh: 根据框架语义,意义最好从发言者和发言者脑中的心理概念和参与者的角度研究。

en: Around the same time , Fillmore 's Santa Cruz Lectures on Deixis , delivered in 1971 and published in 1975 , contributed to establishing the field of linguistic pragmatics , which studies the relationship between linguistic form and the context of utterance .
zh: 同時,菲爾摩爾在1971年發表的《聖克魯斯演說》於1975年出版,幫助建立語言 pragmatics的領域,研究語言形式與發言的文脈之間的關係。

en: In all of this research , he illuminated the fundamental importance of semantics , and its role in motivating syntactic and morphological phenomena .
zh: 在所有这些研究中,他阐明了语义的基本重要性,以及语法和形态学现象的动机作用。

en: His collaboration with Paul Kay and George Lakoff was generalized into the theory of Construction Grammar .
zh: 他与保罗·凯和乔治·拉科夫的合作被推广到建筑语法理论中。

en: This work aimed at developing a complete theory of grammar that would fully acknowledge the role of semantics right from the start , while simultaneously adopting constraint - based formalisms as popular in computer science and natural language processing .
zh: 这项工作旨在发展一个完整的语法理论,从一开始就充分承认语义学的作用,同时同时采用约束式形式主义作为计算机科学和自然语言处理中流行的。

en: This theory built on the notion of construction from traditional and pedagogical grammars rather than the rule - based formalisms that dominate most of generative grammar .
zh: 这一理论建立在传统和教科文法中的建构概念之上,而不是支配大部分生成文法的规则形式主义。

en: One of Fillmore 's most widely noticed works of the time  appeared in ' Language ' in 1988 as " Regularity and Idiomaticity in Grammatical Constructions : The Case of Let Alone " .
zh: 菲尔莫尔最著名的作品之一在1988年发表于《语言》杂志上,名为“ 语法结构中的规则和杂乱性 : 孤立的案例 ” 。

en: Their paper highlighted the merits of such a theory of by focusing on the ' let alone ' construction .
zh: 他们的论文突出了这种理论的优点,重点放在“ 别说 ” 的建设上.

en: Over time , construction grammar developed into a research area of its own , and a number of variants have been proposed over the years by different researchers .
zh: 随着时间的推移,建筑语法发展成为自己的研究领域,许多变体多年来由不同的研究者提出。

en: Fillmore is now widely recognized as one of the founders of cognitive linguistics .
zh: 菲尔莫尔现在被广泛认为是认知语言学的创始人之一。

en: The first chapter of “ Cognitive Linguistics ” by Cruse and Croft  , for instance , begins with a summary of Fillmore 's work .
zh: 例如,克鲁斯和克罗夫特的《认知语言学》的第一章,以菲尔莫尔的著作的摘要开始。

en: Fillmore served as President of the Linguistic Society of America in 1991 and was awarded an honorary doctorate from the University of Chicago in 2000 .
zh: 菲尔莫尔于1991年担任美国语言学会主席,2000年获得芝加哥大学荣誉博士学位。

en: His legacy continues with his many notable students , including Adele Goldberg , Laura Michaelis , Christopher Johnson , Miriam R. L. Petruck , Len Talmy , and Eve Sweetser .
zh: 他的遗产与他的许多著名学生,包括阿德拉·戈尔德伯格、劳拉·迈克利斯、克里斯托弗·约翰逊、米莉安·R·L·佩特克、伦·塔尔米和伊夫·斯威特塞一起延续。

en: In the 1990s , Fillmore taught classes in computational lexicography at the University of Pisa , where he met Sue Atkins , who was conducting frame - semantic analyses from a lexicographic perspective .
zh: 在1990年代, 菲尔莫尔在比萨大学教授计算词汇学, 在那里他遇到了苏·阿特金斯, 他从词汇学的角度进行框架语义分析.

en: In their subsequent discussions and collaborations , Fillmore came to acknowledge the importance of considering corpus data .
zh: 在随后的讨论和合作中,菲尔摩尔认识到考虑数据的重要性。

en: They discussed the " dictionary of the future " , in which every word would be linked to example sentences from corpora .
zh: 他们讨论了“ 未来词典 ”, 其中每个单词将与 corpora 的例子句子联系起来.

en: After 23 years at the University of California , Berkeley , Fillmore retired in 1994 and joined Berkeley 's International Computer Science Institute .
zh: 在加州大学伯克利分校23年后,菲尔摩于1994年退休,加入伯克利国际计算机科学研究所。

en: There , he started a project called FrameNet , an on - line structured description of the English lexicon implementing much of what he had earlier proposed more theoretically in his theory of Frame semantics , while implementing the idea of emphasizing example sentences from corpora .
zh: 在那里,他开始了一个名为 FrameNet的项目,一个在线结构化的英语词典的描述,实现了他先前在其 Frame语义理论中更理论上提出的大部分内容,同时实施了强调例句的 corpora 概念。

en: In FrameNet , words are described in terms of the frames they evoke .
zh: 在 FrameNet中,词汇被描述为它们所产生的框架。

en: Data is gathered from the British National Corpus , annotated for semantic and syntactic relations , and stored in a database organized by both lexical items and Frames .
zh: 数据由英国国家文库收集,为语义和语法关系注释,并存储在由词汇项目和框架组成的数据库中。

en: Siméon Poisson reviewed Galois ' paper on equation theory and declared it " incomprehensible " .
zh: 西蒙·波森审查了加洛瓦关于方程理论的论文,并宣布它“ 不可理解 ” 。

en: Galois returned to mathematics after his expulsion from the École Normale , although he continued to spend time in political activities .
zh: 加洛瓦在被驱逐到普通学校后返回数学,尽管他继续在政治活动中花时间。

en: After his expulsion became official in January 1831 , he attempted to start a private class in advanced algebra which attracted some interest , but this waned , as it seemed that his political activism had priority .
zh: 在1831年1月被驱逐出境后,他试图开始一个高级代数的私人班级,这引起了一些兴趣,但这种兴趣有所减弱,因为似乎他的政治活动是优先的。

en: Siméon Poisson asked him to submit his work on the theory of equations , which he did on 17 January 1831 .
zh: 西蒙·波森(Siméon Poisson)要求他提交他的方程理论工作,他于1831年1月17日完成。

en: Around 4 July 1831 , Poisson declared Galois ' work " incomprehensible " , declaring that "  argument is neither sufficiently clear nor sufficiently developed to allow us to judge its rigor " ; however , the rejection report ends on an encouraging note : " We would then suggest that the author should publish the whole of his work in order to form a definitive opinion . "
zh: 约1831年7月4日,波森宣布加洛瓦的“ 作品 ” 是“ 不可理解 ”, 宣称“ 论点 既 没有 足够 明确, 也 没有 足够 发达, 使 我们 能够 判断 其 严格 ” ; 然而, 拒绝 报告 以 一 项 令人 鼓舞 的 说明 结束 : “ 我们 则 建议 作者 出版 其 全部 作品, 以便 形成 最后 的 意见 ” 。

en: While Poisson 's report was made before Galois ' July 14 arrest , it took until October to reach Galois in prison .
zh: 波森的报告是在7月14日加洛伊被捕之前写的,但直到10月才在监狱里到达加洛伊。

en: It is unsurprising , in the light of his character and situation at the time , that Galois reacted violently to the rejection letter , and decided to abandon publishing his papers through the Academy and instead publish them privately through his friend Auguste Chevalier .
zh: 在当时的性格和形势下,Galois对拒绝信作出了猛烈的反应,决定放弃通过学院出版他的论文,而是通过朋友Auguste Chevalier私下出版。

en: Apparently , however , Galois did not ignore Poisson 's advice , as he began collecting all his mathematical manuscripts while still in prison , and continued polishing his ideas until his release on 29 April 1832 ,  after which he was somehow talked into a duel .
zh: 显然,但加洛伊并没有忽视波森的建议,因为他开始在监狱里收集所有数学手稿,并继续研磨他的想法,直到他于1832年4月29日获释,之后他被说成一场 duel。

en: Galois ' fatal duel took place on 30 May .
zh: 5月30日,加洛伊斯的致命决斗发生。

en: The true motives behind the duel are obscure .
zh: 这场 duel背后的真正动机是模糊的。

en: There has been much speculation as to the reasons behind it .
zh: 人们对其背后的原因进行了大量猜测。

en: What is known is that five days before his death , he wrote a letter to Chevalier which clearly alludes to a broken love affair .
zh: 知道的是,在他死前5天,他写了一封信给切瓦利尔,这显然暗示了一个破裂的爱情关系。

en: Some archival investigation on the original letters suggests that the woman of romantic interest was a Mademoiselle Stéphanie - Félicie Poterin du Motel ,  the daughter of the physician at the hostel where Galois stayed during the last months of his life .
zh: 一些档案对最初的信件的调查表明,这位具有浪漫兴趣的女性是女主人斯特凡妮 - 费利西·波特林·杜·莫特尔(Felicie Poterin du Motel)的女儿,她是加洛伊在生命的最后几个月呆在旅馆的医生。

en: Fragments of letters from her , copied by Galois himself  , are available .
zh: 她写的信 fragments, 由Galois himself 复制, 是可用的.

en: The letters hint that Mlle. du Motel had confided some of her troubles to Galois , and this might have prompted him to provoke the duel himself on her behalf .
zh: 这些信暗示杜莫特太太把一些麻烦交给加洛伊,这可能促使他自己为她挑起争斗。

en: This conjecture is also supported by other letters Galois later wrote to his friends the night before he died .
zh: 这一猜想也得到了其他 Galois 晚些时候写给他的朋友们的信,在他死前夜。

en: Galois ' cousin , Gabriel Demante , when asked if he knew the cause of the duel , mentioned that Galois " found himself in the presence of a supposed uncle and a supposed fiancé , each of whom provoked the duel . "
zh: 加洛伊的表妹加布里埃尔·德曼特(Gabriel Demante)问他是否知道这场 duel的原因是,他提到加洛伊“ 发现自己在一个假称的叔叔和假称的未婚夫面前,他们都挑起了这场 duel ”。

en: Galois himself famously exclaimed : " I am the victim of an infamous coquette and her two dupes . "
zh: 加洛伊本人声称: “ 我是一个臭名昭著的女丑和她的两个小丑的受害者. ”

en: Much more detailed speculation based on these scant historical details has been interpolated by many of Galois ' biographers  , such as the frequently repeated speculation that the entire incident was stage - managed by the police and royalist factions to eliminate a political enemy .
zh: 许多加洛瓦的传记作者基于这些稀少的历史细节的更详细的推测,例如经常重复的推测,整个事件是警察和王朝派别管理的阶段,以消除政治敌人。

en: As to his opponent in the duel , Alexandre Dumas names Pescheux d'Herbinville ,  who was actually one of the nineteen artillery officers whose acquittal was celebrated at the banquet that occasioned Galois ' first arrest .
zh: 至于他的对手在决斗中,亚历山大·杜马斯的名字是Pescheux d'Herbinville,他实际上是19名炮兵中的一个,他的赦免在加洛伊第一次被捕的宴会上庆祝。

en: However , Dumas is alone in this assertion , and if he were correct it is unclear why d'Herbinville would have been involved .
zh: 然而,杜马斯在这一论点上是独一无二的,如果他是对的,就不清楚为什么德·赫宾维尔会参与。

en: It has been speculated that he might have been du Motel 's " supposed fiancé " at the time  , but no clear evidence has been found supporting this conjecture .
zh: 人们猜测他当时可能是杜莫特的“ 假婚 ”, 但没有明确的证据支持这一猜想。

en: On the other hand , extant newspaper clippings from only a few days after the duel give a description of his opponent  that appear to more accurately apply to one of Galois ' Republican friends , most probably Ernest Duchatelet , who was imprisoned with Galois on the same charges .
zh: 另一方面,只有几天之后的报纸剪辑给出了他的对手的描述,似乎更准确地适用于加洛伊的共和党朋友之一,很可能是Ernest Duchatelet,他与加洛伊在同样的指控下被关押。

en: Given the conflicting information available , the true identity of his killer may well be lost to history .
zh: 鉴于现有的矛盾信息,他的凶手的真正身份很可能被历史遗失。

en: Whatever the reasons behind the duel , Galois was so convinced of his impending death that he stayed up all night writing letters to his Republican friends and composing what would become his mathematical testament , the famous letter to Auguste Chevalier outlining his ideas , and three attached manuscripts .
zh: 不管这场 duel 背后的理由是什么,加洛伊对即将死去的死亡如此深信,他整晚都呆在写信给共和党的朋友,并编写了他的数学遗嘱,他 famous letter to Auguste Chevalier outlining his ideas, and three attached manuscripts 。

en: Mathematician Hermann Weyl said of this testament , " This letter , if judged by the novelty and profundity of ideas it contains , is perhaps the most substantial piece of writing in the whole literature of mankind . "
zh: 数学家赫尔曼·韦尔(Hermann Weyl)对这封遗嘱说:“这封信,如果根据它所包含的观念的新颖性和深刻性加以判断,也许是整个人类文学中最重要的著作”。

en: However , the legend of Galois pouring his mathematical thoughts onto paper the night before he died seems to have been exaggerated .
zh: 然而,盖洛斯在死前晚上把数学思想倒在纸上的故事似乎被夸大了。

en: In these final papers , he outlined the rough edges of some work he had been doing in analysis and annotated a copy of the manuscript submitted to the Academy and other papers .
zh: 在这些最后的论文中,他概述了他在分析中所做的一些粗糙的边缘,并注明了向学院提交的手稿和其他论文的副本。

en: Évariste Galois was buried in a common grave and the exact location is still unknown .
zh: 埃瓦里斯特·加洛瓦斯被埋葬在一个共同的坟墓中,确切的地点尚不清楚。

en: Early in the morning of 30 May 1832 , he was shot in the abdomen ,  abandoned by his opponents and seconds , and was found by a passing farmer .
zh: 1832年5月30日早些时候,他被击中腹部,被反对者遗弃,几秒钟后被一个经过的农民发现。

en: He died the following morning  at ten o'clock in the Hôpital Cochin  , after refusing the offices of a priest .
zh: 他于第二天早上10点在科钦医院去世,因为拒绝了一名牧师的职务。

en: His funeral ended in riots .
zh: 他的葬礼在骚乱中结束。

en: There were plans to initiate an uprising during his funeral , but during the same time frame the leaders heard of General Jean Maximilien Lamarque 's death , and the rising was postponed without any uprising occurring until 5 June .
zh: 他的葬礼期间有计划发动起义,但在同一时间内,领导人听到了让·马克西米利昂·拉马克将军的死,起义被推迟到6月5日才发生任何起义。

en: Only Galois ' younger brother was notified of the events prior to Galois ' death .
zh: 只有加洛伊斯的弟弟才得知加洛伊斯去世之前发生的事.

en: J' ai besoin de tout mon courage pour mourir à vingt ans ! ”
zh: 我需要所有的勇气,以致死二十年! ”

en: I need all my courage to die at twenty ! )
zh: 我需要全心全意的勇气在二十岁时死去!

en: In the cemetery of his native town – Bourg - la - Reine – a cenotaph in his honour was erected beside the graves of his relatives .
zh: 在他的家乡布鲁尔-拉-莱恩的墓地里,在他亲属的坟墓旁边 erected a cenotaph in his honour.

en: He made his screen debut in 2002 with ABC 's TV film feature Confessions of an Ugly Stepsister .
zh: 他于2002年在ABC的电视电影《丑妹的告白》中首次亮相.

en: His breakthrough role was in the romantic comedy , Chasing Liberty  , for which he received a nomination at Teen Choice Awards for Choice Breakout Movie Star - Male .
zh: 他的突破性角色是在浪漫喜剧《追寻自由》中, 为此他获得了青少年选择奖的提名.

en: He then appeared in a string of supporting roles in films like Woody Allen 's Match Point  , the German - British romantic comedy Imagine Me and You  , and the period drama Copying Beethoven  .
zh: 之后,他出演了一系列电影中的角色,如伍迪·艾伦的《匹配点》,德国 - 英国的浪漫喜剧《想象我与你》,以及那个时期的戏剧《贝多芬的复制》。

en: He 's garnered praise for his performance as Charles Ryder in Julian Jarrold ’s adaptation of Evelyn Waugh 's Brideshead Revisited  , and as Ozymandias in the American neo - noir superhero film Watchmen  , based on DC Comics ' limited series of the same name .
zh: 他因在朱利安·贾罗德的《伊芙琳·沃夫的新娘之头》改编中饰演查尔斯·里德,以及根据DC漫画的同名有限系列的美国新黑人超级英雄电影《看守者》中饰演奥西曼迪亚斯而获得称赞。

en: He then starred in romantic comedy Leap Year  and Australian drama Burning Man  , the latter earning him a nomination for Best Actor at the Film Critics Circle of Australia Awards .
zh: 之后,他主演了浪漫喜剧《跳跃年》和澳大利亚戏剧《燃烧人》,后者使他获得了澳大利亚电影评论界奖最佳男演员提名。

en: Other notable film roles include The Lookout  , A Single Man  , Cemetery Junction  , Stoker  , Belle  , The Imitation Game  and Self/less  .
zh: 其他著名的电影角色包括《探望者》、《单身人》、《墓地集结》、《斯托克》、《贝尔》、《模仿游戏》和《自私无私》。

en: As well as appearing in films , Goode has appeared in numerous television shows .
zh: 除了出演电影外,古德还出现在许多电视节目中。

en: His most notable television roles include Henry Talbot in the final season of historical period drama Downton Abbey , and Finley " Finn " Polmar in the CBS legal drama The Good Wife .
zh: 他最著名的电视角色包括亨利·塔尔博特在历史时期戏剧《唐顿修道院》的最后一季,以及费尼·“ 芬 ” 波尔马在CBS法律剧《好妻》中。

en: He also had a lead role in the critically acclaimed British mini-serial Dancing on the Edge , as music journalist Stanley Mitchell , for which he earned a nomination for Best Actor in a Miniseries or a Television Film at the Satellite Awards .
zh: 他在音乐记者史丹利·米歇尔(英语:Stanley Mitchell)扮演的英国小剧《边缘舞》中担任主角,并获得卫星奖最佳男演员提名。

en: In 2017 , Goode portrayed Antony Armstrong - Jones , 1st Earl of Snowdon in the Netflix biographical drama series The Crown , for which he received a Primetime Emmy Award nomination for Outstanding Guest Star in a Drama Series .
zh: 在2017年,古德在Netflix的传记剧《皇冠》中饰演安東尼·阿姆斯特朗-琼斯,斯诺登伯爵一世,为此他获得了一次艾美奖最佳剧集客座提名。

en: He currently stars in Sky One 's fantasy - romance series , A Discovery of Witches , as Professor Matthew Clairmont and is filming Matthew Vaughn 's Kingsman prequel , The King 's Man .
zh: 他目前在《天空之星》的幻想浪漫系列《魔女的发现》中饰演马修·克莱蒙特教授,并且正在拍摄马修·沃恩的《国王之人》的续集《国王之人》。

en: Goode has been in a relationship with Sophie Dymoke since 2005 .
zh: 自2005年起,古德与索菲·迪莫克(Sophie Dymoke)建立了关系。

en: They married in 2014 .
They have two daughters , Matilda Eve Goode   and Teddie Eleanor Rose Goode  , and a son , Ralph Goode  .
zh: 他们有两个女儿,玛蒂尔达·伊娃·古德和泰迪·埃莉诺·罗斯·古德,还有一个儿子,拉尔夫·古德。

en: In 2004 , Goode made his American film debut opposite Mandy Moore in the romantic comedy Chasing Liberty .
zh: 在2004年, 古德在浪漫喜剧《追寻自由》中与曼迪·摩尔(Mandy Moore)作了他的美国电影首映.

en: Goode was born in Exeter , Devon .
zh: 古德出生于德文州埃克塞特。

en: His father , Anthony , was a geologist and his mother , Jennifer , is a nurse and amateur theatre director .
zh: 他的父亲安东尼是地质学家,母亲詹妮弗是护士和业余剧院导演。

en: Goode is the youngest of five children with a brother , two half - brothers , and a half - sister , television presenter Sally Meen , from his mother 's previous marriage .
zh: 古德是五个孩子中最小的一个,有一个兄弟,两个半个兄弟,一个半个妹妹, 电视主持人莎莉·梅恩, 来自他的母亲以前的婚姻.

en: He grew up in the village of Clyst St. Mary , near Exeter .
zh: 他在克莱斯特圣玛丽村(Clyst St. Mary)长大,靠近埃克塞特。

en: Goode was educated at Exeter School , an independent school in Exeter , Devon ,  followed by the University of Birmingham and London 's Webber Douglas Academy of Dramatic Art .
zh: 古德在德文的埃克塞特学院学习,随后是伯明翰大学和伦敦的韦伯道格拉斯戏剧艺术学院。

en: He was descended from a family of Aberdeenshire , holders of the small estate of Auchleuchries , near Ellon .
zh: 他是来自阿伯丁郡的一个家族的后裔,他们拥有位于埃尔隆附近的小庄园奥奇鲁奇里。

en: The family was connected with the noble branch of Haddo .
zh: 这个家族与哈多贵族的分支联系在一起。

en: As a result of his distinguished service for Sweden , Poland and Russia he rose in ranks from trooper to full general , and became principal advisor and close friend of Tsar Peter the Great .
zh: 由于他对瑞典、波兰和俄罗斯的杰出服务,他从军官升为全军将军,并成为彼得大帝的主要顾问和亲密的朋友。

en: Gordon assumed the additional Christian name of Leopold when confirmed as a Roman Catholic shortly before his death .
