zh: 但是, 先生, 联合党站在什么位置 呢?

en: We have yet to hear from this most important organisation - the main organisation in fact of anti-Nationalist opinion amongst the European community .
zh: 我们 还 没有 从 这个 最 重要 的 组织 - - 事实上 是 欧洲 社会 中 反 民族 主义 意见 的 主要 组织 中 听到 的 。

en: If the country 's leading statesmen fail to lead at this moment , then the worst is inevitable .
zh: 如果国家领导人目前未能领导,那么最糟糕的事情是不可避免的。

en: It is time for you , Sir , and your Party , to speak out .
zh: 先生, 现在是你和你的党派的时候了, 要发声.

en: Are you for a democratic and peaceable solution to our problems ?
zh: 你赞成我们问题的民主和和平解决吗?

en: We in South Africa , and the world outside expect an answer .
zh: 我们在南非,外面的世界也期待着答案。

en: Silence at this time enables , Dr. Verwoerd to lead us onwards towards the brink of disaster .
zh: 此时的沉默使弗沃尔德博士能够引导我们走向灾难的边缘。

en: We realise that aspects of our proposal raise complicated problems .
zh: 我们认识到,我们提议的各个方面提出了复杂的问题。

en: What shall be the basis of representation at the Convention ?
zh: 在 公约 上 的 代表 的 基础 是 什么?

en: The issue now is a simple one .
zh: 现在的问题很简单。

en: Are all groups to be consulted before a constitutional change is made ?
zh: 在修改宪法之前,所有团体都得与他们协商 吗?

en: A decision on this matter can not be delayed .
zh: 关于这一事项的决定不能延迟。

en: Once that decision is taken , then all other matters , of how , when and where , can be discussed , and agreement on them can be reached .
zh: 一旦作出这项决定,那么所有其他问题,即如何、何时和在哪里,都可以讨论,并就它们达成协议。

en: On our part the door to such discussion has always been open .
zh: 至于我们,这种讨论的门总是敞开的。

en: We have approached you and your Party before , and suggested that matters of difference be discussed .
zh: 我们以前曾与贵方联系过,并建议讨论不同意见的问题。

en: To date we have had no reply : Nevertheless we still hold the door open .
zh: 到目前为止,我们还没有得到答复:尽管如此,我们仍然保持着门开。

en: But the need now is not for debate about differences of detail , but for clarity of principle and purpose .
zh: 但现在不需要就细节上的差异进行辩论,而是要明确原则和目的。

en: For a National Convention of all races ?
zh: 为全国所有种族的大会?

en: It is still not too late to turn the tide against the Nationalist - created crisis .
zh: 现在还不是太晚了,要扭转对民族主义造成的危机的潮流.

en: A call for a National Convention from you now could well be the turning - point in our country 's history .
zh: 你们现在呼吁召开全国大会也许是我国历史上的转折点.

en: It would unite the overwhelming majority of our people , White , Coloured , Indian and African , for a single purpose - round - table talks for a new constitution .
zh: 它将使我们人民的压倒多数 — — 白人 、 色人 、 印度人和非洲人 — — 团结起来,为新宪法进行一个目的 — — 圆桌会议.

en: It would isolate the Nationalist Government , and reveal for all time that it is a minority Government , clinging tenaciously to power against the popular will , driving recklessly onward to a disaster for itself and us .
zh: 它将孤立民族主义政府,并永远暴露它是一个少数政府,顽固地坚持权力,违背人民的意愿,不顾一切地推动着自己和我们走向灾难。

en: Your call for a National Convention now would add such strength to the already powerful call for it that the Government would be chary of ignoring it further .
zh: 你现在要求召开全国大会的呼吁,将使这个已经有力的呼吁变得更加有力,政府将更加无情地忽略它。

en: And if they nevertheless ignore the call for a Convention , the inter-racial unity thus cemented by your call would lay the basis for the replacement of this Government of national disaster by one more acceptable to the people , one prepared to follow the democratic path of consulting all the people in order to resolve the crisis .
zh: 如果他们不顾《公约》的呼吁,那么通过你们的呼吁所巩固的种族间团结将为这一民族灾难政府的取代奠定基础,由一个人民接受的政府取代,一个准备采取民主的协商方式解决这场危机的政府。

en: We urge you strongly to speak out now .
zh: 我们强烈敦促你现在发言。

en: It is ten days to 31 May .
zh: 到5月31日有10天。

en: I spent the entire day at picnics + beach parties at P.A. , but I 'll try to make a little bit of sense .
zh: 我花了整天在P.A.的野餐和海滩聚会,但我会设法弄懂一点。

en: Things went on well for a while , but it takes some getting used to .
zh: 事情好转了一段时间,但需要一些习惯。

en: Then around November Ruth had to move to a single because of bad grades - that 's one thing about this room , it can really hurt your grades - she moved upstairs to the 3rd floor , where there are 3 singles so the four - room became a 3 room for a while , until January , when the 3rd floor was condemned by some shitty building inspector .
zh: 然后在11月左右,露丝不得不搬到一个单身室,因为成绩不好,这是这个房间的一个问题,它真的会伤害你的成绩,她搬到楼上3层,那里有3个单身室,所以4间的房间成了3间的房间,直到1月,3楼被一些糟糕的建筑检查员谴责。

en: We 've all existed so far but we 've been damn lucky , and have also worked damned hard .
zh: 到目前为止,我们都存在过,但我们真是幸运,而且也努力工作过。

en: First of all do n't talk back to Mrs. G. and you 'll have a good year .
zh: 首先不要再和G太太说话,你会过好一年。

en: Adele , the maid , is so dumb that you 'll have loads of fun just giving her gas .
zh: 女佣阿黛尔太傻了,你只要给她加油就会玩得非常开心。

en: voices from the 4 - room carry a lot farther than you think - you can tell this by listening from the bathroom .
zh: 来自四间房间的声音比你想象的要远得多,你可以从浴室里听到这一点。

en: So be quiet , but do n't worry - Mrs. G never reports you to Core for being noisy or staying up , only for things like cutting Church or required crap .
zh: 因此保持安静,但不要担心-G太太从不向科尔报告你吵闹或者不醒来,只是因为切 Church或需要的垃圾。

en: Unless they take them out this summer , you will notice 2 hooks in the ceiling of the outer porch .
zh: 除非他们今年夏天把它们带出去,否则你就会注意到外廊的天花板上有2根钩子。

en: Sally + I , whose beds were out on the porch used them for hanging flashlights over our beds for studying
zh: 萨莉和我,他们的床在阳台上,用它们挂着灯光在我们的床上学习

en: IF you have A SMALL STUDY LAMP you DO N'T EVEN NEED TO WORRY ABOUT THIS .
zh: 如果你有一个小学习班,你甚至不需要担心这个。

en: NEVER EVER LEAVE THE WINDOWS OPEN DURING SPRING TERM without SCREENS , or you 'll find a BEE 'S NEST IN YOUR BED LIKE SALLY DID THIS SPRING .
zh: 永远不要让WINDOWS在开花期内没有开花,否则你会像莎莉在开花时那样在你的宝宝里找到蜜蜂。

en: WELL , ONE of MY ROOMATES is BITCHING LIKE CRAZY 'CAUSE she 's " TIRED , " so I CA N'T GO ON MUCH LONGER - WE 'RE HAVING A PARTY IN HERE TOMORROW NIGHT  so I guess I should try to get to sleep tonight too .
zh: 嗯, 我的一个罗摩特正在疯狂地打架,因为她很累,所以我不会再这么久了 - 明天晚上我们有个聚会,所以我想我应该今晚也去睡觉。

en: so just remember to give this room all you can and remember that it ca n't be all that bad .
zh: 所以记住给这个房间你所能做的,记住它不会那么糟。

en: Have a great 4 - room experience and a fantastic prep year - it 's supposed to be the best year to have , so TAKE ADVANTAGE .
zh: 有一个好四间的经历和一个很棒的准备年 - 它应该是最好的一年,所以请注意.

en: I 'M TRYING FOR FRENCH HOUSE NEXT YEAR , AND I HOPE I 'll make it , cause I hate ABBEY HOUSE .
zh: 明年我正试着买法国房子,希望我能成功,因为我讨厌阿比家。

en: So , LIKE EVERYBODY SAYS , COME ON UP , AND VISIT , I 'M ROOMING with RUTH AGAIN
zh: 所以,就像每个人都说,来吧,去吧,我再和鲁思共寝了

en: IF THINGS GET DESPERATE , I 'M WILLING TO SELL MY GREEK + ROMAN HISTORY NOTEBOOK CONTAINING SECTIONS AND MAPS + NOTES FOR A SUITABLE PRICE .
zh: 如果这些东西得到兴趣,我想卖掉我的希腊 + 罗马历史说明书,包含各节和图表 + 说明书以合理的价格。

en: CONSIDER THIS OFFER LATER WHEN MISS MUCK DEMANDS 30 SECTIONS IN ONE NIGHT .
zh: 请稍后审议这项工作,当米斯·麦克在一天夜里要求30个部门。

en: Thanks for the money .
zh: 谢谢你的钱。

en: I am fixing up my new home here .
zh: 我正在修好我的新房子。

en: I have to do some phoneering , but I find that I like it .
zh: 我得打个电话,但我觉得我喜欢。

en: I am up every morning at five oclock chopping down weeds and planting flowers and things .
zh: 我每天早上五点钟起床,砍除杂草,种花和其它东西。

en: That is why I have been so long getting to my machine to write letters .
zh: 这就是为什么我花了这么长时间才弄到我的机器来写信。

en: I go to bed happily tired and swear that I will write you a letter first thing in the morning .
zh: 我高兴地疲倦地去睡觉,并发誓,早上我将给你写一封信。

en: But the birds , which I feed and who have begun to collect here already in large numbers , wake me up clamoring for their breakfast , and I dash out and place stale bread , etc. and watch the many colors and many behaviors of my feathered friends .
zh: 但那些我喂养的鸟儿,这些鸟儿已经开始在这里大量聚集,叫醒我为他们的早餐而欢呼起来,我冲出去放陈旧的面包,等等,并观察我的羽毛朋友的许多颜色和行为。

en: Less than an hour ago , a male cardinal lit on the porch no more than five feet from me and complained that there was no more food outside , so I hurried to put some out .
zh: 不到一小时前,一位男枢密院主教在门廊上点燃了五英尺远的灯,抱怨外面没有食物,所以我急忙把一些东西放出来。

en: Then just as I opened up the machine , a great conclave of birds , led by two crows , screamed to me that some enemy was raiding a mocking - bird nest in a big oak tree , and I rushed over to find a lean and desperate cat climbing the tree , and chunked him clear off the place .
zh: 就在我打开机器时,由两只乌鸦牵头的一群鸟儿向我喊道,有敌人在大橡树上抢劫了一个嘲笑鸟巢,我匆匆忙忙地去找一只瘦弱而绝望的猫爬到树上,把他从树上清除出来。

en: Spot , and her daughter , Shag , love it here .
zh: 斑点, 和她的女儿, 沙格, 在这里很爱.

en: They show it in many ways .
zh: 他们以多种方式展示了这一点。

en: They go hunting , and so far , have scared up a cat , two rabbits and an armadilla .
zh: 他们去狩猎, 到目前为止, 吓了一只猫, 两只兔子和一只野马.

en: From all that hoeing and what not , I am losing weight , God be praised !
zh: 所有这些磨毛和什么都没有, 我正在减肥, 神可称赞!

en: This day , I take out my notes and go back to work with new vigor and a clean - swept mind .
zh: 今天, 我把笔记拿出来,带着新的活力和清醒的头脑回去工作.

en: I belidve that I can do it , and I 'm giving it a very serious try this time .
zh: 我相信我能做到,这次我正认真地尝试。

en: You will have assorted scripts in your hand very shortly .
zh: 不久,您将掌握多种脚本。

en: Now , you p rhaps questi n why I am putting so much into this place where I now live .
zh: 现在,你也许想知道为什么我把这么多投入到我现在住的地方。

en: I have a chance to buy it .
zh: 我有机会买它。

en: In this little house I wrote MULES AND MEN .
zh: 在这个小房子里,我写了《MULES AND MEN》。

en: Since that time , it has come to be in a White residential neighborhood .
zh: 自那时起,它已成为白人居住区。

en: Eau Gallie has grown with the Jet Base , and not far away , near Cocoa , the Guided Missile Base , and many people stationed here are buying and building .
zh: 厄·加利(Eau Gallie)与喷气基地(Jet Base)一起成长, недалеко的科科(Cocoa)、导引导弹基地(Guided Missile Base)和许多驻扎在这里的人正在购买和建造。

en: Mr. W. Lansing Gleason , my landlord , is the mayor .
zh: 我的房东W·兰辛·格莱森先生是市长。

en: He must go slow about selling it to me , waiting on public reaction .
zh: 他必须慢点卖给我, 等待公众的反应.

en: It is beginning to be favorable to me .
zh: 它开始对我有利。

en: Several of my neighbors have stopped in the last week and remarked on the improvements I have made .
zh: 我的几个邻居上周都停下来,对我所作的改进作了评论。

en: It looked like a jungle three weeks ago , and it took a strong heart and an eye on the future for me to move in when I arrived .
zh: 三个星期前,它看起来像丛林,我到那里时,我需要坚强的心灵和眼光,才能进入未来。

en: The place had run down so badly .
zh: 那地方已经糟透了。

en: In what was meant to be a compliment , I have been told twice , " You do n't live like the majority of your people . You like things clean and orderly around you . "
zh: 我曾两次被告知, “ 你不像大多数人那样生活, 你喜欢你周围的东西干净整齐. ”

en: The manager of the local dairy , seeing me setting out flowers as I cleared , surprised me with a load of compost as a present Saturday .
zh: 当地奶制品店的经理看到我在清扫时摆出鲜花 surprised me with a load of compost as a present Saturday 。

en: The grounds have great possibilities , and I really would love to own it .
zh: 这个土地有很大可能性,我真想拥有它。

en: I still must remove tons of junk , old tin cans and bottles from the premises .
zh: 我仍然必须从房舍里除掉大量的垃圾、旧罐头和瓶子。

en: Somehow , this one spot on earth feels like home to me .
zh: 不知怎么,这片土地对我来说就像家一样。

en: I have always intended to come back here .
zh: 我一直打算回到这儿。

en: That is why I am doing so much to make a go of it .
zh: 这就是为什么我这么做,想办法。

en: No house in a block of me four ways .
zh: 我四条街头没有房子。

en: No loud radios and record - playing to irritate me , and great oaks and palms around the place .
zh: 没有响亮的收音机和录音机来刺激我, 到处都是大橡木和棕榈.

en: I do hope that other person that Burroughs Mitchell had reading my script was not Roy Ottley .
zh: 我确实希望布鲁斯·米切尔读过我的剧本的人不是罗伊·奥特利。

en: You can see why I would not want a Negro writer to be handling it .
zh: 你可以看到为什么我不想让一个黑人作家来处理这件事。

en: Since none of the others have thought to do anything with the hair - traightening business , it might prove a temptation to play my work down to Burroughs , then do something on it himself .
zh: 因为其他人都没有想做任何事情来解决毛发问题,这可能是一种诱惑,把我的工作卖给伯罗斯,然后自己做点事情。

en: Please check on that for me .
zh: 请帮我查一下。

en: The Saturday Evening Post photographer has been here and took a lot of pictures .
zh: 周六晚邮报的摄影师已经到这儿,拍了很多照片。

en: He caught me in my dungarees working outdoors , and naturally insisted on photographing me like that .
zh: 他把我抓住在户外工作时的裤子里,自然地坚持要这样照我。

en: He told me that Ben Hibbs likes the article very much and it will be in an early issue .
zh: 他告诉我,本·希布斯非常喜欢这篇文章,而且它将在早些时候出版。

en: I gather from reading the magazine that the SEP favors Taft , and so it probably falls right in with the plan .
zh: 我从杂志上得知, SEP赞成塔夫特,所以它可能与计划完全相符。

en: They never se m to miss a chance recently to mention him favorably .
zh: 他们从不错过最近一次机会来赞同他。

en: As soon as I can get some things in your hands to sell , I shall try to raise the cash for my newspaper devoted to those in domestic service .
zh: 只要我能把你的一些东西弄到你手里卖掉,我就会设法筹集我为那些从事国内服务的报纸的现金。

en: I really believe that the idea is sound and can makke money .
zh: 我真的相信这个想法是合理的,而且可以赚钱。

en: I paid up my sick and accident insurance for a year , $ 67.70 , and spent so much getting the house wired and made more livable in other ways around the place , that I am almost broke already again .
zh: 我花了一年的病保险和意外保险,67.70美元,花了那么多钱使房子有电线,使它周围的其他地方更可住,我几乎已经破产了。

en: Bought an ice - box , and furniture too , so now , as badly as I hate to draw it , I need some cash to live on .
zh: 买了一个冰盒, 还有家具, 现在, 尽管我讨厌画它, 我需要一些钱来活下去.

en: My best to you and yours , and pray that we make a lot of money this year , so that when / if I am told that I can buy this place , I can do it and build a comfortable little new house on it .
zh: 我向你和你的祝福,并祈祷我们今年能赚很多钱,这样我如果听说我能买到这个地方,我就能做它,然后在上面建造一个舒适的小新房子。

en: After visa snags , all - girl Afghan team honored for ' courageous achievement ' at international robotics competition
zh: 经过签证扣押后, 全 girl 阿富汗队在国际机器人比赛中获得“ 勇敢的成就 ” 的荣誉

en: A group of Afghan teenagers was awarded a silver medal for " courageous achievement " on Tuesday in the FIRST Global Challenge Robot Olympics in the Daughters of the American Revolution Constitution Hall in Washington D.C.
zh: 一群阿富汗青少年于本周二在华盛顿哥伦比亚特区的美国革命宪法厅的女儿举行的第一届全球挑战机器人奥林匹克运动会上获得“勇敢成就”的银牌。

en: The six - member Afghan team , which consists entirely of girls , had been denied visas to enter the United States until last week , drawing notice from critics of U.S. President Donald Trump 's policies regarding Muslims traveling to the U.S.
zh: 这个由女孩组成的六个成员的阿富汗队,直到上周才被剥夺进入美国签证,这引起了美国总统特朗普对穆斯林前往美国的政策批评者们的注意。

en: The President later personally took action to allow the team into the country .
zh: 总统随后亲自采取行动,允许球队进入该国。

en: According to Afghan Ambassador to the United States Hamdullah Mohib , the participation of this team in this science competition shows progress in Afghanistan 's response to nearly two decades of military conflict .
zh: 据阿富汗驻美国大使穆罕默德·穆希布表示,该队参加这项科学竞赛显示了阿富汗对近20年军事冲突的反应的进展。

en: The first FIRST Global robotics competition was held this week in Washington D.C.
zh: 第一届全球机器人竞赛本周在华盛顿举行。

en: The FIRST Global competition  was founded by Dean Kamen to encourage interest in applied science , technology , engineering , and mathematics in young people .
zh: FIRST全球竞赛由Dean Kamen创立,旨在鼓励年轻人对应用科学、技术、工程和数学的兴趣。

en: This year 's theme was water security .
zh: 今年的主题是水安全。

en: For the contest , the robots were required to recognize , pick up , carry , and deposit balls colored blue and orange to represent water and pollution , respectively .
zh: 为了比赛,机器人需要识别、拾起、携带和储存蓝色和橙色的球来代表水和污染,分别。

en: Teams from different countries were arranged in groups of three , and groups faced off in pairs .
zh: 来自不同国家的队伍被安排成三个小组,而小组则以两组面对面。

en: The group whose three robots collectively earned the most points won that match .
zh: 三个机器人 collectively earned the most points的小组赢了那场比赛。

en: According to the Afghan team 's coach , Alireza Mehraban , in their first matchup , the Afghan team 's robot , named " Better Idea of Afghan Girls , " scored one or two points for the three - nation alliance with the Gabonese and Estonian teams .
zh: 根据阿富汗队教练阿里雷萨·梅拉班的说法, 在他们的第一次比赛中, 阿富汗队的机器人,名为“阿富汗女孩的更好的想法”, 为加蓬和爱沙尼亚队三国联盟得分了一两分.

en: This year , the European team won the competition overall , with the silver medal going to Poland and the bronze to Armenia .
zh: 今年,欧洲队总共赢得比赛,银牌是给波兰,铜牌是给亚美尼亚。

en: " We are so interested because we find a big chance to show the talent and ability of Afghans , " team member Rodaba Noori told the press , " to show that Afghan women can make robots too and we can improve in this section —  robotics section .
zh: 团队成员罗达巴·努里(Rodaba Noori)向记者表示:“我们非常感兴趣,因为我们找到了展示阿富汗人的才华和能力的巨大机会。

en: We were so interested because we had n't long or enough time to get ready for competition but we came to United States and now we are here because of Trump intervention . "
zh: 我们非常感兴趣,因为我们没有足够的时间来准备竞争,但我们来到美国,现在我们在这里是因为特朗普的干预。

en: The team arrived in Washington D.C. after many difficulties .
zh: 球队在经历了许多困难之后抵达华盛顿。

en: They were twice denied visas to enter the United States .
zh: 他们两次被拒绝进入美国签证。

en: Even applying for a visa required the entire team to travel about 500 miles  from Herat , their home , to the capital in Kabul , through territory controlled by the Taliban .
zh: 即使申请签证,整个团队都必须从赫拉特(他们家)到喀布尔首都的500英里,通过塔利班控制的领土。

en: They made the trip twice and were turned down both times .
zh: 他们两次旅行,两次被拒绝。

en: President Donald Trump personally asked the United States National Security Council to help the girls enter the country .
zh: 唐纳德·特朗普总统亲自要求美国国家安全委员会帮助这些女孩进入美国。

en: After some interplay between the State and Homeland Security Departments , the girls were granted " parole " status on the grounds that their entry would be a " significant public benefit . "
zh: 在国家和国土安全部之间相互作用之后, 这些女孩被给予“ 假释 ” 地位,理由是她们的进入将是“ 重大的公共利益 ” 。

en: The President has drawn both praise for helping the girls enter the U.S. and criticism for his travel ban , which does not cover Afghanistan , and for the atmosphere of hostility toward Muslims that critics blame for denying them entry in the first place .
zh: 总统为帮助女孩进入美国而称赞,并批评他不包括阿富汗的旅行禁令以及对穆斯林的敌意气氛,批评者首先指责他们拒绝进入美国。

en: Citing privacy rules , U.S. officials have not said why the team was initially denied visas , but Afghan Ambassador Hamdullah Mohib says there were concerns they would attempt to remain in the United States or in Canada after the contest .
zh: 美国官员没有说为什么球队最初被拒绝签证,但阿富汗大使穆希布表示他们会试图在比赛后留在美国或加拿大。

en: Afghanistan is not one of the nations covered by President Trump 's travel ban , but teams from Sudan , Iran , Libya , and Yemen , which are covered , are among the 163 teams in the competition .
zh: 阿富汗不是特朗普总统的旅行禁令所涵盖的国家之一,但包括苏丹、伊朗、利比亚和也门的球队在比赛中的163个球队中。

en: There were also two Syrian teams scheduled to compete , one national and one made up of refugees .
zh: 还有两个叙利亚队,一个国家队和一个由难民组成。

en: Syria and all refugees are covered by the ban .
zh: 叙利亚和所有难民都受禁。

en: The Syrian refugee team listed their country as " Hope " on the backs of their shirts and named their robot " Robogee . "
zh: 叙利亚难民队把他们的国家列为“ 希望 ” 在他们的衬衫背上,并把他们的机器人命名为“ 罗波吉 ” 。

en: Teams from Morocco and Iran both had difficulties getting themselves or their robots across the U.S. border .
zh: 来自摩洛哥和伊朗的团队都难以将自己或他们的机器人通过美国边界。

en: Team Estonia had to rebuild their robot entirely after the original disappeared in transit .
zh: 爱沙尼亚队不得不完全重建他们的机器人,因为原来的消失在运输中。

en: " Seventeen years ago , this would not have been possible at all , " said Ambassador Mohib .
zh: “ 十七年前, 这根本不可能, ”莫希布大使说。

en: " They represent our aspirations and resilience despite having been brought up in a perpetual conflict .
zh: 他们代表了我们的愿望和韧性,尽管他们是在永恒的冲突中长大。

en: These girls will be proving to the world and the nation that nothing will prevent us from being an equal and active member of the international community . "
zh: 这些女孩将向世界和国家证明,没有什么能阻止我们成为国际社会的平等和积极成员。

en: Every team in the contest was sent a collection of robot parts roughly four months in advance of the competition .
zh: 每个参赛队伍在比赛前大约四个月就收到了机器人部件的集合。

en: The Afghan team 's supplies were delayed , leaving them only two weeks left to assemble their robot and only one day to test it before packing it up to mail to the competition site .
zh: 阿富汗队的补给被延迟,他们只剩两个星期的时间来组装他们的机器人,还有一天的时间来测试它,然后把它包装成邮寄到比赛场地。

en: The competition ended on Tuesday .
zh: 比赛于星期二结束。

en: This is the first FIRST Global competition , and the organization plans to hold the contest in a different country every year .
zh: 这是第一届全球第一轮比赛,该组织计划每年在不同的国家举办比赛。

en: Next year 's competition is scheduled to take place in Mexico City .
zh: 明年的比赛将在墨西哥城举行。

en: On Friday , fishermen rescued over 700 asylum seekers whose boat sank , and the Indonesian Navy reportedly saved 200 more after they were found swimming along the coast of Aceh , Indonesia .
zh: 星期五,渔民救出超过700名难民,他们的船沉没,据称印尼海军在他们被发现在印度尼西亚阿什海岸游泳后还救了200人。

en: Major general Fuad Basya , spokesman for the Indonesian military , said fisherman first noticed the people and a warship was deployed to retrieve them .
zh: 印度尼西亚军队发言人福德·巴西亚少将说,渔夫首先注意到了人民,并部署了一支战列舰来追捕他们。

en: The rescued members included Bangladeshis and Rohingya , a stateless minority of Muslims from Myanmar .
zh: 幸存的成员包括孟加拉国人和缅甸的无国籍穆斯林少数群体罗兴亚人。

en: Myanmar is mainly Buddhist and the United Nations rates the Rohingya among the world 's most persecuted groups .
zh: 缅甸主要是佛教徒,联合国把罗兴亚人列为世界上最受迫害的群体之一。

en: Malaysia and Indonesia have maintained a policy of turning away boats of migrants which , according to AFP , the Untied Nations and United States have both criticised .
zh: 马来西亚和印度尼西亚一直实行拒绝移民船只的政策,据 AFP 报道,联合国和美国都对此表示批评。

en: One Rohingya , Muhammad Amin , the first boat rescued on Friday was turned around twice , toward Malaysia by Indonesian navy and then toward Indonesia by Malaysian navy .
zh: 一名罗吉尼亚人,穆罕默德·阿明,星期五救出的第一艘船,被印度尼西亚海军转向马来西亚,然后被印度尼西亚海军转向马来西亚。

en: Discussing his concern in a public statement , Malaysia 's Prime Minister , Najib Razak said , " We are in contact with all relevant parties , with whom we share the desire to find a solution to this crisis " .
zh: 马来西亚总理纳吉布·拉扎克在公开声明中讨论了他的关切:“我们与所有有关各方保持联系,我们与他们分享寻求解决这场危机的愿望。

en: The US State Department said John Kerry , the Secretary of State , contacted Thailand 's foreign minister over temporary housing for the Rohingya out at sea .
zh: 美国国务院说,美国国务卿约翰·克里(John Kerry)联系了泰国外交部长,询问罗兴亚人在海上的临时住房问题。

en: Jeff Rathke , the State Department Spokesperson , said , " We urge the governments of the region to work together quickly , first and foremost , to save the lives of migrants now at sea who are in need of an immediate rescue effort " .
zh: 美国国务院发言人杰夫·拉特克(Jeff Rathke)说:“我们敦促该地区的政府迅速合作,首先,为了拯救目前在海上的难民,他们需要立即作出救援努力。

en: Rathke also asked the governments of South East Asia not to turn away boats of people seeking asylum .
zh: 拉特克还要求东南亚各国政府不要拒绝寻求庇护的人的船只。

en: Estimates suggest 8000 migrants may be currently at sea in the region .
zh: 据估计,目前该地区可能有8000名移民在海上。

en: News of police response to a boy 's digital clock in Texas last week has inspired a global social movement in support of the youth .
zh: 上周在德克萨斯州,警方对一名男孩的数字钟的回应的消息激发了支持青年的全球社会运动。

en: After news of the police response was reported , Mohamed received support online ranging from US President Barack Obama to Facebook creator Mark Zuckerberg .
zh: 警方回应的消息后,穆罕默德收到了来自美国总统奥巴马到Facebook创建者马克·扎克伯格的在线支持。

en: Yesterday Mohamed received VIP attention at Google headquarters in California at the Google Science Fair — and tomorrow he plans to meet international dignitaries at the United Nations headquarters in New York .
zh: 昨天,穆罕默德在加州的Google总部在Google科学博览会上受到了 VIP 的关注 — — 明天,他打算在纽约联合国总部与国际贵族会面。

en: Mohamed brought the digital clock he made to school on September 14 , and a teacher mistakenly thought it resembled a bomb .
zh: 9月14日,穆罕默德将他制作的数字钟带到学校,一位老师误以为它像炸弹。

en: Police arrested and questioned the student .
zh: 警察逮捕并询问了那个学生。

en: Images of the boy wearing a NASA T - shirt and handcuffed by the police were quickly posted and reposted online .
zh: 这个男孩穿着NASA的T恤衫,被警察绑架的照片很快被上传到网上.

en: The Deseret News observed that the hashtag on Twitter , #IStandWithAhmed , had become an international phenomenon .
zh: Deseret News指出,Twitter上的 hashtag #IStandWithAhmed已经成为一个国际现象。

en: The Straits Times noted what began as individual messages to Mohamed had grown into a " support movement " .
zh: 海峡时报指出,从个人给穆罕默德的讯息开始,已经发展成“ 支持运动 ” 。

en: " Hoping that the #istandwithahmed movement translates into a substantive national conversation on race , punishment , and incarceration . "
zh: 希望 #istandwithahmed运动将转化为关于种族、惩罚和监禁的实质性全国性对话。

en: The Twitter attention led to outreach from Google and Mohamed was invited to their Google Science Fair .
zh: 推特的关注引起了谷歌的关注,穆罕默德被邀请参加他们的Google科学展览会。

en: Mohamed was a VIP guest at the Google Science Fair this weekend , and was able to meet finalists at the event held at Google 's headquarters located in Mountain View , California .
zh: 穆罕默德是这个周末的Google科学展览会的 VIP 嘉宾,并能够在加州的 Mountain View 的Google总部举行的颁奖典礼上与 finalists 见面。

en: Co-founder of Google , Sergey Brin , personally met with Mohamed during his visit to Google .
zh: Google的共同创始人塞尔维亚·布林在访问谷歌期间亲自与穆罕默德会面。

en: On Wednesday , Mohamed and his father are to travel to the United Nations .
zh: 星期三,穆罕默德和他的父亲将前往联合国。

en: His father Mohamed El - Hassan Mohamed said he was taking his entire family to the U.N. headquarters in New York , because international dignitaries wanted to meet with his son and express their support .
zh: 他的父亲穆罕默德·埃尔 - 哈桑·穆罕默德说他将全家带到纽约的联合国总部,因为国际贵族希望与他的儿子见面并表示支持。

en: Psychology major at University of Texas Arlington Amneh Jafari heard of the incident and wanted to issue her support to Mohamed .
zh: 德克萨斯大学的心理学系教授阿林顿·阿姆尼·贾法里听说了这个事件,想向穆罕默德发出她的支持。

en: She chose the hastag #IStandWithAhmed and posted to Twitter .
zh: 她选择“#IStandWithAhmed”并在Twitter上发布。

en: Jafari said she felt Mohamed had been subject to Islamophobia and her hashtag created greater awareness about this issue .
zh: 贾法里说,她觉得穆罕默德受到伊斯兰恐惧的困扰,她的推特也使人们对这个问题更加了解。

en: The hashtag took on a life of its own , and was used in messages on Twitter over one million times by Thursday night .
zh: 这个 hashtag在周四晚上已经在Twitter上超过100万次使用。

en: US President Barack Obama tweeted using his @POTUS account :
zh: 美国总统巴拉克·奥巴马在推特上使用他的@POTUS账户:

en: We should inspire more kids like you to like science .
zh: 我们应该鼓励更多像你这样的孩子喜欢科学。

en: Twitter gave Mohamed the option to come to their company for an internship .
zh: Twitter给了穆罕默德选择到他们的公司来实习。

en: Facebook co-founder Mark Zuckerberg tweeted to Mohamed and said the boy was welcome to come and tour the company .
zh: Facebook的共同创始人马克·泽克伯格向穆罕默德发了推特,称这个男孩欢迎来参观这家公司。

en: Executive director of the Dallas chapter of the Council on American - Islamic Relations Alia Salem said Mohamed wishes to use his newfound fame and attention to spotlight social causes including the treatment of Muslims in the United States .
zh: 美国-伊斯兰关系理事会达拉斯支部执行主任阿里亚·萨勒姆说,穆罕默德希望利用他新发现的名声和注意力来突出社会原因,包括对美国穆斯林的待遇。

en: University of Texas Arlington Muslim Student Association president Sehar Memon said the large amount of positive feedback for Mohamed had helped make his situation much better .
zh: 德克萨斯大学阿林顿穆斯林学生协会(Arlington Muslim Student Association)主席塞哈尔·梅蒙(Sehar Memon)说,对穆罕默德的大量积极反馈帮助他改善了他的状况。

en: Memon also said she believed the social movement in reaction to Mohamed helped improve Muslim / non-Muslim .
zh: 梅蒙还说,她相信社会运动对穆罕默德的反应有助于改善穆斯林/非穆斯林。

en: Both the Irving Independent School District and the Irving Police Department have asserted that the boy 's religion and name were not a factor in the manner in which they approached the situation .
zh: 伊尔文独立学校区和伊尔文警察局都声称,这个男孩的宗教和姓名不是他们对待情况的方式的一个因素。

en: A storm yesterday caused a crane to fall into Mecca 's Grand Mosque , killing 107 or more and wounding 238 , according to Saudi Arabia 's Civil Defense Authority .
zh: 据沙特阿拉伯民防当局报道,昨天的暴风雨导致一个吊车坠入墨西哥大清真寺,造成107人死亡或以上,238人受伤。

en: Civil Defense Authority director General Suleiman al - Amr , in remarks to al - Ikhbariya television , said " All those who were wounded and the dead have been taken to hospital . There are no casualties left at the location . "
zh: 民防局总干事苏莱曼·阿姆尔(Suleyman al-Amr)在对伊赫巴里亚电视台的讲话中说, “ 所有受伤者和死者都被送往医院. 在现场没有人员伤亡. ”

en: Photos released of the scene showed numerous bloodied bodies and various scattered debris .
zh: 拍摄现场的照片显示了许多流血的尸体和散布的碎片。

en: The accident occurred at a time when the mosque was relatively uncrowded .
zh: 这次事故发生在清真寺相对没有拥挤的时期。

en: " Had it happened five hours earlier or four hours earlier , I think the death toll would have been more than a thousand . "
zh: 如果发生在5小时前或者4小时前,我认为死亡人数将超过1000人。

en: The crane accident comes just ten days before the beginning of the Hajj , the annual pilgrimage to Mecca , Islam 's holiest site .
zh: 车祸发生在伊斯兰圣地摩卡的每年的巡礼 ஹஜ்开始前十天。

en: As undergoing a pilgrimage to Mecca is a mandatory religious duty for all Muslims who physically and financially can , millions of pilgrims arrive in Mecca each year for the Hajj .
zh: 由于前往墨西哥的巡礼是所有能够从物质和财政上获得的穆斯林的强制性宗教义务,每年有数百万的巡礼者到墨西哥去参加哈ஜ்。

en: Construction was underway at the mosque in order to enlarge the mosque and improve crowd control , which has been a recurring problem during Mecca 's pilgrimages .
zh: 这座清真寺正在进行修建,以扩大清真寺和改善人群控制,这在墨西哥的巡礼期间一直是一次性的问题。

en: Recent reports have revealed that a defector from the elite group within Scientology called the Sea Org was first persuaded to travel back to a management building for the organization in California , where he was interrogated by an attorney for Scientology and then arrested .
zh: 最近的报道显示,一名来自Scientology内部精英团体的叛逃者,名叫Sea Org,首先被说服返回加州的组织管理大楼,在那里他被Scientology的律师审问,然后被逮捕。

en: Montalvo is holding a copy of the book Blown for Good critical of Scientology , written by Marc Headley .
zh: 蒙塔尔沃持有一本由马克·海德利(Marc Headley)撰写的《Scientology》的《Blown for Good》评论书。

en: Daniel Montalvo , 19 , a member of Scientology all his life , was arrested after leaving its elite group the Sea Org .
zh: 丹尼尔·蒙塔尔沃(Daniel Montalvo),19岁,他一生都是科学家的成员,在离开其精英团体的海奥尔格后被捕。

en: He was released on US$ 20,000 bail on Thursday .
zh: 星期四,他以20万美元的保释被释放。

en: Montalvo was charged with taking hard drives and a zip drive from the Scientology organization after leaving the Sea Org group .
zh: 蒙塔尔沃在离开海洋组织后被指控从科学组织带走硬盘和磁盘。

en: Members of the Sea Org live a strict lifestyle – with little income , small diet provided and significant time invested in work per day .
zh: 海奥尔格的成员生活着严格的生活方式 — — 收入很少,提供少量饮食,每天投入大量工作时间。

en: Montalvo had read an article in the Scientology propaganda publication Freedom Magazine , which attacked high - ranking defectors from the organization including Tom Devocht and Mark Rathbun .
zh: 蒙塔尔沃在科学宣传刊物《自由杂志》上读过一篇文章, 文章攻击了该组织高级别的叛逃者,包括汤姆·德沃赫特和马克·拉特本.

en: Montalvo had known Devocht personally , and came to the conclusion that the claims made about him in the Freedom article were lies .
zh: 蒙塔尔沃曾亲自认识德沃赫特,并得出结论说他在《自由》条文中提出的指控是谎言。

en: Montalvo was subsequently motivated to seek out information about Scientology on the Internet , and came upon a blog written by Rathbun .
zh: 蒙塔尔沃随后被动机在互联网上寻找关于科学的资料,并发现了Rathbun写的博客。

en: Montalvo contacted former members of Scientology , who helped him leave the organization and get in touch with Devocht .
zh: 蒙塔尔沃联系了前科学家组织成员,他们帮助他离开组织并与德沃赫特联系。

en: He traveled to Florida to meet with Devocht , who had told Montalvo he would assist him with future employment and housing .
zh: 他前往佛罗里达州与德沃赫特见面,后者告诉蒙塔尔沃他将帮助他获得未来的就业和住房。

en: According to Rathbun the Scientology property in question was returned by mail to the organization by Montalvo shortly after he left the Sea Org .
zh: 根据拉什本的说法,他离开海奥尔格后不久,蒙塔尔沃将有关的科学财产邮寄给该组织。

en: Scientology officials have stated they have not received the materials .
zh: 科学家官员表示,他们没有收到这些材料。

en: After calling the Scientology organization by phone to attempt to speak with his mother , Montalvo was instead put through to a Scientology attorney , Kendrick Moxon .
zh: 蒙塔尔沃在打电话给科学组织,试图与母亲谈谈之后,却被转交给科学律师肯德里克·莫克森。

en: Rathbun wrote , " Moxon proceeded to lie to Daniel that the hard drives were never returned , and made a convincing case  that Daniel would be put behind iron bars for a good long time , UNLESS of course , he returned and cooperated with Moxon and routed out properly . "
zh: 拉特本写道: “ 摩克逊继续向丹尼尔撒谎,说硬盘从未被归还,并提出一个令人信服的证据,说丹尼尔将被放在铁栏后面很长时间,但当然,他又回到了摩克逊,并与摩克逊合作,并将其彻底销毁。

en: According to Rathbun , a detective for the Los Angeles Sheriff 's office was provided with material from Scientology to build a case against Montalvo .
zh: 根据Rathbun的说法,洛杉矶警长办公室的一名侦探得到了Scientology的材料,以便对蒙塔尔沃提起诉讼。

en: Instead of being taken to a hotel , where he could route out as promised , he was taken to the Century City Towers .
zh: 他没有被带到旅馆去,而是被带到世纪城塔。

en: He was deposited in an office on the 33rd floor where a pricy church lawyer interrogated him for two hours . "
zh: 他被关在33楼的办公室里,一个牧师教堂的律师对他进行了两个小时的审讯。

en: Rathbun asserted that Scientology officials , " ... plied the Sheriff 's detective with a grand conspiracy theory , characterizing me as the ' anti-christ ' of the church of Scientology . ... The next thing Daniel knows he 's in a cell where he sat for the next 30 hours . "
zh: 拉特本声称,科学官员“... 将保安官的侦探用一场大阴谋理论来勾引,把我当作科学教会的“反基督” 。

en: Steve Whitmore , a representative for the LA Sheriff 's office , told LA Weekly in a statement that the case involving Montalvo was being dealt with as charges relating to grand theft .
zh: 洛杉矶警长办公室的代表史蒂夫·惠特莫尔(Steve Whitmore)在一份声明中表示,蒙塔尔沃案子被处理为涉及大盗的指控。

en: On September 29 , Scientology officials went to the East Los Angeles sheriff 's station where they claimed Montalvo allegedly left the organization with computer hard drives .
zh: 9月29日,科学官员前往洛杉矶东区的保安局,他们声称蒙塔尔沃已经带着电脑硬盘离开该组织。

en: Whitmore told LA Weekly that on October 6 after traveling back from Florida , Montalvo " walked into lobby of the East L.A. station and turned himself in " , and told the police , " everything he did " .
zh: 惠特摩尔在10月6日从佛罗里达州回来后告诉洛杉矶周刊,蒙塔尔沃“ 走进了洛杉矶东区的车站, 转过身来 ”, 并告诉警察“ 他所做的一切 ” 。

en: Whitmore stated to LA Weekly that the alleged crime involved five hard drives each of $ 200 in value .
zh: 惠特摩尔向洛杉矶周刊表示,涉嫌的罪行涉及五台硬盘,每个硬盘价值200美元。

en: Montalvo has been assisted by former members of Scientology , including musician Tiziano Lugli and actor Jason Beghe .
zh: 蒙塔尔沃还得到了史蒂安托洛学的前成员的帮助,包括音乐家蒂齐亚诺·卢格利和演员杰森·贝格。

en: Rathbun requested donations via a statement made on his blog , in order to help Montalvo with his legal defense financing .
zh: 拉什本通过他在博客上发表的声明请求捐款,以帮助蒙塔尔沃获得法律辩护资金。

en: He described Montalvo as an individual , " facing the penitentiary in thanks for the following sins : a) Leaving a lifehood of slavery to get a taste of freedom and the world . b) Refusing - despite every provocation and incentive and threat - to frame three guys who went out of their ways  to help the kid achieve that freedom . "
zh: 他形容蒙塔尔沃是一个个人,“面对监狱以感谢下列罪行:(a)离开奴隶制的生活,享受自由和世界的滋味。

en: The Hong Kong legislative election was held on Sunday , with a record - breaking turnout of around 2 million voters and turnout rate of 58 % .
zh: 香港议会选举于星期天举行, 有超过200万选民参加,投票率为58 % 。

en: The results show the anti-establishment camp successfully maintained a majority in the geographical constituencies ' seats thus veto power to any members ' bills , and also a minority larger than a third to veto any bills featuring major political reforms .
zh: 结果表明,反体制阵营成功地保持在地理选区的多数席位,从而对任何成员的法案行使否决权,以及超过三分之一的少数人否决任何涉及重大政治改革的法案。

en: Young and new faces emerged in the new council members , as veteran politicians stepped down in both the anti-establishment and pro-Beijing campus .
zh: 年轻和新面孔在新的议会成员中出现, veteran政客在反体制和亲北京的校园中退位。

en: Eddie Chu received the largest vote in any geographical constituency
zh: 埃迪·楚在任何一个地理选区都获得了最大的选票

en: In the New Territories West geographical constituency , nonpartisan pan-democrat Eddie Chu was elected with 84,121 votes , the most given to any list in the geographical constituencies .
zh: 在新界西部的选区,非党派泛民主的埃迪·楚以84,121票当选,是该地区选区中最多得票的选区。

en: Other anti-establishment candidates elected in this district were localist camp 's Cheng Chung - tai of Civic Passion , pan - democracy camp 's Kwok Ka-ki and Andrew Wan of respectively Civic Party and the Democratic Party .
zh: 该地区选出的其他反对体制的候选人分别是民情党 、 泛民主党 、 工党和民主党的吴卡基和安德鲁湾.

en: The pro-Beijing camp candidates elected were New People Party 's Michael Tien , DAB 's Ben Chan and Leung Che - cheung , FTU 's Alice Mak and pro-establishment nonpartisan Junius Ho .
zh: 选出的亲北京阵营候选人是新民党的迈克尔·廷恩 、 民主党的本 Chan 和 Leung Che - cheung 、 联邦工联的 Alice Mak 和支持体制的非党派 Junius Ho 。

en: Two pan-democratic veteran politicians Lee Cheuk - yan of the Labour Party and Frederick Fung of ADPL were defeated in this constituency , with Junius Ho defeating Lee Cheuk - yan by around five thousand votes .
zh: 两位泛民主的资深政治家,工党李中扬和ALDE的弗雷德里克·冯在该选区被击败,朱尼乌斯·霍以约五千票击败李中扬。

en: In the New Territories East geographical constituency , pan - democracy camp councillors Alvin Yeung from the Civic Party , Fernando Cheung of the Labour Party , Raymond Chan of People Power , and Leung Kwok - hung of LSD were successfully elected .
zh: 在新界东地区选区, 泛民主阵营议员来自民党的艾尔文·杨 、 工党的费尔南多·张 、 人民权力的雷蒙德·陈 、 LSD的梁国洪均获选.

en: Pan - democrat Lam Cheuk - ting from the Democratic Party and localist group Youngspiration 's Baggio Leung were successfully elected newcomers .
zh: 来自民主党的泛 民主 拉姆·切克顿和青年spiration 的巴吉奥·勒昂成功当选新成员.

en: For the Pro-Beijing camp , Elizabeth Quat of DAB was elected with 58,825 votes , the highest in the constituency .
zh: 为亲北京阵线,民主党的伊丽莎白·奎特以58,825票当选,是选区最高。

en: Other pro-Beijing candidates elected in this constituency were Gary Chan of DAB and Eunice Yung of New People 's Party .
zh: 在该选区选出的其他亲北京的候选人是DAB的Gary Chan和新人民党的Eunice Yung。

en: Pan - democrat Gary Fan of the Neo Democrats failed to get re-elected in this constituency , and resigned from his leadership in his party due to its election defeat .
zh: 泛民主派新民主党的加里·范在该选区未能再当选, 因选举失败而辞去了党内领导职务.

en: In the Hong Kong Island geographical constituency , pro-Beijing New People Party 's Regina Ip was re-elected with 60,760 votes .
zh: 在香港岛的选区,亲北京新民党(英语:Beijing New People Party)的Regina Ip(英语:Regina Ip)以60760票重新当选。

en: Other pro-Beijing elected were FTU 's Kwok Wai-keung and DAB 's Horace Cheung .
zh: 其他亲北京的选民是FTU的Kwok Wai-keung和DAB的 Horace Cheung。

en: Demosisto 's Nathan Law earned a surprise victory as second place in the constituency with 50,818 votes , and becomes the youngest Legislative Council member in Hong Kong 's history .
zh: Demosisto的Nathan Law以50,818票赢得选区第二名,成为香港历史上最年轻的立法会议员。

en: The other two anti-establishment camp elects were Hui Chi-fung from the Democratic Party and Tanya Chan of the Civic Party , both considered to be in the pan - democracy camp .
zh: 其他两名反对体制阵营的选民是民主党的 Hui Chi-fung 和 公民党的 Tanya Chan, 他们都被认为是全民主阵营的.

en: Pan - democrat veteran Cyd Ho from the Labour Party lost her seat in this constituency .
zh: 工党 的 泛 民主 老兵 希德·霍 在这个选区失去了她的席位.

en: In the Kowloon West geographical constituency , pro-Beijing councillors Ann Chiang of DAB and Priscilla Leung of BPA were successfully re-elected , as well as pan-democratic councillors Claudia Mo of the Civic Party and Wong Pik-wan of the Democratic Party .
zh: 在九龙西区的选区,亲北京议员张建华(英语:An Chiang)和张建华(英语:Priscilla Leung)再当选,泛民主议员 Claudia Mo(英语:Claudia Mo)和黄 Pik-wan(英语:Wong Pik-wan)再当选。

en: The rest of the candidates elected in this constituency were young and relatively new activists from the localist camp , Lau Siu-lai and Youngspiration 's Yau Wai-ching .
zh: 这个选区的其他选民是来自本地阵营的年轻和相对新来的活动家,劳思莱和青年spiration的姚伟庆。

en: Yau Wai-ching defeated another localist camp candidate , veteran politician Raymond Wong of the Proletariat Political Institute , by 424 votes .
zh: 姚明以424票击败了另一位本地党派竞选者, Proletariat Political Institute 的资深政治家雷蒙德·王。

en: In the Kowloon East geographical constituency , pro-Beijing district councillor Wilson Or was elected with 51,516 votes , the highest in this constituency .
zh: 在九龙东选区,亲北京区议员威尔逊·奥尔(Wilson Or)以51,516票当选,是该选区最高的。

en: Nonpartisan Paul Tse and Wong Kwok - kin of the FTU were successfully re-elected .
zh: 非党派的保罗·塞和黄国家系的FTU被成功连任.

en: Civic Party 's Jeremy Tam was elected for the first time .
zh: 公民党的杰里米·塔姆首次当选。

en: Localist group Civic Passion 's Wong Yeung - tat was defeated in this district , and resigned his leadership in Civic Passion .
zh: 该区的民情团体王永泰被击败, 并辞去了民情领导权.

en: In the District Council  functional constituency , commonly know as " Super District Council " seats , pan - democracy camp 's Kwong Chun - yu of the Democratic Party received 491,667 votes , the highest in this constituency .
zh: 在区议会功能选区, 一般称为 “ 超级区议会 ” 席位, 泛民主阵营的国民党青春尤获得491,667票,是该选区最高的.

en: Other pan-democrats elected were Leung Yiu-chung of NWSC and James To of the Democratic Party .
zh: 其他当选的泛民主人士是北西共和派的梁耀忠和民主党的詹姆斯·托。

en: Pro-Beijing DAB 's Starry Lee and Holden Chow were successfully elected in this constituency , while pro-Beijing veteran politician Wong Kwok - hing of FTU was defeated by 10,694 votes by James To .
zh: 亲北京的国会议员李 Starry 和霍登 Chow 成功当选,而亲北京的资深政治家黄国兴(Wong Kwok- hing)则以10,694票击败詹姆斯·托(James To)。

en: In traditional functional constituencies , the pan - democracy camp gained a seat from the pro-Beijing camp .
zh: 在传统的功能性选区, 泛民主阵营从亲北京阵营获得席位.

en: Shiu Ka-chun of the Social Welfare constituency defeated their opponents , hence the pan-democrats ' seats in the functional constituencies increased from 9 to 10 .
zh: 社会福利选区的吴卡春击败了他们的对手,因此功能选区的泛民主席位从9增加到10。

en: Also , an independent who does not claim to belong to either camp , Edward Yiu of the Architectural , Surveying , Planning and Landscape constituency , defeated his opponents and was elected .
zh: 同时,一个不声称属于任何阵营的独立人士,建筑、测量、规划和景观选区的爱德华?

en: The turnout of this election was the highest in the history of Legislative Council elections , with around 2 million voters voted and a turnout rate of 58 % .
zh: 这次选举的投票率是立法会历史上最高,约有200万选民投票,投票率为58%。

en: At a polling station in Taikoo of the Hong Kong Island constituency , after the polls closed at 22:30 , with the long queues outside the station the last ballot there was cast at 2:30 the next day , four hours after the last person was allowed to join the queue .
zh: 在香港岛选区太湖的一个投票站,在投票时间为22时30分结束之后,在投票站外长队排列之后,第二天2时30分,最后一个人被允许进入排列后,最后的投票结果在4小时内被投入。

en: The previous general legislative election in Hong Kong was before the 2014 protests .
zh: 此前香港的议会选举是2014年抗议活动之前。

en: The election elects 70 members of the Legislative Council .
zh: 选举选出70名立法会成员。

en: The 22nd Fan Expo Canada took place at the Metro Toronto Convention Centre this weekend , attracting thousands to the event , one of the most popular in North America .
zh: 这个周末,加拿大第22届风扇博览会在多伦多地铁会议中心举行,吸引了数以千计的观众参加,这是北美最受欢迎的活动之一。

en: Crossing between the genres of science fiction , horror , anime , fantasy and comics , the event sprawled throughout all corners of the facility .
zh: 在科幻 、 恐怖 、 动画 、 幻想和漫画等 жанр之间横跨,这个事件遍及了整个设施的各个角落。

en: Hundreds of vendors offered products new and old , joined by celebrity guests like Stan Lee , Mark Hamill , and Margaret Atwood .
zh: 成百上万的卖家提供新旧的产品, 还有像斯坦·李、马克·汉密尔、玛格丽特·阿特伍德等名人的客人.

en: Various local fan organizations were there in a charitable capacity , and thousands of fans donned costumes , many of which they themselves created .
zh: 许多当地的球迷组织在慈善机构里,成千上万的球迷穿着服装,其中许多人是他们自己创造的。

en: Atwood , a Booker Prize - winner , was there to launch her graphic novel Angel Catbird , with illustrator Johnnie Christmas .
zh: 奥特伍德, 博克奖得主, 在那里与插画家约翰尼·克里斯托斯一起推出她的graphic novel Angel Catbird.

en: Hamill 's schedule included a panel with Kevin Conroy , the voice of Batman in Batman : The Animated Series , in which the Star Wars lead played the Joker .
zh: 哈米尔的计划包含了与凯文·康罗伊(Kevin Conroy)的小组,蝙蝠侠在《蝙蝠侠:动画系列》中的蝙蝠侠的声音,其中《星球大战》的主角扮演了乔克尔。

en: Ubisoft , Microsoft , and PlayStation VR all had large areas set up for attendees to try their latest games .
zh: Ubisoft 、 Microsoft 、 PlayStation VR 都为参与者设置了大型区域来尝试最新游戏。

en: In the 20 - minute PlayStation VR demonstration of Batman : Arkham VR , players are dropped down a secret elevator in Bruce Wayne 's manor , to the Bat Cave , to suit up .
zh: 在20分钟PlayStationVR的蝙蝠侠:阿克汉姆VR的演示中,玩家在布鲁斯·韦恩的庄园下落了一个秘密电梯,到蝙蝠洞里,穿上衣服。

en: From there , the demonstration took players to investigate the murder of Nightwing .
zh: 从那里,示威者带了球员去调查夜翼的谋杀。

en: The Northern Arena Esports Championship ran throughout the weekend , facing off teams of video gamers in a packed hall .
zh: 北亚体育场电子运动锦标赛在整个周末进行,在拥挤的体育场里面对着视频游戏的队伍。

en: Even in early rounds , the event was well attended , with the stands full of gamers , watching the matches with live colour commentary .
zh: 甚至在早期的轮赛中,比赛也受到了广泛的观众的欢迎,场馆里挤满了玩家,观看比赛的现场彩色评论。

en: The finals saw US team Cloud9 and Immortals , from Brazil , face off in Counter-Strike : Global Offensive .
zh: 在决赛中,来自巴西的美国队Cloud9和Immortals在《反击:全球进攻》中相遇。

en: Gameplay was delayed during the " third map "  of the finals , when one Immortals player was caught with their headset off .
zh: 游戏在决赛的“ 第三地图 ” 中被拖延了,一个不死的玩家被带了他们的 headset 。

en: After nearly half an hour , the team was deducted a point , leading to a sudden but temporary rush of success by the US team .
zh: 半小时后,球队被扣掉一分,导致美国队突然而暂时的快速成功。

en: The Canadian garrison of 501st Legion returned with their setup of photo - ops , with proceeds to the Make - A - Wish Foundation .
zh: 加拿大第501团的驻军团带着他们拍摄的摄影行动, 并捐献给“ 制造一个愿望基金会 ”.

en: Volunteer organization Comic Corps of Canada collects donations of comics , to distribute to children and youth in the hospital .
zh: 加拿大漫画团的志愿者组织收集漫画的捐赠,分发给医院的儿童和青年。

en: Along with collecting comics on - site , the group was fundraising through raffles and button sales .
zh: 除了在网站上收集漫画, 该组织还通过抽奖和按钮销售筹集资金.

en: Other charitable fan - based groups included The Ontario Ghostbusters , Doctor Who Society of Canada , and Klingon Assault Group .
zh: 其他慈善支持团体包括: 安大略特鬼魂探险家 、 加拿大博士者协会 、 克林根袭击集团.

en: Brampton Spider - Gwen and Symbiote Spidey pose at the Comic Corps booth .
zh: 布兰普顿蜘蛛 - 格温和双胞胎蜘蛛在漫画公司摊位姿态.

en: The thousands of cosplay outfits on parade around the various halls offered a tremendous cross-section of genres and eras of pop culture .
zh: 数以千计的 cosplay服饰在各厅的游行中提供了巨大的流行文化类型和时代交叉。

en: The majority of outfits involved at least some elements made from scratch , a fantastic display of craftsmanship .
zh: 大多数服装至少包括一些从零的元素,一个绝佳的工艺品展示。

en: Of the thousands , Wikinews spoke with a cosplayer going by the name " The Katherinator " .
zh: 在数千人中, 维基新闻与一个“ 神圣者 ”的宇宙玩家进行了谈话.

en: She was outside the building in the gardens , waiting for a photographer she had arranged to shoot her new Epic Mickey costumed character - style outfit .
zh: 她正站在花园里外面, 等着她安排的摄影师拍摄她新装扮的《Epic Mickey》角色风格的服装.

en: With shoes as wide as a forearm , and a rigid torso of carved foam , she remained exuberant even when caught in the traffic between halls , many hours into wearing the outfit .
zh: 她穿着宽阔的前臂的鞋子和雕刻泡沫的坚固的躯体,即使在被困在大厅间的交通中,仍保持着活力,穿着这件衣服的时间很多。

en: New Zealand begins process to consider changing national flag design
zh: 新西兰开始考虑改变国旗设计的进程

en: On Tuesday , the New Zealand government announced the start of a public process to suggest designs for a new national flag , and determine whether their citizens would prefer a different national flag over the current one .
zh: 星期二,新西兰政府宣布启动一项公众进程,向公众提出新国旗的设计方案,并决定他们公民是否会更喜欢新国旗。

en: The government 's Flag Consideration Project has planned a number of conferences and roadshows as part of this process , with the first meeting set to take place in Christchurch on May 16 .
zh: 政府旗帜审议项目计划在这一进程中举办一些会议和巡回展览,第一次会议将于5月16日在基督城举行。

en: According to the New Zealand Herald , Emeritus Professor John Burrows , the chairman of the project 's panel of twelve , said New Zealand 's flag has never before been open to public choice .
zh: 根据《新西兰 Herald》的报道,项目委员会主席约翰·伯罗斯(John Burrows)称,新西兰的旗帜从来都没有开放给公众选择。

en: Professor Burrows also said resources and kits would be accessible for schools and communities , " For example , schools can run their own flag discussions and referendums to mirror the formal process as part of their own learning exercise " .
zh: 布罗斯教授还说,学校和社区可以利用资源和工具,例如,学校可以举办自己的旗帜讨论和公民投票,以反映正式过程作为他们自己的学习练习的一部分。

en: Names of participants would be engraved , at their option , on a flag pole monument to be built in the nation 's capital , Wellington .
zh: 参与者的名字将按他们选择刻在国家首都威灵顿建造的旗杆纪念碑上。

en: New Zealand 's Prime Minister John Key said he believes redesigning the flag now has a " strong rationale " .
zh: 新西兰总理约翰·凯说,他相信重新设计国旗现在具有“ 强有力的理由 ” 。

en: Mr Key promoted the campaign for a unique New Zealand flag on Waitangi Day - February 6 - this year .
zh: 凯先生在今年2月6日(维塔尼日)为新西兰一个独特的旗帜开展宣传活动。

en: Of the public process , he said , " In the end I 'll have one vote in each referendum just like every other New Zealander on the electoral roll " .
zh: 关于公众进程,他说, “ 最后,我会像其他选民一样在每个公投中投票一次 ” 。

en: The New Zealand government intends to hold two referendums to reach a verdict on the flag , at an estimated cost of NZ $ 26 million , although a recent poll found only a quarter of citizens favoured changing the flag .
zh: 新西兰政府打算举行两次全民投票,以达成有关国旗的裁决,估计费用为26亿美元,尽管最近的一项民意调查发现,只有四分之一的公民赞成改变国旗。

en: This is a decrease from the year before , when it was forty percent .
zh: 这是与前一年相比的下降,当时是40%。

en: The first referendum is to be held from November 20 to December 11 , selecting a single new flag design out of about four finalists .
zh: 第一次公民投票将从11月20日至12月11日举行,从四个最终选民中选出一个新的旗帜设计。

en: Voters would then choose between the new flag and their current flag early in 2016 .
zh: 投票者将在2016年初选择新的旗帜和当前的旗帜。

en: Wikinews has learned that according to an Internet posting made just over 24 hours ago , the Church of Scientology 's website is being attacked by hackers , causing the site to shut down .
zh: 维基新闻报道说,根据24小时前的一项互联网文章,科学教会的网站被黑客攻击,导致该网站关闭。

en: The attack was launched on Wednesday by a user labelled " Anonymous " , on the website " Insurgency Wiki " , a spinoff of 4chan .
zh: 星期三, 一个名为“ 匿名 ” 的用户在4chan的“ 反叛维基 ”网站上发起了攻击.

en: The " History " section of the site explains , in a satirical fashion , that the incident was prompted by the Church of Scientology 's attempts to remove a promotional video featuring Scientologist Tom Cruise from YouTube .
zh: 该网站的“ 历史 ” 部分以讽刺的方式解释,这起事件是由科学教会试图从YouTube删除有科学学家汤姆·克鲁斯的宣传视频所引发的。

en: Though YouTube is complying with the Church of Scientology 's requests to take down the video , other sites such as Gawker.com have stated that they will keep hosting the video .
zh: 尽管YouTube遵守了科学教会要求删除视频的请求,但其他网站如Gawker.com已经表示,他们将继续提供视频。

en: Writing in a blog post , Matthew Ingram of The Globe and Mail dubbed the ongoing conflict involving the Church of Scientology 's attempts to remove the Cruise video from the Internet : " Scientology vs. the Internet , part XVII " .
zh: 在博客上写道,《环球邮报》的马修·因格拉姆(Matthew Ingram)称,目前的冲突涉及科学教会试图从互联网上删除克鲁斯的视频:“科学与互联网,第十七部分”。

en: He characterized the conflict between the Church of Scientology and anonymous posters of the Cruise video as " another small skirmish in a war that Scientology has been waging for almost 15 years , since the early days of newsgroups such as alt.religion.scientology , which posted internal church documents in 1994 .
zh: 他形容圣经教会与克鲁斯视频的匿名海报之间的冲突是“圣经在这场战争中又一次小小的冲突,圣经已经进行了近15年了,从新闻集团的早期开始,例如Alt.religion.scientology,在1994年发布了教会内部文件。

en: Lawsuits have been filed , mailing lists have been shut down , homes of discussion group participants have been raided and their computers seized -- an all - out war . "
zh: 已经提起诉讼, 收件人名单已经关闭, 讨论小组参与者的房子被袭击,他们的电脑被扣押 — — 一场全面战争. ”

en: " Prompted I think by the Tom Cruise video , a new obsession is taking hold on the internet . An insurgency against The Church of Scientology . " Anonymous blogger , " Anon declares war on Church of Scientology "
zh: 被汤姆·克鲁斯的视频所激发,在互联网上出现了一种新的迷信,反对科学教会的叛乱。 匿名博客, “ 安昂宣布对科学教会发动战争 ”

en: One poster admitted to being a part of the effort , writing in a blog post " I have myself , as per instructions , loaded up Gigaloader and started bombarding the Scientology homepage .
zh: 一个海报承认自己是这一努力的一部分,在博客上写道:“我自己按照指示,装上Gigaloader并开始轰炸Scientology网页。

en: There s  something in the hilarious anarchy of the net that produces these ' events ' every now and again . "
zh: 在网络的可笑的无序中,有某种东西会不断地产生这些“事件 ” 。

en: The poster wrote that " Prompted I think by the Tom Cruise video , a new obsession is taking hold on the internet . An insurgency against The Church of Scientology . "
zh: 海报写道: “ 我想由汤姆·克鲁斯的录像带推动, 一种新的迷信在互联网上占领. 反对科学教会的叛乱 ”.

en: " Someone emailed me earlier today talking about a tool a group ’s been using to attack the scientology website .
zh: 今天早些时候,有人给我发了电子邮件,说他们正在使用一种工具来攻击科学网站。

en: It ’s an interesting tool , created to overload / create malformed strings and crash a website ’s database , " said the post by an unknown author on pigmy .
zh: 这是一个有趣的工具,用来重载/创建变形的字符串并破坏网站的数据库,”一个未知作者在 pigmy上发表的文章说。

en: The Church 's website is currently unreachable .
zh: 教堂的网站目前无法访问。

en: Some individuals reported that when they are able to reach the site , all they get is a message stating , " The word scientology means search for truth ... " .
zh: 一些人报告说,当他们能够到达网站时,他们所得到的只是一个信息: “ 科学这个词的意思是寻找真理... ”.

en: As of 15:11 GMT the site was accessible again , but only loads at relatively slow speeds , and by the end of the day Saturday the site was not loading at all .
zh: 截至15:11 GMT,该站再次开放,但仅在相对缓慢的速度上进行载荷,到星期六的最后一天,该站完全没有进行载荷。

en: Posts on the message board for the Scientology - critic site Operation Clambake from Friday theorized that a denial - of - service attack had occurred , and wrote that as of Friday the Scientology.org site was either not loading at all , or loading very slowly .
zh: 来自星期五的Scientology - 评论网站Clambake行动的留言板上的文章认为发生了拒绝服务攻击,并写道,从星期五起Scientology.org网站要么不加载,要么加载非常缓慢。

en: Critics of Scientology at the Internet newsgroup alt.religion.scientology were critical of the attacks to the Church of Scientology website , with one poster writing " How can people look at both sides if one side is gone ? "
zh: 互联网新闻组 alt.religion.scientology的科学批评者批评了对科学教会网站的攻击,其中一个海报写道:“ 如果一个方面已经消失了,人们如何看待两个方面呢? ”

en: Traffic to the Scientology website had already increased 18 - fold prior to the attack , following increased attention after the Tom Cruise video appeared on the Internet .
zh: 在汤姆·克鲁斯的视频在互联网上出现后,人们对科学网站的流量已经增加了18倍, 在此之前攻击已经增加了18倍.

en: At that time , one in three visits to the site came from BBC News , and the website increased to number 3 in the company Hitwise UK 's Lifestyle - Religion category .
zh: 当时,每三个访问网站的一次来自BBC新闻,网站在英国 hitwise的生活方式-宗教类别上升到第3位。

en: Thomas Sam , 42 , and his wife Manju Sam , 36 , from Sydney , Australia , are undergoing trial for manslaughter by gross negligence for the death of their nine - month - old child , Gloria .
zh: 来自澳大利亚悉尼的42岁的托马斯·萨姆和他的36岁的妻子曼朱·萨姆因严重 negligence谋杀他们9个月大的孩子格洛里亚而受到审判.

en: She died from infection caused by severe eczema after they shunned effective conventional medical treatments for homeopathy , a form of alternative medicine that has been described as pseudoscience .
zh: 她死于严重湿疹引起的感染后,他们放弃了治疗 homeopathy的有效传统医学治疗,一种被描述为伪科学的替代医学。

en: Articles in peer - reviewed academic journals including Social Science & Medicine have characterized homeopathy as a form of quackery .
zh: 包括社会科学和医学在内的同行评审的学术期刊上的文章将 homeopathy 描述为一种玩弄游戏.

en: Gloria developed severe eczema at the age of four months and the parents were advised to send the child to a skin specialist .
zh: 格洛里亚在四个月的年龄发展出严重的湿疹,父母建议将孩子送到皮肤专家那里。

en: Thomas Sam , a practising homeopath , instead decided to treat his daughter himself .
zh: 托马斯·萨姆(Thomas Sam)是一位疗法 homeopath的医生, 而是决定亲自治疗他的女儿.

en: His daughter 's condition deteriorated , to the point that the baby spent all her energy battling the infections caused by the constant breaking of the skin , leading to severe malnutrition and , eventually , her death .
zh: 他的女儿的状况恶化了,到婴儿用尽了全部精力去对抗皮肤不断破裂引起的感染,导致严重的营养不良,最终导致她的死亡。

en: By the end , Gloria 's eczema was so severe that her skin broke every time her parents changed her clothes or nappy , and in the words of the Crown prosecutor , Mark Tedeschi , QC , " Gloria spent a lot of the last five months of her life crying , irritable , scratching and the only thing that gave her solace was to suck on her mother 's breast . "
zh: 最后,格洛里亚的湿疹非常严重,每当父母换衣服或脱尿时,她的皮肤都破裂了,根据王室检察官马克·德德西奇(Mark Tedeschi)的话说,“格洛里亚一生的最后5个月大部分时间都在哭泣、发 irritable 、 scratching 、 scratching 、 scratching,她唯一的安慰是吸入母亲的乳房。 ”

en: Gloria also became unable to move her legs .
zh: 格洛里亚也无法移动她的腿。

en: Mr. Tedeschi also told the court that , over the last five months of her life , " Gloria 's eczema played a devastating role in her overall health and it is asserted by the Crown that both her parents knew this and discussed it with each other . "
zh: 特德切先生还向法庭表示,在过去的5个月中,“格洛里亚的湿疹在她的整体健康中发挥了破坏性作用,并由皇室宣称她的父母都知道这一点,并彼此讨论了这一点。 ”

en: However , despite their child 's severe illness , and her lack of improvement , the Sams continued to shun conventional medical treatment , instead seeking help from other homeopaths and naturopaths .
zh: 然而,尽管他们的孩子得了重病,而且没有改善,萨姆人继续避开传统的医疗治疗,而是寻求其他 homeopaths和 naturopaths的帮助。

en: Gloria temporarily improved during the rare times they used conventional treatments , but they soon dropped them in favour of homeopathy , and she consistently worsened .
zh: 格洛里亚在他们使用常规疗法的罕见时期暂时改善了,但他们很快就放弃了这种疗法,并继续恶化。

en: Allegedly , Thomas ' sister pleaded with him to send Gloria to a conventional medical doctor , but he replied " I am not able to do that " .
zh: 据说, 托马斯的妹妹恳求他把格洛里亚送到一个常规的医生那里, 但他回答说: “ 我不能这样做 ”.

en: The parents are also accused of putting their social life ahead of their child , taking her on a trip to India and leaving her to servants while embarking on a busy social schedule , and giving her homeopathic drops instead of using the prescription creams they had been given .
zh: 他们还指责父母把社会生活放在孩子前面,把她带到印度旅行,在忙于社交的日程上把她交给仆人,并给她 homeopathic药滴,而不是他们所给的药膏。

en: Gloria was finally taken to the emergency department shortly before her death .
zh: 格洛里亚死前不久才被送到紧急救护处。

en: By this time , " her skin was weeping , her body malnourished and her corneas melting " , according to the Sydney Morning Herald .
zh: 据《悉尼晨报》报道,此时,“ 她的皮肤正在哭泣, 她的身体营养不良, 她的角膜正在融化 ”.

en: Speaking in the parents ' defense , Tom Molomby , SC , said that , as the parents came from India , where homeopathy is in common use , they should be declared not guilty due to cultural differences .
zh: 汤姆·莫洛姆比(Tom Molomby)说,由于父母来自印度,在印度人普遍使用 homeopathy,所以他们应该因文化差异而被宣布无罪。

en: Homeopathy is a form of alternative medicine which treats patients with massively diluted forms of substances that , if given to a healthy person undiluted , would cause symptoms similar to the disease .
zh: 内科疗法是一种替代药物,它治疗病人大量稀释的物质形式,如果给一个健康的人不稀释,会引起与疾病相似的症状。

en: Typical treatments take the dilutions , with ritualised shaking between each step of the dilution , past the level where any molecules of the original substance are likely to remain ; for homeopathic treatments to work , basic well - understood concepts in chemistry and physics would have to be wrong .
zh: 典型的治疗方法是进行稀释,在稀释的每个步骤之间进行仪式性摇摆,超过原物质的任何分子可能仍存的水平;对于 homeopathic治疗的有效性,化学和物理学的基本理解概念必须是错误的。

en: There is no evidence that homeopathy is more effective than placebo for any condition .
zh: 没有证据表明 homeopathy对任何疾病比安慰剂更有效。

en: Microsoft waits for death of Internet Explorer 6
zh: 微软等待Internet Explorer6的死亡

en: With development of Microsoft 's Internet Explorer 9  browser almost complete , Microsoft announced on Friday that it is time for IE6 users to move away from the antiquated 10 - year - old browser .
zh: 随着微软的InternetExplorer9浏览器的开发几乎完成, 微软于周五宣布, IE6用户应该远离老旧的10 岁 的浏览器.

en: Microsoft has replaced it with three newer versions .
zh: 微软已经用三个较新的版本取代了它。

en: Its name was Internet Explorer 6 .
zh: 它的名字是Internet Explorer 6.

en: Now that we ’re in 2011 , in an era of modern web standards , it ’s time to say goodbye , " Microsoft says on " The Internet Explorer 6 Countdown " .
zh: 现在我们到了2011年, 在一个现代网络标准的时代, 现在是告别的时候了, ” 微软在“ 互联网探测器6 Countdown ” 上说.

en: Internet Explorer 's market share is slipping .
zh: Internet Explorer的市场份额正在下滑。

en: Mozilla Firefox , its main rival , has been actively increasing its market share while the recently released Google Chrome is also quickly gaining users .
zh: MozillaFirefox,其主要竞争对手,一直在积极增加其市场份额,而最近发布的GoogleChrome也在迅速赢得用户。

en: PC World 's recent analysis of its own web traffic statistics concluded , " Usually , Internet Explorer is the # 2 browser after Firefox , but over the past 30 days it 's been # 3 , a couple of points behind Safari - and nearly tied with Chrome .
zh: PC世界最近对自己的网络流量统计的分析得出结论:“通常,Internet Explorer是Firefox之后的第2浏览器,但在过去30天里它已经是第3,在Safari后面还有几点——几乎与Chrome联系在一起。

en: But if it is n't , and Chrome continues to surge , IE could fall to fourth place . "
zh: 但是如果不是这样, Chrome将继续上涨, IE可能会跌至第四位。

en: Web developers face big problems with IE6 .
zh: 网络开发者面临 IE6 的巨大问题。

en: As they design their web pages for the newer browsers with advanced web technology and geared to the newest web core markup language HTML 5 , they are forced to accommodate older out - of - date technology to support IE6 users .
zh: 由于他们为较新的浏览器设计了先进的网页技术,并采用了最新的网页核心标记语言HTML5,因此他们不得不适应较旧的技术,以支持IE6用户。

en: Also , not mentioned on Microsoft 's " The Internet Explorer 6 Countdown " site , are the numerous security vulnerabilities putting the browser at risk of being hacked .
zh: 而且, 没有提到微软的“ Internet Explorer 6 Countdown ”网站, 是无数的安全漏洞使浏览器受到黑客攻击的危险.

en: The Internet security firm Secunia.com , has said that as of March 4 , 2011 , IE6 has 277 vulnerabilities ; 39 percent of these are rated " highly critical " .
zh: 互联网安全公司Secunia.com表示,截至2011年3月4日, IE6有277个漏洞,其中39%。

en: Microsoft says that the latest versions of Internet Explorer provide the user with enhanced protection from these attacks and threats .
zh: 微软表示,最新版本的Internet Explorer提供了用户对这些攻击和威胁的加强保护。

en: Microsoft 's Internet Explorer 6 is one of the most successful software products ever as measured by its durability and the massive numbers of people who have used it .
zh: 微软的InternetExplorer6是迄今为止最成功的软件产品之一,因为它的耐久性和大量用户使用它。

en: IE6 shipped with Windows XP , nearly a decade ago .
zh: IE6与Windows XP一起运送,近十年前。

en: But it has outlived its usefulness , and Microsoft no longer wants to support it .
zh: 但它已经不再有用了,微软不再想支持它。

en: Valeska Paris , an Australian woman and former Scientologist , has claimed that the Church of Scientology imprisoned her for twelve years aboard the Scientology - owned cruise ship , Freewinds .
zh: 澳大利亚女性和前科学家瓦列斯卡·帕里斯(Valeska Paris)声称,科学教会在Scientology拥有的巡航船“Freewinds”上监禁了她12年。

en: Paris was born in Switzerland but her parents moved her to the United Kingdom when she was six so they could be closer to the church 's headquarters .
zh: 帕里斯出生在瑞士,但她的父母在她六岁时搬到英国,以便他们能够更接近教堂的总部。

en: She joined the Sea Org aged 14 .
zh: 她14岁加入海乐队。

en: In 1995 , at age seventeen , she was told to disconnect from her mother .
zh: 1995年,她17岁时被告知与母亲断绝联系。

en: Paris claims she was first sent to the ship aged eighteen for two weeks as a teenager but ended up spending twelve years there .
zh: 巴黎声称她最初在18岁时作为一名青少年被送到船上两个星期,但最终在那里度过了12年。

en: Paris also claims that her passport was taken away from her and she was forced to work in the engine room .
zh: 巴黎还声称她的护照被剥夺了,她被迫在发动机室工作。

en: I was basically hauled in and told that my mum had attacked the church and that I needed to disconnect from her because she was suppressive . Valeska Paris
zh: 我被拉进来并告诉我,我的妈妈袭击了教堂,我需要脱离她,因为她是镇压的。

en: I was basically hauled in and told that my mum had attacked the church and that I needed to disconnect from her because she was suppressive .
zh: 我被拉进来并告诉我,我的妈妈袭击了教堂,我需要脱离她,因为她是镇压的。

en: Her mother had spoken out against Scientology on French television after her ex-husband and Paris 's father , Albert Jaquier , committed suicide after he lost his fortune to Scientology .
zh: 她的母亲在她前丈夫和巴黎的父亲阿尔伯特·贾奎尔在因科学而失去财产而自杀后,在法国电视上发表了反对科学的言论。

en: Paris claims that she was kept at Flag Land Base in Clearwater , Florida until she was eighteen and then transferred to the Freewinds .
zh: 帕里斯声称她被关在佛罗里达州克莱尔沃特的旗舰陆地基地,直到她18岁,然后被转移到自由风。

en: On board the Freewinds , Paris claims that she was working from 6:00 am to midnight and due to lack of sleep ended up being a walking zombie .
zh: 在自由风船上,巴黎声称她从早上6点到午夜工作,由于睡眠不足,最终成为一个步行的僵尸。

en: She also claims that in 1997 and 1998 , she was tasked with removal of asbestos from the ship .
zh: 她还声称在1997年和1998年,她负责从船上除去bestos。

en: She was eventually sent to Rehabilitation Project Force in Sydney , which the Church describes as a religious retreat , but critics charge is a forced work camp .
zh: 她最终被派往悉尼的康复计划部队,教会称这是宗教的退伍,但批评者指责这是强迫工作营。

en: Here , she met her future husband and subsequently left the church .
zh: 在此,她遇到了未来的丈夫,随后离开了教堂。

en: In a statement to the Australian Broadcasting Corporation , the Church denied these allegations :
zh: 在向澳大利亚广播公司(Australian Broadcasting Corporation)的声明中,教会否认了这些指控:

en: She certainly was n't ' forced ' to be there .
zh: 她肯定不是被强迫到那里去.

en: She was also never forced to perform labour in the engine room .
zh: 她也从未被迫在发动机室做劳动。

en: They also claimed Paris was a volunteer and claim she has a vested interest for misrepresenting her experiences with the Church .
zh: 他们还声称巴黎是一个志愿者,并声称她对与教会的错误表现有自己的利益。

en: The Church also claims that Paris not having her passport was maritime procedure .
zh: 教会还声称巴黎没有她的护照是海事程序。

en: Almost half of all Australian primary school children are mild to moderately iodine deficient , researchers say .
zh: 研究人员说,几乎一半的澳大利亚小学儿童中小至中小缺碘。

en: A new study documenting iodine nutritional status in Australian school children has revealed many are not getting enough iodine - which can lead to mental and growth retardation .
zh: 一项新的研究记录了澳大利亚学校儿童碘营养状况,结果表明,许多人没有足够的碘,这可能导致精神和生长发育迟钝。

en: The report 's authors say iodine deficiency is " the sleeper health issue in Australia " , and potentially a very serious one .
zh: 该报告的作者说,碘缺乏是“ 澳大利亚睡眠者健康问题 ”, 潜在是一个非常严重的问题.

en: The results of the Australian National Iodine Nutrition Study published in the Medical Journal of Australia this week , revealed that children in mainland Australia are borderline iodine deficient .
zh: 本周在澳大利亚医学期刊上发表的澳大利亚国家碘营养研究结果显示,澳大利亚大陆的儿童缺碘。

en: The report has prompted calls for all edible salt to be iodised .
zh: 报告要求所有食用盐都用碘化。

en: They say adding the mineral to salt is the simplest and most effective method of preventing iodine deficiency disorders .
zh: 他们说,把矿物添加到盐中是预防缺碘病的最简单和最有效的方法。

en: A cross-sectional survey of 1709 schoolchildren - aged 8 – 10 years , from 88 schools - was carried out in New South Wales , Victoria , South Australia , Western Australia and Queensland , between July 2003 and December 2004 .
zh: 在2003年7月至2004年12月期间,在新南威尔士、维多利亚、南澳大利亚、西澳大利亚和昆士兰,对88所学校的1709名8岁至10岁儿童进行了横断调查。

en: Tasmania was excluded from the study - where an voluntary iodine fortification program using iodised salt in bread , is ongoing .
zh: 塔斯马尼亚被排除在研究之外,目前正在进行一项使用碘盐在面包中的自愿碘化强化计划。

en: The authors say the results confirm the existence of inadequate iodine intake in the Australian population .
zh: 作者说,这些结果证实了澳大利亚人口缺碘的存在。

en: They call for " urgent implementation of mandatory iodisation of all edible salt in Australia . "
zh: 他们呼吁“ 在澳大利亚紧急实施所有食用盐的强制碘化 ”.

en: Professor Cres Eastman , Director of the National Iodine Nutrition study , and Chairman of the Australian Centre for Control of Iodine Deficiency Disorders , says it is crucial that children and pregnant women in particular have an adequate intake of iodine .
zh: 国家碘营养研究主任、澳大利亚碘缺乏症控制中心主席克雷斯·伊斯特曼教授说,儿童和孕妇尤其需要适当摄入碘。

en: Iodine deficiency can lead to serious health problems including brain damage , stunted growth and deafness .
zh: 缺碘会导致严重的健康问题,包括脑损伤、生长障碍和聋哑。

en: Professor Eastman says manufacturers could easily remedy the situation by using iodised salt in their products in line with the United States and most European countries .
zh: 伊斯特曼教授说,制造商可以按照美国和大多数欧洲国家的规定,在产品中使用碘化盐来解决这一问题。

en: " I suspect they wo n't do that on a voluntary basis , we 've tried so far and have n't succeeded , so we 've convinced the Food Standards of Australia and New Zealand | that all salt should be iodised , " he said .
zh: 他说:“我怀疑他们不会自愿这样做,我们已经尝试过,但没有成功,所以我们已经说服了澳大利亚和新西兰的食品标准,所有盐都应该碘化。

en: The report says the decline in iodine intake appears to be due to changes in the dairy industry , where chlorine - containing sanitisers have replaced iodine - containing sanitisers .
zh: 报告说,碘摄入量下降的原因是奶业的变化,其中含氯消毒剂取代了含碘消毒剂。

en: Iodine released from these chemicals into milk has been the major source of dietary iodine in Australia for at least four decades , but is now declining .
zh: 从这些化学品中释放到牛奶中的碘是澳大利亚至少四十年来主要的营养碘源,但现在正在下降。

en: Another contributory factor has been the decreasing consumption of iodised salt used in foods .
zh: 另一个因素是食品中的碘化盐的消耗减少。

en: The report states that few if any food manufacturers use iodised salt in the preparation and manufacture of foods .
zh: 报告指出,很少有食品制造商在食品的制备和制造中使用碘化盐。

en: Professor Eastman says iodine is added to only 10 per cent of Australian salt in contravention of a World Health Organisation recommendation that all salt be iodised .
zh: 伊斯特曼教授说,澳大利亚盐的10%中只有碘,这违背了世界卫生组织建议,所有盐都要碘化。

en: He says authorities are reacting slowly to his urgent calls for mandatory iodised salt .
zh: 他说,当局正在缓慢地回应他紧急要求强制使用碘盐的呼吁。

en: " The effects of iodine deficiency are dependent upon how severe it is and when it occurs .
zh: 碘缺乏的后果取决于其严重程度和发生时。

en: So if we go to the pregnant woman , she does n't get enough iodine , she wo n't make enough thyroid hormone , and the foetus wo n't get the amount of thyroid hormone it needs for adequate and proper development of the brain , so you 'll then see consequences being loss of IQ , learning difficulties , hearing difficulties and other neurological problems , " Professor Eastman said .
zh: 因此,如果我们到怀孕的妇女身上去,她不会得到足够的碘,她不会产生足够的甲状腺激素,而胎儿也不会得到足够的甲状腺激素,它需要以充分和适当地发展大脑,那么你会看到后果是智商下降、学习困难、听力困难和其他神经问题。

en: " If an infant 's not getting enough iodine ... brain development wo n't be completed and they wo n't grow normally , and as you get older the problem will be that you will develop a goiter and your thyroid wo n't function as well as it should , so that may have all sorts of pernicious effects upon normal function in life . "
zh: 如果婴儿没有足够的碘,大脑的发展将无法完成,它们将无法正常生长,而且随着你老龄化的问题将是,你将发育小鼠,你的甲状腺功能也无法正常发挥,这可能对生活正常功能产生各种有害影响。

en: More than two billion people around the world live in areas prone to iodine deficiency , and yet the problem is easily fixed .
zh: 全世界有超过200亿人生活在易缺碘地区,但这一问题很容易解决。

en: The World Health Organisation  recommends that every country should iodise all edible salt .
zh: 世界卫生组织建议每个国家应碘化所有食用盐。

en: The most well known effects of IDD are visible goiter and cretinism , a condition characterised by severe brain damage occurring in very early life .
zh: IDD的最常见的影响是明显的发作性发作性发作性发作性发作性发作性发作,这种发作性发作性发作性发作性发作性发作性发作性发作性发作性发作性发作性发作。

en: WHO say Iodine deficiency is the world ’s most prevalent , yet easily preventable , cause of brain damage .
zh: 世界卫生组织说,碘缺乏是世界最普遍的,但容易预防的,导致大脑损伤的原因。

en: Professor Eastman said he is alarmed by what they found .
zh: 伊斯特曼教授说,他对他们发现的事感到震惊。

en: " Pregnant women in Australia are getting about half as much as what they require on a daily basis .
zh: 澳大利亚的孕妇每天的收入大约是她们所要求的一半。

en: So that alarms me , because there 's quite serious potential for adverse effects and brain damage in the next generation of children born in this country , " he said .
zh: 因此,这使我感到震惊,因为在这个国家出生的下一代儿童会有相当严重的不良影响和大脑损伤的潜力。

en: " If Iodine deficiency is serious you lose 15 IQ points , on average .
zh: 如果缺碘严重,你就会平均损失15分智商。

en: Lydia Buchtmann for Food Standards Australia New Zealand , says they are looking at mandatory guidelines on iodine by the end of the year .
zh: 澳大利亚食品标准协会(Food Standards Australia New Zealand)的丽迪亚·布克曼(Lidia Buchtmann)表示,他们正准备在今年年底之前制定强制性碘化物准则。

en: She says the issue is complicated and will take time to get right .
zh: 她说,这个问题很复杂,需要时间才能解决。

en: We need to " make sure there 's sufficient iodine added into the food supply , to help those people with a deficiency .
zh: 我们需要“ 确保食物供应中添加足够的碘,以帮助那些缺乏碘的人.

en: But at the other end of the scale we 've got to make sure the people who eat a lot of food - we all know the teenage boy who comes home from school and eats a whole loaf of bread - that those people do n't get too much and get overdose , " Ms Bauchtman said .
zh: 但是,在规模的另一端,我们必须确保那些吃很多食物的人--我们都知道从学校回来吃一整块面包的青少年男孩--这些人不会吃太多并且过量服用,”贝茨曼女士说。

en: " One of the reasons that iodine is going down is because people are taking that good healthy eating message and not adding salt during cooking . "
zh: 碘含量下降的原因之一是人们在烹饪时不加盐,而是接受健康饮食的信息。

en: Senior researcher Mu Li , of the University of NSW 's school of public health , said " it is reasonable to assume that pregnant women and breastfeeding mothers are also iodine deficient , putting the next generation of children born in this country at risk of the neuropsychological consequences of iodine deficiency . "
zh: NSW大学公共卫生学院的高级研究员穆利说:“假定孕妇和哺乳母亲缺碘也是合理的,将在这个国家出生的下一代儿童置于缺碘的神经心理后果的危险之中。

en: According to Yonhap news agency , quoting North Korea 's main news agency Korean Central News Agency  , the country 's military has been placed on high alert and has been told to prepare a " quasi - state of war " .
zh: 朝鲜中央电视台报道, 朝鲜军队已经处于高度警戒状态,并被告知准备“ 准战争状态 ” 。

en: " War maniacs of the South Korean puppet military made another grave provocation to the DPRK in the central western sector of the front on Thursday afternoon .
zh: 韩国傀儡军的战争狂妄分子在星期四下午在阵线中西部地区再次严重挑衅朝鲜。

en: They perpetrated such reckless action as firing 36 shells at KPA civil police posts under the absurd pretext that the KPA fired one shell at the south side .
zh: 他们 采取 了 这样 的 不负责任 行动, 即 在 人民 解放军 在 南部 开 了 一 枚 炮弹 的 荒谬 借口 下 向 人民 解放军 民警 哨所 开 了 36 枚 炮弹 。

en: Six shells of them hit the area near KPA civil police posts 542 and 543 and other 15 shells fell near KPA civil police posts 250 and 251 " , said KCNA .
zh: 其中6枚炮弹击中了巴勒斯坦平民警察542号和543号哨所附近的地区,另外15枚炮弹落在巴勒斯坦平民警察250号和251号哨所附近。

en: " Foolhardy provocation deserves harsh punishment " , it added ; and , later , " Kim Jong - un issued an order of the supreme commander of the Korean People 's Army  that the front - line large combined units of the KPA should enter a wartime state to be fully battle ready to launch surprise operations " .
zh: “ 愚蠢的挑衅应该受到严厉的惩罚 ”, 它补充; 后来, 金正日 发布朝鲜人民军最高指挥官的命令,即朝鲜人民军前线大联合部队进入战争状态,充分做好准备发动突袭行动.

en: Yesterday , North Korea fired artillery rounds aimed at a loudspeaker in South Korea that broadcasts anti-Pyongyang propaganda into the North .
zh: 昨天,朝鲜向朝鲜向朝鲜广播反平壤宣传的扬声器发射炮弹。

en: " Commanders of the Korean People 's Army were hastily dispatched to the front - line troops to command military operations to destroy psychological warfare tools if the enemy does not stop the propaganda broadcast within 48 hours and prepare against the enemy 's possible counteractions " , added KCNA .
zh: “ 朝鲜人民军指挥官被紧急派往前线部队指挥军事行动,以摧毁心理战争工具,如果敌人在48小时内不停止宣传广播,并准备对敌人可能的反击行动 ”, KCNA补充说.

en: No injuries or deaths were reported in the attacks from either side , but South Korea evacuated about 80 people in the town of Yeoncheon after at least one shell landed near the area .
zh: 来自双方的袭击中没有报道人员受伤或死亡,但韩国撤离了约80人,至少有一枚炮弹在该地区附近登陆。

en: The South retaliated by firing dozens of rounds of artillery into the north .
zh: 南方以数十枚炮弹向北方射击报复。

en: South Korea had recently started to broadcast propaganda from loudspeakers after an 11 - year lull .
zh: 韩国在11年的停滞后,最近开始从高音机广播宣传.

en: The broadcasts began on August 10 and South Korea says the broadcasts will continue .
zh: 广播于8月10日开始,韩国说广播将继续。

en: After the exchange of fire , North Korea stated it would attack any loudspeakers broadcasting propaganda and would respond , militarily , within 48 hours if the broadcasts do not stop .
zh: 朝鲜在交火后表示,如果广播不停止,北韩将在48小时内攻击任何广播宣传的扬声器,并采取军事行动。

en: Both countries have put their militaries on high levels of alert .
zh: 这两个国家都把军队高度警戒起来。

en: Taipei , Taiwan — The Taipei City Lantern Festival was off to a bright start on Saturday Night as hundreds of thousands of people crowded onto the Chiang Kai Shek Memorial near downtown Taipei to witness city mayor Hau Lung - bin and other dignitaries ceremoniously flip the switch to light hundreds of colorful lantern scenes in and around the 240,000 square meter memorial park .
zh: 台北, 台湾 — 周六晚上,成千上万的人们涌入台北市中心的蒋介石纪念馆,目睹市市长刘龙文和其他高贵人士在仪式上打开开关,在240,000平方米的纪念公园里点燃成千上万的色彩鲜艳的灯光场景。

en: The centerpiece of this rock concert - like performance is a 15 meter high rotating pig equipped with a fog machine , laser light show and theme music .
zh: 这个摇滚音乐会的中心piece是一台高15米的旋转猪,配备了雾机,激光灯表演和主题音乐。

en: The theme of this year s lantern festival revolves around the 12 year Chinese zodiac cycle s year of the pig .
zh: 今年的灯光节的主题围绕着中国十二年农历周期的猪年展开。

en: Its round shape symbolizes wealth and good fortune and is believed to bring good luck .
zh: 它的圆形象征财富和幸运,人们相信它会带来好运。

en: Started in 1990 , the Taipei lantern festival continues a 2000 year old tradition of light related festivals marking the end of the Chinese New Year celebrations .
zh: 台北灯光节始于1990年,延续了2000年的灯光相关节日传统,标志着中国新年的结束。

en: This particular event grows in popularity every year .
zh: 这个特别的事件每年都会变得越来越受欢迎。

en: Last Year over 4 million visitors attended the event and this year the city expects about 6 million visitors according to the event website .
zh: 去年,超过4百万游客参加了活动,而今年,根据活动网站,该市预计约有6百万游客。

en: Colorful lantern scenes not only fill the central square but also the surrounding 2 km circumference of the memorial .
zh: 多彩的灯台场景不仅填满了中央广场,还填满了纪念碑周围的2公里。

en: Each section has a theme .
zh: 每个节都有一个主题。

en: One side of the memorial is scenes made by student groups while other areas represent the counties of Taiwan .
zh: 纪念碑的一面是学生团体制作的场景,而其他区域则代表台湾的县。

en: There is even a section of lanterns sponsored by foreign countries .
zh: 甚至还有一些由外国赞助的灯笼。

en: As with all new year celebrations in Taiwan , the lantern festival is crowded .
zh: 和台湾所有的新年庆典一样,灯火节也挤满了人。

en: People flock to see the lantern scenes and enjoy the festival atmosphere as they carry lanterns , given away by the city and bought from street vendors at the event .
zh: 人们集群观看灯台场景,享受节日的气氛,因为他们携带着街头卖给城市并从街头卖店购买的灯台。

en: The many light toys such a swords , devil ears , and lanterns turn the milling crowd into a unique light show that can be observed by climbing the steps of the 70 meter memorial hall on the grounds .
zh: 许多光玩具如剑、魔鬼的耳朵和灯笼把磨坊的人群变成独特的光景,可以通过爬上地面70米纪念馆的台阶来观察。

en: Local public transportation hubs are often swamped by the event .
zh: 当地公共交通枢纽经常被事件淹没。

en: The station staff at Chiang Kai Shek Memorial Hall Station do an excellent job of crowd control but lines for the subway can still be hours long and very exhausting .
zh: 蒋介石纪念大厅站的车站职员尽力控制人群,但地铁的车线仍然很长,而且很疲劳。

en: A sudden rain storm on Sunday night  caused a mass exodus of people to head for the station prompting lines that backed up into the street .
zh: 星期天晚上突然的暴雨引发了大批人涌向车站的流离失所,引发了拥挤的街道。

en: The commuting crowds can be avoided however by walking from NTU Hospital Station or Shandao Station .
zh: 不过,从北大医院站或山大站步行可以避免交通拥挤。

en: Both of these stops are only about a 20 minute walk from the event and have no crowds at all .
zh: 这两个站点离活动只有约20分钟的步行距离,没有人群。

en: If you really want to avoid the crowds , definitely avoid the weekends .
zh: 如果你真的想避开人群,那么一定要避开周末。

en: Wait until the fourth or fifth day of the festival when the crowds will have dwindled .
zh: 等到节日的第四或第五天,人群已经减少了。

en: I visited the festival on Saturday night , the opening night , and there was a sea of people in the square .
zh: 我星期六晚上参观了这个节日,是开场的晚上,广场上有一大群人。

en: I went back the next Tuesday night and there was almost no one there , just a few stray photographers taking advantage of the unimpeded views of the lanterns .
zh: 第二天星期二晚上我回去,几乎没有人在那儿,只有几个流浪的摄影师利用灯笼的无阻的景色。

en: The festival runs through March 11 this year .
zh: 这个节日将持续到今年3月11日。

en: NASA Administrator Charles Bolden announces where four space shuttle orbiters will be permanently displayed at the conclusion of the Space Shuttle Program during an event commemorating the 30th anniversay of the first shuttle launch on April 12 , 2011 .
zh: 美国宇航局(NASA)署长查尔斯·博登(Charles Bolden)宣布,在2011年4月12日第一次航天飞机发射的30周年纪念活动期间,航天飞机计划结束时将永久展示四个航天飞机轨道器。

en: NASA celebrated the launch of the first space shuttle Tuesday at an event at the Kennedy Space Center  in Cape Canaveral , Florida .
zh: 美国国家航空航天局星期二在佛罗里达州卡纳维尔角的肯尼迪航天中心举行了一次活动,庆祝了第一艘航天飞机的发射。

en: NASA held a ceremony commemorating the date outside the hangar , known as Orbiter Processing Facility - 1 , for Space Shuttle Atlantis , which is being prepped for its final mission which will be STS - 135 , which will be the last Space Shuttle mission .
zh: 美国宇航局举行了纪念航天飞机“亚特兰蒂斯”号轨道处理设施-1号号航天飞机的发射日期的仪式,该号航天飞机正准备其最后的任务——STS-135号航天飞机,这是最后一次航天飞机的任务。

en: At the ceremony , NASA Administrator Charles Bolden announced the locations that would be given the three remaining Space Shuttle orbiters following the end of the Space Shuttle program .
zh: 在仪式上,NASA行政长官查尔斯·博登宣布将在航天飞机计划结束后给三个剩余的航天飞机轨道的地点。
