en: The prototype orbiter , Space Shuttle Enterprise would be relocated from the Smithsonian 's National Air and Space Museum Steven F. Udvar - Hazy Center at Washington Dulles International Airport to the Intrepid Sea - Air - Space Museum in New York City .
zh: 太空飞船企业将从史密森尼亚国家航空航天博物馆的斯蒂文·F·乌德瓦尔 - 哈西中心搬迁到纽约的海空航天博物馆.

en: Discovery has already been retired following the completion of STS - 133 last month , its 39th mission .
zh: Discovery 已于上个月完成 STS - 133, 其第39次任务后退役.

en: Discovery is undergoing decommissioning and currently being prepped for display by removing toxic materials from the orbiter .
zh: 探测器正处于退役阶段,目前正通过从轨道器中除去有毒物质来准备展示。

en: Space Shuttle Endeavour , which will launch on STS - 134 at the end of the month on April 29 , will be sent to the California Science Center in Los Angeles , California following its retirement .
zh: 太空飞船“ Endeavour ”号将于4月29日月底发射于STS-134号,在其退休后将被送到加州洛杉矶的加州科学中心。

en: Finally , Atlantis will go on display at the Kennedy Space Center Visitor Complex following the orbiter 's last flight which launches June 28 .
zh: 最后, 阿特兰蒂斯号将在6月28日发射的最后一次轨道飞行之后,在肯尼迪航天中心游客中心展出.

en: Columbia was lost tragically back on February 1 , 2003 when it disintegrated during re-entry killing all seven astronauts aboard .
zh: 2003年2月1日,哥伦比亚号在重返太空时解体,导致7名宇航员全部遇难。

en: Space Shuttle Challenger was lost when it exploded 73 seconds after liftoff back on January 28 , 1986 killing all six aboard .
zh: 1986年1月28日,太空梭“挑战者”号在起飞后73秒钟爆炸,全部6人丧生。

en: " We want to thank all of the locations that expressed an interest in one of these national treasures , " said Bolden to the gathered crowd which contained many KSC employees .
zh: “ 我们想感谢那些对这些国家宝藏感兴趣的地点,”博尔登对许多SC雇员聚集的人群说。

en: " This was a very difficult decision , but one that was made with the American public in mind .
zh: 这是一个非常困难的决定,但这一决定是针对美国公众作出的。

en: In the end , these choices provide the greatest number of people with the best opportunity to share in the history and accomplishments of NASA 's remarkable Space Shuttle Program .
zh: 最后,这些选择为大多数人提供了最好的机会分享NASA著名的太空飞船计划的历史和成就。

en: These facilities we 've chosen have a noteworthy legacy of preserving space artifacts and providing outstanding access to U.S. and international visitors . "
zh: 我们选择的这些设施具有保存空间文物的值得注意的遗产,并为美国和国际游客提供卓越的访问机会。

en: This was a very difficult decision , but one that was made with the American public in mind .
zh: 这是一个非常困难的决定,但这一决定是在美国公众的考虑下作出的。

en: In the end , these choices provide the greatest number of people with the best opportunity to share in the history and accomplishments of NASA 's remarkable Space Shuttle Program .
zh: 最后,这些选择为大多数人提供了最好的机会分享NASA著名的太空飞船计划的历史和成就。

en: Not all were pleased with the final choice of locations .
zh: 并非所有人都对最后的选择感到满意。

en: U.S. Senator John Cornyn , Republican from Texas , issued a statement regarding the rejection of Johnson Space Center  in Houston , Texas as a location .
zh: 美国参议员约翰·科恩(John Cornyn),来自德克萨斯州的共和党人,发表了关于拒绝休斯顿的约翰逊太空中心的声明。

en: " Like many Texans , I am disappointed with NASA 's decision to slight the Johnson Space Center as a permanent home for one of the Space Shuttle Orbiters .
zh: 与许多 Texans一样,我对NASA决定将约翰逊太空中心作为太空飞船轨道器的永久居所感到失望。

en: Houston has played a critical role throughout the life of the space shuttle , but it is clear political favors trumped common sense and fairness in the selection of the final locations for the orbiter fleet . "
zh: 休斯敦在航天飞机的一生中发挥了关键作用,但在选择轨道飞行器舰队最后的地点时,显然政治利益胜过理智和公平。

en: Cornyn 's statement added , " There is no question Houston should have been selected as a final home for one of the orbiters — even Administrator Bolden stated as much .
zh: 科恩的声明补充道:“毫无疑问,休斯敦应该被选为轨道飞行员之一的最后家园 — — 甚至布尔登的行政长官也这么说。

en: Today 's announcement is an affront to the thousands of dedicated men and women at Johnson Space Center , the greater Houston community and the State of Texas , and I ’m deeply disappointed with the Administration 's misguided decision . “
zh: 今天的宣布是对约翰逊太空中心、休斯顿社区和德克萨斯州的数以千计的献身男性和女性的侮辱,我对政府错误的决定深感失望。

en: However , the JSC will recieve pilot and commander seats from the flight deck .
zh: 然而, 联检组将从飞机甲板获得飞行员和指挥官席位.

en: The Museum of Flight in Seattle , Washington was also proposed as another location for a shuttle , going so far as to build a new building to house an orbiter .
zh: 华盛顿的西雅图飞行博物馆也被提议作为航天飞机的另一个地点,甚至打算建造一座新建筑来安置一个轨道飞行器。

en: In a statement , Governor of Washington Chris Gregoire said , " The Museum of Flight put a tremendous amount of effort into landing a retired shuttle in the Pacific Northwest .
zh: 华盛顿州长克里斯·格雷戈尔(Chris Gregoire)在一份声明中说,“飞行博物馆在西北太平洋上投入了巨大的努力,让退役的航天飞机降落。

en: As the home of modern day air travel and the 747 , which has gracefully transported shuttles for the last 30 years , Seattle would have been a perfect fit .
zh: 作为现代航空旅行的家园,以及过去30年来优雅地运送的747客轮,西雅图将是一个完美的适应。

en: While the Museum of Flight was in the top running , I ’m disappointed that NASA did not choose them .
zh: 尽管飞行博物馆在榜首,但我很失望NASA没有选择它们。

en: In 2008 , Endeavour and Atlantis await a journey on their respective launchpads .
zh: 在2008年, Endeavour 和 Atlantis 在各自的发射台上等待着航行。

en: " However , the full fuselage trainer , that every astronaut including  Bonnie Dunbar has been trained on , will soon call the Museum of Flight home .
zh: 然而, 全机教练, 每个宇航员包括邦妮·邓巴尔已经接受过训练, 不久将召回飞行博物馆回家.

en: The largest of the trainers , this addition will allow visitors to actually climb aboard the trainer and experience the hands - on training that astronauts get .
zh: 这是最大的教练员, 这个增加将允许游客实际登上教练员并体验宇航员获得的手技训练.

en: Visitors will not be allowed in the other shuttles and this trainer is a true win for our dynamic museum .
zh: 参观者不会被允许进入其他航天飞机,而这个教练是我们动态博物馆的真正胜利。

en: It will help inspire young people to the adventure of space and to the excitement of a career in science , technology , engineering and math . "
zh: 它将有助于激发年轻人去太空的冒险,并刺激他们从事科学、技术、工程和数学的事业。

en: Today 's announcement is an affront to the thousands of dedicated men and women at Johnson Space Center , the greater Houston community and the State of Texas , and I ’m deeply disappointed with the Administration 's misguided decision .
zh: 今天的宣布是对约翰逊太空中心、休斯敦社区和德克萨斯州的数千献身的男女的侮辱,我对政府错误的决定深感失望。

en: Other items include various shuttle simulators which will be given to the Adler Planetarium in Chicago , Illinois , the Evergreen Aviation & Space Museum of McMinnville , Oregon , and Texas A&M 's Aerospace Engineering Department .
zh: 其他项目包括将给伊利诺伊州芝加哥的阿德勒天文台、俄勒冈州麦明维尔的埃弗格林航空航天博物馆和德克萨斯州的航空航天工程部的各种航天飞机模拟器。

en: NASA is also offering shuttle heat shield tiles to schools and universities that want to share technology and a piece of space history with their students .
zh: NASA还向希望与学生分享技术和太空历史的学校和大学提供航天器热屏障瓦片。

en: The 30th anniversary of the first shuttle mission coincided with the 50th anniversary of the first manned space flight when Yuri Gagarin lifted off aboard Vostok 1 into space .
zh: 第一次太空飞船任务的30周年 coincided with the 50th anniversary of the first manned space flight when Yuri Gagarin lifted off aboard Vostok 1 into space 。

en: A sensitive Environment Canada document was found wet on an Ottawa street by someone who gave it to the CBC today .
zh: 某人今天向加拿大广播公司(CBC)递交了一份敏感的加拿大环境署文件。

en: The 131 - page document was found on Castlefrank Road in Kanata , Ontario in a rain - stained , tire - marked brown envelope by a passerby .
zh: 这张131页的文件在安大略省坎塔的卡斯尔弗兰克路上被一个路过者发现,上面有雨色 、 轮胎标记的棕色封筒.

en: The document which had the stamp Protected B on every page detailed various security vulnerabilities of the NEMISIS database which is used by officers to track and prosecute environmental law - breakers .
zh: 每页都有“保护B”印章的文件详细说明了警官用来追踪和起诉违反环境法的人员使用的“ NEMISIS”数据库的各种安全漏洞。

en: If someone were able to shut the system down , or hack inside and delete or corrupt the information , it could affect the prosecution of the lawbreakers .
zh: 如果有人能够关闭系统,或者入侵并删除或破坏信息,这可能会影响违法者的起诉。

en: The database was unveiled in 1999 as the National Enforcement Management Information System and Intelligence System .
zh: 该数据库于1999年作为国家执法管理信息系统和情报系统(National Enforcement Management Information System and Intelligence System)发布。

en: However , on the document , it referred to the database as National Enforcement and Emergency Management Information System and Intelligence System , adding the words " and Emergency " to the name .
zh: 然而,在文件中,它将数据库称为国家执法和紧急管理信息系统和情报系统,并将“和紧急”字加入名称。

en: Environment Canada spokesperson Julie Hahn said they apply to letters of complaint , criticism or injury , research or scientific notes and findings that do n`t have any conclusion , and Treasury Board letters , agendas and minutes that do n`t deal with subjects of national interest .
zh: 加拿大环境署发言人朱莉·哈恩说,他们适用于没有结论的投诉信件、批评或伤害信件、研究或科学注释和发现信件、以及财政部信件、议程和记录,这些信件不涉及国家利益的事项。

en: Environment Minister John Baird has asked government officials how such documents that are supposed to be stored in " approved security cabinets " wound up on the street .
zh: 环境部长约翰·贝尔德(John Baird)向政府官员询问,这些据称在“ 核可的安全柜 ”中储存的文件是如何在街上出现的。

en: " I 'm told two things : that it 's neither classified nor secret and that it 's stuff that could be available under access to information , " Baird said .
zh: 贝尔德说:“ 有人告诉我两件事: 它既不是秘密的,也不是秘密的,而且这是可以利用信息的物品。

en: Environment Canada spokeswoman Sujata Raisinghani told CBC News the department will look into the incident .
zh: 加拿大环境署发言人苏贾塔·莱辛哈尼(Sujata Raisinghani)告诉CBC新闻,该部门将调查这一事件。

en: " We take document security seriously , " she said , but refused to give any more details about how the papers came to be on a road .
zh: 她说:“我们认真对待文件的安全,”但拒绝详细说明这些文件是如何在道路上出现的。

en: Paul Dewar , an Ottawa New Democrat MP , said the combined security lapses raise serious questions about the government 's ability to secure sensitive documents .
zh: 奥塔瓦新民主党议员保罗·德瓦尔(Paul Dewar)表示,这一系列安全漏洞引发了有关政府如何确保敏感文件的能力的严重问题。

en: Dewar says that bureaucrats of the Conservative government have complained to him about document security to the point that they ca n`t share the information with their own colleagues .
zh: 德瓦尔说,保守党政府的官僚对他的文件安全抱怨到他们不能与自己的同事分享信息的程度。

en: However , when a government document has been found on the streets , the government then says it was n't particularly sensitive .
zh: 然而,当政府文件在街上被发现时,政府便表示它并不特别敏感。

en: " This government is so consumed with control of information and secrecy yet they do n't seem to be able to get the fundamentals right , " Dewar said .
zh: 德瓦尔说:“这个政府对信息和机密的控制非常着迷,但他们似乎无法正确地掌握基本原则。

en: The incident is a reminiscent of two other incidents .
zh: 这起事件提醒我们另外两个事件。

en: In March , a bundle of blueprints for a new headquarters for the military 's counterterrorism unit were found stuffed in the trash on a downtown street .
zh: 3月,军方反恐单位新总部的蓝图一揽子在市中心的垃圾堆中被发现。

en: In May , Maxime Bernier was forced to resign as Foreign Affairs minister after it became known that he left sensitive documents at the apartment of his then - girlfriend Julie Couillard who had ties to the Hells Angels biker gang .
zh: 5月, 马克西米斯·贝尼尔被强迫辞去外交部长职务,因为人们知道他把敏感文件留在当时的女友朱莉·库伊拉德的公寓里.

en: In the first game of the day , Sweden faced South Korea at the Nizhny Novgorod Stadium .
zh: 在今天的第一场比赛中,瑞典在尼日诺夫哥尔德体育场面对韩国。

en: Sweden had higher ball possession in the game .
zh: 瑞典在比赛中拥有较高的球权。

en: Korea 's Kim Shin-Wook was shown a yellow card early in the game .
zh: 韩国选手金新武在比赛开始时显示了黄色牌。

en: Korea substituted Park Joo-Ho in the 28th minute of the game due to injury and was replaced by Kim Min-Woo .
zh: 韩国在比赛的第28分钟因受伤而替换了朴正熙,并由金明华取代。

en: Despite their attempts , neither side could open the scoring in the first half as it ended 0 – 0 .
zh: 尽管他们作出了尝试, 双方都未能在第一半场以0-0结束时开出得分.

en: In the second half , Hwang Hee-Chan was booked for a bad foul .
zh: 在下半场,黄海昌因犯规而被选中。

en: In the 62nd minute Kim Min-Woo conceded a penalty which the match referee Joel Aguilar awarded Sweden after confirming with the video assistant referee .
zh: 在第62分钟,Kim Min-Woo conceded a penalty which the match referee Joel Aguilar awarded Sweden after confirming with the video assistant referee 。

en: The match ended with Sweden winning three points .
zh: 比赛以瑞典赢得三分结束。

en: Swedish captain Andreas Granqvist won the Budweiser Man of the Match award .
zh: 瑞典队长安德烈斯·格兰克维斯特(Andreas Granqvist)赢得了比赛的布德维希尔人奖。

en: In the first game of Group G , Belgium faced Panama at the Fisht Stadium in Sochi .
zh: 在G组的第一场比赛中, 比利时在 Sotchi的Fisht体育场面对了巴拿马.

en: Belgium had greater ball possession in the match .
zh: 比利時在比賽中擁有更大的球權。

en: Belgium started the game with attacking style with Romelu Lukaku , Yannick Carrasco , and Dries Mertens making early attempts to put Belgium into the lead against debutans Panama .
zh: 比利时以进攻风格开始比赛,与卢卡库、卡拉斯科和梅特伦斯(DriesMertens)在早期的尝试中将比利时带进领先的阵营。

en: Dries Mertens 's attempt in the 18th minute failed .
zh: 梅特伦斯在第18分钟的尝试失败了。

en: The first half ended with 0 – 0 on the scoreboard .
zh: 首半场以0-0的比分结束。

en: Just two minutes in the second half , Dries Mertens scored a goal from a volley , putting the Belgians in the lead .
zh: 在第二半的两分钟里,德里斯·梅特伦斯从排球中得分,使比利时队领先。

en: In the 69th minute , Romelu Lukaku doubled the lead for Belgium , scoring a header from Kevin De Bruyne 's assist .
zh: 在第69分钟,卢卡库对比利时的领先率翻了一番,从德布鲁恩的帮助中得分。

en: Six minutes later , Lukaku scored a third goal for Belgium , this time from Eden Hazard 's assist .
zh: 六分钟后, 卢卡库为比利时射入了第三个进球, 这次是由艾登·哈萨德的帮助.

en: The second half ended with the Belgians winning three points .
zh: 第二半结束时,比利时队获得了三分。

en: Five Panamanian players were booked in the match .
zh: 共有5名巴拿马球员参加比赛。

en: Lukaku won the Budweiser Man of the Match award .
zh: 卢卡库赢得了布达维希尔人比赛奖。

en: After the match , Hernan Dario Gomez , Panama coach , said , " I think we have learned a lot from today 's game .
zh: 比赛结束后, 巴拿马的教练赫南·达里奥·戈梅斯说:“我认为我们从今天的比赛中学到了很多东西。

en: This is the fifth time I 've been at a World Cup but it felt like the first .
zh: 这是我参加世界杯的第五次,但感觉像是第一次。

en: The team was still very emotional at the start of the match but as time went by , they were able to focus better . "
zh: 球队在比赛开始时仍然很激动,但随着时间的推移,他们能够更好地集中注意力。

en: In the last match of the day , Tunisia faced England at the Volgograd Arena .
zh: 在今天的最后一场比赛中,突尼斯在伏尔戈格拉德体育场面对英格兰。

en: England had better ball possession in the game .
zh: 英格蘭在比賽中擁有更好的球權。

en: England started the match with attacking style , with attempts from Jesse Lingard , Harry Maguire , Harry Kane , and John Stones early in the game .
zh: 英格兰以进攻风格开始比赛,以杰西·林加德、哈里·马圭尔、哈里·凯恩和约翰·斯通斯的尝试开始比赛。

en: Four minutes later , Tunisia 's goalkeeper Mouez Hassen was substituted off due to injury and replaced by Farouk Ben Mustapha .
zh: 四分钟后,突尼斯守门员哈森因受伤被替换为法鲁克·本·穆斯塔法。

en: Tunisia won a penalty kick in the 33rd minute .
zh: 突尼斯在第33分钟赢得一场罚球。

en: English defender Kyle Walker was booked for his bad foul , and Ferjani Sassi scored from the penalty spot , equalising for the African side .
zh: 英格兰守门员凯尔·沃克因犯规而被记入,费尔贾尼·萨西从罚点中得分,为非洲球队打平了。

en: The first half ended 1 – 1 on the scoreboard .
zh: 上半场的比分是1:1。

en: The match came to end with England winning 2 – 1 and collecting three points .
zh: 比赛结束时,英格兰以2比1获胜,并获得3分。

en: Harry Kane won the Budweiser Man of the Match award .
zh: 哈里·凯恩赢得了《博德维希尔人比赛》奖。

en: He said , " In the first half it felt good out there .
zh: 他说: “ 上半场感觉很好。

en: We could 've scored two or three goals in the first half and put the game to bed early . "
zh: 我们本来能在第一半球中得分两三球,然后把比赛提前打完。

en: After the match , Tunisia 's coach Nabil Maaloul said , " We were playing against a highly - skilled and highly co-ordinated team in terms of their forward players .
zh: 比赛结束后,突尼斯的教练纳比尔·马卢尔说, “ 我们正在对阵一支高技能和高度协调的球队,从前锋球员的角度来看。

en: If we were to get a draw it would have been an excellent result for us .
zh: 如果我们能得到抽签,那对我们来说将是一个很好的结果。

en: But hopefully this will lead to higher levels of concentration in the coming games . "
zh: 但我们希望这能使未来的比赛更加集中。

en: According to the Saudi Interior Ministry over 345 Muslim pilgrims have been killed in a stampede during the annual Hajj pilgrimage near Mecca , Saudi Arabia .
zh: 据沙特内政部报道,每年在沙特阿拉伯麦卡附近进行的 Hajj巡礼期间,有345名穆斯林巡礼者丧生。

en: The stampede at Islam 's most holy site happened at Jamarat Bridge , during an event where pebbles are thrown at a pillar to represent the stoning of Satan as part of the final rites of the Hajj .
zh: 伊斯兰教最圣地的暴乱发生在贾马拉特大桥(Jamarat Bridge)上,当时人们用石块扔到一个柱子来代表撒旦在最后的礼拜中被石头砸死。

en: The stampede began when luggage from a bus tripped pilgrims at the eastern end of the wall , causing a bottleneck .
zh: stampede开始时,一辆公共汽车的行李在墙的东端绊倒了巡礼者,造成了一个瓶颈。

en: Those who were tripped were then crushed by the wave of people behind them .
zh: 那些被绊倒的人被背后的人群冲垮了。

en: Muslims are required to make a pilgrimage to Mecca during their lifetimes , if physically or financially possible , as it is one of the five pillars of the Islamic faith .
zh: 穆斯林在其一生中必须前往麦加巡礼,如果物理或财政上是可能的,因为这是伊斯兰信仰的五支柱之一。

en: Saudi officials had already provided safeguards by installing an oval wall with padded edges to protect pilgrams from a crush , installed security cameras and placed over 60,000 security personnel in the area .
zh: 沙特官员已经通过安装一个有铺设边的椭圆形墙来保护柱子免受粉碎,安装了安全摄像头,并在该地区部署了超过60,000名安全人员。

en: Last week , at least 76 people were killed when the Al - Gaza Hotel near the Masjid Al - Haram  collapsed , the cause of which is unknown .
zh: 上周, 圣母圣地附近的加沙饭店倒塌时至少有76人丧生, 原因不明.

en: In the past few days in Italy , several municipalities have started asking religious schools to pay taxes for property and local services , despite the resistance of the Catholic Church .
zh: 在过去几天里,在意大利,几个自治市开始要求宗教学校为财产和当地服务支付税,尽管天主教会反对。

en: Instituto Gonzaga , a catholic school in Milan . Image : Friedrichstrasse .
zh: 米兰的天主教学校《冈萨加学院》。

en: The request of the municipalities results from the sentence of the Italian Supreme Court of Cassation on July 8 , recognising as legitimate the request of the Municipality of Livorno asking religious schools to pay property taxes .
zh: 7月8日,意大利最高 Cassation法院判决,承认利沃诺市要求宗教学校缴纳财产税的要求是合法的。

en: Requests have come from the Municipality of Bogliasco , next to Genova , and from the deputies of Movimento 5 Stelle  of the regional counsel of Lombardy .
zh: 布利亚斯科市(Bogliasco Municipality)与雅各那市(Genova)相邻,以及 Lombardy地区议会的5个党派的议员提出了要求。

en: The first case is of the mayor Luca Pastorino that in last years received several refusals of his requests for payment because of the religious nursery school and retirement home .
zh: 第一个案例是市长卢卡·帕斯托里诺(Luca Pastorino)去年因宗教幼儿园和退休院而多次拒绝他的支付请求。

en: In the second case , the M5S party asks to the regional government to assure the local administrations of the region regularly apply the sentence of the Supreme Court .
zh: 在第二宗案件中,M5S党要求区域政府保证该地区地方政府定期执行最高法院的判决。

en: The case on which the Court has ruled was of the religious schools Santo Spirito and Immacolata in Livorno , Tuscany , to pay over 422,000 euros in arrears for the period from 2004 to 2009 .
zh: 法院裁决的案件是托斯卡纳利维尔诺的圣灵堂和圣母学院在2004年至2009年期间欠款超过422,000欧元。

en: The request was advanced by the Municipality of Livorno in 2010 .
zh: 该项请求于2010年由利沃诺市提出。

en: The city reasoned , " because the users of the private schools pay a frequency fee , this kind of activity is considered as a commercial one "  ) .
zh: 该市解释说, “ 由于私营学校的用户支付频率费, 这种活动被认为是商业活动 ” 。

en: In 2014 the Italian municipal tax discipline has changed from the ICI system to the IMU system by the Monti government .
zh: 2014年,意大利市政税制由蒙蒂政府从ICI系统改为IMU系统。

en: A mean cost per student criterion is used to tax only the schools that receive a fee higher than the mean cost per student fixed by the State .
zh: 每名学生平均费用标准仅用于征税学校,其收费高于国家确定的每名学生平均费用。

en: The new law is not retroactive , so the taxes requested in arrears from 2006 to 2009 are under the ICI system .
zh: 这项新法律并不具有追溯性,因此2006年至2009年期间拖欠的税款属于ICI制度。

en: Minister of Education Stefania Giannini said a " more general reflection "  ) is needed .
zh: 教育部长斯蒂芬妮娅·吉安尼尼尼(Stefania Giannini)说,需要“ 更全面地思考 ” 。

en: Claudio De Vincenti , undersecretary to the prime minister , said " a discussion table will be opened with the non-profit associations , religious association included "  ) .
zh: 副总理克劳迪奥·德·文森蒂(Claudio De Vincenti)说, “ 将与非营利组织(包括宗教组织)展开讨论桌 ” 。

en: Undersecretary for Education Mr. Toccafondi says " many schools will increase their fees or they will quit . Then the State will have to find new resources to build new structures and manage them "  ) .
zh: 教育副部长托卡福迪说: “ 许多学校将增加学费,否则他们就会辞职, 然后国家将不得不找到新的资源来建造新的结构和管理它们 ” 。

en: Also the president of the Lombardy region , Roberto Maroni , has reacted by proposing some regional counter-measures to finance private schools .
zh: 罗伯特·马罗尼(Roberto Maroni)是伦巴多地区总统,他对此表示反应,建议采取一些区域的反措施来资助私立学校。

en: The secretary general of CEI  , Nunzio Galantino , has called the sentence " dangerous "  ) and " ideological "  ) :
zh: CEI的秘书长纳西奥·加兰蒂诺(Nunzio Galantino)称“危险”和“意识形态”的句子:

en: " We face a dangerous sentence .
zh: 我们面临一个危险的判决。

en: Who takes the decisions , do it with less ideology .
zh: 谁作出决定,就用更少的意识形态去做。

en: Because I have the clear sensation that with this way of thinking , they wait the praise of some ideologized supporters .
zh: 因为我清楚地感觉到,他们用这种思维方式等待某些意识形态支持者的赞扬。

en: Indeed , they do n't understand what kind of good service private schools held "  ) .
zh: 事实上, 他们不明白私立学校提供什么样的好服务. ”

en: Italian secularist associations are concerned the Government will modify the law in order to maintain an exception for religious schools .
zh: 意大利世俗主义协会担心政府将修改法律,以维持宗教学校的例外。

en: The secularist magazine MicroMega describe the court 's judgement as historic .
zh: 世俗主义杂志MicroMega将法院的判决描述为历史性的。

en: The Union of Rationalist Atheists and Agnostics  has launched a petition which now has more than 11,000 signatures , asking the government to respect and execute the sentence of the Supreme Court .
zh: 理性主义无神论者和无神论者联盟发起了一项请愿书,该请愿书已有超过11,000份签名,要求政府尊重和执行最高法院的判决。

en: It is also encouraging citizens to ask for application of the law in their local municipalities .
zh: 它还鼓励公民在地方自治体申请法律的实施。

en: Warhol 's photo legacy spread by university exhibits
zh: 华霍尔的摄影遗产被大学展览所传播

en: This past week marked the opening night of an Andy Warhol exhibit at the University of Southern Indiana .
zh: 上周在南印第安纳大学举办了安迪·沃霍尔展览的开幕礼。

en: USI 's art gallery , like 189 other educational galleries and museums around the country , is a recipient of a major Warhol donor program , and this program is cultivating new interest in Warhol 's photographic legacy .
zh: USI的艺术画廊与全国其他189家教育画廊和博物馆一样,是沃霍尔的主要捐赠计划的受益者,这项计划正在培育沃霍尔的摄影遗产的新兴趣。

en: Wikinews reporters attended the opening and spoke to donors , exhibit organizers and patrons .
zh: 维基新闻记者参加了开幕式,向捐助者、展览组织者和赞助者讲话。

en: The USI art gallery celebrated the Thursday opening with its display of Warhol 's Polaroids , gelatin silver prints and several colored screen prints .
zh: USI美术馆在周四开幕典礼上展出了沃霍尔的波拉罗伊德、银胶印和几幅彩色屏幕印。

en: USI 's exhibit , which is located in Evansville , Indiana , is to run from January 23 through March 9 .
zh: USI的展览会位于印第安纳州埃文斯维尔,从1月23日至3月9日举行。

en: The Polaroids were all donated by the Andy Warhol Photographic Legacy Program , according to Kristen Wilkins , assistant professor of photography and curator of the exhibit .
zh: 据摄影助理教授和展览馆馆长克里斯汀·威尔金斯(Kristen Wilkins)介绍,所有波拉罗伊德照片都是由安迪·沃霍尔摄影遗产计划捐赠的。

en: The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts made two donations to USI Art Collections , in 2007 and a second recently .
zh: 安迪·沃霍尔视觉艺术基金会(Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts)在2007年向USI艺术收藏捐赠了两笔,最近又捐赠了另一笔。

en: Kathryn Waters , director of the gallery , expressed interest in further donations from the foundation in the future .
zh: 画廊主任凯瑟琳·沃特斯(Kathryn Waters)表示,她对基金会今后的进一步捐赠表示兴趣。

en: Since 2007 the Andy Warhol Photographic Legacy Program has seeded university art galleries throughout the United States with over 28,000 Andy Warhol photographs and other artifacts .
zh: 自2007年起,安迪·沃霍尔摄影遗产计划(英语:Andy Warhol Photographic Legacy Program)在美国各地的大学美术馆里展出了超过28,000幅安迪·沃霍尔照片和其他艺术品。

en: The program takes a decentralized approach to Warhol 's photography collection and encourages university art galleries to regularly disseminate and educate audiences about Warhol 's artistic vision , especially in the area of photography .
zh: 该计划以分散的方式处理沃霍尔的摄影收藏,并鼓励大学美术馆定期散发和教育观众沃霍尔的艺术视野,特别是摄影领域。

en: Wikinews provides additional video , audio and photographs so our readers may learn more .
zh: 维基新闻提供了额外的视频、音频和照片,所以我们的读者可以学习更多。

en: Wilkins observed that the 2007 starting date of the donation program , which is part of the Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts , coincided with the 20th anniversary of Andy Warhol 's death in 1987 .
zh: 威尔金斯指出,2007年开始的捐赠计划,是安迪·沃霍尔视觉艺术基金会的一部分, coincided with the 20th anniversary of Andy Warhol's death in 1987 。

en: K.C. Maurer , chief financial officer and treasurer at the Andy Warhol Foundation , said 500 institutions received the initial invitation and currently 190 universities have accepted one or more donations .
zh: 安迪·沃霍尔基金会首席财务官兼库务长K.C. Maurer说,500个机构收到了初步邀请,目前190个大学已经接受了1个或多个捐赠。

en: Institutional recipients , said Mauer , are required to exhibit their donated Warhol photographs every ten years as one stipulation .
zh: 莫尔说,机构的受援者必须按规定每十年展示他们捐赠的沃霍尔照片。

en: While USI is holding its exhibit , there are also Warhol Polaroid exhibits at the Tang Teaching Museum and Art Gallery at Skidmore College in Saratoga Springs , New York and an Edward Steichen and Andy Warhol exhibit at the Mary & Leigh Block Museum of Art at Northwestern University in Evanston , Illinois .
zh: USI在举办展览的同时,还有Warhol Polaroid展在纽约萨拉托加泉斯 Skidmore College的唐教学博物馆和艺术画廊,还有Edward Steichen和Andy Warhol展在伊利诺伊州埃文斯顿的西北大学的Mary&Leigh Block艺术博物馆。

en: All have received Polaroids from the foundation .
zh: 他们都从基金会收到了 Polaroids 。

en: University exhibits can reach out and attract large audiences .
zh: 大学的展览可以吸引大量观众。

en: For example , the Weatherspoon Art Museum at the University of North Carolina at Greensboro saw attendance levels reach 11,000 visitors when it exhibited its Warhol collection in 2010 , according to curator Elaine Gustafon .
zh: 例如,格林斯博罗的北卡罗莱纳大学的“Weatherspoon Art Museum”在2010年展出沃霍尔收藏时,参观人数达到11,000人。

en: That exhibit was part of a collaboration combining the collections from Duke University , located in Durham , North Carolina , and University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill , which also were recipients of donated items from the Andy Warhol Photographic Legacy Program .
zh: 该展览是结合位于北卡罗莱纳州杜克大学(Duke University)和位于 Chapel Hill的北卡罗莱纳大学(University of North Carolina)的收藏的一部分,这些大学也收到了来自安迪·沃霍尔摄影遗产计划的捐赠品。

en: Each collection donated by the Andy Warhol Photographic Legacy Program holds Polaroids of well - known celebrities .
zh: 所有由安迪·沃霍尔摄影遗产计划捐赠的收藏品都收藏了著名名人的 Polaroids.

en: The successful UNC Greensboro exhibit included Polaroids of author Truman Capote and singer - songwriter Carly Simon .
zh: UNC格林斯博罗的成功展览包括作家特鲁曼·卡波特和歌手 - 作曲家卡莉·西蒙的 Polaroids.

en: " I think America 's obsession with celebrity culture is as strong today as it was when Warhol was living " , said Gustafon .
zh: 古斯塔福恩说:“我认为美国对名人文化的迷恋今天与沃霍尔在世时一样强烈。

en: " People are still intrigued by how stars live , dress and socialize , since it is so different from most people 's every day lives . "
zh: 人们仍然对明星的生活、服装和社交方式感兴趣,因为它与大多数人日常生活非常不同。

en: Wilkins explained Warhol 's obsession with celebrities began when he first collected head shots as a kid and continued as a passion throughout his life .
zh: 威尔金斯解释说,沃霍尔对名人的痴迷始于他小时候第一次收集头 shots,并继续成为他的一生的激情。

en: " He 's hanging out with the celebrities , and has kind of become the same sort of celebrity he was interested in documenting earlier in his career " , Wilkins said .
zh: 威尔金斯说:“他正在和名人聚在一起,并且有点像他早些时候在事业中感兴趣的名人一样。

en: The exhibit at USI includes Polaroids of actor Dennis Hopper ; musician Nick Rhodes of Duran Duran ; publishers Jann Wenner of Rolling Stone Magazine and Carlo De Benedetti of Italy 's la Repubblica ; disco club owner Steve Rubell of Studio 54 ; photographers Nat Finkelstein , Christopher Makos and Felice Quinto ; and athletes Vitas Gerulaitis  and Jack Nicklaus  .
zh: 该展览会展出了 Dennis Hopper 的 Polaroids ; Duran Duran 的 Nick Rhodes 的 musician ; Rolling Stone Magazine 的 Jann Wenner 和 la Repubblica 的 Carlo De Benedetti ; Studio 54 的 disco club 的 Steve Rubell ; 摄影师 Nat Finkelstein, Christopher Makos 和 Felice Quinto ; 以及 运动员 Vitas Gerulaitis 和 Jack Nicklaus 。

en: Wikinews observed the USI exhibit identifies and features Polaroids of fashion designer Halston , a former resident of Evansville .
zh: 维基新闻观察到USI展览标识和展示了时尚设计师哈尔斯顿的 Polaroids, 这位前埃文斯维尔居民.

en: University collections across the United States also include Polaroids of " unknowns " who have not yet had their fifteen minutes of fame .
zh: 美国各地的大学收藏也包括“ 未知者 ” 的 Polaroids, 这些 “ 未知者 ” 尚未获得他们15分钟的名声.

en: Cynthia Thompson , curator and director of exhibits at the University of Arkansas , Fayetteville , said , " These images serve as documentation of people in his every day life and art - one which many of us enjoy a glimpse into . "
zh: 阿肯色大学的馆长兼展览主任辛西亚·汤普森(Cynthia Thompson)说:“ 这些照片是他日常生活和艺术中的人物的记录 — — 我们许多人都喜欢一瞥。 ”

en: Warhol was close to important touchstones of the 1960s , including art , music , consumer culture , fashion , and celebrity worship , which were all buzzwords and images Wikinews observed at USI 's opening exhibit .
zh: 沃霍尔近乎1960年代的重要里程碑,包括艺术 、 音乐 、 消费文化 、 时尚和名人崇拜,这些都是维基新闻在USI的开幕展览上观察到的流行词和图片.

en: " That 's why he did the Campbell Soup cans or the Marilyn pictures , these iconic products of American culture whether they be in film , video or actually products we consumed .
zh: 这就是为什么他制作了坎贝尔苏普罐子或玛丽林照片,这些美国文化的标志性产品,不论是电影、视频还是我们所消费的产品。

en: So even back in the sixties , he was very aware of this part of our culture .
zh: 甚至在六十年代,他非常了解我们的文化这一部分。

en: Which as we all know in 2014 , has only increased probably a thousand fold . "
zh: 正如我们都知道的2014年, 只是增加了大约一千倍. ”

en: " I think everybody knows Andy Warhol 's name , even non-art people , that 's a name they might know because he was such a personality " , Water said .
zh: 沃特说:“我认为每个人都知道安迪·沃霍尔的名字,即使是非艺术人士,他们可能也知道他的名字,因为他是个如此的人物。

en: Hilary Braysmith , USI associate professor of art history , said , " I think his photography is equally influential as his graphic works , his more famous pictures of Marilyn .
zh: USI艺术史副教授希拉里·布莱斯密特说:“我认为他的摄影与他的图形作品一样具有影响力,他的更著名的玛丽莲画。

en: In terms of the evolution of photography and experimentation , like painting on them or the celebrity fascination , I think he was really ground - breaking in that regard . "
zh: 关于摄影和实验的进化, 如画在它们上或名人的迷恋, 我认为他在这方面是真正突破性的. ”

en: The Polaroid format is not what made Warhol famous , however , he is in the company of other well - known photographers who used the camera , such as Ansel Adams , Chuck Close , Walker Evans , Robert Mapplethorpe , and Helmut Newton .
zh: 波拉罗伊德格式不是沃霍尔之所以成为有名的原因,但是他与其他著名的摄影师合作,如安塞尔·亚当斯、查克·克洛斯、沃克·埃文斯、罗伯特·马普勒索普、赫尔穆特·牛顿等。

en: Wilkins said , "  liked the way photo booths and the Polaroid 's front flash looked " .
zh: 威尔金斯说, “ 喜欢照片摊位和波拉罗伊德的正面闪光的样子 ”.

en: She explained how Warhol 's adoption of the Polaroid camera revealed his process .
zh: 她解释了沃霍尔采用的波拉罗伊德摄像机如何揭示了他的过程.

en: According to Wilkins , Warhol was able to reproduce the Polaroid photograph and create an enlargement of it , which he then could use to commit the image to the silk screen medium by applying paint or manipulating them further .
zh: 根据威尔金斯的说法,沃霍尔能够复制波拉罗伊德照片并创建它的扩充,然后他可以通过涂料或进一步操纵它们来将图像提交到丝绸屏幕中。

en: One of the silk screens exhibited at USI this time was the Annie Oakley screen print called " Cowboys and Indians " from 1987 .
zh: 这次在USI展出的丝绸屏幕之一是1987年安妮·奥克利的“牛仔和印第安人 ” 的屏幕印刷。

en: Wilkins also said Warhol was both an artist and a businessperson .
zh: 威尔金斯还说沃霍尔是一位艺术家和商人。

en: " As a way to commercialize his work , he would make a blue Marilyn and a pink Marilyn and a yellow Marilyn , and then you could pick your favorite color and buy that .
zh: 作为一种商业化的手段,他会制作一个蓝色的马里林和一个粉红色的马里林和一个黄色的马里林,然后你可以选择你最喜欢的颜色并买那件。

en: It was a very practical salesman approach to his work .
zh: 这是一个非常实用的推销员的工作方法。

en: He was very prolific but very business minded about that . "
zh: 他很生机勃勃,但对此非常有商业精神。

en: " He wanted to be rich and famous and he made lots of choices to go that way " , Wilkins said .
zh: 威尔金斯说:“ 他想成为富人和名人,他做了很多选择以达到这个目的。

en: Kiara Perkins , a second year USI art major , admitted she was willing to skip class Thursday night to attend the opening exhibit but then circumstances allowed for her to attend the exhibit .
zh: 凯亚拉·佩尔金斯(Kiara Perkins)是USI艺术专业二年级的学生,她承认她愿意在周四晚上跳课参加开幕展览,但当时的形势使她得以参加展览。

en: Why did she so badly want to attend ?
zh: 她为什么这么想参加呢?

en: He said , " Andy Warhol was the center of the Zeitgeist for the 20th century and everything since .
zh: 他说,“安迪·沃霍尔是20世纪和从那时起的一切时代精神的中心。

en: He is a post-modern diety . "
zh: 他是一个后现代的饮食。

en: Allton said he had only seen the Silver Clouds installation before in film .
zh: 艾尔顿说,他以前只看过银云的电影。

en: The Silver Clouds installation were silver balloons blown up with helium , and those balloons filled one of the smaller rooms in the gallery .
zh: 银云的安装是用氦吹爆的银气球,这些气球填满了画廊的一个较小的房间。

en: " I thought that in real life it was really kind of magical , " Allton said .
zh: 我以为在现实生活中,这真是太神奇了, ” 艾尔顿说.

en: " I smacked them around . "
zh: “ 我把它们弄得乱七八糟. ”

en: Elements of the Zeitgeist were also playfully recreated on USI 's opening night .
zh: 在USI的开会晚间,人们还玩耍地 recreated Zeitgeist的元素。

en: In her opening remarks for attendees , Waters pointed out those features to attendees , noting the touches of the Warhol Factory , or the studio where he worked , that were present around them .
zh: 沃特斯在开场讲话中指出了这些特点,并指出了沃霍尔工厂的痕迹,或者他所在的工作室,在他们周围都存在着。

en: She pointed to the refreshment table with Campbell 's Soup served with " electric " Kool Aid and tables adorned with colorful gumball " pills " .
zh: 她指着自助餐桌上的坎贝尔苏普,供应的是“ 电动 ” 止痛药,桌子上装饰着鲜艳的糖果 “ 药丸 ” 。

en: The music in the background was from such bands as The Velvet Underground .
zh: 背景音乐来自诸如 Velvet Underground这样的乐队。

en: The Polaroids were ready in an instant and immediately displayed at the entry of the exhibit .
zh: 波拉罗伊特照片立刻准备好,在展览的入口处立即展示。

en: Exhibit goers then became part of the very exhibit they had wanted to attend .
zh: 参观者随后成为他们想参加的展览的一部分。

en: In fact , many people Wikinews observed took out their mobiles as they left for the evening and used their own phone cameras to make one further record of the moment - a photo of a photo .
zh: 事实上,维基新闻观察到的许多人在晚上离开时拿出他们的手机,用自己的手机摄像机记录了这一时刻——一张照片。

en: Perhaps they had learned an important lesson from the Warhol exhibit that cultural events like these were ripe for use and reuse .
zh: 也许他们从沃霍尔展览中吸取了一个重要的教训,那就是这样的文化事件已经成熟了,可以加以使用和重用。

en: We might even call these exit instant snap shots , the self selfie .
zh: 我们甚至可以称之为这些出口即时快照,自撮り。

en: A research team from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and Colorado State University of the US and the University of Sheffield of the UK has analysed effects of global warming and ozone pollution over 2000 - 2050 on the worldwide production of wheat , rice , maize and soybean .
zh: 马萨诸塞州理工学院、美国科罗拉多州立大学和英国谢菲尔德大学的研究小组分析了全球变暖和臭氧污染在2000年至2050年期间对世界小麦、稻米、玉米和大豆的生产的影响。

en: The study was published in journal Nature Climate Change yesterday .
zh: 这项研究昨天在《自然气候变化》杂志上发表。

en: The scientists found reduction of crop yields by 2050 exceeded 10 % of 2000 levels , substantially decreasing food security , in all cases examined .
zh: 科学家发现到2050年,作物产量的减少超过2000年的10%,大大降低了粮食安全。

en: Several scenarios were considered because of uncertainty of future levels of ozone pollution .
zh: 由于对今后臭氧污染水平的不确定性,考虑了几个方案。

en: They estimated by 2050 , increasing population and changing diet would increase world food needs by 50 percent .
zh: 他们估计到2050年,人口的增加和饮食的改变将增加世界粮食需求的50%。

en: the future of ozone pollution is very different  leading to either offsetting or reinforcing effects  on crops " .
zh: 臭氧污染 的 未来 是 非常 不同 的, 这 将 导致 对 作物 的 影响 的 补偿 或 加强 ” 。

en: By 2050 , undernourishment would increase by either 49 percent or by 27 percent , depending on the scenario .
zh: 到2050年,营养不良将增加49 % 或27 %, 视情况而定。

en: The study focuses on ozone - temperature covariation : ground - level ozone increases with temperatures .
zh: 研究重点是臭氧 - 温度相变: 地层臭氧随着温度的升高.

en: Heald said although temperature and ozone are separately known to impact crop yields , " nobody has looked at these together " .
zh: 海尔德说,尽管温度和臭氧分别影响作物产量, “ 没有人把它们都看成一对 ” 。

en: Depending on region and crops , the yields may be primarily sensitive to ozone - in the case of wheat - or heat - in the case of maize - alone , providing a local estimation of relative benefits of climate change adaptation versus ozone regulation .
zh: 取决于地区和作物,产量可能首先对臭氧具有敏感性,仅在小麦方面,或玉米方面,对热度具有敏感性,从而提供对气候变化适应与臭氧管制的相对利益的局部估计。

en: The U.S. Department of Agriculture notes , " Ground - level ozone causes more damage to plants than all other air pollutants combined " , highlighting the importance of air quality for agriculture .
zh: 美国农业部指出, “ 地下层臭氧对植物造成的破坏比其他空气污染物的总危害要大 ”, 强调了空气质量对农业的重要性.

en: Results of NCLAN studies , published in a paper by AS Heagle in 1989 , show dicot species , such as soybean , cotton , and peanut , lose more yield from ozone than do monocot species such as sorghum , field corn , and winter wheat .
zh: NCLAN研究的结果,在1989年由AS希格尔发表的论文中,显示大豆、棉花和花生等二甲虫种比单甲虫种如大豆、田玉米和冬季小麦损失的产量多。

en: The model does not include the effect of rising carbon dioxide concentration , which has complex and potentially offsetting impacts on global food supply .
zh: 该模型不包括增加二氧化碳浓度的影响,这对全球粮食供应具有复杂的和潜在抵消性影响。

en: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency says some crops may have higher yields with increased levels of carbon dioxide .
zh: 美国环保署说,随着二氧化碳含量的增加,某些作物的产量可能会提高。

en: However , global warming also increases probability of extreme crops - damaging weather events such as floods , droughts , and extreme temperatures .
zh: 然而,全球变暖也增加了极端作物的概率 — — 如洪水、干旱和极端温度等破坏性天气事件。

en: Climate change affects distribution of weeds , pests , and diseases .
zh: 气候变化影响了杂草、害虫和疾病的分布。

en: Heald noted the findings show pollution reduction is also important .
zh: 海尔德指出,这些发现表明减少污染也是重要的。

en: " An air - quality cleanup would improve crop yields
zh: 空气质素的清洁能提高作物产量

en: Ozone is something that we understand the causes of , and the steps that need to be taken to improve air quality . "
zh: 我们了解臭氧的原因,我们需要采取哪些步骤来改善空气质量。

en: As Heald told The Huffington Post , US surface ozone has dropped partly due to the Clean Air Act .
zh: 正如希尔德告诉《哈芬顿邮报》的说法,美国地表臭氧部分由于《清洁空气法案》而下降。

en: " Despite an increase in vehicle miles driven and energy consumption , surface ozone has declined by 25 percent on average across the U.S. from 1980 to 2012
zh: 尽管汽车行驶里程和能源消耗量有所增加,但从1980年到2012年,美国平均地表臭氧量下降了25%

en: However , the future of ozone air quality in the U.S. and around the world will depend on local emissions , the use of pollution control technology , regulations , and air quality policy . "
zh: 然而,美国和世界各地的臭氧空气质量的未来将取决于当地排放、污染控制技术、监管和空气质量政策。

en: The study was supported by the Croucher Foundation , US National Science Foundation , and US National Park Service .
zh: 这项研究得到了克鲁切尔基金会、美国国家科学基金会和美国国家公园管理局的支持。

en: Greek court has ruled that worshippers of the ancient Greek religion may now formally associate and worship at archeological sites .
zh: 希腊法院裁定,古希腊宗教的崇拜者现在可以正式地在考古遗址联合和崇拜。

en: Prior to the ruling , the religion was banned from conducting public worship at archeological sites by the Greek Ministry of Culture .
zh: 在此之前,希腊文化部禁止该宗教在考古遗址进行公众礼拜。

en: The Greek Orthodox Church , a Christian denomination , is extremely critical of worshippers of the ancient deities .
zh: 希腊正教会,一个基督教教派,对古代神圣的崇拜者极为批评。

en: Today , about 100,000 Greeks worship the ancient gods , such as Zeus , Hera , Poseidon , Aphrodite , and Athena .
zh: 如今,大约有100,000名希腊人崇拜古神,如宙斯、赫拉、波西登、阿弗罗迪特和雅典。

en: The Greek Orthodox Church estimates that number is closer to 40,000 .
zh: 希腊正教会估计这个数字接近40万。

en: Many neo - pagan religions , such as Wicca , use aspects of ancient Greek religions in their practice ; Hellenic polytheism instead focuses exclusively on the ancient religions , as far as the fragmentary nature of the surviving source material allows .
zh: 许多新教派, 如维卡, 在他们的实践中使用古希腊宗教的方面;希腊的多神论却只关注古代宗教, 只要存活的来源材料的断片性质允许.

en: Would you say there has to be a negative consequence to the thing you ca n't stop ?
zh: 你认为你不能停止的事情必然会带来负面后果 吗?

en: Somebody can manage to be a teacher .
zh: 有人能成为一名教师。

en: Somebody can manage to be a cop .
zh: 有人能成为警察。

en: Somebody can manage to be the mayor of Toronto .
zh: 有人能成为多伦多市长。

en: And somehow the blowback never hits them .
zh: 不知怎么,回击从来都没有打到他们。

en: Yeah , they 've lost control over use , right ?
zh: 是的, 他们已经失去控制了, 对 吗?

en: Even though they 're managing to sort of stickhandle their way through life .
zh: 尽管他们正设法通过生活来把握自己的路程。

en: Oh , but one of the things I forgot is one of the things is a negative impact on your health as well .
zh: 哦,但我忘记了一件事,就是一件事对你的健康也有负面影响。

en: Well , you can go for a long , long , say , alcoholism .
zh: 嗯, 你可以长时间, 比如, 酗酒.

en: You can go a decade or more before you actually suffer significant health consequences from heavy , heavy alcohol use .
zh: 你可能要经过十年或更长的时间才真正从重度、重度的酒精使用中产生重大健康后果。

en: So what I 'd like to find out by the time this episode is over is whether I 'm addicted to sugar or I just really like it .
zh: 因此,我希望在这一集结束时知道我是否依赖糖果,还是我真的喜欢糖果。

en: Have you lost control over your consumption of sugar ?
zh: 你有没有失去控制你的糖 consumption 吗?

en: I guess I have to define --
zh: 我想我必须定义--

en: Has he ever exhibited any control whatsoever ?
zh: 他有没有表现出任何控制能力?

en: Yeah , I guess I have to define what that means .
zh: 是的,我想我得界定这是什么意思。

en: Do you keep using despite wanting to stop ?
zh: 尽管你想停止使用,你还是继续使用 吗?

en: Then you may have an addiction to sugar .
zh: 那么你可能有糖瘾。

en: My suspicion is true !
zh: 我的怀疑是正确的!

en: So I 've got a list of a few specific addictions that we 're probably covering .
zh: 因此,我有一个关于我们可能正在覆盖的一些特定瘾的清单。

en: Well , one of them we probably wo n't , because I think we 're going to have an episode specifically on that .
zh: 嗯,其中一个我们可能不会,因为我想我们将有一个特别的 Episode 。

en: But drug abuse , of course , is a pattern use of a substance drug in which the user consumes the substance in amounts or with methods which are harmful to themselves or others .
zh: 但药物滥用,当然,是一种药物滥用模式,即使用者在数量上或以有害于自己或他人的方法使用药物。

en: This adds in the harm aspect of it .
zh: 这增加了它的危害性。

en: Sexual addiction is a conceptual model devised in order to provide a scientific explanation for sexual urges , behaviors or thoughts that appear extreme in frequency or feel out of one 's control in terms of being a literal addiction to sexual activity .
zh: 性癖是一种概念模型,旨在提供科学的解释性冲动、行为或思想,这些行为在频率上出现极端,或者在性行为上感觉无法控制。

en: Yeah , it could be just a compulsive thing .
zh: 是的,这可能只是强制性的事情。

en: And again , it 's probably just getting into what do you call addiction .
zh: 再说一遍, 它可能只是进入你称之为“中毒”的领域.

en: This is obviously something that you want and it can be causing problems .
zh: 这显然是你想要的东西,它可能会引起问题。

en: Problem gambling , I think we might have a gambling episode , so I 'm not going to touch too much on this .
zh: 问题赌博,我想我们可能有一场赌博事件,所以我不会太多地讨论这个问题。

en: It probably depends on what you 're gambling , like if you put , you know , one of your kids up or something like that .
zh: 这可能取决于你在赌博什么,比如你把一个孩子放在上面或者那样的东西。

en: And then , of course , video game addiction , a relatively new one , is an excessive or compulsive use of computer games or video games which interferes with a person 's everyday life .
zh: 然后,当然,电子游戏的成瘾,一种相对新颖的成瘾,是过度或强制性的使用电脑游戏或电子游戏,妨碍一个人的日常生活。

en: Video game addiction may present as compulsive game playing , social isolation , mood swings , diminished imagination and hyper focus on in - game achievements to the exclusion of other life events .
zh: 对电子游戏的依赖可能表现为强迫性游戏, 社会孤立,情绪波动, 想象力下降,对游戏中的成就的过度关注,排除其他生命事件.

en: What about , like Facebook and other Internet stuff ?
zh: 还有, 像Facebook和其他互联网的东西 呢?

en: There is also Internet addiction , yeah .
zh: 还有网络上的瘾,是的。

en: In May 2013 , video game addiction was added to the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders in the conditions for further study section as Internet gaming disorder .
zh: 2013年5月,游戏中毒被列入精神疾病的诊断和统计手册,作为互联网游戏障碍的进一步研究的条件。

en: This looks interesting .
zh: 这看起来很有趣。

en: So this is -- this is these are those those trial sports for the Olympics that they 're test - driving but are n't mental sports yet .
zh: 这就是 -- 这就是奥运会的那些测试运动,他们正在测试驾驶,但还没有精神运动。

en: You do n't like sports .
zh: 你不喜欢运动。

en: I understand that .
zh: 我明白了。

en: This is video game addiction . it 's the -- it 's the ballroom dancing of mental disorders , right .
zh: 这就是电子游戏的成瘾,是精神疾病的舞厅舞蹈,对吗?

en: So is there anything on that list that you can get addicted to or anything not on that list that you can get addicted to ?
zh: 那么,在那个名单上有什么东西可以让你变得瘾,或者在那个名单上没有的东西可以让你变得瘾?

en: If you start opening up that definition of addiction to other things .
zh: 如果你开始打开对其他事物的依赖的定义。

en: It 's a reality show , and they talk about all sorts of weird things that people are , quote , addicted to .
zh: 这是一场真人秀,他们谈论着人们对各种怪事的依赖。

en: Girls are eating chalk and yeah you know .
zh: 女孩们正在吃粉末,你知道吗。

en: Which feels to me more like a compulsive disorder rather than an addiction .
zh: 我觉得这是一种强迫性疾病,而不是一种依赖性。

en: Well , these things do shade into one another .
zh: 这些东西互相遮蔽。

en: If you think about addiction as loss of control of use , we can broadly define that in two ways .
zh: 如果你把依赖看作失去使用控制,我们可以从两个方面界定它。

en: So there could be process addictions , which means addiction to a specific behavior such as Internet addiction , pathological gambling , sex addiction .
zh: 因此可能存在过程依赖,即对特定行为的依赖,如网络依赖、病理赌博、性依赖等。

en: And then there would be the substance use disorders such as substance dependance , where you become -- you 've lost control over use of a particular substance .
zh: 然后就会有物质使用障碍,比如物质依赖,你变得--你失去了对特定物质的使用控制。

en: Now , obsessive compulsive disorder is repetitive behaviors that you feel compelled to perform , even though you know they 're irrational .
zh: 现在, obsessive compulsive disorder是你感到被迫进行的重复行为,尽管你知道它们是不合理的。

en: So then the question is , is this person addicted to hand washing ?
zh: 那么问题是, 这个人有手洗瘾 吗?

en: Have they lost control of use over hand washing in the way that an alcoholic has lost control over consumption of alcohol ?
zh: 他们已经失去对手洗的控制,就像酒鬼失去对酒精消费的控制一样?

en: And I mean , there are similarities in terms of the surface behavior , but in terms of the psychology and the neurobiology , there seem to be pretty specific differences .
zh: 我的意思是,表面行为方面存在相似之处,但在心理学和神经生物学方面,似乎存在相当具体的差异。

en: So , for instance , in obsessive compulsive disorder , one of the treatments that 's quite effective would be high dose SSRIs or serotonin reuptake inhibitors , whereas those have no effect at all in classical addiction .
zh: 例如,在专 obsessive compulsive disorder 中,一个非常有效的治疗方法是高剂量 SSRI 或 serotonin再吸收抑制剂,而这些药物在经典的依赖中没有任何效果。

en: So we 're talking about medical quantification .
zh: 所以我们正在谈论医学量化。

en: Yeah , yeah , and you know , neuroimaging looks different in people with OCD versus people with addiction .
zh: 是的,是的,你知道的,神经成像在那些患有CD的人群和那些有瘾的人群中看起来不一样。

en: So they shade together , but there do seem to be differences .
zh: 因此,它们的阴影相连,但似乎存在着差异。

en: As the Western United States burns up with over seventy forest fires in thirteen states and Germany deals with the aftermath of devastating floods , the world 's richest man , not counting Vladimir Putin , rocketed himself up to outer space for ten minutes at a cost of two point five million dollars every 60 seconds .
zh: 随着美国西部在13个州发生70多场森林火灾和德国处理灾难性洪灾的后果,世界最富有的人,不包括普京,每60秒就有两点五百万美元的代价飞往太空十分钟。

en: A Democracy Now ! Segment on Thursday looked at the irony and dangers of billionaires fighting to privatize and monopolize space infrastructure while the Earth burns due to the man made climate catastrophe .
zh: 星期四的“民主现在”部分关注了亿万富翁们为了私有化和垄断空间基础设施而斗争的讽刺和危险,而地球因人类制造的气候灾难而燃烧。

en: As an example of his utter lack of self - awareness , Bezos 's own comments , after returning from his space adventure , admitted that his wealth is created by not only his customers , but his workers .
zh: 作为他的完全缺乏自我意识的一个例子,贝佐斯自己评论说,他从太空冒险回来后,承认他的财富不是由他的顾客创造的,而是由他的工人创造的。

en: This , of course , reminds readers and listeners of the ProPublica story that exposed how little he and the billionaire class pay in taxes .
zh: 当然,这使读者和听众想起了《ProPublica》的故事,它揭示了他和亿万富翁阶层的纳税率。

en: They are all the undeserving recipients of corporate socialism , making their space tours .
zh: 他们都是企业社会主义的无礼的受援者,在太空旅行。

en: I 'm looking at you , Richard Branson .
zh: 我看着你,理查德·布兰森。

en: And so I reluctantly thank the goddess of irony .
zh: 因此,我不愿意感谢讽刺女神。

en: We live in a country where a living wage for all working men and women is somehow not affordable .
zh: 我们 live in a country where a living wage for all working men and women is somehow not affordable 。 我们 live in a country where a living wage for all working men and women is somehow not affordable 。

en: But a man who pays almost nothing in taxes is free to go to outer space at the taxpayers ' expense .
zh: 但纳税几乎没有钱的人可以自由地去太空,以纳税人的开支。

en: You 're on with David McIntosh of the Club for Growth .
zh: 你跟增长俱乐部的David McIntosh在一起。

en: Thank you .
zh: 谢谢你。

en: Mr. McIntosh , my question to you is , how does the space programs by these various millionaire -- billionaires --
zh: 麦克英托什先生,我对你的问题是,这些亿万富翁的太空计划如何进行呢?

en: It shows the failure of trickle down economics upon which you base a lot of your , you know , your stances and everything .
zh: 它显示了你根据你的许多立场和所有事情建立的 trickledown经济的失败。

en: How is -- how is that putting these billions into space instead of improving the conditions of the workers that make these people the richest men on Earth ?
zh: 把这些数十亿人送进太空,而不是改善工人的条件,使这些人成为地球上最富有的人呢?

en: You know , I 'd like a better understanding on , you know , you 're talking about welfare and everything else .
zh: 你知道, 我想了解一下, 你知道, 你在谈论福利和其它所有的事情.

en: Yet at the same token , you ignore these stances where these billionaires are pouring money into -- all this money into space .
zh: 但同样,你却忽略了这些亿万富翁们把钱都注入太空的姿态。

en: The only people who are able to fly with them are also billionaires and millionaires .
zh: 唯一能和他们一起飞行的人也是亿万富翁和百万富翁。

en: Well , first of all , I 'm actually really happy that it 's not a government program where they 're forcing taxpayers to spend the billions of dollars on something like that .
zh: 首先,我真高兴,这不是他们强迫纳税人花费数十亿美元的政府计划。

en: You know , my view , honestly , is if somebody 's been successful in creating a business and making money and the customers have rewarded them , so they 've become a billionaire , if they want to spend it on building a rocket to outer space , that 's their choice .
zh: 你知道,我的观点是,诚实地说,如果有人成功地创立了一家公司,赚了钱,顾客也奖励了他们,所以他们成了亿万富翁,如果他们想花钱建造火箭进入太空,那是他们的选择。

en: If they want to spend it on building mansions , they can do that .
zh: 如果他们想花钱建造公寓,他们可以。

en: I -- I do n't think it 's the right role of government to tell people how to spend their money .
zh: 我认为告诉人们如何花钱是政府的正确作用。

en: David McIntosh , the Club for Growth , can kid himself with his self - assurance , as he did on Washington Journal last Friday , July sixteenth , by believing that the space exploration Bezos partook in was privately funded .
zh: 增长俱乐部的David McIntosh, 可以自以为是地开玩笑, 就像他在7月16日上周五的华盛顿杂志上那样, 相信贝佐斯参加的太空探索是私人资助的.

en: But everyone in my neighborhood pays a higher percentage of their income in taxes than he pays on the beyond exorbitant and exceedingly gratuitous wealth that he lives off of .
zh: 但是,我的邻居的收入比他所付出的超乎寻常和超乎无偿财富还要多。

en: Not to mention , The Hill Online newspaper reported in late May that a US competitiveness bill , then being debated on the Senate floor , included ten billion for Bezos 's own space exploration company , Blue Origin .
zh: 更不用说,《希尔在线》杂志5月底报道,美国竞争性法案,随后在参议院议席上进行辩论,包括了10亿美元用于贝佐斯自己的太空勘探公司蓝源。

en: So we 're expected to forklift over , as a simple dinner fork wo n't cut it , the billions needed for him , again , arguably the richest man on Earth , to acquire more wealth , and as the cherry on top , deliver him one billion more .
zh: 因此,我们预计要把叉子抬上,就像一个简单的餐叉不能切掉它,他需要的数十亿,又一次,可能是地球上最富有的人,以获得更多的财富,而上层的樱桃,将他送上十亿以上。

en: According to the report published by ProPublica last month , the median American household brings in around seventy thousand a year and pays fourteen percent in federal income taxes .
zh: 根据 ProPublica上个月发布的报告,中等美国家庭每年收入约7万英镑,并缴纳联邦收入税的14%。

en: In short , Americans subsidized the fruits of Jeff Bezos ' midlife crisis .
zh: 简言之, 美国人补贴了杰夫·贝佐斯'中期危机的成果.

en: I worry that we are getting closer and closer to the experience of the little people in the sci - fi film Elysium , starring Matt Damon .
zh: 我担心我们越来越接近科幻电影《埃利西亚》中的那些小人物的经历, 主演是马特·达蒙.

en: In the film , the rich , after exploiting the world to the point that it 's practically uninhabitable , have moved on to an artificial world , Elysium that might as well be on our moon .
zh: 在电影中,富人利用世界到实际上是无法居住的地步,转而进入一个人工世界,可能是在我们的月球上。

en: And those that remain on Earth , the rest of us , continue working in what could realistically be a future Amazon warehouse .
zh: 而那些留在地球上的人,我们其余的人,将继续在现实中成为未来的亚马逊仓库中工作。

en: Later in the Democracy Now ! segment , the broadcast aired parts of an MSNBC interview with Bezos , who , in completely out of touch fashion , adamantly expressed that we should preserve our , quote , beautiful gem , end quote , also known as Earth , by transporting polluting industries to outer space , something he acknowledged would take , quote , decades to achieve , end quote .
zh: 在晚些时候的民主现在!段中,广播播放了 MSNBC与贝佐斯的采访部分,贝佐斯在完全脱离触摸时尚时,坚决表示我们应该保存我们的,引用,美丽的宝石,最后引用,也被称为地球,通过运输污染产业到太空,他承认将需要,引用,数十年才能实现,最后引用。

en: The other thing about the witch , um , is that she 's doing that --
zh: 那个巫婆的另一个问题是她正在做那件事--

en: And again , it 's got that Dreamworks vibe , she 's -- a lot of anachronistic --
zh: 再说一遍, 它有梦境的活力, 她 -- 非常过时 --

en: I mean , there 's later where it 's like it 's like , oh , it 's , yeah , it 's funny .
zh: 我的意思是, 后来有这样的地方, 像是, 哦, 是的, 是的, 很有趣.

en: But the whole pour in vial three if you 'd like to hear the the -- it 's like it 's so -- these anachronistic jokes that Pixar normally does n't really do , they do n't do that sort of , oh it 's it 's like that but it 's like voicemail .
zh: 但是,如果你想听这三瓶瓶的 -- 就好像是这样 -- 这些过时的笑话 Pixar通常不会真的做,他们不会做那种,哦,就是这样,但像语音邮件一样。

en: It 's like our modern thing but in a medieval way .
zh: 它就像我们现代的东西,但以中世纪的方式。

en: Yeah , it 's , it 's you know because you 've seen the Shrek movies , right , with the Starbucks jokes and things .
zh: 是的,是的,你知道的,因为你看过史瑞克电影,是的,还有星巴克的笑话和其它事情。

en: I ’m starting to become as baffled as Mike was .
zh: 我开始像迈克一样困惑。

en: Now I 'm starting to , I 'm starting to feel it .
zh: 现在我开始了,我开始感觉到了。

en: Like now I 'm getting really confused .
zh: 就像现在我变得非常困惑了。

en: What are you doing movie ?
zh: 你在做什么电影?

en: And to , he 's lost his leg , and he 's got ta , by God , get his revenge on that bear .
zh: 然后,他失去了腿,他得到了上帝的报复。

en: Yeah , dad hates bears , okay .
zh: 是的,爸爸讨厌熊。

en: But he does n’t spend a bunch of time looking for the bear .
zh: 但是他没花太多时间去寻找熊。

en: So it 's sort of like a half - assed Ahab thing , but we , we 're supposed to sympathize with the dad , but Ahab is , like , clearly not a model of behavior that you should follow .
zh: 所以,这有点像阿哈布的一半,但我们,我们应该同情父亲,但阿哈布显然不是你应该遵循的行为模式。

en: Yeah and he 's not following it .
zh: 是的,他不跟随它。

en: So maybe , I mean , maybe that 's a plot point that also needs to be there .
zh: 所以也许,我的意思是,也许那是一个需要存在的地方。

en: It 's like , yeah , you 've been -- they do say you 've been telling the bear because everyone knows the bear story , the fucking bear story and it ate your leg .
zh: 就像,是的,你曾经--他们确实说你曾经告诉熊,因为每个人都知道熊的故事,那个狗屁的熊的故事,它吃了你的腿。

en: With all this , like , you know , macho dick waving going on with the testosterone crowd , it 's like , maybe it 's like , well , you ever think about maybe going and killing that bear , Mr. King tough guy ?
zh: 这一切, 就像, 你知道, 雄性小家伙和睾丸类人群一起挥舞, 就像, 也许就像, 嗯, 你有没有想过去杀死那只熊, 金先生, tough guy?

en: Yeah , that 's what I 'll do .
zh: 是的, 我会这么做的.

en: I 'll go kill that bear .
zh: 我要去杀那只熊。

en: It 's like , yeah , let 's go kill that bear .
zh: 就像, 是的, 我们去杀那只熊吧.

en: Do n't you want to question my manhood ?
zh: 你难道不想质疑我的男子气 吗?

en: Let 's go .
zh: 让我们走吧。

en: Let 's go kill that bear .
zh: 我们去杀那只熊吧。

en: Also the whole -- that 's another one of the fucking oddly cartoony Chuck Jonesy things is when the kids start waving around the chicken on a stick .
zh: 还有整个 -- 那是另一个奇怪的奇特漫画中 Chuck Jonesy 的东西,是孩子们开始用棍子摇动鸡的时候。

en: And everyone 's like " Yep , that 's a bear " .
zh: 每个人都像 “ 是的, 那是一只熊 ”.

en: Like , yeah , you got a lot of what got a lot of a lot of fear from these this crowd .
zh: 就像, 是的, 你得到的太多了,从这些人群中得到的太多的恐惧。

en: That 's it 's -- and bear in mind the , the Chuck Jonesy thing , I call that out not because fuck that style of comedy .
zh: 这就是 -- 记住, 恰克·琼斯的事, 我叫它不是因为搞那种喜剧风格的.

en: I call that out because when you do that style of comedy , that should be the style of comedy for the whole thing .
zh: 我这样说是因为当你做那种喜剧时,那应该是整个喜剧的风格。

en: Yeah , you can have stakes and real stuff going on in there .
zh: 是的,你可以有赌注和真正的事情在里面发生。

en: As long as that 's the agreed upon tone .
zh: 只要那是商定的调子。

en: You 're not going to get me to buy your Jeopardy later .
zh: 你不会叫我以后买你的宝马。

en: If this is the movie you 're telling me this is .
zh: 这是你告诉我的电影。

en: But you , just , this movie 's all over the place and it 's , do you , here 's the question .
zh: 但是你,只是,这个电影到处都是,这是,你,这是问题。

en: Do you think this is possibly the like you do not understand how good this movie is ?
zh: 你觉得这可能就是你不明白这部电影有多好吗?

en: We came back from this whole other thing like half saved version of the movie .
zh: 我们从这整个其他东西回来了,像是电影的一半保存版本。

en: Or do you think there was a fully realized other story that someone did n't like ?
zh: 或者你认为有人不喜欢一个完全了解的其他故事吗?

en: There is some insights on this that I 've read about .
zh: 我读过关于这方面的一些洞察。

en: Well , maybe we should talk about that , because what I know or you know and you 've read much more in depth about it than I have , because all I know is that apparently .
zh: 嗯,也许我们应该谈谈,因为我知道或者你知道,你已经比我更深入地读过,因为我所知道的只是表面上。

en: You would think that that Brenda Chapman would would just be like , " Oh , yeah , they totally screwed it up . I had a whole thing going " .
zh: 你会认为布兰达·查普曼会说, “ 哦, 是的, 他们完全搞砸了. 我整个事情都在进行 ” 。

en: Apparently she came out and was like , " Yeah , that 's basically what I was going to do with it " .
zh: 显然她出来说, “ 是的, 这基本上是我打算用它做的事 ”.

en: She said her vision was communicated .
zh: 她说她的视觉被传达了。

en: I do n't have any , I do n't know firsthand .
zh: 我没有,我没有亲身了解。

en: And I 'm not sure that I know second hand because this is all Internet stuff .
zh: 而且我不确定我是否知道二手车,因为这都是网上的东西。

en: But around the time this was happening , that switch was happening and they swapped Brenda with , I forget the guy 's name that they brought in .
zh: 但就在这时,他们换了布伦达,我忘记了他们带进来的那个家伙的名字。

en: That 's right .
zh: 没错。

en: Who was like , he was , he was , he was involved from the beginning .
zh: 他从一开始就参与了。

en: They were like , okay , we you know , it 's like a line of succession .
zh: 他们说, 好吧, 你知道, 就像一个连续线一样.

en: It 's like , okay , we just lost the general .
zh: 就好像,我们刚刚输了将军。

en: So you just got promoted .
zh: 你刚被提升了。

en: You 're directing now .
zh: 你现在正在执导。

en: Well , and Brenda Chapman 's been around forever .
zh: 嗯, 布伦达·查普曼一直到这儿。

en: They all seem to know her name and they all seem to be like , " Oh , she was great " .
zh: 他们都好像知道她的名字,他们都好像说, “ 哦, 她真是太棒了 ”.

en: And she worked on Prince of Egypt and she worked on this and Beauty and the Beast and she 's been around forever .
zh: 她和埃及王子一起工作,她和美兽一起工作,她一直都在身边。

en: She 's , she knows her shit .
zh: 她是,她知道她妈的。

en: So it 's not like she ended up getting this far in a movie at Pixar by some sort of an accident or oversight .
zh: 因此,她不是由于某种意外或过失而最终在 Pixar 的电影中取得如此大的成就。

en: It 's like , no , she was going to make this movie .
zh: 好像,她打算拍这部电影。

en: But at the time that switch happened , I found myself , one way or another -- I think someone I know in Facebook had linked to some post , but there 's a blog , there 's a bunch of blogs for like animation nerds , like people who are animators and like blogs for news about the animation industry and shit like that .
zh: 但那个转变发生的时候,我发现自己,不知怎么了,我想我在Facebook上认识的某个人已经链接到某个帖子,但有博客,有博客,有博客专门为动画业的迷人,像那些是动画师的人们,还有博客专门为动画业的新闻和类似的东西。

en: Wayne has written with comedy legend Judd Apatow , penned lines for major awards shows , and was the head monologue writer for Jimmy Fallon when Fallon was doing Late Night .
zh: 韦恩与喜剧传奇人物朱德·阿帕托(Jud Apatow)共同创作了剧本,为主要奖项节目撰写了歌词,并当费伦在晚间演出时担任吉米·费伦的独白编剧。

en: So I remember , like a couple of months into the Fallon job , which was one of the greatest jobs I 've had in my life , one of the greatest jobs you can have is running a monologue room for late night thing .
zh: 因此,我记得,在法伦工作了几个月后,这是我一生中最伟大的工作之一,你能做的最伟大的工作之一就是为晚间的事情开一个独白室。

en: Even like three months in , I was like , oh , this feels like school .
zh: 即使在三个月里,我还是像,哦,这感觉像学校。

en: It feels like you have to get up and go to school .
zh: 感觉你得起来去上学。

en: It was like a workday hours .
zh: 就像一天的工作时间。

en: I do n't really love getting up in the morning .
zh: 我真不喜欢早晨起床。

en: Anne and Wayne both told me that while an episode of TV is usually credited to 1 or 2 writers , everything always starts with a group of smart , funny people sitting around a table .
zh: 安妮和韦恩都告诉我,虽然电视节目通常被归功于1或2名作家,但每件事总是由一群聪明、有趣的人坐在桌旁开始。

en: One year I had like my own little off- , like a little just office , like very -- as small as you could .
zh: 一年,我有一个自己的小办公室, 就像一个小办公室, 很小, 尽可能小.

en: And then when we moved to a different location , it was -- I was part of like the production team , like the person that was doing the bookings was three desks away .
zh: 当我们搬到另一个地方时,我就像制作团队的一部分,就像做订货的人离三张桌子远。

en: It feels a lot like hanging out with a group of friends and just finding what you genuinely like talking about , what you find funny about certain things .
zh: 感觉就像和一群朋友聚在一起,发现你真正喜欢谈论什么,觉得某些事情有趣的事情。

en: Like you come up with your own vocabulary for how to discuss ideas .
zh: 比如,你来找自己的词汇来讨论想法。

en: It just sort of becomes this little um I guess summer camp type thing where it 's like insular and it 's a , it 's a community .
zh: 它只是成为一个小,我想夏天的营地类型的东西,它就像绝缘体,它是一个社区。

en: And I mean I feel like writers room , and I 've spoken to people about that , all reflect the show runner and what he or she wants out of that .
zh: 我的意思是,我感觉像作家的房间,我已经和人们谈过,所有都反映了节目主持人和他或她想要得到的。

en: There 's something called a writer 's packet where , as comedian or writer they put down , they do sample monologue jokes , you do sample sketch jokes .
zh: 有一种叫做编剧包的东西,作为喜剧演员或编剧他们写下来,他们做样本的独白笑话,你做样本的草图笑话。

en: I never have had a packet .
zh: 我从来没带过包裹。

en: Lorne Michaels told Jimmy he 's like , I want you to go out on the road , back on the road and do some standup .
zh: 罗恩·迈克尔斯告诉吉米,他想让你出去,回到路上做一些 standup。

en: So Jimmy contacted me and was like , look , I got to go out on the road .
zh: 于是吉米联系我,说,看,我得开路了。

en: I want to get my chops back up .
zh: 我想把我的裤子拿回来。

en: Lorne wants me to cuz he sees me in the audience interacting .
zh: 洛恩想让我来,因为他看见我在观众的互动中。

en: I want to like , do crowd work and stuff .
zh: 我想喜欢,做群众工作等。

en: Can I open for you on the road ?
zh: 我能在路上给你开门 吗?

en: And then during the day we 'll come up with a new act together .
zh: 然后在白天我们一起想出一个新动作。

en: And we wrote together .
zh: 我们一起写了。

en: Like during the day we were just two friends , usually hanging out , trying to make each other laugh .
zh: 像白天,我们只是两个朋友,经常在一起,互相逗笑。

en: I remember there was one bit , I do n't remember the specifics of it , but it was a a GPS joke in the car thing , like the different voices that were talking to you .
zh: 我记得有一点,我记不起它的具体细节,但是它是在汽车里的一个GPS玩笑,像那些与你说话的不同的声音一样。

en: And he would do like the British voice , you know , he could do all of those voices and stuff .
zh: 他喜欢英国的声音,你知道,他能做所有那些声音和其它事情。

en: So we we worked on that .
zh: 所以我们就这么做了。

en: And by the time I was done with it , there was like 7 or 8 great little punchlines , like , oh , this is great .
zh: 到我完成的时候,有7个或8个好小拳头,像是,哦,这太棒了。

en: Like he re- I really fleshed it out .
zh: 像他那样,我真把它弄得精致了。

en: Wayne 's experience was definitely uncommon .
zh: 韦恩的经历很罕见。

en: Most people do n't just get asked by a show 's star to run their writers ' room .
zh: 大多数人并不只是被一个节目明星要求经营他们的作家室。

en: She submitted writing samples .
zh: 她提交了书面样本。

en: If you know anything about improv , you 're familiar with the concept of " Yes , And " .
zh: 如果你知道任何改进的话, 你已经熟悉“ 是的 、 是的 ”的概念了.

en: It 's about creating forward momentum with your collaborator , taking whatever the other performer says and building upon it , always adding information to the original idea in a collaborative spirit .
zh: 它是与你的合作者一起创造前进的势头,采取其他表演者所说的任何东西并建立在它上,总是在合作精神中添加信息到原始的想法。

en: But in order to earn the ability to trust and try out new ideas with a group of other people , you 've got to be willing to also maybe look like an idiot from time to time .
zh: 但是为了获得信任和与一群其他人尝试新的想法的能力,你必须愿意偶尔看起来像个傻瓜。

en: Putting , putting something out there , getting it smashed down in front of everyone , and then immediately , like having to jump back up and like , do it again .
zh: 把东西放出来,让它在所有人面前摔倒,然后立刻,像要跳起来一样,再做一遍。

en: I think that something that improv and sketch helps with , or at least has helped me with is depersonalizing your connection to whatever is making you laugh at that time because you reali- I 've bombed a thousand times and and it 's sort of my favorite thing is when you 're like , I 'm certain this is hilarious .
zh: 我认为 impro 和 sketch 的帮助,或者至少帮助我了,就是使你与任何事情的联系脱人性,因为你当时真的笑了,我已经轰炸了一千次,我最喜欢的是当你这样,我肯定这很有趣。

en: And then and then the audience is like , I 'm certain this is nothing .
zh: 然后观众就好像,我肯定这没什么。

en: And you just double down for that performance of it because it 's hilarious that your mind thought something was , you know , you have to like be sort of reflective in moments like that of like , okay , yeah , alright , that 's fine .
zh: 而且你只是 double down 这个表演的,因为你脑子里想的东西很有趣,你知道,你必须喜欢在像那样的时刻进行反思,好,是的,好吧,没关系。

en: And just drop it and continue .
zh: 然后放下,继续。

en: But also , if you take every , um , every flop joke seriously , you 're going to have a bad day , you know , and it 's more just like a focus on the discussion at the time and what can help move an idea forward or move a certain train of thought forward rather than how can I say the funniest thing right now .
zh: 但是,如果你认真对待每一个小笑话,你会有一个坏的一天,你知道,这更像是集中讨论那个时候的讨论,什么能帮助把一个想法推向前去,或者把某种思想推向前去,而不是我怎么说现在最有趣的事情。

en: It 's more like , what is it that we 're really discussing at the heart of it and how do we make that come to the forefront even more than it is now .
zh: 它更像是,我们真正讨论的是什么在它的中心和我们如何使它比现在更突出。

en: WrestleMania happened , Raw happened , Smackdown happened , everything fucking happened .
zh: WrestleMania发生了, Raw发生了, Smackdown发生了,所有的事情发生。

en: Holy shit , there is so much to talk about this week , and we ’re going to cover it all , the best we can .
zh: 天哪,这个星期有很多事情要谈,我们打算把所有事情都包括在脑海里,尽我们所能。

en: I ’m your host as always , Dave , and I am joined by Alex .
zh: 我是你的主人,戴夫,我是亚历克斯的。

en: We were supposed to have word from Carl .
zh: 我们本来应该得到卡尔的消息。

en: We do n’t know where he is , so I ’ll just take that as a – he ’s one of the people that is cutting his wrists because the Undertaker ’s career is over !
zh: 我们不知道他在哪里,所以我将把它当作一个 — 他是那些正在切手的人之一,因为这个承办商的事业已经结束!

en: Those of you who take offense to that , fuck off and –
zh: 你们中那些对此冒犯的人,滚蛋,然后...

en: What did , uh , what ’s his name – what did , uh , our , our , wh- , the one that always is dressed up like Undertaker on Facebook ?
zh: 他叫什么?他叫什么?他叫什么?他叫什么?他叫什么?

en: Yeah , he did the exact same thing , he folded his clothes and put ’em on or something .
zh: 是的,他做了同样的事情,他把衣服折叠起来穿上或者什么。

en: Yeah , I thought I saw that picture , what does it look like , what is he – what is he doing ?
zh: 是的, 我想我看见了那张照片, 它是什么样子, 他干什么?

en: I ’m ignoring anybody who is taking this retirement personally and acting like this is the end of the fucking world .
zh: 我不理会任何人,谁会亲自接受退休并这样行事,这简直是世界末日。

en: Um , I ’m gon na say this right now , and I ’m gon na say it again when we get to the match – I ’m glad it ’s over .
zh: 嗯,我马上就这么说,我们到比赛时再说一遍,很高兴比赛结束了。

en: And I know people that are getting offended by that .
zh: 我知道有人会因为这而生气。

en: I ’m glad it ’s over .
zh: 我很高兴它结束了。

en: I mean , how many days are in a year ?
zh: 我的意思是,一年里有多少天?

en: 365 days , so he was there one out of – c’m on .
zh: 365天,所以他在那儿有一个 out of – c’m on。

en: He made two appearances .
zh: 他出场了两次。

en: I mean , I mean , OK , think about it like this : at Wrestlemania 31 he was there once the whole year , cause he was only there the day of Wrestlemania .
zh: 我是说, 我是说, 好吧, 这样想想: 在摔角运动会31年,他一年一来,因为他只是在摔角运动会的日子。

en: So that ’s one day of the year that you watched him , that year .
zh: 那一天是你看着他的那一年。

en: Are you really missing that much of wrestling by not having Undertaker there ?
zh: 你真的错过了那么多的摔跤,因为没有那个承办者呢?

en: I mean , come on .
zh: 我是说,来吧。

en: Yeah , and he ’ll be mine as well , but there does come a time when you have to go “ look , it ’s over ” .
zh: 是的, 他也是我的, 但有的时候你得去 “ 看, 已经结束了 ” 。

en: I mean the guy – the guy – the guy ca n’t wrestle forever .
zh: 我的意思是,那个人,那个人,那个人不会永远摔跤。

en: I mean he ’s – he was , 53 ?
zh: 我的意思是,他53岁?

en: Yeah , when we get to that match I ’m gon na be so critical on it .
zh: 是的,当我们到达那场比赛时,我就会对它非常敏感。

en: And I know people are gon na be pissed off at me .
zh: 我知道人们很讨厌我。

en: And I do n’t care , I ’m gon na call it like I see it , the rose colored glasses are off , the nostalgia is gone .
zh: 我也不在乎,我快要像我所看到的那样称呼它,那朵玫瑰色的眼镜已经脱掉了,怀念已经消失了。

en: Stop wanting the fucking 90s back , because the 90s are dead , get the fuck over it .
zh: 别再想回 90-年代了,因为 90-年代已经死了,别再想了。

en: You people and your fucking 90s nostalgia , stop it .
zh: 你们和你们的90年代怀念,别这样。

en: Let the 90s fucking die .
zh: 让90年代的家伙死去吧。

en: Let it fucking die , please , just stop .
zh: 让它死吧, 求你, 停下来.

en: Stop .
zh: 停止。

en: Um , it was – like , I do n’t even remember – well , let me see .
zh: 嗯,那是,我甚至记不起,嗯,让我看看。

en: I forgot to mention , I guess I should mention this now .
zh: 我忘了提及,我想现在应该提及这一点。

en: This is actually not from this week but , let me see .
zh: 这实际上不是这个星期的,但让我看看。

en: When was this ?
zh: 这是什么时候的?

en: Let me look at the calendar real quick on the computer .
zh: 让我在电脑上快速地看一下日历。

en: This would have been … not last week , but the week – no , not last week , not the week before that , but the week before that , on March 25th was my 29th birthday .
zh: 这是...不是上星期,而是上星期——不,不是上星期,不是前一周,而是前一周,在3月25日是我29岁生日。

en: And you ’re just now letting us know ?
zh: 你现在才告诉我们呢?

en: Well I belie- I think I was wished happy birthday by all of you on Facebook , so , that ’s fine .
zh: 嗯,我想我被你们在Facebook上祝贺生日快乐,所以,没关系。

en: But I did n’t – but I do n’t think we ’ve had a show since , cause we – cause we – cause we missed so many shows in a row .
zh: 但我没有 — — 但我认为我们没有 since 的演出,因为我们 — — 因为我们错过了一连串的演出。

en: But uh , yeah , I put a video up on YouTube .
zh: 但是, 是的, 我把视频上传到YouTube上.

en: We all drank a whole lot ta shit .
zh: 我们都喝了一大堆垃圾。

en: Um , I did n’t get drunk at all despite literally shotgunning I think six or seven shots of … was it tequila ? .. yeah , I think it was like really really decent tequila , in a row .
zh: 嗯,我一点也不喝醉了,虽然我实际上是开枪的,我想是六、七枪的...是泰奎拉吗?.是的,我想是像一连串的真正不错的泰奎拉。

en: I did n’t feel anything , cause I do n’t know that ’s just how I am .
zh: 我什么都感觉不到,因为我不知道自己就是这样。

en: But yeah , that ’s up there on my YouTube channel , not that anybody ever goes on it .
zh: 但是,是的,那是在我的YouTube频道上,不是有人去过它。

en: So uh , this week I do n’t know , they added more DLC , the only DLC for King of Fighters .
zh: 因此,这个星期我不知道,他们增加了更多的DLC,这是战斗王的唯一DLC。

en: Did you say you liked Rock Howard ?
zh: 你说你喜欢洛克·霍华德吗?

en: I forget .
zh: 我忘了。

en: Um I think he ’s cool .
zh: 我想他很酷。

en: Yeah , I know .
zh: 是的,我知道。

en: And I ’m decent with Kim but I ’m OK with Rock .
zh: 我和金很合情,但我和洛克很合情。

en: No , I know who Rugal is .
zh: 不,我知道鲁加尔是谁。

en: It is my special pleasure to address the fifty - ninth session of the General Assembly of the United Nations .
zh: 我特别高兴地向联合国大会第五十九届会议发言。

en: This universal forum has enabled the peoples of the world to coordinate and harmonize their efforts in preserving peace and security , in achieving prosperity and upholding the values of human civilization .
zh: 这个世界性论坛使世界各国人民能够协调和协调维护和平与安全、实现繁荣和维护人类文明的价值的努力。

en: I would like to congratulate you , Mr. President , on being elected to preside over this august body and to express my confidence in your successful leadership .
zh: 主席先生,我谨祝贺你当选为本 august 机构的主席,并向你成功领导表示信心。

en: I would also like , on behalf of Albania , to convey to the Secretary - General our highest appreciation for his leading contribution to the fulfilment of the historical mission of the United Nations and to the aspirations of our peoples for a better world in which only peace , democracy and economic prosperity reign .
zh: 我 还 谨 代表 阿尔巴尼亚 向 秘书长 表示 高度 赞赏, 他 为 实现 联合国 的 历史 使命 和 我们 各国 人民 对 和平 、 民主 和 经济 繁荣 的 更 美好 世界 的 愿望 所作 的 领导 贡献 。

en: Only a few months ago , a historic event vitalized the dream of a more united and stronger Europe .
zh: 仅仅几个月前,一个历史性事件使更团结更强的欧洲的梦想得以实现。

en: Ten European countries , sharing a common aspiration for integration , were admitted into the European Union .
zh: 共有十个共同愿望的欧洲国家加入欧盟。

en: The Albanian Government and society are engaged in an all - round European integration process , and they are carrying out necessary reforms with the necessary political will and drive .
zh: 阿尔巴尼亚政府和社会正参与全面 的欧洲一体化进程,并以必要的政治意愿和动力进行必要的改革。

en: Albania is working to strengthen the democratic institutions and capacities of its central and local government with a view to bringing its legislation and conditions into line with European Union standards , progressively achieving concrete and measurable results , as previously defined .
zh: 阿尔巴尼亚正努力加强其中央和地方政府的民主机构和能力,以期使其立法和条件符合欧洲联盟标准,逐步取得前述的具体和可衡量的结果。

en: Determined to make our contribution to regional and global security , the Albanian Government considers the country 's integration into NATO to be one of its major objectives .
zh: 阿尔巴尼亚政府决心为区域和全球安全作出贡献,认为该国加入北约是其主要目标之一。

en: The NATO Istanbul Summit last June commended the progress made by my country in this regard and encouraged the deepening of reforms .
zh: 去年6月的北约伊斯坦布尔首脑会议赞扬我国在这方面取得的进展,并鼓励深化改革。

en: It welcomed Albania 's contribution to regional stability and cooperation and committed to assess our further progress at the next NATO summit , which would hopefully mark the start of negotiations for our full membership in the alliance .
zh: 安理会欢迎阿尔巴尼亚对区域稳定和合作作出的贡献,并承诺在下一届北约首脑会议上评估我们的进一步进展,希望这标志着我们全面加入北约的谈判的开始。

en: We believe that the commitments set up in the framework of the Adriatic Charter are also contributing to meet NATO standards , to the benefit of regional stability and security .
zh: 我们 认为, 《 亚得里亚海 宪章 》 所 规定 的 承诺 也 有助于 实现 北约 标准, 有利于 区域 稳定 和 安全 。

en: The Government of the Republic of Albania will continue to constantly demonstrate its commitment to a full implementation of the standards enshrined in the United Nations and Council of Europe conventions , as well as the relevant documents of regional organizations , such as the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe , in which we are playing a very active role .
zh: 阿尔巴尼亚 共和国 政府 将 继续 不断 表明 致力于 充分 执行 《 联合国 和 欧洲 理事会 公约 》 所载 的 标准, 以及 我们 正在 发挥 非常 积极 的 作用 的 区域 组织 的 有关 文件, 例如 欧洲 安全 和 合作 组织 。

en: We will continue to do so in the future as well .
zh: 我们将继续这样做。

en: By adopting contemporary legislation and by becoming a party to other recently adopted international instruments on human rights , Albania has associated itself with countries that are enforcing a number of national strategies and programmes focusing on specific population groups , especially women , children , persons in need and minorities , among others .
zh: 阿尔巴尼亚通过当代立法,并成为最近通过的其他国际人权文书的缔约国,并与执行一些国家战略和方案的国家联系起来,这些国家主要针对特定人口群体,特别是妇女、儿童、需要者和少数群体。

en: In recent years , the Albanian Government has started to periodically submit reports to the committees of the six main United Nations human rights treaties and is taking their recommendations into serious consideration .
zh: 近年来,阿尔巴尼亚政府开始定期向联合国六项主要人权条约委员会提交报告,并认真考虑它们的建议。

en: It is our belief that these international mechanisms play a significant and important role as guardians of the common human values we have together adopted .
zh: 我们 认为, 这些 国际 机制 作为 我们 共同 通过 的 共同 人类 价值观 的 守护者 发挥 了 重要 和 重要 的 作用 。

en: Albania , as one of the 191 signatory countries of the Millennium Declaration , remains fully committed to implementation of the Millennium Development Goals , which have been properly reflected in a national strategy for social and economic development .
zh: 阿尔巴尼亚 作为 《 千年 宣言 》 的 191 个 签署国 之一, 仍然 充分 致力于 执行 《 千年 发展 目标 》, 这些 目标 已 在 国家 社会 和 经济 发展 战略 中 得到 适当 反映 。

en: The pattern of our sustained economic growth , which is at 6 to 7 per cent for the seventh consecutive year , is a good support base for the whole society to maintain higher standards of respect for human rights and to fight poverty and crime .
zh: 我们持续增长的模式,在连续七年的增长率为6%至7%,是整个社会保持高标准的尊重人权和打击贫困和犯罪的良好支持基础。

en: I would like to take this opportunity to thank the United Nations specialized agencies for their valuable assistance in support of the implementation of these objectives nationwide and on a central and local level .
zh: 我 谨 借此 机会 感谢 联合国 各 专门机构 在 全国 和 中央 和 地方 一 级 为 实现 这些 目标 提供 宝贵 的 支助 。

en: The Albanian Government is pleased to note that an ever - healthier climate of confidence and relations of bilateral and multilateral cooperation are prevailing in the South - Eastern European region .
zh: 阿尔巴尼亚 政府 高兴 地 注意 到 南欧 地区 的 信任 气氛 和 双边 和 多边 合作 关系 日益 健康 。

en: The countries of the region are fully engaged in a process that will lead us clearly toward Euro - Atlantic integration and at the same time continually remove us from the extremist tendencies that caused a number of conflicts in the last decade .
zh: 该区域各国正全力参与一个进程,它将使我们明确地走向欧洲-大西洋一体化,同时不断使我们脱离过去十年造成许多冲突的极端主义倾向。

en: The regional policy of my Government is guided by the motto : ' the more integrated in the region , the more integrated in Europe . '
zh: 我国 政府 的 区域 政策 是 以 “ 区域 的 一体化, 欧洲 的 一体化 ” 为 指导 。

en: In implementing this policy , Albania is cooperating as never before with all the countries of the region by making borders less relevant , opening up to one regional market the implementation of free trade agreements and free movement corridors , and stimulating foreign direct investment .
zh: 在执行这项政策时,阿尔巴尼亚与该区域所有国家进行前所未有的合作,使边界不再具有重要意义,为一个区域市场开放实施自由贸易协定和自由流动走廊,并刺激外国直接投资。

en: We are especially cooperating with the common fight against organized crime and all kinds of illegal trafficking .
zh: 我们尤其在共同打击有组织犯罪和各种非法贩运方面进行合作。

en: In the meantime , Albania is reinforcing its border management and control , guided by the European Union and NATO standards .
zh: 与此同时,阿尔巴尼亚正在加强其边境管理和控制,以欧洲联盟和北约标准为指导。

en: My country will hold general parliamentary elections by the middle of next year .
zh: 我国将于明年中期举行全国议会选举。

en: We are committed to doing all that is required to ensure that the election process is fully compatible with international standards for free and fair elections .
zh: 我们承诺尽一切努力确保选举进程符合国际自由公正选举标准。

en: To that end , we are committed to continuing to work with relevant specialized institutions on elections by fully implementing especially OSCE / Office for Democratic Institutions and Human Rights  recommendations .
zh: 为此 目的, 我们 承诺 继续 同 有关 专门机构 就 选举 进行 合作, 并 充分 执行 特别是 欧安组织 / 民主 机构 和 人权 事务 厅 的 建议 。

en: In the context of strengthening regional cooperation , my country is committed to a more enhanced partnership with all regional organizations and initiatives that serve the promotion of good neighbourly relations ; the strengthening of regional peace , security and stability ; ensuring political support for integration into Euro - Atlantic structures , and attracting financing for national and regional projects in priority fields such as energy , transportation and telecommunications .
zh: 在 加强 区域 合作 的 范围 内, 我国 致力于 与 所有 促进 睦邻 关系 的 区域 组织 和 倡议 加强 伙伴 关系 ; 加强 区域 和平 、 安全 和 稳定 ; 确保 欧洲 - 大西洋 结构 的 一体化 的 政治 支持 ; 吸引 国家 和 区域 项目 的 资金, 例如 能源 、 运输 和 电信 等 优先 领域 。

en: On its path towards European integration , the South - East European region is still facing pending challenges , such as the future of Kosovo .
zh: 在走向欧洲一体化的道路上, 东南欧地区仍然面临着悬而未决的挑战, 例如科索沃的未来.
