en: Albania greatly appreciates the recent democratic and integration developments in Kosovo , thanks to the efforts of the respective peoples and the partnership of its self - governing institutions with the United Nations Interim Administration Mission in Kosovo  .
zh: 阿尔巴尼亚 非常 赞赏 科索沃 最近 的 民主 和 一体化 发展, 感谢 各 人民 的 努力 和 其 自治机构 与 联合国 驻 科索沃 临时 行政团 的 伙伴 关系 。

en: Allow me at this point to congratulate Mr. Soren Jessen - Petersen , Special Representative for Kosovo of the United Nations Secretary - General , in assuming this very important duty .
zh: 请允许我在此向联合国秘书长科索沃特别代表索伦·杰森-彼得森先生表示祝贺,他承担了这项非常重要的职责。

en: This year has once again confirmed the importance of the United Nations as the truly indispensable multilateral forum for addressing today ’s global problems .
zh: 今年再次证实了联合国作为解决当今全球问题的真正不可缺少的多边论坛的重要性。

en: The humanitarian crisis in the Horn of Africa , ecological disasters such as Fukushima , political developments like the Arab Spring and terrorist attacks such as the assault on the United Nations building in Abuja last August require concerted action by the United Nations and its Member States .
zh: 非洲之角的人道主义危机、诸如福島这样的生态灾害、阿拉伯之春这样的政治发展以及去年8月袭击阿布贾联合国大楼的恐怖袭击等需要联合国及其会员国采取一致行动。

en: Ten years after 9/11 , joint action in the fight against terrorism continues to remain central on the multilateral agenda .
zh: 九一一事件发生十年后,打击恐怖主义的联合行动仍然是多边议程的中心。

en: In the past nine months , we have witnessed momentous changes in the Arab world that nobody expected when we met one year ago .
zh: 在过去的九个月中,我们目睹了阿拉伯世界的巨大变化。

en: Pressure for change is driven by the wish of women and men to choose their own fate and to improve their chances for a better life .
zh: 改变的压力是由妇女和男性选择自己的命运和改善他们更好的生活的机会所驱动的。

en: These are legitimate demands .
zh: 这些要求是正当的。

en: An overwhelming number of young people were at the forefront of this enormous tide , which started in Tunisia and Egypt .
zh: 在突尼斯和埃及开始的这场大潮中,绝大多数年轻人处于领先地位。

en: We should pay tribute to their courage .
zh: 我们应该赞扬他们的勇气。

en: In Libya , thousands lost their lives in the struggle for freedom and democracy .
zh: 在利比亚,数千人在争取自由和民主的斗争中丧生。

en: In Syria , and to some extent in Yemen , the suppression is ongoing .
zh: 在叙利亚和某种程度上在也门,镇压正在进行。

en: Austria strongly condemns the systematic human rights violations and the violence against peaceful demonstrators .
zh: 奥地利强烈谴责有系统地侵犯人权和对和平示威者的暴力行为。

en: We strongly urge those responsible to immediately stop the bloodshed and to engage in meaningful dialogue and reforms .
zh: 我们 强烈 敦促 负责者 立即 停止 流血, 进行 有意义 的 对话 和 改革 。

en: Austria supports the Libyan people in its struggle for freedom .
zh: 奥地利支持利比亚人民争取自由的斗争。

en: Over € 150 million blocked in Austrian bank accounts has been de-frozen for humanitarian use .
zh: 在奥地利银行账户中被封锁的150亿欧元已经被解除冻结,用于人道主义用途。

en: Both the Austrian Government and private sector have provided medicine , relief supplies and desperately needed fuel to Libya .
zh: 奥地利政府和私人部门都为利比亚提供了药品、救济物资和迫切需要的燃料。

en: The international community and the United Nations have to support and assist the transition process in the Arab world as the United Nations does now in Libya .
zh: 国际 社会 和 联合国 必须 支持 和 协助 阿拉伯世界 的 过渡 进程, 联合国 现在 在 利比亚 也 如此 。

en: This period of change may last for some time and will be full of challenges .
zh: 这种变化的时期可能持续一段时间,而且会充满挑战。

en: Austria welcomes all efforts undertaken by Governments in the region for peaceful and credible change .
zh: 奥地利 欢迎 该 区域 各国 政府 为 和平 和 可信 的 变革 作出 的 一切 努力 。

en: We encourage the newly empowered authorities to create a constitutional framework based on democracy and human rights , in order to fulfil their mandate for democratic change responsibly and peacefully .
zh: 我们鼓励新赋予权力的当局建立以民主和人权为基础的宪法框架,以负责任和和平地履行民主变革的任务。

en: The events in the Arab world notwithstanding , we must continue to focus on the Middle East peace process .
zh: 不管阿拉伯世界发生什么事,我们必须继续关注中东和平进程。

en: The Middle East took centre stage this week here at the General Assembly — and rightly so .
zh: 本周在大会上,中东问题占据了中心地位 — — 这是正当的。

en: We must build trust and we have to foster the belief among Israelis and Palestinians that a negotiated settlement can be achieved — a sustainable solution based on two States living side by side in a secure and peaceful neighbourhood within mutually recognized borders .
zh: 我们 必须 建立 信任, 在 以色列 和 巴勒斯坦 人 之间, 我们 必须 促进 他们 的 信念, 即 可以 达成 一 项 谈判 解决 办法 - - 一 项 以 两 个 国家 在 相互 承认 的 边界 内 共同 生活 的 安全 和 和平 的 邻国 为 基础 的 可 持续 解决 办法 。

en: We have no choice but to return to direct negotiations between the two parties .
zh: 我们别无选择,只能回到双方之间直接谈判。

en: The Quartet , in its statement yesterday , has shown a way to do that and has also proposed concrete timelines .
zh: 四国集团在昨日的声明中表明了如何做到这一点,并提出了具体的时间表。

en: Austria fully supports the Quartet statement .
zh: 奥地利 完全 支持  kvartet 声明 。

en: There is no time to lose .
zh: 没时间丢失。

en: Austria welcomes President Al - Nasser ’s choice of theme for this year ’s general debate .
zh: 奥地利欢迎阿尔-纳瑟总统为今年的一般性辩论选择的主题。

en: We appreciate Qatar ’s strong track record in that regard .
zh: 我们赞赏卡塔尔在这方面取得的良好成绩。

en: Last year ’s tenth anniversary of the adoption of Security Council resolution 1325  on women , peace and security reminded us that the promise of women ’s full and equal participation in all efforts of maintaining peace and security , including in mediation processes , has not yet come true and that we all need to intensify our efforts .
zh: 去年安理会关于妇女、和平与安全的第1325号决议通过的十周年提醒我们,妇女充分和平等参与维持和平与安全的所有努力,包括调解进程的承诺尚未实现,我们都必须加紧我们的努力。

en: In that context , let me also mention an Austrian contribution to international mediation efforts .
zh: 在 这 方面, 我 还要 提到 奥地利 对 国际 调解 努力 的 贡献 。

en: By inviting political decision - makers from both Khartoum and Juba to Vienna in recent years , Austria has managed to offer the two sides a platform for discussion .
zh: 奥地利近年来邀请了卡尔图姆和朱巴的决策者到维也纳,并设法为双方提供一个讨论平台。

en: We are ready to continue to do so .
zh: 我们准备继续这样做。

en: The Sudan and South Sudan have a shared past and must resolve their remaining problems peacefully .
zh: 苏丹和南苏丹有着共同的过去,必须和平解决其剩余的问题。

en: I am proud to announce that a liaison office of the United Nations Office for Disarmament Affairs will open in Vienna soon .
zh: 我 自豪 地 宣布, 联合国 裁军 事务 厅 的 联络 办事处 不久 将 在 维也纳 开办 。

en: Over the past year , the International Anti-Corruption Academy set up its headquarters near Vienna , and the Vienna Centre for Disarmament and Non-Proliferation and an office of the International Peace Institute were established .
zh: 去年,国际反腐败学院在维也纳附近设立总部,设立了维也纳裁军和不扩散中心和国际和平研究所办公室。

en: Austria fully stands behind the campaign launched by the Secretary - General on Monday to achieve universal access to modern energy services .
zh: 奥地利完全支持秘书长星期一发起的旨在实现普及现代能源服务的运动。

en: We support doubling the rate of improvement in energy efficiency and the share of renewable energy in the global energy mix by 2030 .
zh: 我们支持到2030年提高能源效率和全球能源组合中可再生能源占比的两倍。

en: Austria provides substantial support to the energy and environment efforts undertaken by the United Nations Industrial Development Organization .
zh: 奥地利 对 联合国 工业 发展 组织 进行 的 能源 和 环境 努力 提供 了 实质性 支持 。

en: Last June , we hosted the Vienna Energy Forum , where about 1,400 participants discussed alternative energy concepts to reach the energy goals of the United Nations .
zh: 去年6月,我们主办了维也纳能源论坛,约1,400名参与者讨论了实现联合国能源目标的替代能源概念。

en: The Fukushima nuclear catastrophe should become a turning point in our approach to nuclear safety .
zh: 福島核灾难应该成为我们对核安全的方针的转折点。

en: We owe it to future generations to make safety concerns come first when using nuclear power .
zh: 我们应该让下一代在使用核能时优先考虑安全问题。

en: Austria decided , in 1978 , to forgo the use of nuclear energy .
zh: 奥地利于1978年决定放弃使用核能。

en: Some countries have recently adopted a similar course , which we welcome .
zh: 一些国家最近采取了类似的方针,我们对此表示欢迎。

en: When I tour around Taiwan , of course , I also find people taking action without even waiting for the ministries to take action .
zh: 当然,当我在台湾巡回时,我发现人们甚至没有等待政府部门采取行动。

en: This is another of the g0v projects the environmental agency .
zh: 这是环保署的另一个g0v项目。

en: If you change the O to a zero , you get into them , considering environmental agency .
zh: 如果你把O变为零,你就会进入它们,考虑环境机构。

en: More than 2,000 people , actually , installed these in their balconies , in their schools and so on , to get a real - time sensor of their IoT devices but not just IoT .
zh: 超过2000人, 实际上, 把这些安装在他们的阳台 、 学校等等, 以获得他们的IoT设备的实时传感器,而不仅仅是IoT.

en: They also upload it to the public cloud , which then uploads it to a distributed ledger to make sure that nobody can modify those numbers after the fact .
zh: 他们还将数据上传到公共云上,然后将数据上传到分布式帐户上,以确保在事实发生后没有人能够修改这些数字。

en: After that , we see this kind of innovation is very rare in Asia .
zh: 之后,我们发现这种创新在亚洲非常罕见。

en: When I talk to all the UN - related bodies , many other Asian countries tell me that they wo n't let this network grow to be 2,000 nodes strong .
zh: 当我与联合国有关机构交谈时, 许多其他亚洲国家告诉我,他们不会让这个网络成为2000节点强的.

en: If it 's 200 nodes strong , they will try to poach the leader to the government .
zh: 如果它有200个节点,他们会设法将领导赶到政府。

en: If they refuse , then maybe , they get disappeared because they really challenge the legitimacy of the environmental agency .
zh: 如果他们拒绝,那么也许,他们就会消失,因为他们真的挑战了环保机构的合法性。

en: If the environmental agency group reports one number and your neighbors report another number , of course , you 're going to trust the one that you participated yourself , even though it 's a lower quality sensor .
zh: 如果环保机构的小组报告一个数字,而你的邻居报告另一个数字,当然,你会相信你自己参与的那个数字,即使它是低质量的传感器。

en: Because of that , it 's very rare in Taiwan because we have an expanding civic space .
zh: 由于这个原因, 台湾非常罕见,因为我们有不断扩大的公民空间.

en: We manufacture low - cost , high - precision sensors for them , but we also see this as a map of digital gap in Taiwan , a digital divide .
zh: 我们为他们制造低成本 、 高精确的传感器,但我们还把它看作台湾的数字鸿沟的地图,一个数字鸿沟。

en: We set up points when the people do n't have the resource to go to , indigenous places , places in the mountains .
zh: 我们设置了人们没有资源去的地方,土著地方,山地的地方。

en: We also talk to the citizen scientists and they say they really want a point here to tell the air pollution from outside Taiwan or from inside Taiwan , domestically .
zh: 我们还和公民科学家谈了一番,他们说他们真的想在这里指出台湾以外的空气污染或者台湾内部的空气污染。

en: There 's no way the citizen scientists can install an AirBox there , even if they 're very good at drones and so on .
zh: 公民科学家不可能在那里安装一个AirBox,即使他们非常擅长飞行器等等。

en: We can install those sensor networks as part of the complementary action .
zh: 我们可以安装这些传感器网络作为补充行动的一部分。

en: The beauty is this , it 's all open hardware .
zh: 美妙之处在于,这都是开放的硬件。

en: It 's on GitHub .
zh: 它在GitHub上。

en: You just download , put it onto Raspberry Pi , and then , you can do it yourself , as people have done over the world .
zh: 你只要下载,把它放在 Raspberry Pi上,然后,你可以自己去做,就像世界各地的人一样。

en: If you do n't change the source code , it uploads to the Taiwan network by default , so we kind of have the numbers of all the atmosphere and meteorological data .
zh: 如果您不更改源代码,它将默认上载到台湾网络上,所以我们有点有所有大气和气象数据的数字。

en: We have a website dedicated for this , the Civil IoT project at CI.taiwan.gov.tw , that is basically , collective intelligence , meteorological , air quality , earthquake , and disaster prevention , and things like that .
zh: 我们有一个专门为此的网站,即CI.taiwan.gov.tw的民用IoT项目,它基本上是:集体智能、气象、空气质量、地震、防灾等。

en: We have single websites like this , CI for Collective Intelligence , AI for AI Taiwan , SI for Social Innovation , Smart Taiwan for the Smart Taiwan plan , and also , Bio Taiwan .
zh: 我们有这样的单一网站,CI为集体智能,AI为AI台湾,SI为社会创新,Smart台湾为智能台湾计划,还有Bio台湾。

en: The medical industry says , " You really should call it biomed.taiwan because bio and med are different things . "
zh: 医学界说, “ 你应该把它叫做生物医学,因为生物和医学是不同的东西. ”

en: In any case , what we 're doing is now is breaking across ministry and municipality and national government because this says nothing about the level of the government or the departments .
zh: 无论如何,我们现在正在做的是跨越省、市和国家政府,因为这无关政府或部门的级别。

en: It is one , single message that is collaboratively curated by everybody .
zh: 这是一个由每个人共同管理的单一消息。

en: Through this , we solved not just our local social and environmental issues through economic approaches but using the SDGs as a map to unite the efforts together .
zh: 通过这一途径,我们不仅通过经济途径解决了当地的社会和环境问题,还利用可持续发展目标作为一个地图,合并了各项努力。

en: Just by saying " Taiwan can help " , we mean specifically , 17 , 18 , which is the availability of reliable data that people from across sectors , across jurisdictions , can trust the data .
zh: 只要说“台湾可以帮助”,我们的意思就是,17、18,即提供可靠的数据,让来自不同行业、不同管辖区的人们可以信任数据。

en: Then , based on the data , we encourage cross-sectoral partnerships .
zh: 然后,根据数据,鼓励跨部门伙伴关系。

en: Then , based on that , we make open innovations that we , then , export , not as colonizers but , really , co-creators .
zh: 然后,基于这一点,我们创造开放的创新,然后出口,而不是作为殖民者,而是共同创造者。

en: Just download it on GitHub and then , we devise something together in a way that has free access to science and technology .
zh: 只需在GitHub下载它,然后,我们共同设计了一种可以免费访问科学和技术的方式。

en: When I joined the cabinet two years ago , based on these ideas -- with a contract -- the administration asked me for a job description , because they 've never seen anything like this before .
zh: 两年前,当我加入内阁时,根据这些想法--和一份合同--政府要求我一份工作说明书,因为他们从来没见过这样的事情。

en: Instead of a job description , I just wrote them a poem , a prayer , which I 'm going to read to you as a conclusion .
zh: 我只是给他们写了一首诗,一个祈祷,我将把它读给你作为结论。

en: To me , it means the shift from IT or ICT to digital , the shift from the sectors separately as attack or an innovation , or whatever , into the humanity as a whole .
zh: 对我来说,它意味着从资讯科技或资讯科技转向数字,从单独的部门转变为攻击或创新,或者什么,进入整个人类。

en: This is digital transformation for me .
zh: 对我来说,这是数字的转变。

en: This is , literally , my job description .
zh: 这是我的工作描述。

en: " When we see the Internet of Things , let 's make it an Internet of Beings .
zh: 当我们看到事物的互联网时,让我们把它变成事物的互联网吧。

en: When we see virtual reality , let 's make it a shared reality .
zh: 当我们看到虚拟现实时,让我们把它变成共享现实。

en: When we see machine learning , let 's make it collaborative learning .
zh: 当我们看到机器学习时, 让我们让它成为协作学习.

en: When we see user experience , let 's make it about human experience , and whenever we hear that a singularity is near , let 's keep in mind and always remember that a plurality is here . "
zh: 当我们看到用户体验时,让我们把它当作人类体验,并且当我们听到一个单一性接近时,让我们记住和永远记住一个多重性在这里。

en: Thank you so much .
zh: 非常感谢。

en: Long years ago we made a tryst with destiny , and now the time comes when we shall redeem our pledge , not wholly or in full measure , but very substantially .
zh: 很久以前,我们做了一场命运的试炼,现在到了我们必须兑现承诺的时刻,不是完全或完全,而是非常实质性的。

en: At the stroke of the midnight hour , when the world sleeps , India will awake to life and freedom .
zh: 世界睡着的午夜时刻,印度将醒来生活和自由。

en: A moment comes , which comes but rarely in history , when we step out from the old to the new , when an age ends , and when the soul of a nation , long suppressed , finds utterance .
zh: 一个时刻来临,它在历史上很少来临,当我们从老往新迈出的时候,一个时代结束,一个民族的灵魂,长期被压迫,终于找到了说法。

en: It is fitting that at this solemn moment , we take the pledge of dedication to the service of India and her people and to the still larger cause of humanity .
zh: 在这一庄严时刻,我们承诺致力于为印度及其人民服务,为人类事业作出更大的贡献,是恰当的。

en: At the dawn of history , India started on her unending quest , and trackless centuries are filled with her striving and grandeur of her success and failures .
zh: 在历史的黎明时,印度开始了无穷的探索,无尽的世纪充满了她的奋斗和她的成功和失败的伟大。

en: Through good and ill fortune alike , she has never lost sight of that quest , forgotten the ideals which gave her strength .
zh: 通过好运和坏运,她从不忘记了那 quest,忘记了赋予她力量的理想。

en: We end today a period of misfortunes and India discovers herself again .
zh: 我们今天结束了一段不幸的时期,印度再次发现自己。

en: The achievement we celebrate today is but a step , an opening of opportunity to the greater triumphs and achievements that await us .
zh: 我们今天庆祝的成就只是一个步骤,向我们等待的更大的胜利和成就提供机会。

en: Are we brave enough and wise enough to grasp this opportunity and accept the challenge of the future ?
zh: 我们是否足够勇敢和明智地抓住这个机会并接受未来的挑战?

en: Freedom and power bring responsibility .
zh: 自由和权力带来责任。

en: The responsibility rests upon this Assembly , a sovereign body representing the sovereign people of India .
zh: 这个 代表 印度 主权 人民 的 主权 机构 的 大会 有 责任 。

en: Before the birth of freedom , we have endured all the pains of labour and our hearts are heavy with the memory of this sorrrow .
zh: 在自由诞生之前,我们忍受了所有劳动的痛苦,我们怀着这个悲伤的记忆,心里很沉重。

en: Some of those pains continue even now .
zh: 有些痛苦甚至现在仍在继续。

en: Nevertheless , the past is over and it is the future that beckons us now .
zh: 尽管如此,过去已经过去了,而现在正是未来的召唤。

en: That future is not one of ease or resting but of incessant striving so that we may fulfill the pledges we have so often taken and the one we shall take today .
zh: 这种未来不是轻松的,也不是宁静的,而是不断努力的,以便我们能够履行我们经常作出的承诺,以及我们今天作出的承诺。

en: The service of India means , the service of the millions who suffer .
zh: 为印度服务意味着为受苦的数百万人服务。

en: It means the ending of poverty and ignorance and poverty and disease and inequality of opportunity .
zh: 它意味着结束贫穷、无知、贫穷、疾病和机会不平等。

en: The ambition of the greatest men of our generation has been to wipe every tear from every eye .
zh: 我们这一代最伟大的人物的野心是把每一个眼泪都从每一个眼睛中擦掉。

en: That may be beyond us , but as long as there are tears and suffering , so long our work will not be over .
zh: 这也许超出了我们的范围,但只要有泪水和痛苦,我们的工作就不会结束。

en: And so we have to labour and to work , and to work hard , to give reality to our dreams .
zh: 因此,我们必须努力工作,努力工作,使我们的梦想成为现实。

en: Those dreams are for India , but they are also for the world , for all the nations and peoples are too closely knit together today for any one of them to imagine that it can live apart .
zh: 这些梦想是为印度的,但是它们也是为世界的,因为所有国家和人民今天都过于紧密地结合在一起,所以任何一个国家都无法想象它能够独立生活。

en: Peace is said to be indivisible , so is freedom , so is prosperity now , and also is disaster in this one world that can no longer be split into isolated fragments .
zh: 人们说和平是不可分割的,自由是不可分割的,现在繁荣是不可分割的,在这个一个世界里也是一种灾难,不能再被分割成孤立的碎片。

en: To the people of India , whose representatives we are , we make an appeal to join us with faith and confidence in this great adventure .
zh: 向我们代表的印度人民,我们呼吁他们以信心和信心加入我们这个伟大的冒险。

en: This is no time for petty and destructive criticism , no time for illwill or blaming others .
zh: 这不是小规模和破坏性的批评的时机,也不是恶意或指责他人的时机。

en: We have to build the noble mansion of free India where all her children may dwell .
zh: 我们必须建造自由印度的贵族宫殿,让所有她的子女居住。

en: The appointed day has come - the day appointed by destiny - and India stands forth again , after long slumber and struggle , awake , vital , free and independent .
zh: 定日已经到来--由命运所定的日--印度在漫长的睡梦和斗争之后再次站出来,醒来,生机勃勃,自由独立。

en: The past clings on to us still in some measure and we have to do much before we redeem the pledges we have so often taken .
zh: 过去在某种程度上仍与我们相连,我们必须做很多事情才能兑现我们经常作出的承诺。

en: Yet the turning - point is past , and history begins anew for us , the history which we shall live and act and others will write about .
zh: 然而, 转折点已经过去, 历史对我们重新开始, 历史是我们的生活和行动以及其他人将写的.

en: It is a fateful moment for us in India , for all Asia and for the world .
zh: 这是我们印度,整个亚洲和全世界的命运时刻。

en: A new star rises , the star of freedom in the East , a new hope comes into being , a vision long cherished materializes .
zh: 新星升起,东方的自由之星,新希望诞生,长期珍视的远景实现。

en: We rejoice in that freedom , even though clouds surround us , and many of our people are sorrowstricken and difficult problems encompass us .
zh: 尽管我们周围是云彩,但我们人民中的许多人都悲伤,困难的问题包围着我们。

en: But freedom brings responsibilities and burdens and we have to face them in the spirit of a free and disciplined people .
zh: 但自由带来了责任和负担,我们必须以自由和纪律的人民的精神面对它们。

en: On this day our first thoughts go to the architect of this freedom , the Father of our Nation , who , embodying the old spirit of India , held aloft the torch of freedom and lighted up the darkness that surrounded us .
zh: 在这一天,我们首先想到这个自由的建筑师,我们的国家之父,他代表了印度的古老的精神,悬挂着自由的火炬,照亮了我们周围的黑暗。

en: We have often been unworthy followers of his and have strayed from his message , but not only we but succeeding generations will remember this message and bear the imprint in their hearts of this great son of India , magnificent in his faith and strength and courage and humility .
zh: 我们常常是他的不值得的追随者,从他的信条中逃脱,但不仅我们,而且以后的几代人将记住他的信条,并铭记在他们心中这个伟大的印度儿子,他以信仰、力量、勇气和谦卑著称。

en: We shall never allow that torch of freedom to be blown out , however high the wind or stormy the tempest .
zh: 我们永远不会让自由之火熄灭,无论风高还是暴风雨大。

en: Our next thoughts must be of the unknown volunteers and soldiers of freedom who , without praise or reward , have served India even unto death .
zh: 我们接下来的思考必须是那些无名志愿者和自由战士,他们没有得到赞扬或奖励,甚至一直服役印度直到死亡。

en: We think also of our brothers and sisters who have been cut off from us by political boundaries and who unhappily can not share at present in the freedom that has come .
zh: 我们还想起那些因政治界限而离我们分离的兄弟姐妹,他们不幸不能分享现今的自由。

en: They are of us and will remain of us whatever may happen , and we shall be sharers in their good  ill fortune alike .
zh: 他们属于我们,无论发生什么事,他们都属于我们。

en: The future beckons to us .
zh: 未来向我们发出召唤。

en: Whither do we go and what shall be our endeavour ?
zh: 我们到哪里去,我们的努力是什么?

en: To bring freedom and opportunity to the common man , to the peasants and workers of India ; to fight and end poverty and ignorance and disease ; to build up a prosperous , democratic and progressive nation , and to create social , economic and political institutions which will ensure justice and fullness of life to every man and woman .
zh: 为普通人、印度农民和工人带来自由和机会;为消除贫穷、无知和疾病而作斗争;为建设繁荣、民主和进步的国家而建立社会、经济和政治机构,确保每个男人和女人享有公正和充分的生活。

en: We have hard work ahead .
zh: 我们有很辛苦的工作要做。

en: There is no resting for any one of us till we redeem our pledge in full , till we make all the people of India what destiny intended them to be .
zh: 直到我们完全兑现我们的承诺,直到我们使所有印度人民成为他们所预定的命运。

en: We are citizens of a great country on the verge of bold advance , and we have to live up to that high standard .
zh: 我们是一个伟大的国家,在大胆的进步的边缘,我们必须坚持这一高标准。

en: All of us , to whatever religion we may belong , are equally the children of India with equal rights , privileges and obligations .
zh: 无论我们属于哪种宗教,我们都是平等权利、特权和义务的印度儿童。

en: We can not encourage communalism or narrow - mindedness , for no nation can be great whose people are narrow in thought or in action .
zh: 我们不能鼓励共产主义或狭隘思想,因为没有一个民族能够伟大,其人民在思想和行动上是狭隘的。

en: To the nations and peoples of the world we send greetings and pledge ourselves to cooperate with them in furthering peace , freedom and democracy .
zh: 我们向世界各国和人民致敬,并承诺与他们合作促进和平、自由和民主。

en: And to India , our much - loved motherland , the ancient , the eternal and the ever - new , we pay our reverent homage and we bind ourselves afresh to her service .
zh: 对印度, 我们的深爱的祖国, 古老 、 永恒 、 新, 我们 敬重 并 重新 致力于她的服务.

en: Washington , D.C. – Speaker Nancy Pelosi delivered remarks on the Floor of the House of Representatives in support of H. R. 1280 , the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act of 2021 .
zh: 华盛顿 — — 美国众议院发言人佩洛西在众议院会议厅发表了讲话,支持《2021年乔治·弗洛伊德警察法》的1280号法案。

en: Below are the Speaker ’s remarks :
zh: 下面是发言人的评论:

en: I thank the gentleman from New York , the distinguished Chair of the Judiciary Committee , for yielding and for his leadership in bringing this important legislation to the Floor .
zh: 我感谢纽约的先生,司法委员会的杰出主席,他为将这一重要的立法提交了会议而作出的贡献和领导。

en: And I commend Congresswoman Karen Bass , Madam Chair , for your great leadership in this important legislation .
zh: 主席女士,我赞扬国会议员卡伦·巴斯(Caren Bass)在这项重要的立法中发挥了杰出领导作用。

en: Madam Speaker , nearly one year ago , George Floyd gasped his last words , ‘ I ca n't breathe , ’ and ignited a nationwide reckoning on the racial injustice and police brutality in America .
zh: 几乎一年前,美国总统乔治·弗洛伊德(George Floyd)用最后一句“我不能呼吸”气喘吁吁地说,引发了美国全国性的种族不公正和警察残暴行为的调查。

en: Americans from every corner of the country took to the streets to peacefully protest violence against Black Americans , waving Black Lives Matter flags , chanting the names of the murdered , repeating George Floyd 's dying words , ‘ I ca n't breathe . ’
zh: 来自全国各地的美国人走上街头,和平抗议黑人对黑人暴力的暴力行为,挥舞着《黑人生活问题》的旗帜,唱着被杀人的名字,重复乔治·弗洛伊德的死去的话:“我不能呼吸。 ”

en: They turned their agony into action , but tragically , despite these mass protests , the injustice , killings continued .
zh: 他们把痛苦转化为行动,但悲惨的是,尽管发生了这些大规模抗议,不公正,杀戮仍在继续。

en: Those protests were global .
zh: 这些抗议活动是全球性的。

en: Here , as Members of Congress and as Americans , we can not accept this epidemic of injustice .
zh: 作为国会议员和美国人,我们不能接受这种不公正的流行。

en: We can not stay silent when one – when our most vulnerable and historically marginalized communities , people of color , those living in poverty , Americans with disabilities are being targeted and sometimes killed .
zh: 当我们最脆弱和历史上被边缘化的社区、肤色人、生活在贫困、残疾的美国人被当作目标和有时被杀的时候,我们不能保持沉默。

en: That is why , today , the House will again pass the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act and send it to the Senate and the President 's desk so that it can finally become the law of the land .
zh: 这就是为什么,今天,众议院将再次通过乔治·弗洛伊德警察法,并将其送到参议院和总统的办公桌,以便最终成为土地的法律。

en: I salute Congresswoman Karen Bass who has been relentless , persistent and absolutely courageous in her leadership on this legislation .
zh: 我向国会议员卡伦·巴斯(Caren Bass)致敬,她一直坚持不懈地领导这项立法。

en: Thank you to the Congressional Black Caucus and its Chair , Joyce Beatty .
zh: 感谢国会黑人委员会及其主席乔伊斯·贝蒂.

en: The George Floyd Justice in Policing Act fundamentally transforms the culture of policing with strong , unprecedented reforms .
zh: 乔治·弗洛伊德的《警察司法法》根本地改变了警察文化,通过强有力的、前所未有的改革。

en: This legislation will not erase centuries of systemic racism and excessive policing in America .
zh: 这项立法不会消除美国数百年的系统性种族主义和过度执法。

en: It will not bring back George Floyd , Breonna Taylor – say her name , Breonna Taylor – Ahmaud Arbery , or the countless other men and women who died or were senselessly injured .
zh: 它不会带回乔治·弗洛伊德、布莱恩娜·泰勒(Breonna Taylor)、布莱恩娜·泰勒(Breonna Taylor)、阿马德·阿伯里(Ahmaud Arbery)和无数其他死亡或无意义受伤的男女。

en: But it will make a tremendous – take a tremendous step toward – or to stop the violence , stem the suffering and start to build a healthier , better relationship between law enforcement and communities that they respect .
zh: 但它将带来巨大的 — — 迈出巨大的一步 — — 或停止暴力,遏制痛苦,并开始建立一个更健康、更好的执法与他们尊重的社区之间的关系。

en: All of us here salute and are proudly , profoundly grateful to our law enforcement heroes .
zh: 我们大家在这里向执法英雄们致敬,并感到自豪,深表感谢。

en: I grew up in a family , public service family .
zh: 我在一家公共服务家庭长大。

en: My father , my whole life at home , was Mayor of Baltimore .
zh: 我的父亲, 我的整个家庭生活, 都是巴尔的摩市长.

en: My brother was Mayor later , Thomas D’Alesandro , in Baltimore .
zh: 我弟弟后来是巴尔的摩的市长,托马斯·迪亚历山德罗。

en: And they had a motto about the police : ‘ Be true to the men in blue . ’
zh: 他们有一个关于警察的口号: “ 忠于蓝色的人们. ”

en: So , I was I was raised with that respect , with the – prayerfully that these people , our men and women , now , men and women in uniform , whether they 're police or fire , but addressing police here , our first responders left home when they left to go to work , not knowing – their families not knowing if they would return home because they were risking their lives to save lives and to protect all of us .
zh: 因此,我以这种敬意长大,以-祈祷这些人,我们的男女,现在,男女穿制服,不管是警察还是消防员,但面对警察,我们的第一批救援人员离开家去上班,不知道-他们的家人不知道他们是否会回家,因为他们冒着生命危险拯救生命和保护我们所有人。

en: So , it ’s with great , prayerful gratitude to most of the men and women in blue , that we sadly have to say that our appreciation for them can not lapse into apathy or acceptance of actions that are fundamentally incompatible with the purpose of policing , the purpose of policing .
zh: 因此,我们不得不向大多数蓝色的男性和女性表示深切的,祈祷的感激,我们不得不说,我们对她们的赞赏不能沉淀于无情或接受那些与警察的目的根本无关的行动。

en: Of course , we all – there 's not anyone on our side of the aisle who has advocated any policy in this body to defund the police , contrary to misrepresentations that are coming forth .
zh: 当然,我们大家 — — 没有谁在我们的行道上鼓吹在这个机构的任何政策去剥夺警察的资金,这与正在出现的错误陈述相反。

en: All of us here , again , salute and profoundly grateful for our law enforcement heroes .
zh: 我们大家在这里,再次向执法英雄们表示敬意和深切感谢。

en: As the National Organization of Black Law Enforcement Executives writes , ‘ The passage of this act is paramount in achieving the fundamental principle of a police force that protects and serves every citizen of their community with fairness , accountability and transparency in their actions . ’
zh: 黑人执法执行机构国家组织(National Organization of Black Law Enforcement Executives)写道:“通过这项法案是实现一个以公平、负责和透明的方式保护和服务其社区的每一个公民的警察的基本原则的关键。 ”

en: The Democratic Congress , together with the Biden - Harris Administration , is committed to not only ensuring that this legislation becomes law , but to take further action to end violence and advance justice in America .
zh: 民主党与比登-哈里斯政府一道,致力于不仅确保这项立法成为法律,而且采取进一步行动以结束暴力和推进美国的正义。

en: Let us ensure that the passage of the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act is the first of many steps in this direction .
zh: 让我们确保通过《乔治·弗洛伊德警察法》是迈向这一方向的第一步。

en: To the family of George Floyd that came here when the bill was being reviewed by your committee , Mr Chairman – you remember that day .
zh: 主席先生,你还记得那个日子吗?

en: We could n't be in your committee room because of COVID , but they came and they asked me that day , they said , ‘ Madam Speaker , will you name this bill for our brother ? ’
zh: 因为科维德,我们不能在你们委员会的房间里,但是他们来问我那天,他们说, “ 主席女士,您能为我们的兄弟命名这个法案 吗? ”

en: Philonise , his brother , asked that question .
zh: 他的弟弟菲洛尼西问了这个问题。

en: I said , ‘ Only if you think it is worthy of your brother . ’
zh: 我说, “ 只有你认为它值得你兄弟的. ”

en: I think of George Floyd at least once a day – sometimes more .
zh: 我想乔治·弗洛伊德至少一天一次 — — 有时还要一次。

en: And you know why ?
zh: 你知道为什么吗?

en: Not just because of the sadness of it all , but I think of him because they tell us that in order to be safe from COVID , we must wash our hands for 20 seconds .
zh: 不是因为这一切的悲伤,而是因为我想到他,因为他们告诉我们,为了远离科维德,我们必须洗手20秒。

en: As I 'm washing my hands for 20 seconds , after about eight or nine seconds , I 'm thinking
zh: 我正在洗手20秒,大约8或9秒后,我正在想

en: I ca n't do this for 20 seconds .
zh: 我不能这么做20秒。

en: It 's a long time , as Congresswoman Dean said , calling out for his mother , extending love to his family .
zh: 正如国会议员迪恩所说,这是一个漫长的时期,他呼吁他的母亲,向他的家人表达爱。

en: Let us ensure that George 's brother , Philonise , when he said , ‘ George 's name means something , ’ and that , as his daughter , Gianna , said , ‘ Daddy changed the world ’ with this legislation .
zh: 让我们确保乔治的弟弟菲洛尼斯说:“乔治的名字有意义,”他女儿吉安娜说:“爸爸用这项立法改变了世界。

en: Let us take an important step in changing the world for George 's family , for all communities of color , for all Americans , for the whole world .
zh: 让我们为乔治的家人,为所有不同肤色社区,为所有美国人,为全世界迈出一个重要步骤,改变世界。

en: I thank Karen Bass again , Madam Chair .
zh: 我再次感谢卡伦·巴斯,主席女士。

en: Thank you so much , again .
zh: 再次谢谢你。

en: And I yield back the balance of my time .
zh: 我把时间的余额交回了。

en: The Charter of the United Nations sends a clear message to us all : put people first .
zh: 《联合国宪章》向我们所有人发出了一个明确的信息:把人放在首位。

en: The first words of the Charter , “ We the peoples ” , are a summons to place people at the centre of our work — every day , everywhere .
zh: 《宪章》的第一句话,“我们人民”是让我们把人民放在我们的工作中的中心 — — 每天,在任何地方。

en: Those rights are not a favour to be rewarded or withheld ; they are an endowment for simply being human .
zh: 这些权利不是得到或被剥夺的恩惠;它们是仅仅是人类的恩赐。

en: Throughout the first half of my mandate , I have had the good fortune to meet people around the world , not in gilded meeting rooms but where they live , work and dream .
zh: 在我任期的第一个半期中,我幸运地遇到了世界各地的人们,不是在金色的会议室里,而是在他们居住、工作和梦想的地方。

en: And I have listened .
zh: 我听了。

en: I have heard families in the South Pacific who fear their lives being swept away by rising seas ; young refugees in the Middle East yearning for a return to school and home ; Ebola survivors in North Kivu struggling to rebuild their lives ; women demanding equality and opportunity ; people of all beliefs and traditions who suffer simply because of who they are ; and so many others .
zh: 我听说了南太平洋的家庭害怕被上升的海洋淹没;中东的年轻难民渴望返回学校和家园;北基伍的埃博拉幸存者挣扎着重建自己的生活;要求平等和机会的妇女;所有信仰和传统的人仅仅因为他们是谁而苦难;还有这么多人。

en: We are living in a world of disquiet .
zh: 我们生活在一个不安的世界里。

en: A great many people fear getting trampled , thwarted , left behind .
zh: 许多人害怕被踩踏、阻挠、遗弃。

en: Machines take their jobs , traffickers take their dignity , demagogues take their rights , warlords take their lives , fossil fuels take their futures .
zh: 机器夺取了他们的工作,贩卖者夺取了他们的尊严,煽动者夺取了他们的权利,军阀夺取了他们的生命,化石燃料夺取了他们的未来。

en: And yet people believe in the spirit and ideas that bring us to this Hall .
zh: 然而,人们相信我们来到这堂的精神和思想。

en: They believe in the United Nations .
zh: 他们相信联合国。

en: But do they believe in us ?
zh: 但他们相信我们吗?

en: Do they believe that , as leaders , we will put people first ?
zh: 他们认为, 作为领导者, 我们将把人放在首位 吗?

en: We the leaders must deliver for we the peoples .
zh: 我们领导者必须为人民服务。

en: People have the right to live in peace .
zh: 人民有和平生活的权利。

en: One year ago in this Hall , I spoke of winds of hope despite the chaos and confusion of our world  .
zh: 一年前,我在这个大厅里谈到了希望的风声,尽管我们世界一片混乱。

en: Since then , some of those currents have continued to move in promising directions .
zh: 自那时起, 一些这些潮流继续朝着有希望的方向前进.

en: Against the expectations of many , elections unfolded peacefully in Madagascar , the Maldives and the Democratic Republic of the Congo , to name just a few places .
zh: 与许多人的期望相反,马达加斯加、马尔代夫和刚果民主共和国举行了和平选举。

en: Greece and the Republic of North Macedonia resolved their decades - long name dispute .
zh: 希腊和北马其顿共和国解决了长达数十年的名称争端.

en: Political dialogue in the Sudan and the peace process in the Central African Republic have brought renewed hope .
zh: 苏丹的政治对话和中非共和国的和平进程带来了新的希望。

en: A long - sought step forward has just been taken on the political path out of the tragedy in Syria , in line with Security Council resolution 2254  .
zh: 按照安全理事会第2254号决议,刚刚在政治上走出叙利亚悲剧的道路上迈出了漫长的一步。

en: As I announced yesterday , an agreement has been reached with all parties for a credible , balanced and inclusive Syrian - owned and Syrian - led constitutional committee .
zh: 正如我昨天宣布的那样, 已经与所有各方达成了一项可靠 、 平衡和包容性的叙利亚 - 拥有和叙利亚 - 领导的宪法委员会的协议.

en: My Special Envoy just left Damascus after finalizing the last details with the Government and the opposition .
zh: 我 的 特使 在 同 政府 和 反对派 完成 最后 的 细节 后 刚刚 离开 大马士革 。

en: The United Nations looks forward to convening the committee in Geneva in the coming weeks .
zh: 联合国期待着在未来几周在日内瓦召开委员会。

en: However , across the global landscape , we see conflicts persisting , terrorism spreading and the risk of a new arms race growing .
zh: 然而,在全球范围内,我们看到冲突持续,恐怖主义扩散,新的军备竞赛的风险不断增加。

en: Outside interferences , often in violation of Security Council resolutions , make peace processes more difficult .
zh: 外部干预,往往违反安全理事会决议,使和平进程更加困难。

en: Many situations remain unresolved , from Yemen and Libya to Afghanistan and beyond .
zh: 许多局势仍未解决,从也门和利比亚到阿富汗和 beyond。

en: A succession of unilateral actions threatens to thwart a two - State solution between Israel and Palestine .
zh: 一系列单方面行动威胁要阻碍以色列和巴勒斯坦之间的双国解决.

en: In Venezuela , 4 million people have fled the country — one of the largest displacements in the world .
zh: 在委内瑞拉,4百万人逃离了这个国家,这是世界上最大的流离失所者之一。

en: Tensions are heightened in South Asia , where differences need to be addressed through dialogue .
zh: 在南亚,紧张局势加剧,需要通过对话解决分歧。

en: Above all , we are facing the alarming possibility of armed conflict in the Gulf , the consequences of which the world can not afford .
zh: 首先,我们正面临着海湾武装冲突的令人震惊的可能性,世界无法承受的后果。

en: The recent attack on Saudi Arabia ’s oil facilities was completely unacceptable .
zh: 最近对沙特阿拉伯的石油设施的袭击是完全不能接受的。

en: In a context where a minor miscalculation can lead to a major confrontation , we must do everything possible to push for reason and restraint .
zh: 在轻微的误算可能导致重大的冲突的情况下,我们必须尽一切努力争取理性和克制。

en: I hope for a future in which all the countries of the region can live in a state of mutual respect and cooperation , without interference in each other ’s affairs .
zh: 我希望这个地区所有国家能够在一个相互尊重和合作的状态下生活,不干涉彼此的事务。

en: I hope equally that it will still be possible to preserve the progress on nuclear non-proliferation represented by the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action .
zh: 我 同样 希望, 在 联合 全面 行动 计划 中 所 表现 的 核 不 扩散 方面 的 进展 仍 能够 得到 保留 。

en: From the first day , I have emphasized prevention , mediation and a surge in diplomacy for peace in order to address the crises that we face .
zh: 从第一天起,我强调了预防、调解和和平外交的兴起,以解决我们面临的危机。

en: Consider the lives that we can save by strengthening our investments to sustain peace around the world .
zh: 让我们考虑通过加强我们为维持世界和平的投资来拯救生命。

en: Across some of the most troubled corners of the world , some 100,000 United Nations peacekeepers protect civilians and promote peace .
zh: 在世界上一些最麻烦的地方,大约有100,000名联合国维持和平人员保护平民并促进和平。

en: Through the Action for Peacekeeping initiative , we are strengthening our effectiveness and efficiency and we are renewing partnerships with troop - and police - contributing countries , host countries and regional organizations , such as the African Union and the European Union .
zh: 通过 维持 和平 行动 倡议, 我们 加强 了 我们 的 效率 和 效率, 我们 正在 与 部队 和 警察 派遣 国 、 东道国 和 非洲 联盟 和 欧洲 联盟 等 区域 组织 重新 建立 伙伴 关系 。

en: I am also proud of the work of our humanitarian workers , easing suffering around the world .
zh: 我也对我们的人道主义工作者的工作感到自豪,帮助减轻世界各地的苦难。

en: Fully half of all international relief aid is channelled through the United Nations , ensuring that millions receive protection , food , medicine , shelter , water and other life - saving forms of assistance .
zh: 整个国际救济援助的一半是通过联合国 channelled的, 确保数百万人得到保护 、 粮食 、 药品 、 住房 、 水和其他救生形式的援助.

en: This year alone , in brutal attacks and other circumstances , we have lost at least 80 peacekeepers , humanitarian workers and others , all of whom gave their lives serving the United Nations and trying to better the lives of others .
zh: 仅今年,在残酷的袭击和其他情况下,我们损失了至少80名维持和平人员、人道主义工作者和其他人员,他们都为联合国服务并努力改善其他人的生活而牺牲了生命。

en: I honour their service and their sacrifice .
zh: 我尊重他们的服务和牺牲。

en: We have bolstered our counter-terrorism architecture and defined new strategies to tackle violent extremism and to address root causes , while respecting human rights .
zh: 我们加强了打击恐怖主义的架构,确定了应对暴力极端主义和解决根本原因的新战略,同时尊重人权。

en: I have put forward a new disarmament agenda to advance global peace .
zh: 我提出了一项新的裁军议程,以促进全球和平。

en: In the near term , the New START Treaty must be extended .
zh: 在不久的将来, 新 START 条约必须延长。

en: We must work to address the heightened threat posed by ballistic missiles and ensure a successful 2020 Review Conference of the Parties to the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons .
zh: 我们 必须 努力 解决 弹道导弹 所 构成 的 日益 严重 威胁, 并 确保 《 不 扩散 核武器 条约 》 缔约国 2020年 审查 会议 取得 成功 。

en: The situation of the Korean peninsula remains uncertain .
zh: 朝鲜半岛的局势仍然不确定。

en: I fully support the efforts towards a new summit between the President of the United States and the leader of the Democratic People ’s Republic of Korea .
zh: 我 完全 支持 美国 总统 和 朝鲜 民主主义 人民 共和国 领导人 举行 新 的 首脑 会议 的 努力 。

en: At this time of transition and dysfunction in global power relations , there is a new risk looming on the horizon that may not yet be large but it is real .
zh: 在这个全球权力关系的转型和失效时期,在远景上出现了新的风险,虽然可能还不大,但它是现实的。

en: I fear the possibility of a great fracture — the world splitting in two , with the two largest economies on Earth creating two separate and competing worlds , each with their own dominant currency , trade and financial rules , their own Internet and artificial intelligence capacities and their own zero - sum geopolitical and military strategies .
zh: 我担心会发生巨大的分裂 — — 世界将分裂成两个,地球上最大的两个经济体会形成两个独立的竞争世界,每个国家都有自己的主导货币、贸易和金融规则、自己的互联网和人工智能能力以及自己的零总地缘政治和军事战略。

en: We must do everything possible to avert the great fracture and maintain a universal system — a universal economy with universal respect for international law , a multipolar world with strong multilateral institutions .
zh: 我们必须尽一切可能,避免大裂缝,维护一个普遍的制度 — — 一个普遍尊重国际法的全球经济,一个具有强有力的多边机构的多极世界。

en: Madam Speaker , " I solemnly swear that in all things appertaining to the trial of the impeachment of Donald John Trump , President of the United States , now pending , I will do impartial justice according to the Constitution and laws . "
zh: 主席女士, “ 我庄严宣誓,在所有有关美国总统唐纳德·约翰·特朗普被起诉的案件中,我将按照宪法和法律公正公正审判。 ”

en: It is an oath rooted in the Revolution fought by their grandparents to create a republic of laws , not kings .
zh: 这是他们祖父母为建立一个法律的共和国而斗争的革命中根深蒂固的誓言,而不是国王。

en: It is an oath whose power derives from its common sense : that a juror must always be impartial for a trial to be fair .
zh: 这是一项宣誓,其权力来自它的常识:陪审员必须始终公正,以使审判公正。

en: And it is an oath made necessary by the fact that Senators are not , as we are not , under normal circumstances , impartial in our work .
zh: 这是由于参议员在正常情况下不公正地做我们的工作而必须作出的誓言。

en: The words chosen for this oath recognize that when our Constitution calls Senators to try impeachment , it calls them away from their role as partisans .
zh: 为这一誓言所选择的词语承认,当我们的宪法要求参议员进行起诉时,它要求他们远离作为党派的职责。

en: When that oath is taken , Senators are supposed to step back from the affiliation of party or political kinship with or opposition to the President on trial .
zh: 在宣誓时,参议员应撤离与总统审判时的党派或政治亲属关系或反对总统的立场。

en: Madam Speaker , this afternoon , Senators will be asked to vote on the two Articles of Impeachment the House presented on abuse of power and the obstruction of Congress .
zh: 主席女士,今天下午,参议员将被要求就众议院提出的滥用权力和阻挠国会的两项弹劾条款进行表决。

en: After voting to refuse to hear evidence and call witnesses with pertinent information , nearly all Republican Senators have already announced that they will vote against the articles .
zh: 经过投票拒绝听证并要求提供有关资料的证人,几乎所有共和党参议员已经宣布他们将投票反对这些条款。

en: In doing so , many of them acknowledge that what President Trump did was wrong and inappropriate .
zh: 他们中许多人承认特朗普所做的是错误和不恰当的。

en: They accept that it was wrong for him to withhold military aid to Ukraine until the President of that country promised to interfere in the American elections .
zh: 他们承认,他拒绝向乌克兰提供军事援助是错误的,直到该国总统承诺干预美国选举。

en: The evidence of President Trump 's abuse of power and attempt to solicit foreign interference in the 2020 elections is clear enough that Republican Senators can not and have not denied the facts , yet they can not bring themselves to confront this President and are choosing party over country .
zh: 特朗普总统滥用权力和试图要求外国干预2020年选举的证据十分清楚,共和党参议员不能否认事实,但他们却不能让自己面对这位总统,并且选择党派胜任国家。

en: The Senator from Alaska , in explaining her decision to vote to block witnesses and evidence , tried to deflect responsibility from the consequences of her actions , writing : " I have come to the conclusion that there will be no fair trial in the Senate . "
zh: 来自阿拉斯加的参议员在解释她决定投票阻止证人和证据时,试图从她的行动的后果中转移责任,写道:“我已得出结论,参议院不会有公正的审判。

en: I agree with that .
zh: 我同意这一点。

en: She further said : " It is sad for me today to admit that , as an institution , the Congress has failed . "
zh: 她还说: “ 今天我很难承认, 作为一个机构, 国会已经失败了. ”

en: Madam Speaker , the Congress has not failed .
zh: 主席女士,国会没有失败。

en: The House did its job , whether you agree or not .
zh: 不管你同意还是不同意,众议院做了它的工作。

en: In regular order , by a vote of this House , we impeached the President of the United States based upon our oath to protect and defend the Constitution of the United States .
zh: 按照正常秩序,我们通过众议院的表决,以我们的誓言保护和捍卫美国宪法为基础起诉美国总统。

en: The House did its job and did so with the solemnity required when undertaking the process of impeachment , which we did not seek but accepted as our responsibility under the Constitution .
zh: 众议院履行了其职责,并履行了在进行 impeachment进程时所要求的庄严,而我们并没有寻求,而是根据宪法接受了这项责任。

en: Many of the witnesses and documents , of course , were withheld by the White House .
zh: 当然,许多证人和文件被白宫隐瞒。

en: It is the Senate that will fail if Senators do not uphold their oaths to impartial justice .
zh: 如果参议员不遵守他们对公正公正的誓言,那就是参议院的失败。

en: It is the Senate , Madam Speaker , that will fail if it does not hold this President accountable for using a hold on military aid to compel an ally to interfere in our election for his own personal gain .
zh: 只有参议院,主席女士,如果它不让这位总统负责利用占领军事援助迫使盟友干涉我们的选举以他个人利益,就将失败。

en: History will judge poorly those who choose fear of their party over the courage to do the right thing .
zh: 历史将对那些选择对党派的恐惧而采取正确的行动的勇气作不好的判断。

en: There was no lobbying .
zh: 没有游说。

en: There was no pressure .
zh: 没有压力。

en: Our members voted consistent with their oath of office and the conviction that that vote was required by that oath to protect and defend the Constitution .
zh: 我们 的 成员 投票 符合 他们 的 职务 誓言, 并 深信, 这项 誓言 要求 对 宪法 进行 保护 和 辩护 。

en: Americans will judge .
zh: 美国人会判断。

en: I am often asked why the House passed Articles of Impeachment even knowing that the odds were slim that Senate Republicans would set aside partisanship and hear the case as impartial jurors .
zh: 我经常被问到,为什么众议院通过 impeachment条款,即使知道参议院共和党人会放弃党派支持并作为公正的陪审员审理案件的可能性很小。

en: It is because I know future generations will look back on this chapter in our history and ask :
zh: 因为我知道未来几代人会回顾我们历史的这一章节并问:

en: Who stood up for the values our Founders charged us to keep ?
zh: 谁捍卫了我们的创始者要求我们保持的价值?

en: Who refused to shrink from the heavy responsibilities of their oath ?
zh: 谁拒绝缩小他们宣誓的沉重责任?

en: I can be proud that the House did its job , followed the law , defended our Constitution .
zh: 我感到自豪的是,众议院做了它的工作,遵照法律,捍卫了我们的宪法。

en: We did not convict ; that is not our role .
zh: 我们没有被定罪,这不是我们的角色。

en: Essentially , what we said was there was probable cause that powers had been abused and certainly cause to see that the President refused to cooperate with the constitutional responsibilities of the House of Representatives .
zh: 基本上,我们所说的是,有可能是权力被滥用的原因,而且肯定有理由看到总统拒绝与众议院的宪法责任进行合作。

en: I am also proud of the House managers , as all of my colleagues on the Democratic side of the aisle are proud of our managers who made their case .
zh: 我也对众议院的经理感到骄傲,因为我与民主党的同事们都对那些为自己辩护的经理感到骄傲。

en: They made their case with intellect .
zh: 他们用智慧来辩护。

en: They made their case with evidence that had been adduced here in the House .
zh: 他们用在众议院上提出的证据来提出他们的论据。

en: They made their case and appealed to Senators to hold this President accountable , as our Founders intended .
zh: 他们提出了自己的主张,呼吁参议员将这位总统绳之以法,正如我们的创始者所打算的。

en: Almost everybody has watched a trial either in person or on television .
zh: 几乎每个人都亲自或电视上观看了审判。

en: Seventy - five percent of our people wanted to have witnesses because that was their understanding of what a trial is , not just argument at the beginning and argument at the end , but evidence for jurors who have pledged to be impartial to consider .
zh: 七十五 % 的人民希望有证人,因为这是他们对审判的理解,不仅仅是开始和结束的争论,而是保证不偏不倚的陪审员的证据。

en: Any judge in this country would agree that opening and closing statements alone are not a trial .
zh: 这个国家的任何法官都会同意,开庭和结束庭的发言本身并不是一个审判。

en: Nevertheless , the House managers proved their case .
zh: 尽管如此, 众议院的经理们证明了他们的观点.

en: The American people know what that truth is and know what this President has done .
zh: 美国人知道这个事实是什么,知道这位总统做了些什么。

en: And they will remember who on this day abided by the truth , the whole truth , and nothing but the truth .
zh: 他们将记住今天谁坚持真理, 全真理, 只有真理.

en: The orderly transfer of authority as called for in the Constitution routinely takes place , as it has for almost two centuries , and few of us stop to think how unique we really are .
zh: 正如宪法所要求的那样,权力的有序转移是经常发生的,这已经持续了近两个世纪了,我们当中很少有人会停下来思考我们到底有多独特。

en: In the eyes of many in the world , this every 4 - year ceremony we accept as normal is nothing less than a miracle .
zh: 在世界上许多人的眼里, 每四年一次我们接受的这个仪式是正常的,只不过是奇迹而已.

en: Mr. President , I want our fellow citizens to know how much you did to carry on this tradition .
zh: 主席先生,我希望我们的同胞知道你为继续这一传统付出了多大的努力。

en: By your gracious cooperation in the transition process , you have shown a watching world that we are a united people pledged to maintaining a political system which guarantees individual liberty to a greater degree than any other , and I thank you and your people for all your help in maintaining the continuity which is the bulwark of our Republic .
zh: 通过你们在过渡过程中的慷慨合作,你们向全世界展示了我们是团结一致的人民,承诺维护一个比其他任何国家更保障个人自由的政治制度,我感谢你们和你们人民在维护我们共和国的支柱的连续性方面所给予的一切帮助。

en: The business of our nation goes forward .
zh: 我们国家的事业向前迈进。

en: These United States are confronted with an economic affliction of great proportions .
zh: 这些美国正面临着巨大的经济困境。

en: We suffer from the longest and one of the worst sustained inflations in our national history .
zh: 我们遭受了我国历史上最长的持续通货膨胀和最严重的持续通货膨胀。

en: It distorts our economic decisions , penalizes thrift , and crushes the struggling young and the fixed - income elderly alike .
zh: 它扭曲了我们的经济决策, 惩罚了储蓄, 压垮了那些苦难的年轻人和固定收入的老年人.

en: It threatens to shatter the lives of millions of our people .
zh: 它威胁着摧毁我们数百万人的生命。

en: Those who do work are denied a fair return for their labor by a tax system which penalizes successful achievement and keeps us from maintaining full productivity .
zh: 那些工作的人被一个惩罚成功的成就和阻止我们保持充分生产力的税收制度剥夺了他们劳动的公平回报。

en: But great as our tax burden is , it has not kept pace with public spending .
zh: 但无论我们的税收负担有多大,它仍未与公共支出相适应。

en: For decades we have piled deficit upon deficit , mortgaging our future and our children 's future for the temporary convenience of the present .
zh: 几十年来,我们把赤字堆积成赤字堆积,把我们的未来和我们的子女的未来以目前的暂时方便为代价。

en: To continue this long trend is to guarantee tremendous social , cultural , political , and economic upheavals .
zh: 继续这一长期趋势是保证巨大的社会 、 文化 、 政治和经济动荡.

en: You and I , as individuals , can , by borrowing , live beyond our means , but for only a limited period of time .
zh: 你和我,作为个体,可以借钱,生活超出我们的能力,但只限于有限的时间。

en: Why , then , should we think that collectively , as a nation , we 're not bound by that same limitation ?
zh: 为什么, 那么, 我们应该认为, 作为一个国家, 我们不是被同样的限制所束缚的?

en: We must act today in order to preserve tomorrow .
zh: 我们必须今天行动,才能保卫明天。

en: And let there be no misunderstanding : We are going to begin to act , beginning today .
zh: 让我们不要误解:我们今天开始行动。

en: The economic ills we suffer have come upon us over several decades .
zh: 几十年来,我们所遭受的经济弊端已经临到我们头上。

en: They will not go away in days , weeks , or months , but they will go away .
zh: 它们不会在几天、星期、或几个月里消失,但它们会消失。

en: They will go away because we as Americans have the capacity now , as we 've had in the past , to do whatever needs to be done to preserve this last and greatest bastion of freedom .
zh: 他们会离开,因为我们作为美国人现在有能力,正如我们过去那样,做任何需要做的事来保存这个最后最大的自由堡垒。

en: In this present crisis , government is not the solution to our problem ; government is the problem .
zh: 在当前的危机中,政府不是解决我们的问题;政府是问题。

en: From time to time we 've been tempted to believe that society has become too complex to be managed by self - rule , that government by an elite group is superior to government for , by , and of the people .
zh: 有时我们被诱惑相信,社会已经变得过于复杂,不能由 自我 统治来管理,一个精英团体的政府比政府更优于人民的政府。

en: Well , if no one among us is capable of governing himself , then who among us has the capacity to govern someone else ?
zh: 如果我们当中没有人能治理自己,那么谁有能力治理别人呢?

en: The solutions we seek must be equitable , with no one group singled out to pay a higher price .
zh: 我们寻求的解决方案必须是公平的,没有哪个群体愿意付出更高的代价。

en: We hear much of special interest groups .
zh: 我们听到许多特别利益集团。

en: Well , our concern must be for a special interest group that has been too long neglected .
zh: 我们必须关心一个长期以来被忽视的特殊利益集团。

en: It knows no sectional boundaries or ethnic and racial divisions , and it crosses political party lines .
zh: 它没有分区界限或种族和种族隔离,它跨越了政党的界限。

en: It is made up of men and women who raise our food , patrol our streets , man our mines and factories , teach our children , keep our homes , and heal us when we 're sick — professionals , industrialists , shopkeepers , clerks , cabbies , and truck drivers .
zh: 它由男人和女人组成,他们养活我们的食物,巡逻我们的街道,管理我们的矿山和工厂,教导我们的孩子们,维护我们的家园,在生病时治愈我们 — — 专业人员,工业家,商店主,职员,咖啡馆和卡车司机。

en: They are , in short , " We the people , " this breed called Americans .
zh: 他们就是, 简言之, “ 我们是人民, ” 这个叫美国人的品种.

en: Well , this administration 's objective will be a healthy , vigorous , growing economy that provides equal opportunities for all Americans , with no barriers born of bigotry or discrimination .
zh: 这个政府的目标将是一个健康、充满活力、增长的经济,它为所有美国人提供平等的机会,没有因偏见或歧视而产生的障碍。

en: Putting America back to work means putting all Americans back to work .
zh: 把美国重新投入工作意味着把所有美国人重新投入工作。

en: Ending inflation means freeing all Americans from the terror of runaway living costs .
zh: 结束通货膨胀意味着把所有美国人从逃避生活成本的恐怖中解放出来。

en: All must share in the productive work of this " new beginning , " and all must share in the bounty of a revived economy .
zh: 所有人都必须参与这一“新开端”的生产性工作,也必须参与复兴经济的丰盛。

en: With the idealism and fair play which are the core of our system and our strength , we can have a strong and prosperous America , at peace with itself and the world .
zh: 以理想主义和公平竞争作为我们制度的核心和力量,我们能够拥有一个强大繁荣的美国,与自己和世界和平相处。

en: Mr. President , I need to catch my breath , so much has happened .
zh: 主席先生,我需要喘息,发生了这么多事。

en: A few hours ago , on the West Front of this citadel of democracy , Joe Biden and KAMALA HARRIS were administered the oaths of Office to the Presidency and Vice Presidency of the United States .
zh: 几小时前,在这个民主的堡垒的西面,乔·比登和卡马拉·哈里斯向美国总统和副总统宣誓。

en: We have turned the page to a new chapter in the history of our democracy , and I am full of hope .
zh: 我们已经打开了我国民主历史的新篇章,我充满了希望。

en: I would challenge anyone not to feel hopeful today after listening to Amanda Gorman , the amazing 22 – year - old poet , wise far beyond her years , who told us that :
zh: 听阿曼达·戈尔曼(Amanda Gorman)的讲话后,我谨向任何人提出挑战:

en: The hope she spoke about — the strong and happy hope — the hope we feel today , is a hope , of course , that is tempered by reality .
zh: 她所讲的希望 — — 强烈而快乐的希望 — — 我们今天所感受到的希望, 当然是希望, 它由现实所调和的。

en: The crowds that customarily line the National Mall were absent , a reminder that our Nation is still in the throes of a deadly pandemic .
zh: 传统上排列在国家广场的人群没有出现,这提醒我们国家仍处于致命的流行病的苦难之中。

en: The presence of thousands of National Guardsmen , police , and Secret Service was a reminder that 2 weeks ago , in this very room and on those very steps where President Biden took the oath , a mob of violent criminals tried to dismantle our democracy — our sacred democracy — brick by brick and would try again if they could .
zh: 数以千计的国民卫兵、警察和情报部门的出现提醒我们,两周前,在这个房间和总统比登宣誓的那段台阶上,一群暴力犯罪分子试图摧毁我们的民主 — — 我们的神圣的民主 — — 砖块砖块,如果他们能再试一次。

en: But , as President Biden said a few hours ago , today , democracy has prevailed , the will of the people was heeded , and the peaceful transfer of power fulfilled .
zh: 但是,正如比登总统几小时前所说的,今天,民主已经取得胜利,人民的意愿得到尊重,和平的权力转移得到了实现。

en: Let it be a message to our friends and adversaries around the world that our democracy , though it has been tried and been tested , shall long endure .
zh: 让我们向全世界的朋友们和敌人传递一个信息,那就是我们的民主虽然经过考验,但仍将长期存在。

en: And let it be a message to those terrorists who desecrated this temple of democracy that they will never prevail .
zh: 让我们向那些破坏民主的寺庙的恐怖分子传达一个信息,那就是他们永远不会胜过。

en: KAMALA HARRIS is now the 49th Vice President of the United States .
zh: 卡马拉·哈里斯现任美国第49任副总统。

en: Today , the threat to our democracy from the Presidency itself has ended , but the challenges we face as a nation remain .
zh: 今天,总统本身对我国民主的威胁已经结束,但我们作为一个国家面临的挑战仍然存在。

en: In the wake of violence and division , hatred and mistruth , in the shadow of disease and economic hardship , a warming planet and unequal society , we begin the work of the 117th Congress .
zh: 在暴力和分裂、仇恨和误解的背景下,在疾病和经济困难、全球变暖和不平等社会的阴影下,我们开始了第117届国会的工作。

en: In his inaugural address , President Biden spoke to this moment — a moment of great challenge — and told us two simple truths : One , that our responsibilities are numerous , and , two , it will take unity — unity of spirit , unity of purpose — to fulfill them .
zh: 在布登总统就职演说中,他谈到了这一时刻 — — 一个巨大的挑战时刻 — — 并告诉我们两个简单的事实:一是我们的责任是众多的,二是要团结 — — 精神团结,目的团结 — — 才能完成它们。

en: President Biden , we heard you loud and clear .
zh: 比登总统,我们听到你的声音很响亮。

en: We have a lengthy agenda , and we need to get it done together .
zh: 我们有一个漫长的议程,我们需要一起完成。

en: President Biden pointed the way to our Nation ’s recovery and renewal .
zh: 比登总统指出了我国的复苏和复兴之路。

en: He reminded us of who we are and where we need to go , but we must now turn the spirit of his words into action .
zh: 他提醒我们我们是谁,我们需要去哪里,但现在我们必须把他的话的精神转化为行动。

en: The Senate must immediately set to work on the mission President Biden described — restoring the greatness and goodness of America .
zh: 参议院必须立即开始完成总统比登所描述的任务 — — 恢复美国伟大和善良。

en: This will be an exceptionally busy and consequential period for the U.S. Senate .
zh: 这对美国参议院来说将是一个非常繁忙的时期。

en: There is much to do , and we are ready to get to work .
zh: 还有许多事情要做,我们准备开始工作。

en: Now , not to upstage our new President and Vice President , but theirs has not been the only swearing in today .
zh: 现在,不是为了提升我们的新总统和副总统的形象,但他们不是今天唯一宣誓的。

en: A few moments ago , the Senate welcomed three new Members to this Chamber .
zh: 几分钟前,参议院欢迎三名新成员进入这个大厅。

en: I can now happily and proudly call them Senator PADILLA , Senator OSSOFF , and Senator WARNOCK .
zh: 现在我可以高兴而自豪地叫他们参议员帕迪拉、参议员奥斯索夫和参议员沃诺克。

en: They join Senators KELLY , HICKENLOOPER , and Luján as part of a six - Member class of Democratic Senators and a new Democratic Senate majority .
zh: 他们加入了凯利 、 希肯洛佩尔和卢扬的参议员,他们是民主党参议员的六名成员和新民主党参议院多数的组成部分.

en: I mention the historic nature of Vice President HARRIS ’ ascendance , but let ’s not forget that her successor , ALEX PADILLA , is the first Latino Senator to represent California ; that RAFAEL WARNOCK , born while Georgia was represented in this Chamber by two staunch segregationists , is now the first African - American Senator Georgia has ever elected ; and that JOHN OSSOFF is the first Jewish Senator from his State , sworn in today on a book of Hebrew Scripture once owned by the rabbi , who , decades ago , formed a bond between the Jewish and African - American communities of Georgia .
zh: 我提到了副总统哈里斯的崛起的历史性,但让我们不要忘记她的继任者阿莱克斯·帕迪拉是第一个代表加利福尼亚的拉丁裔参议员;拉斐尔·沃诺克在乔治亚州被两个坚定的种族隔离主义者所代表时出生,现在是乔治亚州历史上第一位非洲裔美国参议员;约翰·奥斯索夫是第一个来自他的州的犹太参议员,今天宣誓在犹太圣经一本书上,曾经由拉比拥有,数十年前,他建立了乔治亚州的犹太和非洲裔美国社区之间的纽带。

en: With the swearing in of these three Senators , the Senate will turn to Democratic control , for which I deeply thank my colleagues .
zh: 通过这些三名参议员的誓言,参议院将转向民主控制,对此我深表感谢我的同事。

en: We will return to Democratic control under the first New York - born majority leader in American history — a kid from Brooklyn , the son of an exterminator and a housewife , and a descendant of victims of the Holocaust .
zh: 我们将回到美国历史上第一个出生于纽约的多数党领袖的民主党控制之下 — — 布鲁克林的一名孩子,一个灭绝者和家庭主妇的儿子,以及 holocaust受害者的后裔。

en: That I should be the leader of this new Senate majority is an awesome responsibility — awesome in the Biblical sense , as the angels that tremble in awe before God .
zh: 我应该成为新参议院多数派的领袖,这是一种可怕的责任 — — 从圣经上讲,就像神面前畏惧的天使一样。

en: Today , I feel the full weight of that responsibility , a sense of reverence and of awe at the trust placed in me .
zh: 今天,我感受到了这种责任的全部重荷,对我所赋予的信任感和敬畏感。

en: I intend to honor that trust with all of my energy and with joy .
zh: 我打算用我的全部精力和欢乐来称颂那份信任。

en: And as the majority changes in the Senate , the Senate will do business differently .
zh: 由于参议院多数人改变,参议院将进行不同的事务。

en: The Senate will address the challenges our country faces head on and without delay , not with timid solutions but with boldness and with courage .
zh: 参议院将毫不拖延地解决我国面临的挑战,不以胆怯的解决办法,而是以勇气和勇气。

en: The Senate will tackle the perils of the moment , a once - in - a - generation health and economic crisis , and it will strive to make progress on generations - long struggle for racial justice , economic justice , equality of opportunity , and equality under the law .
zh: 参议院将处理当前的危险, 一代一代的健康和经济危机,并将努力在世代长久的种族正义、经济正义、机会平等和法律平等的斗争中取得进展。

en: And make no mistake , the Senate will forcefully , consistently , and urgently address the greatest threat to this country and to our planet : climate change .
zh: 并且不要犯错,参议院将坚决、一致、紧急解决对我国和地球最大的威胁:气候变化。

en: This Senate will legislate .
zh: 参议院将立法。

en: And to my Republican colleagues , when and where we can , the Democratic majority will strive to make this important work bipartisan .
zh: 对共和党的同事们来说,无论什么时候和在哪里,多数民主党人都会努力让这项重要工作成为两党派的工作。

en: The Senate works best when we work together .
zh: 我们一起工作时,参议院最能发挥作用。

en: We have no choice .
zh: 我们没有选择。

en: The divisions in the country are real .
zh: 这个国家的分裂是真实的。

en: We have no choice but to try to work together every day to reward the faith the American people have placed in us .
zh: 我们别无选择,只能努力每天共同努力,以回报美国人民对我们的信念。

en: So let us begin .
zh: 让我们开始吧。

en: I yield the floor .
zh: 我让步了。

en: I wish to make a ministerial statement about the first confirmed case of COVID - 19 in New Zealand .
zh: 我谨就新西兰第一个证实的COVID-19病例发表部长声明.

en: On Friday , 28 February , New Zealand recorded its first case of the COVID - 19 coronavirus , becoming the 48th country to have a confirmed case .
zh: 2月28日星期五, 新西兰首次记录了COVID-19冠状病毒的病例, 成为已证实的第48个国家.

en: The individual had entered the country two days earlier after spending some weeks in Iran , which is currently experiencing a sizable outbreak of the disease .
zh: 该人两天前在伊朗度过了好几周后进入该国,目前伊朗正经历大规模的疫情爆发。

en: I can report to the House that they are currently in a stable and improving condition at Auckland Hospital .
zh: 我能向众议院报告他们目前在奥克兰医院的状况稳定和改善。

en: The good news in this instance is that the individual had limited contact with people upon their return to the country , and their family took all the appropriate measures when presenting at the emergency department .
zh: 这个例子的好消息是,个人在返回国家时与人接触有限,而他们的家人在向紧急部门提出时采取了一切适当的措施。

en: As you would expect , our public health service is working hard to contain this first case and limit the risk of any spread of the disease .
zh: 正如你所预期的那样,我们的公共卫生部门正努力控制这起病例并限制疾病传播的风险。

en: Contact tracing began immediately and has gone to plan .
zh: 联系跟踪立即开始,并已进行计划。

en: All 15 people who were seated nearby the individual on their flight into New Zealand have been traced and are being told to self - isolate .
zh: 所有15人被追踪到他们飞往新西兰的飞机上,并被告知自己 孤立.

en: Public health staff will remain in touch with individuals to monitor the situation and give ongoing advice .
zh: 公共卫生人员将与个别人士保持联系,以监测情况并提供持续的建议。

en: All but 10 of the remaining passengers on the flight , who are not considered to be close contacts , have also been contacted to provide reassurance and answer any questions they might have ; those 10 that have n't been contacted did not provide accurate contact information .
zh: 除了机上其余的10名乘客之外,他们还被联系,以提供保证和回答他们可能遇到的任何问题;没有联系的10名乘客没有提供准确的联络资料。

en: I 'm advised that as a result of our decisive response , the chance of an outbreak from our first case is low .
zh: 我被告知,由于我们作出决定的反应,我们的第一宗病例爆发的可能性很小。

en: Internationally , the situation with COVID - 19 continues to develop at pace .
zh: 国际上, 科维德-19 的局势继续发展缓慢.

en: However , the Director - General of the World Health Organization said , this morning , containment … is feasible and must remain the top priority for all countries .
zh: 然而, 世界卫生组织总干事说, 今天早上, 控制是可行的,必须是所有国家最优先的.

en: At every step , the Government has taken decisions in the interests of health and safety of the wider public , and so far we have been among the best at keeping COVID - 19 at bay .
zh: 政府在每一个步骤中都为广大市民的健康和安全作出了决定,迄今为止,我们一直是保持COVID-19在外的最优秀的国家之一。

en: Just yesterday , Cabinet decided to extend for another week the travel restrictions that have been in place for China since 3 February and for Iran since last Friday .
zh: 就在昨天,内阁决定将从2月3日开始对中国和去年星期五以来对伊朗实行的旅行限制延长一周。

en: These restrictions have played a key role in keeping COVID - 19 out of New Zealand for so long and have given us time to better understand the disease and ramp up our preparations .
zh: 这些限制对保持COVID-19在新西兰之外发挥了关键作用,并给了我们时间更好地了解疾病并加快我们的准备。

en: Of course , members will be aware that there are outbreaks in other regions as well .
zh: 当然,会员们会知道其他地区也有疫情。

en: So , as a further precaution , we have decided that anyone arriving in New Zealand who has been in northern Italy or South Korea who has been there in the last 14 days will be registered for self - isolation .
zh: 因此, 作为进一步的预防措施, 我们决定任何到达新西兰的,在北意大利或韩国的,在过去14天中在那里的,都将被登记为 自我 孤立.

en: This is based on an expert assessment of risk .
zh: 这基于专家对风险的评估。

en: It recognises that while there are outbreaks in both countries , they also have well - developed health systems and the outbreaks are largely located in specific regions .
zh: 它承认,虽然这两个国家都有疫情,但它们的卫生系统也十分发达,疫情主要集中在特定地区。

en: It is a longstanding and successful approach to managing infectious diseases and has proven its worth again in recent weeks .
zh: 它是一个长期有效的治疗传染病的方法,最近几周又证明了它的价值。

en: We have also stepped up the health presence at our airports .
zh: 我们还加强了机场的卫生服务。

en: All airlines flying into New Zealand have been requested to read a health message upon landing , and all arrivals into New Zealand will receive health information cards alongside the standard customs declaration form .
zh: 所有飞往新西兰的航空公司已要求在降落时阅读健康信息,所有抵达新西兰的航空公司将收到健康信息卡,并附上标准海关申报表。

en: As a result of decisions taken on Friday , health staff are meeting all direct international flights landing in New Zealand airports from Hong Kong , Japan , South Korea , Singapore , and Thailand .
zh: 由于星期五作出的决定,医务人员正在接见来自香港、日本、韩国、新加坡和泰国的新西兰机场的所有直接国际航班。

en: Our border response is further ramping up to have health staff available for all international flights into New Zealand .
zh: 我们 的 边境 反应 正在 进一步 扩大, 以便 为 所有 进入 新西兰 的 国际 航班 提供 医疗 人员 。

en: All these decisions and actions are designed to limit the spread of any sporadic COVID - 19 cases that might arrive in New Zealand .
zh: 所有这些决定和行动都是为了限制在新西兰出现的任何偶发的COVID-19病例的传播。

en: At the same time , our health system continues its preparations in line with our comprehensive pandemic plan .
zh: 同时,我们的卫生系统继续按照我们的全面流行病计划进行准备。

en: I want to thank our DHBs , public health staff , and primary care and health officials for the work they are doing to protect the public .
zh: 我要感谢我们的卫生防护人员、公共卫生工作人员、初级医疗和卫生官员为保护公众所做的工作。

en: I have high confidence in our medical professionals .
zh: 我对我们的医务人员有很高的信心。

en: We have a strong public health system .
zh: 我们有一个强大的公共卫生系统。

en: We continue to work to keep COVID - 19 out , but we are ready if it arrives in our community .
zh: 我们继续努力保持COVID-19在外,但是如果它到达我们的社区,我们已经准备好了。

en: This is the 37th time I have spoken to you from this office , where so many decisions have been made that shaped the history of this Nation .
zh: 这是我从这个办公室向你们讲话的第37次,在这个办公室里已经作出了许多决定,这些决定塑造了这个国家的历史。

en: Each time I have done so to discuss with you some matter that I believe affected the national interest .
zh: 我每次这样做是为了和你讨论一些我认为影响国家利益的事情。

en: In all the decisions I have made in my public life , I have always tried to do what was best for the Nation .
zh: 在我一生中所作的所有决定中,我总是尽力为国家做最好的事。

en: Throughout the long and difficult period of Watergate , I have felt it was my duty to persevere , to make every possible effort to complete the term of office to which you elected me .
zh: 整个“水门”的漫长而艰难时期,我感到这是我的职责,坚持不懈,竭尽全力完成你选我担任的任期。

en: In the past few days , however , it has become evident to me that I no longer have a strong enough political base in the Congress to justify continuing that effort .
zh: 然而,在过去的几天里,我已明白,我已不再在国会拥有足够强大的政治基础来证明继续努力。

en: As long as there was such a base , I felt strongly that it was necessary to see the constitutional process through to its conclusion , that to do otherwise would be unfaithful to the spirit of that deliberately difficult process and a dangerously destabilizing precedent for the future .
zh: 只要 有 这样 一 个 基础, 我 强烈 认为, 必须 把 宪法 进程 完成 到 结束, 否则 就 违背 了 这个 故意 困难 的 进程 的 精神, 而且 是 对 未来 造成 危险 破坏 稳定 的 先例 。

en: But with the disappearance of that base , I now believe that the constitutional purpose has been served , and there is no longer a need for the process to be prolonged .
zh: 但随着基地的消失,我相信宪法的目的已经实现,不再需要延长这一进程。

en: I would have preferred to carry through to the finish , whatever the personal agony it would have involved , and my family unanimously urged me to do so .
zh: 我宁愿继续到最后,不管它会带来多少个人痛苦,我的家人一致地敦促我这样做。

en: But the interests of the Nation must always come before any personal considerations .
zh: 但是,民族的利益必须在任何个人考虑之前得到考虑。

en: From the discussions I have had with Congressional and other leaders , I have concluded that because of the Watergate matter , I might not have the support of the Congress that I would consider necessary to back the very difficult decisions and carry out the duties of this office in the way the interests of the Nation will require .
zh: 从与国会和其他领导人的讨论中,我得出结论,由于水门问题,我可能不会得到国会的支持,我将认为有必要支持这些非常困难的决定,并按国家利益需要的方式履行这个办公室的职责。

en: I have never been a quitter .
zh: 我从来没当过妓女。

en: To leave office before my term is completed is abhorrent to every instinct in my body .
zh: 在我任期结束之前离开办公室,对我的身体的一切本能都是可憎的。

en: But as President , I must put the interests of America first .
zh: 但作为总统,我必须把美国的利益放在首位。

en: America needs a full - time President and a full - time Congress , particularly at this time with problems we face at home and abroad .
zh: 美国需要一个全职总统和一个全职国会,特别是现在我们在国内和国外面临的问题。

en: To continue to fight through the months ahead for my personal vindication would almost totally absorb the time and attention of both the President and the Congress in a period when our entire focus should be on the great issues of peace abroad and prosperity without inflation at home .
zh: 继续在今后几个月内为我个人的辩护而斗争将几乎完全吸收总统和国会的时间和注意力,在这个我们应该把全部注意力放在国外和平和国内不通胀的繁荣的伟大问题的时代。

en: Therefore , I shall resign the Presidency effective at noon tomorrow .
zh: 因此,我将于明天中午起就职。

en: Vice President Ford will be sworn in as President at that hour in this office .
zh: 福特副总统将在这一时刻就职。

en: As I recall the high hopes for America with which we began this second term , I feel a great sadness that I will not be here in this office working on your behalf to achieve those hopes in the next 2 1/2 years .
zh: 我记得我们开始第二届总统任期时对美国抱有很高的希望,因此我感到非常遗憾,我不会在这办公室里代表您工作,以便在接下来的两年半里实现这些希望。

en: But in turning over direction of the Government to Vice President Ford , I know , as I told the Nation when I nominated him for that office 10 months ago , that the leadership of America will be in good hands .
zh: 但在向福特副总统转任政府领导时,我知道,正如我在10个月前提名他担任该职务时告诉国家,美国的领导将掌握在好手中。

en: In passing this office to the Vice President , I also do so with the profound sense of the weight of responsibility that will fall on his shoulders tomorrow and , therefore , of the understanding , the patience , the cooperation he will need from all Americans .
zh: 在向副总统转交这个职务时,我也带着深切的责任感,将把责任放在他明天的肩上,因此,他需要来自所有美国人的理解、耐心、合作。

en: As he assumes that responsibility , he will deserve the help and the support of all of us .
zh: 他承担了这一责任,他应该得到我们所有人的帮助和支持。

en: As we look to the future , the first essential is to begin healing the wounds of this Nation , to put the bitterness and divisions of the recent past behind us and to rediscover those shared ideals that lie at the heart of our strength and unity as a great and as a free people .
zh: 当我们展望未来时,首先是开始治愈这个国家的伤口,把最近的痛苦和分裂放在后面,重新发现我们作为伟大和自由的人民的核心那些共同的理想。

en: By taking this action , I hope that I will have hastened the start of that process of healing which is so desperately needed in America .
zh: 通过采取这一行动,我希望我能加快美国迫切需要的治疗进程的开始。

en: I regret deeply any injuries that may have been done in the course of the events that led to this decision .
zh: 我深表遗憾,在导致这一决定的事件中可能发生过任何伤害。

en: I would say only that if some of my judgments were wrong -- and some were wrong -- they were made in what I believed at the time to be the best interest of the Nation .
zh: 我只是说,如果我的一些判断是错误的--还有一些是错误的--那么它们是根据我当时认为是国家的最好利益而作出的。

en: To those who have stood with me during these past difficult months -- to my family , my friends , to many others who joined in supporting my cause because they believed it was right -- I will be eternally grateful for your support .
zh: 对那些在这些困难的几个月里同我站在一起的人--对我的家人,朋友,以及许多其他参与支持我的事业的人,因为他们相信这是正确的--我永远感谢你们的支持。

en: And to those who have not felt able to give me your support , let me say I leave with no bitterness toward those who have opposed me , because all of us , in the final analysis , have been concerned with the good of the country , however our judgments might differ .
zh: 对那些无法给予我支持的人来说,让我说,我不会对那些反对我的人感到痛苦,因为我们所有人,在最后的分析中,都关心国家的利益,不管我们的判断如何不同。

en: So , let us all now join together in affirming that common commitment and in helping our new President succeed for the benefit of all Americans .
zh: 因此,让我们现在团结起来,重申这一共同承诺,帮助我们的新总统取得成功,为所有美国人的利益。

en: I shall leave this office with regret at not completing my term , but with gratitude for the privilege of serving as your President for the past 5 1/2 years .
zh: 本人因未能完成任期而感到遗憾,但感谢在过去5年半担任总统的荣幸。

en: These years have been a momentous time in the history of our Nation and the world .
zh: 这些年是我国和世界历史上的一个重要时期。

en: They have been a time of achievement in which we can all be proud , achievements that represent the shared efforts of the Administration , the Congress , and the people .
zh: 这是我们大家可以自豪的成就时期,这些成就代表了政府、国会和人民的共同努力。

en: But the challenges ahead are equally great , and they , too , will require the support and the efforts of the Congress and the people working in cooperation with the new Administration .
zh: 但未来的挑战同样巨大,它们也需要国会和与新政府合作工作的人民的支持和努力。

en: We have ended America 's longest war , but in the work of securing a lasting peace in the world , the goals ahead are even more far - reaching and more difficult .
zh: 我们结束了美国最漫长的战争, 但在确保世界持久和平的工作中, 未来的目标更远 、 更困难.

en: We must complete a structure of peace so that it will be said of this generation , our generation of Americans , by the people of all nations , not only that we ended one war but that we prevented future wars .
zh: 我们必须完成一个和平的结构,以便人们能够对这一代美国人说:我们不仅结束了一场战争,还防止了今后的战争。

en: We have unlocked the doors that for a quarter of a century stood between the United States and the People 's Republic of China .
zh: 我们打开了一个世纪四分之一的美国与中华人民共和国之间的门。

en: We must now ensure that the one quarter of the world 's people who live in the People 's Republic of China will be and remain not our enemies , but our friends .
zh: 现在我们必须确保世界上居住在中华人民共和国的四分之一的人不是我们的敌人,而是我们的朋友。

en: I am proud to come here to Philadelphia and join my fellow Democrats .
zh: 我很高兴来到费城并加入我的民主党人。

en: In 1960 , the Democrats of this city produced a margin in the presidential race that was in this city three times as large as it was in the whole United States .
zh: 在1960年,这个城市的民主党人在总统竞选中产生了一个席位,这个城市的席位比整个美国大三倍。

en: So I am proud to be back here again , and I am very happy to be introduced by your distinguished chairman , Bill Green .
zh: 因此,我很高兴再次回到这儿,很高兴能见到您尊敬的主席比尔·格林。

en: When he became chairman of this city committee , there were 300,000 more Republicans registered in the city of Philadelphia than Democrats , and it is a source of satisfaction to me that tonight there are 260,000 more Democrats registered .
zh: 当他成为该市委员会主席时,费城市的共和党人比民主党人注册的人数多了300,000人,今晚的民主党人注册人数多了260万人,这使我感到满意。

en: I can understand why some Republicans may not like it , but , as a Democrat , as one who believes in the Democratic Party , as one who believes that the Democratic Party has meant progress for this city , this State , and this country , I am proud to be here in Philadelphia .
zh: 我明白为什么一些共和党人可能不喜欢,但是,作为一个民主党人,一个相信民主党的人,一个相信民主党对这个城市,这个州和这个国家意味着进步的人,我自豪地在这里,费城。

en: I do not come from Philadelphia , and I would not interfere , but I am hopeful and confident that when we come to the Army - Navy game in a month from now , we will be greeted by the new mayor of Philadelphia , Mayor Tale .
zh: 我不是来自费城的,我不会干涉,但我充满希望和信心,当我们到一个月后参加陆军-海军比赛时,我们将被费城的新市长,梅尔·塔尔(Mayor Tale)欢迎。

en: And I am glad to be here with a mayor who follows two other distinguished mayors of this city , who carries on their tradition - Joe Clark , your United States Senator who was a great mayor of Philadelphia , and Dick Dilworth , who followed him , who was a great mayor of Philadelphia .
zh: 我很高兴能与一位跟随这个城市的其他两位杰出市长的市长一同出席,他们继承了他们的传统--你的美国参议员乔·克拉克(Joe Clark)是费城的一位伟大的市长,他跟随的迪克·迪尔沃思(Dick Dilworth)是费城的一位伟大的市长。

en: And I am glad to be here with Judge Hoffman and Senator Mahady who also run this fall in the State of Pennsylvania .
zh: 我很高兴与霍夫曼法官和马哈迪参议员一同出席,他们也是今年秋天在宾夕法尼亚州的总统。

en: Everyone expects things of Presidents , but I am not sure that they realize how much depends upon the Members of the House and the Members of the Senate who must make the final judgment on what kind of laws a President must execute .
zh: 每个人都期望总统的事情,但我并不确定他们意识到,他们如何取决于众议院议员和参议院议员,他们必须对总统执行哪些法律作出最后的判决。

en: The Congressmen from this city as well as the Senator from this State - Bill Barrett and Bob Nix and Herman Toll and Jim Byrne and Chairman Green - have , with Joe Clark supported legislation month in and month out that benefited this city and this State and this country and , what is more , has helped make the United States meet its responsibilities around the globe .
zh: 来自这个城市的国会议员以及来自这个州的参议员--比尔·巴雷特、鲍勃·尼克斯、赫曼·托尔、吉姆·拜恩和格林主席--在乔·克拉克的支持下,每个月都为这个城市、这个州和这个国家带来好处的立法,而且,更重要的是,帮助美国履行其全球责任。

en: So what you do in this city counts all across the country , and Philadelphia has sent the right men to the House of Representatives and to the Senate of the United States .
zh: 因此,你在这个城市做的事在全国各地都有数目,而费城已经派出了正确的人去美国众议院和参议院。

en: And I am also proud to be here with your former Governor who is now working for us in Washington as our adviser on fair housing , Governor Dave Lawrence , of the State of Pennsylvania .
zh: 我也自豪地在这里与你们的前州长戴夫·劳伦斯(Dave Lawrence),宾夕法尼亚州的公平住房顾问一起工作。

en: Three years ago tomorrow night , I spoke in this hall in the closing days of the 1960 campaign , and I asked the people of this city to give us their support to help this country move again .
zh: 三年前,我将在1960年竞选的最后几天里在这个大厅里讲话,并请这个城市的人民给予我们支持,帮助这个国家重新前进。

en: The people of Philadelphia gave that support , and the support I received from this city and this State was , as it was in the 1960 convention , the key to our victory across the country .
zh: 费城人民给予了这种支持,我从这个城市和这个州得到的支持,正如1960年大会一样,是我们全国的胜利的关键。

en: I am back in Philadelphia to express my thanks for that support and also to express appreciation for the help we received from those Democrats in this city and State , and to report to you on the progress that this country has made on the goals that were outlined 3 years ago .
zh: 我回到费城,感谢你们的支持,并感谢我们从这个城市和州的民主党人那里得到的帮助,并向你们汇报这个国家在3年前提出的目标上所取得的进展。

en: I did not promise on that October night that life would be easy in the Great Republic .
zh: 那天十月夜,我没有保证在大共和国的生活会轻松。

en: I did not say we would not have new pressures and new problems .
zh: 我没有说我们不会有新的压力和新的问题。

en: Nor did I speak of swift solutions in 100 days in office .
zh: 我也没有提到在100天的任期内迅速解决的问题。

en: I talked instead about the kind of America that I wanted for my family and for your family and all those who are citizens of this country in these difficult and changing years , the kind of America in which I believed , not as a Democrat or as a candidate , but as a citizen .
zh: 相反,我谈论了我要为我的家人和你们的家人以及在这个艰难和变化的岁月中这个国家的所有公民的那种美国,那种我相信的美国,不是作为民主党人或候选人,而是作为公民。

en: Today , in many ways , the world looks very different , and the revolutionary change of pace is even more rapid than it has been in the past .
zh: 如今,在许多方面,世界看起来非常不同,革命的步伐甚至比过去更快。

en: But there has been no change in my concept of the goals which this country must strive for if it is to meet its responsibilities to its people and those who depend upon it .
zh: 但是,我对这个国家必须努力达到的目标的观念没有改变,如果它要履行对人民和依赖它的人的责任。

en: I still believe in the kind of America which I described in this hall 3 years ago , and I am still determined that this Nation shall continue to strive to meet those goals .
zh: 我仍信奉我3年前在这个大厅里所描述的那种美国,我仍坚信这个国家将继续努力实现这些目标。

en: And I am gratified to be able to report some progress in the last 33 1/2 months .
zh: 我很高兴能够报告过去33个月半的进展。

en: I said , first of all , that I believed in America where work was available to those who were willing and able to work , where the waste of idle men and machines could be avoided , and where greater economic growth could provide the new jobs and the new markets that our growing Nation needed .
zh: 我说,首先,我相信在美国,那些愿意和能够工作的人可以找到工作,可以避免闲置的人和机器的浪费,而且更大的经济增长可以提供我们不断增长的国家所需要的新工作和新市场。

en: That goal has not been fully achieved .
zh: 这一目标尚未完全实现。

en: There are still too many men and women , particularly young men and women , unable to find work .
zh: 还有太多的男性和女性,尤其是年轻的男性和女性,找不到工作。

en: And our high wartime tax rates still prevent our economy from growing as fully and as freely as it must .
zh: 而且,我们的战时高税率仍然妨碍我们的经济得以充分和自由地增长。
