en: Um , and you guys will see , like , a lot more stuff in the future , but first we want to focus on these two products .
zh: 嗯,你们将来会看到更多的东西,但首先我们想集中精力看这两个产品。

en: I wanted to get these out to you guys because you guys have been asking for styling products since the beginning , so I 'm so glad to finally have actual styling products that I can , um , you know , present to you guys .
zh: 我想把这些发给你们,因为你们从一开始就要求发型产品,所以我很高兴终于有了真正的发型产品,我可以,嗯,你知道,向你们介绍。

en: So this first product that I 'm going to show you guys is the Nourished by Shawnta Curl Defining and Soft Hold Styler , which is enriched with sesame seed oil and rose essence .
zh: 因此,我将向你们展示的第一款产品是Shunta Curl Defining和Soft Hold Styler的营养品,它富含麻籽油和玫瑰精华。

en: So this product is – I just – I love it .
zh: 因此,这个产品是-我只是-我喜欢它。

en: You guys can see on the camera it 's super thick .
zh: 你可以在摄像机上看到它非常厚。

en: Um , it does have like a butter feel to it .
zh: 嗯,它有点像黄油的感觉。

en: It 's a cream , but it has a really buttery feel to it .
zh: 它是一种奶油,但它的确有奶油的味道。

en: The ingredients in here are super jam - packed .
zh: 里面的材料是超级酱料包装的.

en: There 's even honey in here .
zh: 这里甚至还有蜂蜜。

en: I wanted to make sure that this styler actually contributes to the health of your hair .
zh: 我想要确保这个发型师实际上有助于你的头发的健康。

en: So a lot of times with stylers , they 're just , you know , there to give you a nice style , which is great , but I want to make sure that all my products are geared towards the health of the hair even if they 're styling products .
zh: 所以很多时候,发型师,他们只是,你知道,给你一个漂亮的发型,这太棒了,但我想确保所有我的产品都是针对发型产品的,即使他们都是发型产品。

en: So I was , like , not backing down on that part .
zh: 因此,我并没有放弃那部分。

en: So there are , like , really jam - packed vitamins , nutrients in this formula .
zh: 因此, 如, 在这个配方中, 确实有填充的维生素 、 营养物质.

en: As I mentioned , one of the ingredients is pure honey , along with a lot more nutrient - dense botanicals and herbs .
zh: 正如我所提到的, 其中一种成分是纯蜂蜜, 以及更多的营养 - 浓密的植物和草药.

en: So this is geared towards moisturizing your hair and also hair growth .
zh: 因此,这是为了使你的头发湿润,并使头发生长。

en: I really did want to make sure that I infused that into the product as well .
zh: 我真的想确保我把这个注入到产品中。

en: If you guys are wondering , the smell of this product is very natural .
zh: 如果你想知道,这种产品的味道很自然。

en: It 's very natural , and it does n't have a strong scent .
zh: 它很自然,而且没有强烈的气味。

en: With all of my products are normally like a pretty natural smell .
zh: 我的所有产品通常都是很自然的气味。

en: I do n't put really really strong scents in my products .
zh: 我不会把我的产品里放得非常强烈的气味。

en: I can just like – I ca n't even begin to tell you how much time and effort I put into this line .
zh: 我甚至不能告诉你我花了多少时间和精力来写这篇文章。

en: I just – I do n't know what to say .
zh: 我只是...我不知道该说什么。

en: I 'm like " What else can I say ? What else can I say ? "
zh: 我想: “ 我还能说什么? 我还能说什么? ”

en: I do n't know what to say .
zh: 我不知道该说什么。

en: I 'm just so excited to finally , like , give it to you guys and know that it 's gon na contribute to the actual health of your hair .
zh: 我只是太兴奋了,终于,像,给你们,知道它能促进你们头发的实际健康。

en: You can use this on twist outs .
zh: 你可以在转弯处使用这个。

en: You can use this on braid outs .
zh: 你可以在胸罩上使用。

en: You can even use it on your wash - n - go as well .
zh: 你甚至可以在洗衣服上使用它.

en: But I will say with wash - n - go's a- on my channel , I always show you guys wash - n - go's where I put a gel on there .
zh: 但我要说,在我的频道上,我总是向你们展示洗-n-go的地方,我把它涂上一层凝胶。

en: So I could not come out with a cream and tell you guys just – " You can use it on your wash - n - go's " when that would kinda go against all that I 've always said on my channel , which is " Gels actually are what make your wash - n - go stay . "
zh: 所以我不能带奶油来告诉你们, “ 你可以用它在你们的洗手间去, ” 这会有点违背我常在频道上说的,那就是“ 凝胶实际上是让你的洗手间呆的地方. ”

en: So that brings us to the next product , which is my curl defining jelly .
zh: 这样我们就到了下一个产品,那就是我的曲线定义的 Jelly 。

en: I have a gel as well , so it 's not just a cream .
zh: 我也有凝胶, 所以不是只是奶油.

en: I have another styler as well , which is a gel .
zh: 我还有另外一种发型剂, 就是凝胶.

en: So the next product is the Angelic Clear Coarse Jelly with aloe plus rosemary , and it 's a curl - defining and light - to - medium whole jelly , and it 's enriched with aloe vera juice , which is amazing .
zh: 因此,下一个产品是 Angelic Clear Coarse Jelly 与 aloe plus rosemary, 是 curl - defining 和 轻到中等的全胶 Jelly, 并由 aloe vera  juice 丰富, 这真是太棒了.

en: So with gels – a lot of times you will find gels that kinda , like , dry out your hair .
zh: 因此,用凝胶 — — 很多时候你会发现凝胶有点像,干掉头发。

en: Lots of ingredients in it that kinda like counteracts what you would typically want for your hair .
zh: 里面有许多成分,有点像抵消了你通常要的头发。

en: But a lot of times we kinda , like , deal with it because , you know , the gel is what 's gon na keep our hair in place and make it actually last .
zh: 但是很多时候我们有点,像,处理它,因为,你知道,凝胶是把头发保持在原来的位置和使它真正持久的。

en: So I wanted to make a gel that did not do any of those things .
zh: 所以我想制作一个没有这些东西的凝胶。

en: So this gel is going to give a light - to - medium health .
zh: 因此,这种凝胶将给 轻微 到 中等健康.

en: You guys already know that – if you follow my channel for a while , you know that I use , like , light defining gels and jellies and stuff all throughout my channel .
zh: 你们已经知道了,如果你们跟随我的频道一段时间,你们知道我用光标胶、海绵和其它东西在整个频道里。

en: So we slept to like 7:15 today .
zh: 所以我们今天睡得像7:15了。

en: Anyways I just wanted to show you guys this is what our shoes look like every day after we get done hiking in Glacier .
zh: 不管怎样,我只是想向你们展示一下我们每天在冰川徒步完毕后穿鞋的样子。

en: That 's how the paths are , so I have to clean them every day um but yeah .
zh: 这条路就是这样,所以我每天都要清理它们,但是是的。

en: So that 's fun just a heads up , hiking in Glacier , it 's not muddy it 's just the dusty dirt paths are very dusty .
zh: 因此,在冰川上徒步旅行,只是头上,很有趣,它不是泥泞的,只是尘埃的泥路很尘埃。

en: But hey I just wanted to give a shout out to these Adidas Terrex shoes , I literally bought these hiking shoes right before our trip .
zh: 但是,嘿,我只是想向这些阿迪达斯特雷克斯鞋发出一声叫声,我实际上就在我们的旅行之前买了这些徒步鞋。

en: They literally arrived on my doorstep the day before we left for the trip because I needed some new hiking shoes , and these have been absolutely the best hiking shoes I 've ever owned .
zh: 他们 буквально在我们离开旅行的前一天到达我的门口,因为我需要一些新的徒步鞋,这些绝对是我所有过的最好的徒步鞋。

en: So if you 're in a need for some new hiking shoes I definitely recommend these Adidas Terrex .
zh: 所以如果你需要一些新的徒步鞋,我绝对推荐这些阿迪达斯特雷克斯。

en: What I like about these is that they 're tennis shoe - like then they have the rubber soles on the front for if you 're walking through , like , wet grass areas and the grip on these guys are amazing .
zh: 我喜欢的这些是它们是网球鞋-就像他们前面的橡胶鞋,如果你在穿过,像,湿的草地和这些家伙的握住是惊人的。

en: So these have been awesome for hiking and I highly recommend them , especially if you 're looking for like a lighter shoe that 's not heavy like hiking boots or anything .
zh: 因此,这些对于徒步旅行非常棒,我非常推荐它们,特别是如果你正在寻找像轻型鞋一样,不是像徒步靴或任何东西一样重的。

en: If you need shoes , get these .
zh: 如果你需要鞋子,就买这些。

en: So it 's our last day and we are just driving the uh – Going to the Sun Road and we ’re just gon na stop along wherever we want to go .
zh: 所以这是我们的最后一天,我们只是开车去太阳路,我们只是开车去任何我们想去的地方停下来。

en: We 're not having any plans today and right now we are at like a river waterfall area , so yeah we 're just gon na kind of roll with whatever happens today , so just chill , relax and enjoy our last day in beautiful Glacier National Park !
zh: 我们今天没有计划,现在我们就像河水瀑布一样,所以我们只是在玩弄今天的事情,所以冷静下来,放松,享受美丽的冰川国家公园的最后一天!

en: Alright so I think we 're gon na just do a tiny bit of hiking this morning just to kind of get out and move , and we feel pretty good from hiking 12 miles yesterday , like we 're totally ready to go again .
zh: 好吧,我想我们今天早上要出去散散步,我们昨天散散步了12英里,感觉很舒服,好像我们完全准备回去了。

en: So I think we 're gon na start here at the loop trailhead which is the same highline – um , trail that we did the other day .
zh: 因此我认为我们应该从这儿开始,是同一条高线的环路头 — — 嗯,我们前几天的路线。

en: It 's just the other end of it , um , so we 're just gon na hike a little bit on that .
zh: 这只是它的另一端,嗯,所以我们只是想在上面做个小 hike。

en: It is overcast today and they said there could be some rain , so we 're probably gon na go far and that 's okay .
zh: 今天天气阴暗,他们说可能会下雨,所以我们可能要去远点,没关系。

en: This is a pretty cool little thing that is posted here at the loop so this Going - To - The - Sun Road is actually considered a national landmark now , how cool .
zh: 这是一个很酷的小东西,它在这里贴在环上,所以这个去-到-太阳路实际上被认为是一个全国的里程碑,多么酷。

en: 1997 they declared it .
zh: 1997年,宣布成立。

en: It 's one of the best roads in the US I feel , it 's amazing .
zh: 这是美国最好的道路之一,我觉得,真是太棒了。

en: We got the bear spray though .
zh: 不过我们还有熊喷雾。

en: Alright , I think we made it about a mile on the loop and I think we 're gon na turn around because thing is it 's all uphi- uphill and we 're just we 're being lazy today .
zh: 好吧,我想我们在循环上跑了大约一英里,我想我们快要转弯了,因为事情是全是上坡上坡的,我们只是今天懒惰。

en: We 've been hiking 10 plus miles a day so , you know what , last day we 're gon na – we 're gon na chill .
zh: 我们每天徒步10英里以上,所以,你知道吗, 上天我们很紧张,我们很冷。

en: And yeah I 'm gon na head back and then just keep driving and stop along the way .
zh: 是的,我要去回去,然后继续开车,沿着这条路停下来。

en: There 's a grizzly bear and two babies that were hanging out up here .
zh: 这里有一只熊和两个小孩玩在一起。

en: I could n't get it on my camera .
zh: 我不能把它放在相机上。

en: She was like too far away and then she 'd like go into the bush and stuff but I do have my big Canon and I was able to get some photos of her but that was cool !
zh: 她好像太远了,然后她想进丛林里去,但是我确实有我的大Canon,我能拍一些她的照片,但那真是太酷了!

en: Because we have n't seen any yet and it 's our last day so we were really hoping to see some today and we did !
zh: 因为我们还没有看到任何东西,这是我们最后一天,所以我们真希望今天能看到一些,我们做到了!

en: So that 's so cool I 'm so glad we found .
zh: 那太酷了,我很高兴我们找到了。

en: Guys so we had an awesome lazy day in the park today and now we are ending our time in Glacier with some pizza .
zh: 伙计们,我们今天在公园度过了一个令人惊叹的懒惰的日子,现在我们正用点比萨来结束我们在冰川的时光。

en: We got beers at Pizza Hut in Montana !
zh: 我们在蒙大拿的比萨哈特喝啤酒了!

en: Montana , you can get beer .
zh: 蒙大拿,你可以买啤酒。

en: Alright Pizza Hut was awesome and now we went and got some ice cream .
zh: 好吧,比萨哈特很棒,现在我们去买点冰淇淋。

en: I told him a small .
zh: 我告诉他一个小问题。

en: Everything 's bigger in Montana .
zh: 蒙大拿州的一切都大了。

en: Everything 's bigger in Montana .
zh: 蒙大拿州的一切都大了。

en: But anyways we 're just down by this river here that 's like right here in Columbia Falls and we 're going to eat our ice cream and enjoy our last evening here .
zh: 但是不管怎样,我们就在这条河边,就像在哥伦比亚瀑布里一样,我们要去吃冰淇淋,在这里享受我们最后的晚上。

en: It is windy as you can see
zh: 正如你看到的那样,风很大

en: I just wanted to thank you guys so much for watching our vlog .
zh: 我只是想非常感谢你们看了我们的 vlog 。

en: We had such a great time being back in Glacier and I hope this inspired you to come out here and see one of our most favorite national parks we 've ever been to in the USA .
zh: 我们很高兴回到冰川,我希望这能激励你们到这儿来参观我们最喜爱的美国国家公园之一。

en: We have a 10 hour drive today ahead of us .
zh: 今天我们前面有10小时的车程。

en: We are heading to Gillette , Wyoming and then from there we are going to be heading into South Dakota .
zh: 我们要去怀俄明州吉尔莱特,然后从那里我们要去南达科他州。

en: And if you have n't already be sure to give this video a thumbs up .
zh: 如果你还没有确定要给这个视频一个大拇指。

en: If you have any questions of course comment below and do n't forget to subscribe for future videos .
zh: 如果您有任何问题,当然可以下文评论,并不要忘记订阅未来视频。

en: It 's like lipstick central .
zh: 就像唇膏中心。

en: Eventually I actually — maybe we can check for this at Target .
zh: 最终我实际上 — 也许我们可以在Target上检查一下。

en: I actually want to get one of those acrylic things where the lipsticks can just stand up in it and it looks super neat .

en: Kharma Medic here and welcome back to another dose .
zh: 卡尔玛医生,欢迎你回到另一剂量。

en: So in today 's video , I 'm finally gon na be doing a room tour .
zh: 因此在今天的视频中, 我终于开始做一个房间巡游.

en: I know this is something that you guys have requested for a very long time , and after two and a half years of living here , I finally feel like I 've made it my own and decorated it how I want , and I 'm ready to show it to you guys .
zh: 我知道这是你们很长时间以来的请求,经过两年半在这里生活之后,我终于感觉自己做了它,把它装饰成我想要的样子,我准备向你们展示。

en: Alright so let 's start off with the bed and the couch area .
zh: 好吧,让我们从床和沙发开始。

en: Honestly , if I was redoing this from the beginning , I would have really liked to have a double bed in this room , but , unfortunately , with the space as you can probably see from that wall there till the door , it 's basically just enough to fit a bed and a couch , and this is my couch over here .
zh: 老实说,如果我从一开始就重新设计了,我真想在这个房间里有一个双人床,但是,不幸的是,由于你可能从那堵墙看到那扇门的空间,基本上就够了一张床和一张沙发,这是我的沙发。

en: I 've recently changed it , and if you 've been following my channel for a long time , then you 'll know I 'm really proud of how I color match the pictures on the wall over here with sort of the gray and yellow vibe , the gray and yellow cushions .
zh: 我最近改变了它,如果你已经追踪我的频道了很长时间,那么你会知道,我非常自豪我如何将墙上的图片与灰色和黄色的振荡,灰色和黄色的垫子相匹配。

en: This couch is also quite big , it fits three people quite comfortably , and if I have family or friends staying over , it opens up into a full double bed .
zh: 这个沙发也是相当大的,它可以容纳三个人,而且如果我有家人或朋友呆在一起,它可以打开成一个完整的双人床。

en: This coffee table over here , it 's glass and has two levels , so it 's really good when we have multiple friends over , and we have lots of food to put on the table , or if we 're playing board games , we can have people sit around it , and still have a lot of space to lay everything out .
zh: 这张咖啡桌上,是玻璃,有两层,所以当我们有多个朋友的时候非常好,我们有很多东西摆在桌上,或者如果我们正在玩板游戏,我们可以让人们坐在它周围,还有足够的空间摆放一切。

en: So there 's nothing too special about the bed itself , but it does have a very important function , which , it has a lot of storage .
zh: 因此,这张床本身没什么特别之处,但是它有一个非常重要的功能,它有很多存储空间。

en: So down here is basically where I keep everything that I ca n't really keep in my room , because there 's not enough space .
zh: 因此,这里基本上就是我把所有我不能真正放在房间里的东西都放在的地方,因为没有足够的空间。

en: I 've got an ironing board , all of my suitcases , socks , clothes that I do n't wear that often , anything that I need for fixing the house like screwdrivers , drills , nails , all these things that I definitely would n't want to have laid out in my room , but I still need somewhere in the house .
zh: 我有一个熨斗板,所有我的行李箱,袜子,我不经常穿的衣服,我需要修理房子的任何东西,比如螺旋桨,钻头,钉子,所有这些东西我肯定不想放在我的房间里,但我仍然需要在家里的某个地方。

en: I love that this room has floor - to - ceiling windows as well , it really lets the light come in , especially in the summer time .
zh: 我喜欢这个房间有地板到天花板的窗户,它真的让光进来,尤其是在夏天。

en: I know London does n't have that much light , but I 'll take as much as I can , and there 's also a small balcony out here , which is fairly rare for London .
zh: 我知道伦敦没有那么多的光线,但我会尽量多拿,而且外面还有一个小阳台,这对于伦敦来说很罕见。

en: We have two chairs where we can sit down and sort of enjoy the weather when it is a little bit better , um but now it 's really cold so just gon na close it .
zh: 我们有两张椅子,我们可以坐下来享受一下天气,当天气有点好的时候,嗯,但现在真的冷了,所以就把它关上吧。

en: And then a little behind the scenes that you probably will never see again in a video is that down here I keep all of the filming gear that does n't really fit anywhere else in the room : two sets of tripods , I also have a c - stand .
zh: 然后,在场景后面的一点,你可能不会再在视频中看到,就是我把所有的摄像机放在下面,这些摄像机真的不适合房间的其他地方:两套三脚架,我还有一个c架。

en: Okay next to my bed , I 've got the radio alarm clock , and this has actually changed my life .
zh: 好吧,在我床边,我有收音机闹钟,这实际上改变了我的生活。

en: It makes waking up in the morning and getting out of bed at 6:00 a.m. when it 's pitch black outside so much easier when you 're waking up really early .
zh: 它使早晨醒来和早上6点起床,外面天黑,当你醒来很早的时候就更容易了。

en: It 's so much better to wake up to the sound of somebody talking to you : your favorite radio station , some music , whatever , instead of that classic iPhone alarm , " ba , ba , ba . "
zh: 听到别人对你说话的声音比起来好得多: 你的最喜欢的收音机, 音乐, 什么, 而不是那种经典的iPhone警报, “ 巴, 巴, 巴 ”.

en: Over here on the wall , these are posters that I actually bought back in 2013 in my first year of university in Toronto , and I really really liked them so I 've kept them around .
zh: 在这墙上,这些是我在2013年在多伦多大学的第一年买回来的海报,我非常喜欢它们,所以我把它们留在那里。

en: Also I 'm really proud that I managed to put them up all by myself , they look quite neat , and I feel like they 're equally spaced , so I 'm really proud of how they turned out .
zh: 我也非常自豪,我自己设法把它们都摆起来,它们看起来很整洁,而且我觉得它们都一样有空间,所以我非常自豪它们是如何出现的。

en: Hey it ’s Jackie and welcome back to my vlog channel .
zh: 嘿,我是杰克,欢迎回到我的 vlog频道。

en: We are currently in the car yet again and we ’re driving to Alexander Springs .
zh: 我们现在又回到了车里,开车去亚历山大·斯普林斯。

en: This theme is a Grecian mermaid .

zh: 还有尾巴,这次我们有一个硅尾巴,非常类似于这张唇色,我的朋友玛丽安和我们在一起,我喜欢她的摄影风格和风格。

en: So she actually made this kind of Grecian top , like , very quickly , and I ca n’t wait to see this location .
zh: 所以她真的做了这种希腊式的顶部,像,非常快,我可不等看这个位置。

en: And then after that we are headed to Orlando , I ’m gon na see my parents and we ’re doing Harry Potter World .
zh: 然后我们要去奥兰多,我要去见我的父母,我们正在做哈利波特世界。

en: We had to go into this little corner store because um we had to pee and we had to get five dollars worth of stuff .
zh: 我们必须到这个小店里去,因为我们得尿,我们得买东西值五美元。

en: Saw this place on the corner of the road .
zh: 看到这条路的拐角处。

en: We love tacky .
zh: 我们喜欢粘贴的。

en: This place is so cool .
zh: 这个地方太酷了。

en: Doing some touch-ups before we head into the springs and I ’m using this really beautiful Mac blush , this is the shade Melon Pink .
zh: 在我们进入泉源之前做一些触摸,我正在使用这件非常漂亮的麦克红脸,这是梅隆粉红色的阴影。

en: For eyes I ’ve been using the Dominique ‘ the Moment Palette ’ .
zh: 为了眼睛,我一直在使用多米尼克的“时刻 palette ” 。

en: I used this in my last video but instead of going with the blues I went with these shades here and I love these together .
zh: 我在最后的视频中使用了这个,但是我没有用蓝调,而是用这些阴影,我喜欢这些一起。

en: See if I can get you in here .
zh: 看看我能带你进来吗。

en: I ’m gon na add some to my highlight .
zh: 我快要加点 highlight 了。

en: I ’m gon na go with these rounds under the lash line .
zh: 我要用这些枪子在射线下射击。

en: Looks like a resort .
zh: 看起来像是度假胜地。

en: I ’m easily impressed .
zh: 我很容易印象深刻。

en: I feel like we ’re at Mako Island .
zh: 我感觉好像我们在马科岛。

en: It is so green and the tail is kind of H2O-esque .
zh: 它非常绿色,尾巴有点像H2O。

en: We ’re in Florida .
zh: 我们在佛罗里达州。

en: I love how you have your , um –
zh: 我喜欢你这么做,um-

en: What just happened ?
zh: 刚才发生了什么事?

en: Why are you not in – why are you not over there anymore ?
zh: 你为什么不在,为什么不再在那儿呢?

en: I ran for my life because I heard a little chirping sound and we already saw the gator warning , so I was like – and threw the tail off , probably good .
zh: 我为了生命而奔跑,因为我听到了一点尖叫声,我们已经看见了毒气虫的警告,所以我像--把尾巴扔掉了,也许很好。

en: Sorry I did n’t get it on video .
zh: 对不起,我没看到视频。

en: Where you going – where are you going ?
zh: 你要去哪里-你要去哪里?

en: But yeah , we ’re packing up and we ’re headed to Orlando .
zh: 但是的,我们正在收拾行李,我们要去奥兰多。

en: Have anything to say ?
zh: 有什么话要说吗?

en: You look like you were about to .
zh: 你看起来像是要。

en: It ’s a very – it was a bird or something , some sort of small –
zh: 那是一只鸟儿,或者什么东西,有点小——

en: Oh no that ’s not going anywhere .
zh: 哦,不,那不会到哪里去。

en: Jump from one bed to the other , like a child .
zh: 像个孩子一样从床上跳到床上跳。

en: And we ’re doing Universal tomorrow .
zh: 而且我们正在做明天的Universal。

en: This is the Harry Potter World outfit of the day .
zh: 这就是当时的哈利波特世界服装。

en: We did not get up as early as we should have .
zh: 我们不应该这么早起床。

en: Wow , what are you doing ?
zh: 哇,你在干什么?

en: I booked the tickets for the wrong day and that was stressful , but I ended up getting them switched , and we finally made it .
zh: 我给错的一天预订了机票,这很紧张,但最后我把他们换了,我们终于赶上了。

en: For the best experience get a park to park ticket so you can do both Hogsmeade and Diagon Alley .
zh: 为了获得最佳的体验,请购买一个公园到公园的票据,这样你就可以做Hogsmeade和Diagon Alley。

en: Everything is really detailed and when you look up even on the way going into the shop there are owls that move up high .
zh: 一切都非常详细,甚至在进入商店的路上,当你抬头看的时候,有一只猫头鹰在高处移动。

en: You know I got ta go with the kid .
zh: 你知道,我跟那个孩子一起去了。

en: I do n’t know , I ’m looking at every single one !
zh: 我不知道,我正在看每一个!

en: So we got our wands from the shop , and apparently they ’re interactive .
zh: 我们从店里拿了我们的魔杖,很明显它们是互动的。

en: We do n’t actually know what we ’re doing , but here is my wand .
zh: 我们实际上不知道我们正在做什么,但这是我的魔杖。

en: Okay , we ’re trying .
zh: 好吧,我们正在尝试。

en: This one ’s so pretty !
zh: 这个太漂亮了!

en: Okay , how do you do it ?
zh: 好吧, 你怎么做?

en: I kind of – I do the same motion .
zh: 我有点 — 我做同样的动作。

en: Now we know .
zh: 现在我们知道。

en: Look at this tea shop !
zh: 看这个茶店吧!

en: So we just went on at the Harry Potter and the Forbidden Journey ride .
zh: 所以我们只是继续参加哈利·波特和禁止的旅程。

en: You can see that Hogwarts right there .
zh: 你可以看到霍格沃茨。

en: And it was so fun , like , I ’m not a rides person , but , um , it felt like you were flying .
zh: 而且很有趣,我不是骑车的人,但是,嗯,感觉像是你在飞行。

en: How did you like it ?
zh: 你觉得怎么样?

en: I loved it .
zh: 我很喜欢。

en: With the park to park ticket we took the train to Diagon Alley and for lunch we went to the Leaky Cauldron , which has a bunch of British themed food .
zh: 我们乘火车去Diagon Alley,吃午饭去Leaky Cauldron,那里有很多英国主题食物。

en: I would say the food is like a 5 out of 10 .
zh: 我要说,食物比十分之五好。

en: It was n’t amazing but it was a really cool spot .
zh: 那并不令人惊奇,但确实是一个很酷的地方。

en: Low - key Saturday vlog .
zh: 低关键的星期六 vlog.

en: You never know what 's gon na happen on Saturdays for me .
zh: 你永远不知道星期六会发生什么事。

en: You should , like , vlog , like , you taking your dogs out and , like , you getting cereal in the morning , and , like , you 're just chilling at your counter .
zh: 你应该,像, vlog,像,你把你的狗带出去,像,你早上吃谷物,像,你只是在柜台冷冰。

en: That 's what I did !
zh: 这就是我做的!

en: Look at our basil plants .
zh: 看看我们盆栽的植物。

en: I 'm gon na be like this basil plant .
zh: 我要像这盆栽一样。

en: You 're supposed to take basil and put it up your nose .
zh: 你应该拿盆栽,把它放在鼻子上。

en: No , I have never seen that .
zh: 不,我从来没见过。

en: You 're supposed to roll up the basil and put it in your nose .
zh: 你应该卷上盆子,把它放在鼻子里。

en: Do it .
zh: 做吧。

en: I wan na put this in my hair so bad .
zh: 我真不想把这东西弄到头上。

en: Nonna is my father 's mother .
zh: 诺娜是我父亲的母亲。

en: She gave birth to my father , who gave birth to me .
zh: 她生了我的父亲,他生了我。

en: You guys know .
zh: 你们知道。

en: You put your hand here .
zh: 你把手放在这儿。

en: It 's weird , like , teaching them because they teach me everything about cooking !
zh: 真奇怪, 像, 教他们,因为他们教我烹饪的一切!

en: Yes , but I wan na see you guys throw it in the air .
zh: 是的,但我想看看你们把它抛在空中。

en: So , we hold it like this .
zh: 那么,我们这样保持它。

en: So , it 's like , uhh , that motion .
zh: 所以, 就像, 啊, 那动作.

en: If it falls on the floor , it 's okay ?
zh: 如果它掉到地板上, 好 吗?

en: See how you do n't even have to tell Nonna to get , like , all close to the crust , like , she already knows .
zh: 看,你甚至不必告诉诺娜去,比如,她已经知道,全靠在十字架上。

en: The pizza sauce is in Nonna 's blood , that 's where it started .
zh: 比萨酱是诺娜的血中, 就是从那里开始的.

en: You want onions on yours ?
zh: 你想要你的洋葱吗?

en: How 'd you think it went ?
zh: 你觉得怎么样了?

en: I think it went well and I 'm proud of myself too !
zh: 我觉得一切顺利,我也很骄傲!

en: Because I 'm with the ... the beautiful cook !
zh: 因为我和...美丽的厨师在一起!

en: The beautiful pizza maker !
zh: 那个漂亮的披萨制造商!

en: They 're , like , the most Italian women you 've ever met .
zh: 他们, 就像你见过的大多数意大利女人.

en: Look at this .
zh: 看这个。

en: You wan na try ?
zh: 你想试试吗?

en: You sure ?
zh: 你确定吗?

en: It did n't get down !
zh: 它没落下来!

en: And I do these !
zh: 我做这些!

en: I like to toss it .
zh: 我喜欢扔它。

en: You got ta have fun at work .
zh: 你在工作中玩得很开心。

en: It makes it more enjoyable , like , we 're here all the time , so we just , like , have fun together and do this .
zh: 它使它更有趣,比如,我们总是在这里,所以我们只是,像,一起玩耍和做这个。

en: I ca n't pick this up without doing that , I do n't know why .
zh: 我不能不做这件事,我不知道为什么。

en: It 's just , like , a little twist .
zh: 只是有点扭曲。

en: Oh , my god , this is beautiful .
zh: 哦,我的天啊,这很美。

en: Listen to that crunch .
zh: 听着那回声。

en: I love how they 're , like , mesmerized by the pizza .
zh: 我喜欢他们, 像, 被披萨弄得迷人.

en: I always wanted to work here !
zh: 我一直想在这里工作!

en: You can work here !
zh: 你可以在这里工作!

en: You got it !
zh: 你明白了!

en: Bieber not like the animal !
zh: 比伯不喜欢那只动物!

en: Hi everyone , welcome back to my channel .
zh: 大家好,欢迎回到我的频道。

en: My name is Katie and today I 'm going to be talking about my two and a half week long vacation to Portland , Oregon .
zh: 我叫凯蒂,今天我要谈谈我两个半个星期的去俄勒冈州波特兰的假期。

en: So I am from Washington D.C. , and I have a bunch of family in Portland , Oregon , so it was n't my first time going there .
zh: 我来自华盛顿特区,有一家人在俄勒冈州波特兰,所以我不是第一次去那里。

en: I thought that I would make sort of like more of an informative video because I could just like post a vlog , but um the footage was like so random , and all over the place .
zh: 我想我会制作一个多有信息的视频,因为我能像发布一个 vlog一样,但是这个视频很随机,到处都是。

en: I got some really cool footage but um , not like cute like Instagram girl footage , because I did dress like a 12 year old boy the whole time .
zh: 我得到了一些非常酷的视频,但嗯,不像像Instagram女孩的视频那样可爱,因为我整天穿着像一个12岁的男孩。

en: So the first thing that I recommend you do in Portland is not actually in Portland at all .
zh: 所以我建议你首先在波特兰做的事其实根本不在波特兰。

en: So you might be like this is a terrible list .
zh: 所以你可能觉得这是很糟糕的名单。

en: Sorry .
zh: 对不起。

en: The footage that I 'm gon na put in here honestly it looks a little bit fake .
zh: 我敢把这张录像带放在这儿,老实说,看起来有点假。

en: This place was incredible .
zh: 这个地方真是太棒了。

en: We did n't do a whole lot of hiking here because there was not a whole lot of cloud coverage that day , and it was so hot .
zh: 因为那天没有太多的云层覆盖,所以我们在这儿做了很多徒步旅行,天气太热了。

en: So what we did was we drove around the entire perimeter of the lake and you get all these incredible views of the mountains and the lake , and seeing it from all the different angles was so worth it .
zh: 我们开车绕着整个湖区,你可以看到山脉和湖泊的壮观景象,从不同角度来看,真是值得。

en: So maybe this is not something that you want to do if you 're just going to Portland for a couple of days but it 's definitely something to consider if you 're going out to Oregon for a little bit longer period of time .
zh: 所以也许这不是你想要做的,如果你只是去波特兰几天,但是如果你去俄勒冈一段时间,这绝对是值得考虑的事情。

en: These are in no particular order by the way .
zh: 顺便说一下,这些没有特别的顺序。

en: They 're just sort of like what I thought of as I was making this video .
zh: 他们就像我在制作这个视频时想到的那样。

en: So there 's a lot of cool shopping in Portland , Oregon .
zh: 因此,在俄勒冈州波特兰有许多很酷的购物。

en: And then one of the biggest things that you should check out while you 're there is Powell 's which is a bookstore .
zh: 再说,在你到那儿的时候,你应该检查一下最大的东西是鲍威尔的书店。

en: And I want to say it 's like the the biggest like Indie Indie bookstore in America .
zh: 我想说它是美国最大的印第安印第安书店。

en: I guess that 's what it 's called .
zh: 我想这就是它所谓的。

en: So this place was so cool we could have spent hours in here .
zh: 这个地方太酷了,我们在这儿呆了几个小时。

en: The best thing that I thought about this bookstore was that they mixed in new copies of books with used copies .
zh: 我对这家书店最感兴趣的是,他们把新书和旧书混合在一起。

en: So if you 're looking for a book and you 're wondering like – oh I wonder if I could get this used , like it 's usually right next to it , which I thought was just like so awesome .
zh: 所以如果你正在寻找一本书,你想知道-哦,我想知道我是否能用它,它通常就在它旁边,我以为这真是太棒了。

en: That was very exciting for me because I love a used book .
zh: 这对我来说非常刺激,因为我喜欢用过的书。

en: Um I do n't enjoy bugs .
zh: 我不喜欢虫子。

en: But um I will go on a good hike from now and again so just like you know where I 'm coming from .
zh: 但是我会从现在开始一次又一次地徒步旅行,所以就像你知道我从哪里来的一样。

en: My friend Andrea is a biology major so we did stop to look at many slugs that were on the ground and I did beeline it away from the slugs .
zh: 我的朋友安德烈是生物学专业的学生,所以我们停下来看看地面上的许多泥潭,我便把泥潭从泥潭里移开。

en: But if you like slugs , you 're in – you 're in luck .
zh: 但如果你喜欢懒虫, 那么你是幸运的.

en: So the first couple days we were in Portland , we went hiking in Forest Park which you can get to by public transit in the city .
zh: 因此,我们在波特兰的头几天,我们去森林公园徒步旅行,你可以通过城市公共交通工具到达。

en: It 's really quick and some of the trails even pop you back out into like the city , so it 's – it 's really super accessible .
zh: 它非常快速,有些小径甚至会让你回到城市里,所以它 — — 它确实非常易于访问。

en: So we did the Wildwood Trail and we also did a tour of Pittock Mansion .
zh: 因此,我们做了Wildwood Trail,我们还参观了皮托克豪宅。

en: Um if you do n't want to do a tour of Pittock Mansion , I 'd still recommend like taking the trail up there because it has a really cool like overlook of the city that you can go see .
zh: 嗯,如果你不想参观皮托克大厦,我还是建议去那儿走小路,因为那里有一个非常酷的街景,你可以去看看。

en: Um I loved doing that .
zh: 我喜欢做那件事。

en: So number four are the Japanese gardens and the rose gardens in Forest Park .
zh: 第四是日本园和森林公园的玫瑰园。

en: I actually do n't know if they 're like technically in Forest Park but they 're right in the same area .
zh: 我实际上不知道他们是否像技术上在森林公园,但是他们就在同一个地区。

en: So the rose garden is free and open to the public and it is just huge .
zh: 因此,玫瑰园是免费的,开放给公众,而且是巨大的。

en: It 's a lot of roses as you can imagine .
zh: 这是你想象中的许多玫瑰。

en: You get to walk through all these gardens and different types of roses from different parts of the world and yeah it was just really cool .
zh: 你可以穿过这些花园和来自世界各地的不同类型的玫瑰,而且真的太酷了。

en: Then the Japanese gardens you do have to pay for but I will say that it was definitely worth it .
zh: 然后你必须付钱的日本花园,但我会说它绝对值得。

en: If it 's a clear day you can actually see Mount Hood from the Japanese gardens which was really wild , and the garden was just so pretty and quiet and serene .
zh: 如果天气晴朗的话,你可以从日本花园里看到胡德山,那里非常野生,而且花园非常漂亮,安静和宁静。

en: There were even some people like meditating in there which was kind of funny .
zh: 甚至还有一些人喜欢在那里冥想,这很有趣。

en: I did wear my bird shirt – It 's a pretty good bird shirt , I got a compliment on it – which I did n't say this earlier , but I bought this at the Audubon Society which I learned what that was .
zh: 我确实穿了我的鸟衬衫 — — 这件很漂亮的鸟衬衫,我收到了一份赞赏 — — 我以前没有说这话,但我在阿杜邦学会买了这件,我明白了那是什么。

en: I did n't know what that was but it 's um a society for um like bird watching and bird care and um they had a shirt that said bird nerd on it so I bought it because I thought it was funny .
zh: 我不知道那是什么,但是它是一个像看鸟和照顾鸟类这样的社会,他们有一件说鸟类痴迷的衬衫,所以我买了它,因为我觉得很有趣。

en: But I was approached by – I want to say – at least three different people who asked me if I did bird watching like very seriously .
zh: 但我想说,至少有三个不同的人来接近我,他们问我是否非常认真地观察鸟类。

en: So I 'm just about to tuck into a crisp sandwich .
zh: 所以我正准备将它塞进一个鲜嫩的三明治里。

en: Salt vinegar squares are my crisp of choice .
zh: 盐醋方形是我最喜欢的。

en: And I 've got some apple juice because this signifies kind of my diet staples the last few weeks .
zh: 我喝了些苹果汁,因为这代表了我最近几周的饮食习惯。

en: So I thought this was an opportune time to tell you all that a couple of weeks ago I found out that I am pregnant .
zh: 所以我想现在是时候告诉大家,几周前我发现我怀孕了。

en: It 's the first week that I 've been actually able to say the words " I 'm pregnant " and have it not feel really weird .
zh: 这是我第一个星期能够说“我怀孕”的词汇,而且感觉不那么奇怪。

en: I found out on , I think it was the 3rd of January .
zh: 我发现,我想是1月3日。

en: Let 's just double check that .
zh: 让我们再检查一下。

en: I found out on the fifth and that was because my period was late and I am never late .
zh: 我第五天发现,这是因为我的怀孕太晚了,我从不迟到。

en: As soon as I came off the pill my period came back pretty regularly and I started tracking my periods just because I knew the pregnancy was something that eventually we would want , and I know that it helps if you 've been tracking your period so you know your cycle .
zh: 一旦我戒掉药丸,我的月经便很正常地回来了,我开始追踪我的月经只是因为我知道怀孕是最终我们想要的东西,我知道如果你一直在追踪你的月经,那么你就会知道你的周期。

en: And for the first few days / couple of weeks I felt really anxious , really scared , really worried , because my initial reaction was , and still now , I 'm a bit like , I 'm not old enough for this .
zh: 在最初的几天/几周里,我感到非常焦虑,非常害怕,非常担心,因为我的最初反应是,而且现在,我有点像,我不够老了。

en: I 'm not grown up enough to do this .
zh: 我还没长大做这事。

en: You feel like you 're prepared , you 're in a , you know , in a relationship .
zh: 你觉得你已经准备好了,你已经处于关系中了。

en: We have been for years , we 're adults , but I do n't know what it is .
zh: 我们已经多年了,我们已经成年了,但我不知道这是什么。

en: As soon as I found out I just went back to like a 14 year old girl .
zh: 一旦我发现,我就回到一个14岁的女孩身上了。

en: I 'm like " oh my god , what am I gon na tell my mom ? I ca n't be a mom . "
zh: 我心里想: “ 天哪, 我该怎么告诉妈妈? 我不能做妈妈. ”

en: So really I was just very very overwhelmed and anxious so it took a few days for me to really process what happened .
zh: 因此,我只是非常非常被压抑和焦虑,因此我花了几天才真正处理发生的事情。

en: It 's life - changing , and so for the first couple of weeks that 's all I could focus on , was how life - changing it was and it was really scary .
zh: 这是人生的变迁, 因此在最初的几个星期里,我只能集中精力,那就是人生的变迁是怎样的,而且很可怕的。

en: I then started to talk to people about it , that made me feel better .
zh: 然后我开始和人们谈谈,这让我感觉好多了。

en: And , I 'm not really sure what I 'm trying to say .
zh: 而且,我不太确定我想要说些什么。

en: I do n't want this to be too , like , all over the place but I decided I do want to document this some way , whether I – at first I was like , I do n't need to copy it on YouTube but I definitely wanted to document this in some kind of video form , just because it 's such a huge thing .
zh: 我不希望这太过,像,到处都是,但我决定要用某种方式记录这点,不管我—我一开始就是这样,我不需要在YouTube上复制它,但我肯定想用某种视频形式记录这点,只是因为它太大了。

en: But I did want to document my first trimester to an extent , because when I first found out , I did start to watch videos of people 's first few weeks , but again , maybe because I was n't in a great headspace , that just frightened me , which again was because everyone was just saying how awful they felt , how excited they were , and I did n't feel excited .
zh: 但我确实想在某种程度上记录我的第一个学期,因为当我第一次发现的时候,我确实开始看人们最初的几周的视频,但是又一次,也许因为我没有一个好头部空间,这只是吓了我,这又一次是因为每个人都只是说他们感觉多么可怕,他们多么兴奋,我并不感到兴奋。

en: I felt worried .
zh: 我感到担心。

en: I cried when I told her because I felt so , just , like , oh my god .
zh: 当我告诉她的时候,我哭了,因为我觉得,简直像,天哪。

en: I mean you , you feel quite bad when you feel like that , because it 's such a happy thing and now , you know , I – you know , I know I 've kind of accepted .
zh: 我是说你,你感觉很糟糕,因为这真是个快乐的事情,现在,你知道,我...你知道,我知道我有点接受了。

en: The shock has kind of sunk in .
zh: 这种震惊有点沉没了。

en: And I am happy to tell people , but at first when you 're trying to get your head around it , it 's very daunting and you just feel awful thinking .
zh: 我很高兴告诉大家,但一开始,当你试图解决这个问题时,它很令人畏惧,你只是觉得很糟糕。

en: The thought of telling someone makes me want to burst into tears .
zh: 告诉别人的念头使我想要流泪。

en: So that also then helped me to make the decision that I do want to document this , but I 'm probably going to do it , like , with hindsight , so I check in every now and again and just let you know how I 've been feeling .
zh: 因此,这也帮助我作出决定,我确实想记录这点,但我可能要这样做,比如,回顾一下,所以我经常检查一下,让你知道我的感受。

en: But in terms of if I am sick or I 'm not feeling great , I 'm not gon na vlog whilst I feel like that .
zh: 但如果我病了,或者我感觉不好,那么我不会像那样感觉。

en: I would n't want to vlog whilst I feel like that if I was just ill anyway .
zh: 如果我只是病了,我不想在这样感觉的时候露面。

en: And I just think it did n't help me seeing people at their worst at the very beginning , because all you hear is doom and gloom .
zh: 我只是觉得这并没有帮助我从一开始看到最糟糕的人,因为你所听到的只是灾难和悲惨。

en: I decided to wait a few weeks before I even started to talk about it , so I think I 'm about seven weeks .
zh: 我决定等几周才开始谈论这件事,所以我想我大概已经七周了。

en: I am waiting for my first midwife appointment .
zh: 我正等着我的第一个产妇约会。

en: I went – I booked the doctors , because the NHS says you need to book a doctor 's appointment , but that was a waste of time and I felt quite bad about taking that appointment .
zh: 我去了-我预订了医生,因为 NHS说你需要预订医生的预约,但那是浪费时间,我对预约感到很遗憾。

en: Because in my area you 'd have to self - refer , so I have n't had any kind of appointment or checkups or anything but I have been tracking – tracking –
zh: 因为我的地区,你必须自言自语,所以我没有任何约会或检查或任何其他事情,只是一直在跟踪 — —跟踪 — —

en: I 've got an app called " what to expect " , put in my , you know , cycle situation and have an estimated due date , which is about mid-September .
zh: 我有一个名为“ 什么待 呢 ”的应用程序,将它放在我的循环状态中,并有一个估计的期满日期,大约是9月中旬。

en: In terms of symptoms , I mean I have n't felt the best , but I have been able to get through it .
zh: 在症状方面,我的意思是,我感觉不太好,但我还是能够通过它。

en: I 've definitely struggled on some days but I have n't been sick .
zh: 我肯定在几天里挣扎过,但我还没有生病。

en: The biggest thing for me is I have lost – I dipped , and I have lost my appetite .
zh: 对我来说最大的事情就是我失去了——我潜水了,我失去了食欲。

en: There 's nothing I really feel like eating .
zh: 我真不想吃什么。

en: I do n't have particular aversions to things , I do n't feel really sick when I smell anything at the moment .
zh: 我对事物没有特别的厌恶,当我现在闻到任何东西时,我并不觉得很不舒服。

en: But there 's things that I do n't want to have , so like coffee , I just know that I do n't want that , and all I want is beige :
zh: 但有些东西我不想喝,所以像咖啡一样,我只是知道我不想喝,我只想喝白:

en: I want chips , I want white toast , it 's pretty much all I eat all day .
zh: 我想要薯条,我想要白面包,这差不多是我整天吃的。

en: Pasta if I want something hot maybe , I 've had soup , but essentially starchy carbs and that 's quite normal it seems .
zh: 要是我要点热的东西,我就吃汤了,但基本上是淀粉的碳水化合物,这看起来很正常。

en: Like , everyone craves that at this point because you 're , you know , building a baby , so you need that energy .
zh: 就像, 现在每个人都渴望这个,因为你, 你知道, 建造一个婴儿, 所以你需要那份能量。

en: So I do n't feel particularly great nutrition-wise , and I 'm trying to eat fruit where I can and veg when I can , but I 'm just sort of going with it , because I know there 's enough information out there that this is generally how it goes .
zh: 因此,我并不觉得营养方面特别好,而且我正尝试在我能吃的地方吃水果和在我能吃的时候吃蔬菜,但我只是有点同情,因为我知道外面有足够的信息,这一般就是这样。

en: And then hopefully you start to feel a bit better .
zh: 然后希望你开始感觉好一点。

en: I have felt nauseous and as everyone describes it , a bit jet - lagged , a bit cloudy in my head , and the worst thing for me has been headaches .
zh: 我感到恶心,正如大家所描述的那样,有点滞后,头上有点云雾,我最糟糕的事情就是头疼。

en: I have n't had them this week , but last week I had a couple of really really bad ones and I have n't had headaches that bad for years .
zh: 这个星期我还没有发这种病,但上周我确实有几个非常糟糕的病例,而且头疼好几年没那么严重。

en: So we are going to do a week of me vlogging .
zh: 所以我们打算做一个星期的我 vlogging。

en: I bounced around here and there , so I have to kind of show you guys around and show you what it 's all about , and today I 'm on general nuclear medicine , so let 's start the day .
zh: 我从这里到那儿跳起来,所以我得向大家展示一下,展示一下这是怎么回事,今天我从事一般核医学,让我们开始吧。

en: So like I said , I 'm on my general nuclear medicine rotation this week .
zh: 正如我所说, 本周我正在进行常规核医学回转.

en: I get switched around -- moved around a few times to cover some residents who are on vacation , so I 'll be at other spots later this week .
zh: 我转过身来--转过身去数次,以掩盖一些度假的居民,所以我会在本周晚些时候到其他地方。

en: So so far this morning I 've just read a few studies  of general nuclear medicine because a lot of stuff takes time for the radio tracers to go into the body or the specific organ we are targeting , so we have to wait a little bit in the morning .
zh: 到目前为止,我只是读了一些关于一般核医学的研究,因为很多事情需要时间才能让无线电追踪器进入我们的目标身体或特定器官,所以我们必须在早上稍等一会儿。

en: So I 've done three lymphoscintigraphies .
zh: 所以我做了三个淋巴细胞检查。

en: For lymphoscintigraphies we basically inject technetium in skin surrounding a melanoma and after we inject we wait about 15 - 20 minutes , maybe up to an hour , and wait for that radio tracer to travel to the closest lymph node which we would call the sentinel lymph node .
zh: 在淋巴细胞检查中,我们基本上在皮肤周围的黑色素瘤中注射技术内tium,然后在注射后,我们等待约15-20分钟,可能长达一小时,然后等待无线电追踪器到达我们称之为 sentinel淋巴结的最接近的淋巴结。

en: What we do is we mark it under our cameras and then the patient will go up to the OR , have the melanoma , a wide excision of the melanoma , and then they will try to find the lymph node that we marked and take that one out as well to make sure there 's no metastasis .
zh: 我们做的是标记它在我们的摄像机下,然后病人将上手术室,有黑色素瘤,黑色素瘤的广泛切除,然后他们将试图找到我们标记的淋巴结,并把这个结节也取出来,以确保没有转移。

en: So I 've done three of those this morning .
zh: 所以我今天早上做了三件。

en: I will read a few more scans coming up here shortly and just trying to tie up some loose ends before I go to conference .
zh: 不久,我将再看几张扫描,然后在去会议之前,我只是想把一些松散的结尾绑起来。

en: I 'll check back in afterwards .
zh: 我稍后再来。

en: Ah , the sun feels so good on the face .
zh: 啊,太阳脸色真好。

en: I 'm officially done .
zh: 我正式完成了。

en: We get to head home early today because we finished off the scans , and I 'm gon na go home and work out because I was too lazy to do it this morning because for some reason I was tired from having a weekend off , which makes no sense .
zh: 我们今天早点回家了,因为我们已经完成扫描,我快要回家去工作了,因为我今天早上太懒了,因为有某种原因我厌倦了周末的假,这毫无意义。

en: But I 'm gon na go work out , cook something for dinner and do this all over again tomorrow .
zh: 但是我要去工作,做晚饭做点东西,明天再做一遍。

en: It is Tuesday and today I got pulled to ultrasound .
zh: 今天是星期二,我被拉到超声室去。

en: Yes , I do n't know why I got pulled on today , but I did , so probably just sit in there , read some ultrasounds and get out early .
zh: 是的,我不知道为什么我今天被拉动了,但是我拉动了,所以可能只是坐在那儿,读一些超声听觉,然后早点出去。

en: I need to film another YouTube video .
zh: 我需要拍摄另一张YouTube视频。

en: Alright so I 've been here just crushing ultrasounds , and today I 've been feeling a little under the weather so I 've been , like , yeah , I 've been like crushing these all day today and then I 'll show you what else I 've been .
zh: 好吧,我来这里只是压碎超声波,今天我感觉有点不舒服,所以今天我好像压碎了这些整天,然后我给你看看我还有什么。

en: I picked these up when I was in Amsterdam for ...
zh: 我在阿姆斯特丹的时候,我拿了这些东西...

en: I got sick when I was on Croatia for vacation .
zh: 我在克罗地亚度假时生病了。

en: I have no idea what it says , but I think they 're cough drops , so if anybody knows what this says let me know .
zh: 我不知道上面写的是什么,但我想它们是咳嗽滴,所以如果有人知道上面写的是什么,请告诉我。

en: But I 'm pretty sure it 's just cough drops with some vitamin C in it .
zh: 但我确信这只是一些含维生素C的咳嗽滴。

en: So this is what I have been doing all day is crushing ultrasounds and having Dutch cough drops .
zh: 这就是我整天做的,就是压碎超声波和吸取荷兰咳嗽滴。

en: So if anybody speaks Dutch tell me what that means .
zh: 如果有人能说荷兰语,告诉我那是什么意思。

en: Oh and PS , I usually try to avoid taking medicines that I ca n't read the name of but I had someone help me at the pharmacy in the airport .
zh: 哦和PS,我通常尽量避免服用我不能读名字的药,但我在机场的药房里有人帮我。

en: She spoke a little bit of English and I think those are actually cough drops , so , that 's the only reason I 'm still eating them today .
zh: 她讲了一点英语,我想这些实际上是咳嗽滴,所以,这就是我今天仍然吃它们的唯一原因。

en: You can tell by my voice it 's a little on the sore side today so hopefully I get better because , I have n't told you guys yet , but I 'm going somewhere this weekend and it 's gon na be fun .
zh: 你可以从我的声音中看出今天有点痛,所以希望我能好起来,因为我还没有告诉你们,但这个周末我要去某个地方,很有趣。

en: So I 'm officially going home right now .
zh: 所以我现在正式回家了。

en: Yeah , normally I would go home and work out , especially since it 's , like , a beautiful day I would probably go running .
zh: 是的,我通常会回家去工作,特别是因为今天是这么美好的一天,我可能去跑步。

en: But since I feel kind of crappy today I 'm just going to go home , hang out , rest  .
zh: 但既然我今天感觉有点糟糕,我就回家玩,休息。

en: So I 'm probably just gon na go home and rest and I have to get my hair cut today for my big trip coming up .
zh: 所以我可能只是想回家休息,今天我要剪掉头发来参加这次大旅行。

en: But you still do n't know where I 'm going .
zh: 但是你还不知道我要去哪里。

en: But yeah that 's pretty much it , hope you guys do n't mind this kind of like random vlog that I 'm doing , but I just wanted to show you guys kind of loosely like how a week is and the life of a radiology resident .
zh: 但是,是的,这差不多了,希望你们不要介意我正在做这种随机的 vlog,但我只是想向你们展示一个星期和放射科居民的生活。

en: So hopefully you guys find it somewhat interesting , and if you do I 'll keep doing it .
zh: 希望你们觉得这有点有趣,如果你们愿意的话我会继续做。

en: So heading home now .
zh: 现在回家了。

en: Welcome back to my channel or welcome if you 're new .
zh: 欢迎你回到我的频道或欢迎你新加入。

en: Today I 'm doing another college day in my life .
zh: 今天我的生活又一次大学的日子。

en: And I just left Starbucks , do n't mind what I look like .
zh: 我刚离开Starbucks,别介意我的样子。

en: I literally just pretty much woke up and left this morning .
zh: 我刚醒来,今天早上就走了。

en: I 'm starting the review for all the chapters for my final exam , and it is a lot of information so I already planned on getting up early today and going .
zh: 我正在开始对所有章节进行复习,这是我的最后考试,而且有很多信息,所以我已经计划今天早点起床去。

en: And then I 'm gon na do the same thing tomorrow .
zh: 然后我打算明天做同样的事情。

en: I basically like created a digital calendar where I 'm gon na go over each of the chapters , just because I only have one week left to study .
zh: 我基本上喜欢创建一个数字的日历,在那里我快去每个章节,只是因为我只剩一个星期去学习。

en: I 'm back home now , and I basically just typed up a little calendar laying out the chapters that I have left to review before Tuesday .
zh: 我现在回了家,我基本上只是打了一个小日历,列出了我在星期二之前要复习的章节。

en: That 's my final list and I hate that , like , this week is our Thanksgiving break and then we literally come back Tuesday and take our final .
zh: 这是我最后的名单,我讨厌,这个星期是我们的感恩节休息,然后我们真的回到星期二去做最后的。

en: So I 'm gon na be studying on Thanksgiving Day , Black Friday , and the whole weekend even though we 're going getting our Christmas tree I think on Saturday , and I I 'm not decorating I 'm not doing anything fun , like I have to study .
zh: 因此,我打算在感恩节,黑色星期五学习,整个周末虽然我们要去买圣诞树,我想在星期六,我不会装饰我不会做任何有趣的事,像我必须学习一样。

en: I thought I would show you guys kind of how I 'm mapping this out , because it 's a really good tip if you have like a lot to do .
zh: 我想我能向你们展示一下我如何绘制这个地图,因为如果你想做很多事情,这是一个非常好的提示。

en: So today I 'm doing female reproductive system , male reproductive system tomorrow .
zh: 所以今天我做的是女性生殖系统,明天是男性生殖系统。

en: I work on Wednesday , I 'm going to go over chapter 29 fluid balance , chapter 28 so urinary system on the 29th .
zh: 我星期三工作, 我要看29章的流体平衡,28章的尿道系统是29日.

en: The 30th , Chapters 17 through 22 - yes that 's like six chapters or something .
zh: 第30章, 第17章到第22章 - 是的,那就像六章或什么。

en: And then on Sunday , I 'll be doing chapters 23 through 27 and I just made this on my iPad and then printed it .
zh: 然后在星期天,我将做第23至27章,我只是在我的iPad上做的,然后把它打印出来。

en: I did not include my schedule for college algebra because I have a final on Thursday of next week for that .
zh: 我没有列入我的大学代数日程表,因为我有下周的星期四的最后一次。

en: So I 'm going to go in with like a different color and add in the chapters I 'm gon na be studying for that , but I 'm super stressed .
zh: 所以我打算用不同的颜色加入我正在学习的章节,但是我非常紧张。

en: I bought these Vans from DSW .
zh: 我从DSW买了这辆车。

en: You guys know I have the white ones and I wear them all the time and these ones are just like black perforated Vans .
zh: 你们知道我有白色的车子,我总是穿着它们,这些车子就像黑色穿孔的车子。

en: I love them and they are definitely the right size because I have two other pairs of Vans that are this size , but one of these ones is like messed up or something .
zh: 我喜欢它们,而且它们绝对是正确的尺寸,因为我还有另外两对这种尺寸的货车,但其中一个有点乱七八糟。

en: I think it 's like this part on the left foot because my foot feels super tight in only the left side , so something 's up because they 're both the right size but I do n't know .
zh: 我想这就像左脚上的这个部分,因为我的脚只在左边感觉非常紧,所以有东西在上面,因为它们都是正确的尺寸,但我不知道。

en: So I 'm gon na exchange them for another pair because something 's not right about that .
zh: 因此,我不得不换换换另外一对,因为这儿有些不对劲。

en: So I just got finished at the library .
zh: 我刚在图书馆完成工作。

en: I 'm really proud of myself and now I 'm about to go get some lunch , and go to DSW and see if I can exchange those Vans .
zh: 我真为自己骄傲,现在我要去吃点午餐,去DSW看看能不能换那些车子。

en: So while I was in the library one of you guys came up to me , and said hi .
zh: 我在图书馆的时候,你们中的一个人过来问我好。

en: I feel so bad because I was so in the zone that I did n't even get her name .
zh: 我觉得很糟糕,因为我处于这样的境地,我甚至连她的名字都不知道。

en: But if you 're watching this , hi thank you so much for coming and saying hi to me you actually made my whole day .
zh: 但是如果你正在看这个,嗨,谢谢你来向我问候,你真使我度过了一天。

en: She said she watches my videos and loves them .
zh: 她说她看我的录像和爱上它们。

en: And you guys are so sweet , I love making videos and it 's so nice to have that support .
zh: 你们真可爱,我喜欢制作视频,有这种支持真是太好了。

en: So if you do go to FGCU and you ever see me on campus , like feel free to say hi because you 'll make my day .
zh: 因此,如果你真的到FGCU去见我在校园里,就别忘了说你好,因为你会让我开心的。

en: I just got out of DSW , and I spent like 30 minutes in there because it was just such a process for them to do an exchange .
zh: 我刚从DSW出来,在那儿呆了大约30分钟,因为这是他们进行交换的那种过程。

en: And then she had to scan and go get the shoes and then she said they did n't have the size .
zh: 然后她不得不扫描并去买那双鞋,然后她说它们没有尺寸。

en: So I ended up having to order them , but she said there was no way to do a direct exchange .
zh: 最后我不得不订货,但她说没有办法进行直接交换。

en: So she had to give me a return and then re-ring it up .
zh: 因此她不得不给我回钱,然后再回钱。

en: And oh my gosh I was literally in there for like 25 minutes all to just do a simple exchange for the exact same shoe .
zh: 哦,我的天啊,我在那儿呆了25分钟,只是为了换一双鞋而已。

en: But it 's over now and they 're gon na send them to me in the mail .
zh: 但是现在已经结束了,他们快要给我发邮件了。

en: Hopefully they 'll be here in about a week .
zh: 希望他们大约在一周内就到这儿来。

en: I 'm just kind of sad that they did n't have them in stock , so now I have to wait .
zh: 我只是有点悲伤,他们没有库存,所以现在我得等一下。

en: But oh well it 's over with now , we 're gon na go get lunch .
zh: 可是,现在就结束了,我们要去吃午饭了。

en: So remember how yesterday when I showed you the thingy thing there were like very high waves in the lagoon ?
zh: 那么,还记得昨天我给你展示的东西时,湖泊里有非常高的波浪吗?

en: Well , today is like the exact opposite .
zh: 现在的情况正好相反。

en: This is like the calmest water you might have seen .
zh: 这是你可能见过的最平静的水。

en: And I 'm drinking instant coffee , but the instant coffee is actually from Bremen .
zh: 我喝的是即时咖啡, 但即时咖啡实际上来自布莱门.

en: We are heading out here at 10:00 a.m. I think , and then on the way back we 're stopping at a winery for , I do n't know , for looking at it , and then we 're gon na head back .
zh: 我们早上10点出发,我想,然后在回去的路上我们停下来在一家酒厂里看,我不知道,看它,然后我们又往前走。

en: So firstly the Sauvignon Blanc which is for you , for you sir .
zh: 首先是萨维尼翁布兰克,这是给你的,给你的先生。

en: And then the Chardonnay - Pinot Noir , it is a blended wine of 60 % Chardonnay and 40 % Pinot Noir , so it 's more like a dry rosé style of wine with lots of strawberry flavors , hints of yellow apple , and it 's 2018 vintage , which is unwooded .
zh: 然后是查登nay-皮诺诺酒,它是60%的查登nay和40%的皮诺酒的混合酒,所以它更像许多草莓味的干玫瑰风格的酒,有黄色苹果的暗示,这是2018年 vintage,它没有木头。

en: So these are the type of wine that you can enjoy on their own and also with your light meals , because they are made to open now , drink now wines .
zh: 因此,这些是你可以自己享受的那种酒,也可以用你的轻食来享受的,因为它们是用来现在开的,现在喝的酒。

en: Can I ask you , with your white wines , how – how long – when 's the best time to drink them ?
zh: 我能问你, 用你的白酒, 什么时候, 什么时候最好喝?

en: It 's open now drink now wines , as I said they are lifestyle wines , easy drinking , everyday drinking styles .
zh: 现在是开放的,现在是饮酒,正如我所说的,他们是生活方式的酒,轻松饮酒,日常饮酒风格。

en: But if you want to keep them , I would say 5 years in the cellar .
zh: 但是如果你想保留它们,我会说5年在地下室里。

en: Yes you can keep them in your cellar , and then the red wines , six years to seven years , not more than that .
zh: 是的,你可以把它们放在地下室里,然后再把红酒放在地下室里,六年到七年,不超过那。

en: And then with the red wines from the Signature they only spent eight months in the French oak .
zh: 然后,他们只花了8个月在法国橡木里喝了来自《签名》的红酒。

en: So the reason behind that shorter period of time is for you to get more of the original flavors from the grapes , not so much of the secondary flavor since they are more level entry wines .
zh: 因此,短时间的原因在于你从葡萄中得到更多的原味,而不是更多的次要味,因为它们是更高级的进入葡萄酒。

en: It was discovered in the year of 1925 by a professor called Abraham Perold in the University of Stellenbosch .
zh: 它于1925年由一个名叫亚伯拉罕·佩罗德的教授在斯坦布尔顿大学发现。

en: So it 's a high grade grape that is made from Pinot Noir and the Hermitage .
zh: 因此,它是一种高档葡萄,由 Pinot Noir 和 Hermitage 制成。

en: You took a stem of both , cross-breeded them .
zh: 你拿了两个茎,交种了它们。

en: The Hermitage is known as the Cinsault today .
zh: 如今,这个避难所被称为Cinsault。

en: So the Pinotage is very aromatic , has lots of plum fruits , red fruit flavors .
zh: 因此 Pinotage非常芳香,有许多梅果,红果味。

en: This is a 2017 vintage and then the Shiraz , it 's known for its biasing characteristics , that what you pick up on the palette on the nose to the palate , spicy peppery flavor , has lots of great fruits and this is 2017 vintage .
zh: 这是2017年 vintage,然后是Shiraz,它以其偏见的特性而闻名,你从鼻子上拾到调味品上的东西,香辛辣的辣椒味,有很多很好的水果,这是2017年 vintage。

en: And then the Cab , the Cabernet is known for its thick uh skin and it 's known for when it 's blended , it always acts as a backbone to the wine .
zh: 然后是 Cab, Cabernet以其厚厚的肌肤而闻名,它在混合时,它总是作为葡萄酒的骨干。

en: So since this one had not much of the oak barrel you pick up the original black currant fruits , pencil shavings aromas , has lots of black cherries as well .
zh: 因此,由于这个没有多少橡木桶,所以你 pick up original black currant fruits, pencil shavings aromas, has lots of black cherries as well 。

en: So , so with th- with these people , it 's better to wait for these as well , even though they 're your everyday –
zh: 因此,跟这些人在一起,最好也等着这些人,即使他们是你的日常——

en: Remember , while it gets better with age , so , these also .
zh: 记住,随着年龄的增长,这些也变得更好。

en: I will bring the cheese platter .
zh: 我将带上奶酪盘子。

en: So you heard it people : whatever she said .
zh: 你听见了,不管她说什么。

en: To make it a real wine tasting , we also got a cheese platter .
zh: 为了使它成为真正的葡萄酒尝尝,我们还买了一个奶酪盘。

en: So we just saw a wine tasting , and got to say it was really good .
zh: 所以我们刚看了一次酒品尝尝,并不得不说它是真的好。

en: They gave us a little wine .
zh: 他们给了我们一点酒。

en: I feel like my sunburn adds nicely to the effect .
zh: 我觉得我的晒太阳效果很好。

en: I actually spit it , all of it , in here .
zh: 其实我吐了出来,全部吐了进去。

en: No you did n't .
zh: 不,你没有。

en: Yeah , I drank all of it .
zh: 是的,我全部喝了。

en: But you see all of these glasses ?
zh: 但是你看到这些眼镜了吗?

en: I drank all of them .
zh: 我都喝了。

en: He 's lying , you drank – you drank most of them .
zh: 他撒谎,你喝了,你喝了大部分。

en: No but this one , this one was really really good .
zh: 不,但这件,这件真真好。

en: What 's your recap ?
zh: 你的收录是什么?

en: My recap ?
zh: 我的背书?

en: No which one 's your favorite wine ?
zh: 谁不是你最喜欢的酒?

en: Just say your favorite wine .
zh: 只要说你最喜欢的酒。

en: It is a blend of Merlot , Cabernet Sauvignon , Cabernet Franc , Malbec , and Petit Verdot .
zh: 它是梅洛 、 萨维尼翁 Cabernet 、 法兰克 Cabernet 、 马尔贝克 Cabernet 、 以及 Petit Verdot 的混合物.

en: Got it .
zh: 明白了。

en: So what was your favorite ?
zh: 那你最喜欢的是什么?

en: For me it was actually the Creative Block 3 , was this one , with Shiraz , Mourvèdre , Viognier .
zh: 对于我来说,这实际上是Creative Block 3,这是这个,与Shiraz, Mourvèdre,Viognier。

en: Actually all of us did n't choose the most expensive one .
zh: 事实上,我们没有选择最昂贵的。

en: Yeah , we did n't .
zh: 是的,我们没有。

en: We had one of the very expensive ones , and actually none of us liked it the most .
zh: 我们有一个非常昂贵的,实际上我们谁都不喜欢它。

en: We all liked the inexpensive version of the Pinotage more .
zh: 我们都更喜欢 Pinotage的廉价版本。

en: It is in many ways the birthplace of Classical Greece , and therefore of Western civilization .
zh: 它在许多方面是古典希腊的产地,因此是西方文明的产地。

en: The legend says that the King of Athens , Theseus unified the ten tribes of early Athens into one kingdom  .
zh: 传说说,雅典国王泰西乌斯将早期雅典的十个部落统一为一个王国。

en: This process of synoikismos – bringing together in one home – created the largest and wealthiest state on the Greek mainland , but it also created a larger class of people excluded from political life by the nobility .
zh: 希腊大陆最大的和最富有的国家是希腊的西诺伊克主义,但它也创造了一个被贵族排除在政治生活之外的更大阶层。

en: By the 7th century BC , social unrest had become widespread , and the Areopagus appointed Draco to draft a strict new law code  .
zh: 到公元前7世纪,社会动荡已普遍,阿雷奥帕格斯任命德拉科起草一项严格的新法律法规。

en: When this failed , they appointed Solon , with a mandate to create a new constitution  .
zh: 一旦失败,他们任命索伦,并授权他创建新的宪法。

en: During the Middle Ages , Athens experienced a decline , but re-emerged under Byzantian rule .
zh: 在中世纪,雅典经历了衰落,但在拜占庭统治下再度出现。

en: Athens was thriving and prosperous during the Crusades , actually benefiting from the Italian trade during this period .
zh: 雅典在十字军期间繁荣繁荣,实际上从意大利贸易中受益。

en: However , this fruitful period was short - lived , as Greece suffered badly under the Ottoman Empire , only to recover in the 19th century as the capital of independent Greece .
zh: 然而, 这个丰盛的时期是短暂的, 因为希腊在奥斯曼帝国的统治下遭受了沉重的打击, 直到19世纪才恢复成为独立希腊的首都.

en: Athens hosted the 2004 Summer Olympic Games .
zh: 雅典是2004年夏季奥林匹克运动会的主办城市。

en: While most of the sporting venues were located outside the city proper - in various locations throughout Attica - the entire urban area of Athens underwent major lasting changes that have improved the quality of life for visitors and residents alike .
zh: 尽管大部分体育场馆都位于该市外 — — 在整个雅典的各个地点 — — 整个雅典城市地区经历了重大的持续变化,这些变化改善了游客和居民的生活质量。

en: Aside from the excellent transportation infrastructure that was completed in time for the 2004 Olympics  , the city 's historic center underwent serious renovation .
zh: 除了在2004年奥运会期间完成的交通基础设施外,城市历史中心也进行了重大的翻新。

en: Most notable among the city 's facelift projects are the Unification of Archaeological Sites - which connects the city 's classical - era ruins and monuments to each other through a network of pleasant pedestrianized streets - and the restoration of the picturesque neoclassical Thissio and Pláka districts .
zh: 其中最著名的是考古遗址的统一,通过一个愉快的步行街网将城市古典时期的废墟和纪念碑连接起来,以及美妙的新古典时期的泰西奥和普拉卡区的修复。

en: The ancient Olympic Games took place in Olympia from 776 BCE to 394 AD .
zh: 古代奥林匹克运动会于公元前776年至公元394年在奥林匹克举行。

en: Although it had a prestigious past , the city 's political , economic , and cultural importance had declined over the centuries , leaving behind only its classical ruins as a reminder of better times .
zh: 尽管历史悠久,但城市的政治 、 经济 、 文化重要性却随着时间的推移而下降,仅留下古典的遗迹作为一种更美好的回忆。

en: With the decision to move the national capital from Nafplio to Athens , architects and city planners were hired to build a new city next to the classical ruins , with grand neoclassical homes and public buildings , large city squares , green spaces , and wide avenues , making a conscious , decisive turn from the city 's Ottoman past .
zh: 由于决定将国家首都从纳夫普利奥迁往雅典,建筑师和城市规划师被雇佣在古典遗迹旁边建造一个新的城市,拥有宏伟的新古典主义住宅和公共建筑,大城市广场,绿色空间,以及宽阔的大道,使城市从奥斯曼帝国的过去转变了一种意识的决定性转变。

en: The city regained its importance in Greek civilization , and by 1900 had evolved into a very attractive cosmopolitan city , with abundant neoclassical architecture harking to the nation 's past .
zh: 这座城市在希腊文明中重获重要地位,并于1900年发展成为一个非常吸引人的哥本哈根城市,拥有丰富的新古典主义建筑,融入了国家历史。

en: The 20th century however , marked the rapid development of Athens .
zh: 然而,20世纪标志着雅典的迅速发展。

en: The city suffered minor damage during WWII , and suffered extensive urban planning in the decades that followed , as the nation rapidly industrialized and urbanized .
zh: 该市在二战期间遭受了轻微的破坏,并在随后的数十年中遭受了广泛的城市规划,随着国家迅速工业化和城市化。

en: The city also expanded outward through rash development , particularly towards the west , as its population grew by absorbing job - seekers from the provinces .
zh: 城市由于迅速发展,特别是向西部扩展,因为其人口通过吸收来自各省的求职者而增长。

en: With the onset of the automobile , public officials reduced the city 's public transportation services without foreseeing the traffic gridlock and smog that would menace the city by the 1980s .
zh: 随着汽车的出现,公共官员减少了城市的公共交通服务,没有预料到交通堵塞和烟雾将威胁到1980年代。

en: By the late 1980s and early 1990s , the city 's reality led to a rude awakening among local and national officials and , coupled with the country 's new found remarkable prosperity , large scale projects began to slowly regenerate the city and undo some of the damages of recent decades .
zh: 在20世纪80年代末和90年代初,城市的现实导致了当地和国家官员之间不礼貌的觉醒。

en: Over the course of the next 15 years , money was poured into new transportation infrastructure projects , the restoration of surviving neoclassical buildings , the gentrification of the city 's historical center and the renovation of many former industrial areas and the city 's coastline .
zh: 在接下来的15年中,资金投入了新的交通基础设施项目,修复了幸存的新古典主义建筑,改善了城市的历史中心,以及修复了许多旧工业区和城市的海岸线。

en: The restoration of charming neoclassical buildings in the city 's historical center has been accompanied by the construction of attractive post-modern buildings in newer districts ; both of which have begun to improve the aesthetic essence of the city .
zh: 城市历史中心的魅力新古典主义建筑的修复,并伴随在较新的地区兴建具有吸引力的后现代建筑,这两个建筑都开始改善城市的审美本质。

en: Athens today is ever evolving , forging a brand new identity for the 21st century .
zh: 雅典今天正不断发展,为21世纪塑造了全新的身份。

en: Summer can be extremely hot and dry during heatwaves , but this rarely happens .
zh: 夏天在热浪中非常热干,但这种情况很少发生。

en: Winter is definitely low season , with the occasional rainy or snowy day , but also an ideal time to save money while enjoying the city without countless other travelers and tourists .
zh: 冬天绝对是低季节,有时是雨天或雪天,但同时也是省钱的好时机,享受城市而不计数的其他旅行者和游客。

en: Whilst peak traffic hour can be a bit smoggy on the main roads , on most sunny days the skies are azure blue .
zh: 虽然交通高峰时段在主要道路上可能有点烟雾,但大多数阳光明媚的日子,天空是蓝色的。

en: The government 's ban on diesel vehicles within Athens and the early 1990s initiatives to improve car emissions have greatly contributed to better atmospheric conditions in the basin .
zh: 政府对雅典境内的柴油车辆的禁令以及1990年代早期改善汽车排放的倡议,大大有助于改善该盆地的大气条件。

en: The islands are in their own time zone , 45 minutes ahead of New Zealand time ;
zh: 这些岛屿位于自己的时区,距离新西兰时间45分钟;

en: the International Date Line jogs eastward to keep them on the same calendar day as the rest of New Zealand .
zh: 国际日期线向东跑去,以保持它们同新西兰其他地区一样的日历。

en: The islands lie 860 km east of Christchurch , in the middle of the " Roaring Forties " .
zh: 该群岛位于基督城以东860公里处, 是“ 四世纪之声 ” 的中心.

en: Steeped in culture and history , these islands are on the very edge of civilisation .
zh: 这些岛屿充满文化和历史,处在文明的边缘。

en: Experience Moriori culture , experience Rekohu .
zh: 体验moriori文化,体验rekohu。

en: The Chatham Islands consist of the main island , Chatham Island itself , with a population of 600 , smaller Pitt Island with about 40 inhabitants , and a number of rocky outcrops .
zh: 查塔姆群岛包括主要岛屿,查塔姆群岛本身,人口600人,较小的皮特群岛约有40人,以及一些岩石覆盖。

en: The islands are volcanic in origin and have a unique and sensitive habitat that supports many rare and endangered species .
zh: 这些岛屿起源于火山,具有独特的和敏感的栖息地,支持许多稀有和濒危物种。

en: The original people of the islands are the Moriori , who were descended from the Maori of mainland New Zealand , but who developed their own culture and variant of the language .
zh: 这些岛屿的原始人是毛里奥里人,他们是新西兰大陆的毛里人后裔,但他们发展出自己的文化和语言的变体。

en: In 1835 Maori settlers from the mainland arrived , massacred and enslaved the Moriori .
zh: 1835年,来自大陆的毛里族定居者抵达,屠杀和奴役毛里族。

en: Air Chathams fly 5 days per week , from either Christchurch , Auckland or Wellington and , seasonally , from Napier .
zh: Air Chathams每周飞行5天,从 Christchurch 、 Auckland 、 Wellington 或, 季节性, 从 Napier 。

en: The plane is based in the Chathams and flies to mainland New Zealand in the morning , then back to the Chathams in the afternoon .
zh: 飞机坐落在查坦群岛,早上飞往新西兰大陆,下午返回查坦群岛。

en: As part of New Zealand , there are no passport or visa requirements and no border controls on arrival from the mainland .
zh: 作为新西兰的一部分,从内地入境时没有护照或签证要求,也没有边境管制。

en: You should book or ensure accommodation before you board a flight for the Chathams , as during the popular months of the tourism season , between October and April , accommodation can be severely limited .
zh: 你应该在登飞机前预订或确保住宿,因为在旅游季节流行的月份,十月至四月之间,住宿可能受到严重限制。

en: There are no same - day return flights , so once there you have to stay at least one night .
zh: 没有同一天的返程航班, 因此一旦到那里你必须至少停留一个晚上.

en: Although flying to the Chathams and back is not cheap , it is worth it .
zh: 尽管飞到查塔姆斯和回不便宜,但值得。

en: Even the mainland school groups that fly there for school camps , and choose to stay at Kopinga Marae  get value for money by chartering a flight one way .
zh: 甚至大陆的学校团体飞往那里去学校营地,并选择住在科宾加马拉以租机的方式获得经济效益。

en: Anyway , you do n't have a choice on how you get there , unless you happen to own an aeroplane .
zh: 无论如何,你没有选择如何到达那里,除非你碰巧拥有飞机。

en: However , when you get off that aeroplane , if you have n't pre-organised transport , you will have to walk , and it is a long way into town .
zh: 然而,当你离开那架飞机时,如果你没有预先安排的交通,你将不得不步行,而到城里还有很长的路。

en: This boat has serviced the islands for many years , but does not carry passengers .
zh: 这艘船在岛上服务了好几年,但没有载客。

en: Freight charges on the Rangatira appear to be flexible and subject to change .
zh: 兰加蒂拉的货运费似乎是灵活的,有变动的。

en: Vessels can call at the Chathams and there are a number of " safe " harbours for shelter if the need arises .
zh: 船只可以在查塔姆岛上呼叫,如果需要的话,还有一些“ 安全 ” 的避难港。

en: Remember to notify the local policeman , or Ministry of Fisheries officer if you are entering New Zealand via the Chathams .
zh: 若要通过查塔姆进入新西兰,请通知当地警察或渔业部官员。

en: If you want a wharf berthage then call the local harbour master as you near the Chathams and he will sort you out .
zh: 如果你想要一个码头泊位,就叫当地的船长在你查坦附近,他会帮你解决。

en: There are several businesses on Chatham Island that will rent you a vehicle .
zh: 查特姆岛有几家公司会租给你一辆汽车。

en: Do not expect the flashest and latest in rental cars though .
zh: 尽管如此,不要期望在租车方面最闪亮和最新的。

en: The cars " will " be warranted and safe , but they wo n't be exceptionally " flash " .
zh: 汽车 " 将 " 得到保证和安全, 但它们不会特别 " 闪光 ".

en: Chatham Motors have a range of nice rental vans available as well and they provide pretty good service for both visitors and locals .
zh: Chatham Motors也提供一系列漂亮的租车,并为游客和当地人提供相当好的服务。

en: Guests of the lodge can meander around either a short easy walk , or take the longer 2 hr return walk out onto the spectacular beach .
zh: 旅馆的客人可以漫步,或者步行到壮观的海滩,再步行2小时。

en: Access is free to Lodge guests .
zh: 旅馆的客人可免费进入。

en: One of only two National Historic Scenic Reserves in New Zealand  , Hapupu is a special place , and somewhere that you will want to tell others about .
zh: 是新西兰仅有的两个国家历史风景区之一,哈布努是一个特别的地方,也是你想要告诉别人的地方。

en: There are many views on why they did these carvings , but whatever the reason , you will find them a very special attraction .
zh: 关于他们制作这些雕刻的原因有很多看法,但不管原因是什么,你会发现它们是一个非常特别的吸引力。

en: One of the most scenicly attractive ports in the whole of New Zealand , Port Hutt boasts an incredibly sheltered little harbour , with picturesque views and safe anchorage in all weather .
zh: 哈特港(Port Hutt)是全新西兰最美丽的港口之一,拥有一个令人难以置信的避难港,景色优美,在任何情况下都安全停泊。

en: Historically important and economically crucial for these islands today , Port Hutt is the ideal location for a short browse around and a mecca for those photography buffs  .
zh: 现在这些岛屿具有历史意义和经济重要性,哈特港是短途浏览的理想地点,也是那些摄影爱好者的圣地。

en: If you could define a place that will remind you of your visit to the Chathams , then this very special place will be at the top of your list .
zh: 如果你能定义一个会提醒你参观查塔姆的地点,那么这个非常特别的地点将在你的列表的顶部。

en: Adorned with contemporary Moriori carvings and traditional taonga  , the marae is a magnificent , tasteful and contemporary testament to the ancestors of Te Imi Moriori .
zh: 装饰着现代莫里奥里雕刻和传统面具,马拉是帝伊莫里奥里祖先的壮观 、 美味和当代的遗迹.

en: Enjoy a guided tour of this beautiful and peaceful building .
zh: 欣赏这个美丽的和平建筑的导游。

en: School - Camps At Kopinga Marae  also utilise this wonderful national treasure for hosting visiting school groups .
zh: 学校 - 营地在科宾加马拉也利用这个美丽的国家财富来举办参观学校的团体。

en: Tame Horomona Rehe was the last known full - blooded Moriori and he passed away in 1933 .
zh: 泰姆·霍罗莫纳·雷赫是最后一个全血的莫里奥里,他于1933年去世。

en: He was however , not the last Moriori .
zh: 然而,他不是最后的莫里奥里。

en: His own descendants and the descendants of other Moriori live on today .
zh: 他的后裔和其他毛利奥里人的后裔现存。

en: Come and have a look at this statue , erected in 1985 to commemorate his passing .
zh: 来,看看这个雕像,它建于1985年纪念他逝世。

en: Come and see Manakau , the property of his descendants , located on the eastern corner of Rekohu and blessed with the sun 's first rays as they rise above the sea each day .
zh: 来,看看他的后裔的马纳卡乌,位于里科胡东角,每天从海面上升起的太阳的头光上得到祝福。

en: You 'll find world - class museums and cultural events , professional sports and amusement parks , and the most golf courses per capita in the United States .
zh: 你会找到世界级的博物馆和文化活动, 专业体育和娱乐公园,以及美国人均最多高尔夫球场.

en: Places Rated Almanac ranks the area second in recreational options out of 354 US metro areas .
zh: 在354个美国地铁区中,Almanac评级该区在休闲选择中排名第二。

en: Plus , this region ranks fifth in the nation in number of major cultural resources per one million residents .
zh: 此外,这个地区是全国第五大文化资源地区之一,每百万居民。

en: Throughout the twentieth century , the City of Cleveland proper was ranked as one of the 10 largest cities in the U.S.  .
zh: 整个20世纪,克利夫兰市被列为美国10大城市之一。

en: Like most U.S. cities , Cleveland proper began to lose population to suburban areas in the 1960s and 1970s .
zh: 与大多数美国城市一样,克利夫兰 proper在1960年代和1970年代开始在郊区失去人口。

en: However , in the mid-1980s , Cleveland earned the nickname the " Comeback City " as the urban core experienced a dramatic revitalization process that continues today .
zh: 然而, 在 1980 年代 中期, 克利夫兰 因 城市 核心 经历 了 持续 至今 的 戏剧性 的 复兴 进程, 因此 获得 了 “ 回归 城市 ” 的 绰号 。

en: As its " comeback " has continued , the official moniker is now the New American City as Cleveland has rightfully earned the reputation as a model of effective public - private partnership for urban planning .
zh: 随着其“ 回归 ” 的继续, 官方名称现在是新美国城,克利夫兰正得名作城市规划的有效公共 - 私营伙伴关系的模式.

en: Despite the common perception that Cleveland is an industrial town , just beyond the automotive and steel plants , a clean and beautiful downtown rises at the mouth of the Cuyahoga River on the southern shore of Lake Erie  .
zh: 尽管人们普遍认为克利夫兰是一个工业城市,就在汽车和钢铁厂之外,一个干净而美丽的市中心在埃里湖南岸的库亚哥河口上兴起。

en: Like other cities in the so - called " rust belt “ , Cleveland has endured growing pains as it makes its transition from a manufacturing - based economy .
zh: 克利夫兰与其他所谓的 “ 锈带 ” 城市一样,在从制造业经济转型的过程中,经历了不断增长的痛苦。

en: While Cleveland continues to play a leading role in building the U.S. industrial base , it has also developed economic prowess in the fields of health care , law , finance , insurance , real estate development , and professional services .
zh: 克利夫兰继续在建设美国工业基地方面发挥主导作用,同时也在医疗、法律、金融、保险、房地产开发和专业服务领域发展了经济实力。

en: Another thing non-locals do n't often realize is that Cleveland 's long history of industrial wealth has left it chock full of cultural riches as well as the beginnings of a " sustainable city " movement .
zh: 另一个非本地人经常不知道的事情是,克利夫兰的悠久的工业财富历史使它充满了文化财富,同时也是“可持续城市”运动的开端。

en: Serving as a global model for urban rebirth , Cleveland has been named one of the top 10 international visitor hotspots by Travel and Leisure magazine .
zh: 作为城市复兴的全球模式,克利夫兰被《旅行和休闲》杂志评为十大国际游客热点之一。

en: For decades , the city has boasted of : a " Big Five " orchestra  , the second largest performing arts center in the U.S.  , a world - renowned art museum  , the nation 's first health museum  , R&D hub of the aerospace and aviation industry  and a number of other first - rate attractions  .
zh: 数十年来, 该市拥有: “ 五大乐队 ” 、 美国第二大表演艺术中心 、 世界著名的艺术博物馆 、 国家首个卫生博物馆 、 航空航天和航空工业的研发枢纽以及其他一流景点.

en: During its " comeback " years , Cleveland has added : the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum , the Great Lakes Science Center with Omnimax theatre , and four new sports facilities in the downtown area - Progressive Field  for the Major League Baseball Indians , QuickenLoans Arena  for the NBA Cavaliers , Cleveland Browns Stadium for the NFL Browns and the Wolstein Center for the Cleveland State University Vikings basketball team .
zh: 克利夫兰在“ 回归 ” 岁月中增加了: 摇滚名人堂和博物馆 、 大湖科学中心和Omnimax剧院 、 市中心的四个新体育设施 - 主要联盟棒球印第安人进步场 、 NBA Cavaliers的QuickenLoans Arena 、 NFL Browns的克利夫兰布朗斯体育场和克利夫兰州立大学维京斯篮球队的沃尔斯坦中心。

en: Coron is in the province of Palawan , Philippines on Busuanga Island .
zh: 科隆位于菲律宾巴拉万省布苏安加岛。

en: It is the largest town on the island and has the largest share of accommodations .
zh: 它是岛上最大的城市,拥有最大的住宿量。

en: Coron is both the name of the largest town on the island of Busuanga , and the name of a different , smaller island just offshore .
zh: 科隆是布苏安加岛上最大的城镇的名字,也是另一个小岛屿的名字。

en: The area is famous for its World War II wreck diving , and the site has been named in many lists of top dive spots in the world .
zh: 该地区因其第二次世界大战的残骸潜水而闻名,并被列为世界首屈指的潜水地点。

en: In September 1944 , a fleet of Japanese ships hiding in the harbor were sunk in a daring raid by the US navy .
zh: 1944年9月,一艘潜伏在港口的日本舰队被美国海军的大胆袭击击沉。

en: There are also attractions on Coron Island itself .
zh: 科隆岛本身也有一些景点。

en: There are many beautiful white sand beaches , mostly tiny and surrounded by large limestone cliffs and wildlife .
zh: 这里有许多美丽的白沙滩,大部分是小而周围是巨大的石灰岩悬崖和野生动物。

en: Barracuda and Kayangan lakes are both stunning locations , and good for snorkeling , and the island is the ancestral domain of an indigenous tribe who are managing the island in a sustainable way and keeping outsiders at a distance and offshore at night .
zh: 巴拉库达和卡伊兰加湖都是令人惊奇的地点,并且适合 snorkeling,岛是当地部落的祖先领土,他们以可持续的方式管理岛并把外界保持在远处和海上的夜间。

en: The first inhabitants of Coron were the Tagbanuas who belong to the second wave of Indonesians who migrated to this area some 5,000 years ago .
zh: 科隆最早的居民是塔格班乌亚人,他们属于印度尼西亚人第二波移民到该地区大约5000年前。

en: They were a nomadic , seafaring people , living mainly by fishing and subsistence agriculture .
zh: 他们是一个游牧、航海的民族,主要靠渔业和农业谋生。

en: Although they are now sedentary  , they maintain many of their old customs , traditions and beliefs .
zh: 尽管他们现在是坐着的,但他们仍保留着许多旧的习俗、传统和信仰。

en: Today , the Tagbanuas remain the dominant if not entire population of Coron .
zh: 如今, 塔格巴努亚人仍然是科伦的统治者,如果不是整个人口.

en: In 1902 that Coron was registered as a town and the name of the town was officially changed from Penon de Coron to Coron .
zh: 1902年,科隆被注册为一个城镇,并正式从彭恩德科隆改名为科隆。

en: From 1939 to the outbreak of World War II , the municipality experienced the mining boom .
zh: 从1939年到第二次世界大战爆发,该市经历了采矿繁荣。

en: Labor shifted from farming to mining .
zh: 劳工从农业转移到采矿。

en: In July 1942 the Japanese occupied the mining camps and resumed operation of the manganese mines .
zh: 1942年7月,日本占领了矿山营,恢复了锰矿的作业。

en: On September 24 , 1944 , a group of Japanese ships were sunk by American warplanes in Coron waters as the ships retreated from Manila Bay .
zh: 1944年9月24日,一组日本船被美国战机击沉在科隆海域,船只从马尼拉湾撤退。

en: To this day , about 10 or 12 of these World War II Japanese shipwrecks comprise what is considered one of the best dive sites in the world .
zh: 到今天为止,大约有10到12艘在第二次世界大战中日本沉没的船只构成了被认为是世界上最好的潜水地点之一。

en: In 1947 , large scale deep sea fishing was introduced to Coron , and the town experienced another boom , a fishing boom .
zh: 1947年,大规模的深海捕鱼被引入科隆,该市经历了另一场繁荣,一次渔业繁荣。

en: The population increased , as many people from Luzon and the Visayas came to work either as fishermen or miners .
zh: 人口增加,因为来自卢森和维萨亚的许多人 either as fishermen or miners came to work 。

en: On June 17 , 1950 , Busuanga was officially created as a separate municipality from Coron and in 1954 , Coron was further reduced by the official creation of the Municipality of Linapacan .
zh: 1950年6月17日,布苏安加正式成立为与科隆分离的自治市,1954年,科隆被正式成立的利纳帕坎自治市进一步缩小。

en: On September 12 , 1992 , Coron was finally reduced by the official creation of the Municipality of Culion .
zh: 1992年9月12日,科隆市正式成立,最终被削减。

en: Coron has taken an important position in the tourism industry .
zh: 科隆在旅游业中占据了重要地位。

en: In the past decade , there has been a rapid influx of scuba divers and other tourists coming in , making tourism the major industry player in Coron today .
zh: 在过去的十年里,有大量潜水员和其他游客涌入,使旅游业成为科隆的主要产业主体。

en: For information specific to U.S. citizens see Americans in Cuba
zh: 有关美国公民的具体资料,请参见古巴的美国人

en: A tourist visa card  is necessary for travelers from most nations .
zh: 大多数国家的旅行者需要旅游签证。

en: This visa , which is really little more than a piece of paper on which you list your vital statistics , costs between 15 - 25 CUC  , depending on where purchased .
zh: 这张签证,其实只是一张纸张,上面你可以列出你的生命统计数字,费用在15-25 CUC之间,这取决于你在哪里购买的。

en: It can be purchased at the Airport in Cuba on arrival , however it should be noted that many airlines will require a valid tourist visa card before boarding flights .
zh: 它可以在抵达古巴的机场购买,但应该指出,许多航空公司在登机前需要有效的旅游签证卡。

en: It is usually valid for 30 days and can be extended once for another 30 days at any immigration office in Cuba  - beyond this you would need a flight out of Cuba within the extended visa period .
zh: 该签证通常有效期为30天,在古巴的任何入境事务处可以再延长30天,在此以外,你需要在延长的签证期限内离开古巴。

en: Canadians are the exception , getting 90 days on arrival and can apply for a 90 day extension .
zh: 加拿大人是例外,在抵达后90天,可申请延长90天。

en: Your passport needs to be valid at least six months past the end of your planned return .
zh: 您的护照必须在计划返回后至少六个月内有效。

en: From Canada , the tourist card is normally provided on the flight .
zh: 从加拿大,旅游卡通常在飞机上提供。

en: It can also be purchased from most Latin American gateway airports if departing from there  .
zh: 它也可以从大多数拉丁美洲的机场购买,如果从那里出发。

en: Please note that if departing from Europe  , you will require to have the visa before boarding the plane .
zh: 请注意,在离开欧洲时,您必须在登机前持签证。

en: Some times , the airline provides these at the airport , however check first that this is the case .
zh: 有时,航空公司在机场提供这些,但先检查一下情况。

en: Without a valid visa , boarding will be denied  .
zh: 没有有效签证,将被拒绝登机。

en: UK : Applying for the visa is a very simple process and can be done by post or in person at the Cuban embassy in London .
zh: 申请签证是一个非常简单的过程,可以通过邮递或亲自到伦敦的古巴大使馆办理。

en: When applying to the Cuban Consulate by post , there is a new charge introduced in 2011 which is a £ 25 for a non-personal transaction .
zh: 在申请到古巴领事馆邮递时,2011年引入了一项新的收费,为非个人交易的25英镑。

en: If you can not go to the Cuban Consulate you may consider using VisaCuba  because it may be cheaper .
zh: 如果你不能去古巴领事馆,你可以考虑使用VisaCuba,因为它可能更便宜。

en: Through them it may cost £ 20 in total per person .
zh: 通过他们,总共每人可能花费20英镑。

en: If you apply in person to the Cuban Consulate , you get the visa straight away .
zh: 如果你亲自向古巴领事馆申请,你就可以立刻获得签证。

en: It can also be done through online agencies as mentioned before although they may be slightly more expensive  .
zh: 它也可以通过在线机构进行,正如前面提到的,尽管它们可能略有昂贵。

en: Germany : You can obtain the tourist card through the Cuban embassy in post .
zh: 德国: 你可以通过古巴大使馆邮寄领取旅游卡.

en: Travel agencies may often offer cheaper and quicker services though .
zh: 尽管如此,旅行社往往会提供更便宜和更快的服务。

en: Regular tourists who renew their 30 day visa are eligible to depart the country  and return immediately enjoying a further 60 days  .
zh: 定期旅游者如续领30天的签证,可立即离开该国并返回该国,享受60天的时间。

en: You are only allowed two consecutive stays in this manner .
zh: 这种方式只允许你连续停留两次。

en: If you want to stay with friends or family in Cuba you have to go with your intended host within two days after arrival to a migration office and pay 40 CUC for a 30 days family visa .
zh: 如果你想与朋友或家人在古巴呆在一起,你必须在抵达移徙办事处后两天内同你的 intended host 一起前往,并支付40 CUC的30天家庭签证。

en: Citizens of Antigua and Barbuda  , Barbados  , Benin , Bosnia and Herzegovina , CIS  , Dominica , Grenada  , Liechtenstein  , Macedonia , Malaysia  , Mongolia , Montenegro  , Namibia , Singapore , Slovakia , Saint Kitts and Nevis , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Serbia  , Turkmenistan who can stay 30 days without visa .
zh: 居住在安提瓜和巴布达 、 巴巴巴多斯 、 贝宁 、 波斯尼亚-黑塞哥维那 、 独联体 、 多米尼加 、 格林纳达 、 列支敦士登 、 马其顿 、 马来西亚 、 蒙古 、 黑山 、 纳米比亚 、 新加坡 、 斯洛伐克 、 圣基茨和尼维斯 、 圣卢西亚 、 圣文森特和格林纳丁斯 、 塞尔维亚 、 土库曼斯坦 的公民,可以不签证停留30天。

en: ( The source of the previous sentence is unknown .
zh: (前句的来源不明。

en: Aeromexico staff at Cancun airport claim that only citizens of China and Russia need no visa .
zh: 坎昆机场的阿罗梅西科工作人员声称只有中国和俄罗斯的公民不需要签证。

en: It is important to note that there is also a departure tax of CUC 25 , to be paid in cash when departing Cuba by airplane ; this is not required for boat departures .
zh: 重要的是,在乘飞机离开古巴时,还须缴付CUC25的离港税;这不适用于船只离港。

en: This tax is not well publicized but it is essential to remember it .
zh: 这个税款没有得到很好的宣传,但必须记住。

en: You will run into significant difficulties if you do not have enough cash to pay this tax when leaving the country .
zh: 如果你离开国家时没有足够的现金支付这个税款,你会遇到重大的困难。

en: An ATM and currency exchange are available at Havana airport , but these facilities are not as reliable in Cuba as in other places .
zh: 哈瓦那机场有自动取款机和货币交换机,但这些设施在古巴并不像其他地方一样可靠。

en: Cuban customs can be strict , though they sometimes go easy on tourists .
zh: 古巴的关税很严格, 尽管有时对游客来说很轻松.

en: Fort Lee is located between the Paramus , NJ retail corridor and Upper Manhattan .
zh: 李堡位于帕拉穆斯 、 NJ零售走廊和上曼哈顿之间.

en: This town is comprised of a large residential community that includes Fort Lee natives , transplants from New York , and immigrants , especially from Korea .
zh: 这个城市由一个庞大的居民社区组成,包括李堡的土著人、来自纽约的移植者和移民,特别是来自韩国的移民。

en: This cultural diversity is represented through the vast variety of international restaurants and small business , and in particular , there is a strong Korean presence that can be seen in retail and dining storefronts .
zh: 这种文化多样性体现在众多的国际餐馆和小企业中,尤其是在零售店和餐馆中,韩国存在着强大的存在。

en: Fort Lee is a small town but is piled high with apartment buildings .
zh: 李堡是一个小城镇,但是堆满了公寓楼。
