en: Because Fort Lee is situated above the banks of the Hudson River , there are breathtaking views from almost any window facing the river .
zh: 由于李堡位于哈德逊河岸上,几乎任何面向河的窗户都可以看到令人叹息的景色。

en: The New York City skyline and 4th of July fireworks are spectacular over the river .
zh: 纽约市的天空和7月4日的烟花在河面上是壮观的。

en: Although it is highly built up , Fort Lee also houses many playing fields and recreational parks as well as bike and running trails .
zh: 虽然是高度建设的,李堡还拥有许多游戏场和休闲公园,以及自行车和跑道。

en: And although there is a great deal of vehicle traffic to and from the George Washington Bridge , which connects Fort Lee with Manhattan , one of the largest perks of this town is the walking access to many restaurants , convenience stores and mass transit , in the form of buses and vans that frequently run across the bridge and up and down major streets .
zh: 尽管从乔治华盛顿大桥(英语:George Washington Bridge)到曼哈顿(英语:Manhattan)的交通量很大,但这个城市的最大的好处之一就是步行到许多餐馆、便利店和大众运输,这些公共汽车和卡车经常穿过大桥,沿着主要街道往上往下。

en: One of the more interesting of the many highrise residential buildings in Fort Lee
zh: 李堡的许多高楼住宅建筑中最有趣的建筑之一

en: Ask any bus or jitney driver leaving from the Port Authority George Washington Bus Station on 177 St. whether s/he can let you off in Fort Lee .
zh: 请任何从港署乔治华盛顿巴士站(177街)出发的巴士或吉特尼司机问一下,他是否可以让你离开李堡。

en: Fort Lee can also be accessed by boat or ferry from New York City via Edgewater and Weehawken docks .
zh: 从纽约市通过Edgewater和Weehawken码头,也可以乘船或渡轮到达李堡。

en: Old and new meet in Fort Lee , as the Good Shepherd Episcopalian Church is dwarfed by a residential highrise immediately behind it
zh: 新旧的聚会在李堡,因为圣牧师主教座堂的后面是一座住宅高楼

en: Most people choose cars , but if headed to a central area , such as Main Street , it is best to drive there , park in a municipal parking lot , and walk around from there .
zh: 大多数人选择汽车,但如果要去市中心,比如大街,最好开车到那里,在市政停车场停车,然后从那里步行。

en: If walking use caution , and if parking , make sure to feed the meter with plenty of pocket change ; the meter maids take their job very seriously .
zh: 如果步行使用小心,如果停车,一定要用大量的零钱给计量员喂食;计量员非常认真地对待工作。

en: Since fort lee is situated in such a convenient area for those commuting to and from the city , there is often high traffic and congestion on the roads .
zh: 由于莱堡位于市中心的交通便利地区,因此公路上经常有大量交通和交通堵塞。

en: If you are planning on being somewhere at a certain time , one might suggest leaving a good 10 to 15 minutes to escape local traffic before hitting any major roadways .
zh: 如果你打算在某个时候到某处去,你可能会建议离开10到15分钟去避开当地交通,然后撞上任何主要的道路。

en: For local transportation or air - port / train station services , there are several local taxi companies that are reliable .
zh: 对于当地的交通或机场/火车站服务, 有几个当地的出租车公司是可靠的.

en: Fort Lee is known and named for the story of how General George Washington was forced to evacuate the area in November of 1776 and begin his famous retreat through New Jersey during the winter of 1776 - 77 in the protection of " Fort Lee " .
zh: 利堡以乔治·华盛顿将军在1776年11月被迫撤离该地区的故事而闻名,并于1776年至1777年冬季开始在“ 利堡 ” 的保护下通过新泽西进行著名的撤退。

en: The Visitors ' Center provides information on the role of Fort Lee in the War .
zh: 参观者中心提供关于李堡在战争中的作用的信息。

en: Audio - visual displays , detailed exhibits , gives visitors a sense of what this town was like centuries ago .
zh: 听觉展示, 详细的展览, 让参观者对这座城市几百年前的面貌有了深刻的认识.

en: The George Washington Bridge can be crossed by bicycle or on foot as well as in a motorized vehicle .
zh: 乔治华盛顿大桥可以骑自行车或步行,也可以骑摩托车。

en: Other than eating , or shopping , or shopping for food , there is not much else to do unless you work in Fort Lee .
zh: 除了吃饭、购物、购买食物外,除了在李堡工作以外,别无其他事情可做。

en: Fort Lee also has a great community center open to all borough residents .
zh: 李堡也是一个伟大的社区中心,开放给所有区居民。

en: The community center has dance , yoga , and other exercise classes , offers open gym hours for basketball or other recreation .
zh: 社区中心有舞蹈 、 瑜伽 、 其他运动课, 为篮球或其他娱乐提供开放的健身房时间.

en: During the summer their outdoor theatre is used for performances and " movies in the park " every Friday night .
zh: 在夏天,他们的户外剧院每星期五晚上都用于表演和“ 公园里的电影 ” 。

en: Jack Alter Fort Lee Community Center , 1355 Inwood Terrace , tel : 1 201-592-4699 , contact for membership information , and upcoming events .
zh: Jack Alter Fort Lee Community Center, 1355 Inwood Terrace, 电话:1 201-592-4699, 联络会员资料, 及即将举行的活动.

en: There is an abundance of supermarkets , one the most famous and unique being Caffasso ’s Fairway Market .
zh: 这里有很多超市,其中最著名的和独特的是卡法索的万里市场。

en: There are tons of specialty boutiques and gourmet caterers , as well as clothing and sporting good retailers .
zh: 这里有许多专门的百货店和美食家,以及服装和体育用品零售商。

en: Also on Main St. is Metropolitan Plants , a haven for flower lovers , with a very large selection of products for gardeners .
zh: 同样在主街是大都会植物园,是园艺爱好者的避难所,园艺爱好者的品目非常丰富。

en: Within Fort Lee , the main attraction would be its collection of restaurants .
zh: 在李堡内, 主要的景点是其餐厅的收藏.

en: They have a warm local atmosphere and taste great .
zh: 他们有一个温暖的当地气氛,味道很好。

en: Guadeloupe , known as Gwadloup in the local creole , and sometimes known as the Butterfly Island  on account of the shape of two of its major islands , is a group of islands in the eastern Caribbean , and is a French overseas department .
zh: 瓜德鲁普(Guadeloupe),在当地的克里奥尔语中被称为瓜德鲁普,有时也被称为蝴蝶岛,因为其两个主要岛屿的形状,是加勒比东部的一个群岛,是法国海外部。

en: It is located southeast of Puerto Rico .
zh: 位于波多黎各东南部。

en: Pointe - à - Pitre : with its suburbs , it is the economic capital of Guadeloupe
zh: 皮特尔: 与其郊区, 它是瓜德鲁普的经济首都

en: St François if you go at the eastern point of Guadeloupe , you will reach La Pointe des Chateaux , a scenery made of sand and rocks which have vaguely the shape of a castle .
zh: 圣弗朗索瓦如果你到瓜德鲁普的东端,你会到达城堡的角,一个由沙子和岩石构成的景象,这些岩石有模糊的城堡形状。

en: From there , you can look up at the islands La Désirade , Petite Terre , Marie Galante , Les Saintes , La Dominique but also have a perfect view of the islands Grande Terre and far away Basse Terre .
zh: 从那里,你可以俯瞰拉迪西拉德岛、 Petite Terre岛、Marie Galante岛、Les Saintes岛、La Dominique岛,同时也可以俯瞰大特里岛和遥远的 Basse Terre岛。

en: L'Americano , bd Georges Mandel , 0590883899 : bar / restaurant offers free salsa courses on Saturdays and live performances some days .
zh: L'Americano, bd Georges Mandel, 0590883899 : 酒吧/餐厅在星期六提供免费的萨尔萨课程和一些天现场表演。

en: You will find all kind of bars .
zh: 你会找到各种酒吧。

en: You can try Club Med , 0590854950 fax : 0590854959  for a one day all inclusive  for about € 46 , so it may be a good deal  .
zh: 你可以尝试 Club Med, 0590854950 传真: 0590854959, 为期一天, 包括约€ 46, 因此可能是一个很好的交易。

en: You can also go to Porte d'Enfer , a beautiful still stripe of sea between a scenery of reefs .
zh: 你可以去 Porte d'Enfer,一个美丽的静止的海带,在珊瑚礁的景象之间。

en: From there , walk one hour along the cliff , and you will discover a Souffleur , kind of geyser due to the pressure of the sea .
zh: 从那里,沿着悬崖步行一小时,你会发现一个苏菲尔厄,因为海压力的 geyser。

en: They are located at the same place .
zh: 它们位于同一个地方。

en: Not too far from there , you can find a local bar / nightclub named Bik Kreyol , Beau Soleil , 0590258046 or 0590920648  .
zh: 离那里不远,你可以找到当地的酒吧/夜总会,叫Bik Kreyol, Beau Soleil, 0590258046或0590920648。

en: The building is typical , it 's a former warehouse .
zh: 这个建筑是典型的, 它是一个旧仓库.

en: Some are within 5 – 10 minutes walking distance from the nearest parking lot , some require at least 3 – 4 hours of hiking  .
zh: 离最近的停车场有5-10分钟的步行距离,有些需要至少3-4小时的徒步旅行。

en: The local rum distilleries offer tours  which are certainly worth the while since rum production is a very integral part of Guadeloupe 's economy .
zh: 当地的红酒酿造厂提供旅游,因为红酒生产是瓜德鲁普经济的重要组成部分。

en: And sampling the local rums is definitely worth the while .
zh: 而且采样当地的朗姆肯定值得一试。

en: Even though they might not be the best way to get around the island , a ride on the bus is still an experience you should not miss .
zh: 尽管他们可能不是 best way to get around the island, 坐公共汽车仍然是一个你不应该错过的经历。

en: Cheap , full of locals , conducted by fearless drivers , you can enjoy the beautiful Caribbean panorama to the sound of Guadeloupean zouk music .
zh: 廉价,满是当地人,由无畏的司机指挥,你可以享受美丽的加勒比的风光,听着瓜德鲁普的萨克音乐。

en: Some routes are not good for passengers with weak stomachs .
zh: 有些路线对胃不好的乘客不适宜。

en: Isfahan  is a city in central Iran , south of Tehran and is the capital of Isfahan Province .
zh: 伊斯法汗是伊朗中部的一座城市,位于德黑兰南部,是伊斯法汗省的首都。

en: Due to its beautiful hand - painted tiling and magnificent public square , it is considered to be one of the most beautiful cities in the world .
zh: 由于它的美丽的手绘瓷砖和壮丽的公共广场, 它被认为是世界上最美丽的城市之一.

en: An ancient town and capital of Persia from 1598 to 1722 , it was long noted for its fine carpets and silver filigree .
zh: 从1598年到1722年,古城和波斯的首都,它因其精美的地毯和银 filigree而闻名。

en: Today , textile and steel mills take their place .
zh: 如今,纺织和钢铁厂取代了它们。

en: Its architecture , tree - lined boulevards and relaxed pace make it one of the highlights of Iran .
zh: 它的建筑 、 树林排列的大道和放松的步伐使它成为伊朗的重点之一.

en: The city is 430 km south of Tehran at the foothills of the Zagros mountain range .
zh: 该市位于德黑兰以南430公里,位于扎格罗斯山脉的山麓。

en: The city enjoys a temperate climate and regular seasons .
zh: 这个城市有着温和的气候和规律的季节。

en: Isfahan is located on the main north - south and east - west routes crossing Iran .
zh: 伊斯法汉位于主要的北 - 南和东 - 西经伊朗的路线上.

en: The city has an Armenian Quarter called Jolfa  established by Shah Abbas I in the 1600s after he destroyed the prosperous Armenian town of Julfa in Armenia and forced all of the Armenians to move to Persia , mostly to Isfahan .
zh: 阿巴斯一世于1600年代摧毁了亚美尼亚城市朱尔法,迫使所有亚美尼亚人迁往波斯,大部分人迁往伊斯法汉。

en: They were allocated land and rebuilt a prosperous community that was a key part of an Armenian trade network extending from Singapore and India to Venice and Amsterdam .
zh: 他们被分配土地,重建了一个繁荣的社区,这是从新加坡和印度到威尼斯和阿姆斯特丹的亚美尼亚贸易网络的关键部分。

en: Today the quarter still has many Armenian Churches , an Armenian school , shops and Armenian residents .
zh: 今天,该区仍有许多亚美尼亚教堂,一个亚美尼亚学校,商店和亚美尼亚居民。

en: There are daily flights to Tehran and Mashhad in Iran .
zh: 每天有前往伊朗的德黑兰和马什哈德的航班。

en: There are also flights to Damascus , Dubai , Kuwait and Istanbul .
zh: 还有往大马士革、迪拜、科威特和伊斯坦布尔的航班。

en: From the Airport you can take cab for c. IRR 200,000 to the city centre .
zh: 从机场起,你可以乘出租车到市中心的IRR200,000。

en: Since most people are going there anyway , you can always ask people to share taxi .
zh: 因为大多数人都去那里 anyway,你可以随时要求人们分享出租车。

en: The square contains two mosques , a palace , and the bazaar .
zh: 广场有两个清真寺、一座宫殿和一个市场。

en: This a very popular place for locals to picnic on Friday and holiday evenings .
zh: 这个地方很受欢迎,在星期五和假日晚上当地人去野餐。

en: 1596 , dating from the Saffavid era , the avenue is the most historically famous in all of Persia .
zh: 1596年, 从 萨法维德 时代 开始, 这条 大道 是 波斯 历史上 最 著名的 大道 。

en: Built during the Safavid period , it is an excellent example of Islamic architecture of Iran , and regarded as one of the masterpieces of Persian Architecture .
zh: 建于萨法维德时期,是伊朗伊斯兰建筑的杰作,被认为是波斯建筑的杰作之一。

en: It is registered as a UNESCO World Heritage Site .
zh: 它被列入教科文组织世界遗产。

en: Its splendour is mainly due to the beauty of its seven - colour mosaic tiles and calligraphic inscriptions .
zh: 它的华丽主要归因于它的七色 mosaic 瓦片和书法铭文的美丽.

en: One of the architectural masterpieces of Safavid Iranian architecture , this mosque is considered to be the most beautiful in Iran .
zh: 这座清真寺是萨法维德伊朗建筑的建筑杰作之一,被认为是伊朗最美丽的。

en: The mosque was designed to be a private mosque for the royal family and therefore it does not have any minarets .
zh: 这座清真寺被设计为皇家家族的私人清真寺,因此它没有 minarets。

en: There is a tunnel from the mosque to the Royal Palace , across the square .
zh: 从清真寺到皇家宫殿有一条隧道,穿过广场。

en: Started in AD 842 , this is the first Islamic building to adopt the four - courtyard layout of Sassanid palaces .
zh: 该建筑始建于842年, 是第一个采用萨珊王朝宫殿四院布局的伊斯兰建筑.

en: The portal was covered in mud until it was discovered in 1956 .
zh: 门廊被泥土覆盖,直到1956年才发现。

en: It is forty - eight meters high and there are seven floors , each accessible by a difficult spiral staircase .
zh: 它高 四十八 米, 有七层, 每个层都通过一个困难的螺旋楼梯通往.

en: In the sixth floor music room , deep circular niches are found in the walls , having not only aesthetic value , but also acoustic .
zh: 在第六层音乐厅内,墙壁中发现深圆的空间,不仅具有美学价值,而且具有声学价值。

en: It is rich in naturalistic wall paintings by Reza Abbassi , the court painter of Shah Abbas I , and his pupils .
zh: 它富于自然主义的壁画,由拉萨·阿巴斯西(Reza Abbassi)、沙阿·阿巴斯一世(Shah Abbas I)的宫廷画家和他的弟子创作。

en: There are floral , animal and bird motifs .
zh: 有花、动物和鸟类的图案。

en: 1647 : It is called Palace of forty columns , as there are many columns , and in Iranian , 40 means many .
zh: 1647年:它被称作40个柱子的宫殿,因为有许多柱子,在伊朗语中,40个意味着很多。

en: Incidentally , there are twenty columns , and these are reflected in the pool in front , which might also account for its name .
zh: 顺便说一下,有二十个柱子,它们在前面的池中映射出来,这可能也解释了它的名字。

en: The function of this palace was for holding religious - national ceremonies and royal festivals and for receiving royal ambassadors and guests .
zh: 这座宫殿的职能是举行宗教-国家仪式和皇家节日,并接待皇家大使和客人。

en: Contains some spectacular battle murals .
zh: 包含一些壮观的战斗壁画。

en: Łódź  is Poland 's third biggest city , and the capital of the Łódzkie Voivodship .
zh: 罗兹是波兰第三大城市,也是罗兹省的首都。

en: Unlike most other large Polish cities , which have long histories , Łódź was created almost from scratch during the 19th century textile industry boom to house textile mills , their owners and their workers , and rapidly grew to become an important industrial and commerce centre .
zh: 与其他大波兰城市不同,波兰有悠久的历史,罗兹在19世纪纺织工业的繁荣时期几乎从零创建,以安置纺织厂、它们的业主和工人,并迅速发展成为一个重要的工业和商业中心。

en: In recent years , Łódź has been battling rising unemployment and youth migration resulting from the failing textile industry and is repositioning itself as a hub for design and creative industries .
zh: 近年来,洛兹一直在打击由于纺织业的衰落而上升的失业和青年移民,并重新定位为设计和创意产业的枢纽。

en: Owing to its history , Łódź has an impressive collection of residential , commercial and industrial 19th - century architecture including some of Europe 's largest factory buildings , now mostly repurposed as shopping centres or lofts .
zh: 由于其历史, 罗兹有令人印象深刻的住宅 、 商业和工业建筑的19世纪建筑,包括欧洲最大的工厂建筑,现在大多被重新用于购物中心或高楼.

en: Recent local investment and a long - standing cultural scene ensures there is always something more to do than just sightseeing or shopping , with the city hosting some of the best museums and art galleries in the country .
zh: 近期的当地投资和悠久的文化景观保证,除了观光或购物外,这里还有其他的事情可以做,因为这个城市拥有国内最好的博物馆和美术馆。

en: The close proximity of Warsaw and Łódź 's location at the crossroads of the Polish motorway system make it an ideal destination for a day trip or longer city break .
zh: 波兰高速公路系统交汇处的华沙和罗兹的地理位置使它成为日游或更长的城市休息的理想目的地。

en: The origin of the city 's name is unknown , however , the word łódź translates to " boat " in English .
zh: 这个城市的名字的起源不详,但“łódź”这个词在英语中翻译为“船”。

en: This is referred to in the emblem and when you hear the dwellers of Łódź  łodzianka  łodzianie  ) calling themselves " the boat people " .
zh: 这在徽章中提到,当你听到罗兹的居民(lodzianka łodzianie)称自己为“船民”时。

en: A settlement on the area of present - day Łódź was established in the 14th century and in 1423 it was granted a town charter , along with the right to have a marketplace .
zh: 在14世纪,在今天的罗兹地区建立了一个定居点,并于1423年授予了一个城市宪章,以及拥有市场的权利。

en: However , the real development of Łódź started with the industrial era at the beginning of the 19th century when the city was chosen to be the heart of the rapidly - growing textile industry .
zh: 然而,洛兹的真正发展始于19世纪初的工业时代,当时洛兹被选为快速增长的纺织工业中心。

en: The population of Łódź soared from some 4,000 people in the 1830s and 40,000 in 1865 to over 300,000 inhabitants at the turn of the century , which was an unprecedented growth on a worldwide scale .
zh: 羅茲的人口從1830年代的4,000人和1865年的40,000人上升到世紀初的300,000人,這是全球規模的前所未有的增長。

en: The rapid development of Łódź in the second half of the 19th century was brought about by the rise of enormous industrialist fortunes .
zh: 洛兹在19世纪第二半叶的迅速发展是由巨大的工业财富的崛起所带来的。

en: The profits obtained from prosperous textile mills opened up practically unlimited possibilities for their owners .
zh: 从繁荣的纺织厂获得的利润为其所有者提供了几乎无限的可能性。

en: The city residences became expressions of the riches and power of the local tycoons .
zh: 城市居民成为当地贵族的财富和权力的表达。

en: They were usually situated next to the owner 's factory .
zh: 他们通常在主人的工厂旁边。

en: Ever since the industrial revolution brought a massive influx of workforce , Łódź had been a city almost equally divided between four cultures - Polish , Jewish , German and Russian .
zh: 自从工业革命带来大量劳动力的涌入以来,洛兹一直是四种文化 - - 波兰、犹太、德国和俄罗斯 - - 几乎同样的区分的城市。

en: Andrzej Wajda 's movie , Promised Land based on a novel by the Nobel laureate Władysław Reymont , depicts those times and is a worthwhile introduction to the city 's bustling history .
zh: 安德烈·瓦伊达的电影,基于诺贝尔奖得主Władysław Reymont的小说《许诺的土地》,描绘了那些时代,并是一个值得介绍城市繁华的历史。

en: The city was renamed to Litzmannstadt , and Piotrkowska Street was called Adolf - Hitler - Strasse .
zh: 这座城市被改名为立茨曼施塔特, 彼得罗克owska街被称作阿道夫 - 希特勒 - 大道.

en: The Jewish community was practically wiped out , and many others lost their lives .
zh: 犹太人社区几乎被摧毁,还有许多人丧生。

en: Although the city was not destroyed in the aftermath , the material losses were serious as the machinery , raw materials and finished goods were taken away by the fleeing Nazis .
zh: 尽管城市在之后没有被摧毁,但物质损失是严重的,因为机器、原材料和成品被逃离的纳粹人夺走了。

en: The day before the liberation , about 80,000 Germans left Łódź in panic .
zh: 解放前一天,约8万德国人惊恐地离开了 Łodzi。

en: Since the fall of communism in Poland , Łódź has not enjoyed the rapid economic growth cities like Kraków , Warsaw and Wrocław have experienced , and has had to endure the fall of much of its textile industry , rising unemployment and emigration  .
zh: 自波兰共产主义垮台以来,罗兹没有享受过像克拉科夫、华沙和弗洛茨瓦罗这样的快速经济增长的城市,并且不得不忍受其纺织工业的大部分倒闭、失业和移民的上升。

en: This led to further dilapidation of the investment - starved city , and many of its streets and buildings show profound signs of neglect .
zh: 这导致了投资贫穷的城市进一步分裂,许多街道和建筑物表现出严重的忽视迹象。

en: At first glance , for a city of 760,000 and agglomeration of 1.428,000 , there does not seem to be much to see .
zh: 乍一看,对于一个760,000人的城市和1.428,000人的聚居区,似乎没有什么可看。

en: However , the situation is rapidly changing now with Łódź campaigning and redesigning itself as an up - and - coming destination .
zh: 然而, 现在的情况正在迅速变化,洛兹正在宣传和重新设计自己作为一个即将到来的目的地.

en: To accomplish this , Łódź has been capitalizing on its film history - Łódź is jokingly referred to as the " HollyŁódź " of Poland and hosts several film festivals and many other cultural events .
zh: 为了实现这一目标,波罗兹一直在利用其电影历史 — — 波罗兹被笑话称作波兰的“ HollyŁódź ”,并举办了几场电影节和许多其他文化活动。

en: Łódź today may not have the glitz and glamour of its heyday ; however , there is a certain charm to Łódź in its partially renovated façades and leitmotivs , not to mention its grand artistic traditions .
zh: 如今的罗兹可能没有其高峰时期的光辉和魅力;然而,部分翻新的 фасад和主题,更不用说其伟大的艺术传统,给罗兹带来了某种魅力。

en: Mérida is the capital of the state of Yucatán in Mexico .
zh: 梅里达是墨西哥尤卡坦州的首都。

en: You will find elegant hotels , restaurants and malls in the northern part of the city .
zh: 在城市北部,你会找到优雅的旅馆、餐馆和购物中心。

en: Downtown , there are hotels and restaurants to suit every budget .
zh: 市中心,有各种酒店和餐馆适合每一个预算。

en: A large central market and numerous small shops are found all around the main plaza .
zh: 广场周围有许多大型中央市场和小商店。

en: Mérida has a rich cultural life which also reflects its diversity .
zh: 梅里达的丰富文化生活也反映了它的多样性。

en: Many free concerts , performances and other events are held daily .
zh: 每天有许多免费的音乐会、表演和其他活动。

en: The city was founded by the Spanish conquistadors in the 1540s on top of a centuries - old Maya city called T'ho .
zh: 这座城市由西班牙征服者在1540年代建立在一座几百年历史的玛雅城市T'ho之上。

en: The palatial home of the family of conquistador leader Montejo can still be seen on the south side of the Zócalo or main square .
zh: 索卡洛(Zócalo)或主广场的南侧仍然可以看到蒙特乔(Montejo)征服者领袖家族的宫殿。

en: Here and there bits of ancient Maya stonework can be seen reused in Spanish Colonial era buildings in the old part of town .
zh: 在旧市镇的西班牙殖民时期的建筑中,可以看到一些古代玛雅石器作品的重新使用。

en: From the later 1800s to the 1920s Mérida enjoyed prosperous boom times fueled by the henequen or sisal plant harvest , which made Yucatán the rope maker to the world .
zh: 从19世纪晚期到20世纪20年代,梅里达享受繁荣繁荣的繁荣时期,其产物是花生植物的收获,这使得尤卡坦成为全世界的绳子制造者。

en: Progressive Mérida had electric trams and street lights before Mexico City .
zh: 在墨西哥城之前,进步的梅里达有电车和街灯。

en: The wealthy constructed the grand Pasejo Montejo avenue north of the old town , inspired by the Champs - Élysées in Paris .
zh: 富人修建了旧市北面的圣帕塞奥蒙特乔大道, 以巴黎的 Champs - Élysées为灵感.

en: With the development of artificial twines the sisal boom ended , and Mérida slowed to a more sleepy provincial capital until development picked back up in the late 20th century .
zh: 随着人工双胞胎的开发,西萨尔的繁荣告终,梅里达开始缓慢发展,直到20世纪末才恢复发展。

en: The city 's ambiance is colonial and the climate is tropical .
zh: 这个城市的气氛是殖民地的,气候是热带的。

en: The daytime temperature varies ; in January , it is about 24 ° C  and in June , about 35 ° C  .
zh: 白天的温度变化,在1月大约为24°C,在6月大约为35°C。

en: They have lunch and siesta , then go back to work for a few hours in the late afternoon .
zh: 他们吃午饭和午饭,然后在下午晚些时候再回去工作。

en: You can see them visiting and talking as they stroll along the streets , sit in the plazas or dine in the many sidewalk restaurants .
zh: 你可以看见他们在街上散步,在广场上坐,或者在许多路边餐馆里吃饭。

en: From Mérida , it is easy to take day trips to a vast array of destinations : archaeological sites , ecological parks , typical villages , caves , beaches , colonial missions and more .
zh: 从梅里达出发,很容易到许多目的地进行日游:考古遗址、生态公园、典型的村庄、洞穴、海滩、殖民任务等等。

en: Take your time and really explore the Maya sites , walk for miles along the Gulf of Mexico , attend a village festival , photograph the wildlife , crawl through a cave or swim in a cenote .
zh: 花时间去真正探索玛雅的遗址,沿墨西哥湾步行数英里,参加村庄节日,拍摄野生动物,爬进洞穴或游泳。

en: The city maintains several tourist information offices , all of which can offer helpful information on accommodation , free maps , and bus connections .
zh: 该市设有多个旅游信息处,它们都提供有关住宿、免费地图和公共汽车的便利信息。

en: All offices also have free copies of Yucatan Today , a helpful weekly Spanish - English publication listing all events in the city and the surrounding region .
zh: 所有办事处还免费提供《尤卡坦今日》的副本,这是一份帮助的每周西班牙语 - 英语出版物,列出了市内和周边地区的所有事件。

en: Often overshadowed by San Francisco , its larger neighbor lying directly to the west , Oakland has in recent years began to step out from under the shadows , playing upon the beautiful highlights of its own and its rise as the multicultural " hipster ' city of the Bay Area .
zh: 经常被旧金山遮蔽,其较大的邻居直接位于西边,奥克兰近年来开始从阴影下走出,在自己的美丽的亮点上发挥作用,并成为多文化“嘻哈”城市湾区的崛起。

en: Since the 1960s , Oakland has been a hub of radical culture , and is the birthplace of both the Black Panther Party and the Hell 's Angels .
zh: 自1960年代以来,奥克兰一直是激进文化的中心,也是黑豹党和地狱天使的诞生地。

en: Oakland 's history in the arts and entertainment arena is notable as well , as Oakland has nurtured or been a second home to novelists Gertrude Stein , Jack London , Amy Tan , and Maya Angelou ; actors Meryl Streep , Mark Hamill , Bruce Lee , and Tom Hanks ; architect Julia " Butterfly " Hill ; classical conductor Calvin Simmons ; rappers MC Hammer , 2Pac , Messy Marv , and several other notables in the liberal arts and sciences .
zh: 奥克兰在艺术和娱乐领域的历史也是值得注意的,因为奥克兰是小说家格尔特鲁德·斯坦、杰克·伦敦、艾米·坦和玛雅·安吉洛的第二家;演员梅里尔·斯特雷普、马克·汉密尔、布鲁斯·李和汤姆·汉克斯;建筑师朱莉娅“蝴蝶”山;古典指挥家卡尔文·西蒙斯;摇滚乐队MC·哈默、2Pac、梅西·马夫和一些其他自由艺术和科学的著名人。

en: Oakland as a city reflects the amazing diversity of its residents and long history .
zh: 奥克兰作为一个城市反映了其居民的惊人的多样性和悠久的历史。

en: For many visitors , the first place they are likely to visit is Downtown , especially if they are in town on business , or simply do not know where to start .
zh: 对许多游客来说,他们最有可能参观的第一个地方是市中心,特别是在城市里出差,或者根本不知道该从哪里开始。

en: The center of transportation by BART and by bus is there , if one wants to branch out .
zh: BART和公共汽车的交通中心是在那里,如果一个人想分支出去。

en: And it is as simple as walking in a direction from there , for the first few neighborhoods , since Old Oakland is along 10th Street , just west of Broadway .
zh: 而且从那里走一方向就很容易,因为旧奥克兰沿10街,就在百老汇以西。

en: Just east of Broadway and continuing north and south is Oakland 's famous Chinatown , and that to get the real essence of " Chinatown , " Oakland rather than San Francisco is your best bet .
zh: 就在百老汇的东面和继续北和南是奥克兰著名的中国城,并且获得“中国城”的真正本质,奥克兰而不是旧金山是你的最好的赌注。

en: Many of the buildings and streets of Chinatown reflect the diverse nature of its history , in architecture and in the bilingual signs seen throughout the neighborhood .
zh: 中国城的许多建筑和街道反映了其历史的多样性,在建筑上和在整个社区的双语标志上。

en: The curious traveler can venture to take a bus southwards along Broadway , and come to Jack London Square .
zh: 好奇的旅行者可以冒险乘公共汽车沿着百老汇向南,到杰克伦敦广场。

en: The unlikely mixture of warehouses and very expensive restaurants and posh atmosphere alongside some of the landmarks of the city 's waterfront makes the Square an interesting place to visit and explore , even for locals .
zh: 这个 improbable mix of warehouses and very expensive restaurants and posh atmosphere alongside some of the landmarks of the city's waterfront makes the Square an interesting place to visit and explore, even for locals 。

en: It 's the home of the USS Potomac and the site of the namesake author 's residence , still preserved and humbly standing not far from a saloon from the same era .
zh: 它是美国波多马克号的家园,也是名著作者的住所,仍然保存和谦卑地站在同时代的酒吧附近。

en: Just west of Downtown and slightly north of the Financial District is Uptown .
zh: 位于市中心以西,金融区以北的市区是市区。

en: In the evening it buzzes with art galleries , theaters and residents and Bay Area visitors coming into the area to see concerts .
zh: 晚上,这里到处都是美术馆、剧院和居民以及湾区游客来参观音乐会。

en: Uptown also has some of the best in the city 's vintage architecture , like the Gothic Revival Cathedral Building and the Art Deco Fox and Paramount Theaters , as well as several restaurants .
zh: 上城还拥有一些在城市的老式建筑中最好的建筑,如哥特复兴大教堂建筑和艺术装饰福克斯和帕拉蒙特剧院,以及几个餐馆。

en: North Oakland is a sweeping term , referring to just about everywhere north of Uptown and Lake Merritt .
zh: 北奥克兰(英语:North Oakland)是一个广泛的术语,指位于市区北部和梅里特湖的几乎所有地方。

en: Many of the neighborhoods are commercial centers and absolute heaven for foodies or those who seek quieter surroundings than the hustle and bustle of Downtown and Chinatown .
zh: 许多地区是商业中心和绝对的天堂食品爱好者或那些寻求比市中心和中国城的喧闹更安静的环境。

en: Until the 1960s , a dominantly Italian - American neighborhood , it is now a much more diversified neighborhood , home to many restaurants , including some of the city 's best Korean and Ethiopian establishments .
zh: 直到20世纪60年代, 意大利裔美国人占主导地位的地区, 现在是一个更多样化的地区, 许多餐馆的所在地, 包括城市最好的韩国和埃塞俄比亚餐馆.

en: Northeast of Temescal and near the Berkeley border lies Rockridge , a neighborhood mixed with family friendly and artistic vibes .
zh: 位于泰梅斯卡尔东北部,靠近伯克利边境的罗克里奇(Rockridge)。

en: It has lots of local boutiques and a diverse range of food at all prices and styles .
zh: 它有许多当地的百货店和各种价格和风格的多样的食品。

en: Open - air markets , bookstores , and a BART station all its own make Rockridge another of many pleasant stops in North Oakland .
zh: 露天市场 、 书店 、 和自己的BART车站使罗克里奇成为北奥克兰许多愉快的停留点之一.

en: South of Rockridge , and southeast of Temescal lies Piedmont Avenue , a street extending from Broadway near 34th and Hawthorne and an area with a group of hospitals on a hill  up and through a neighborhood bordered on both sides by picturesque hills , houses and trees .
zh: 位于洛克里奇以南,泰梅斯卡尔以东南的皮埃蒙特大道(Piedmont Avenue)是一条从百老汇(Broadway)附近的34号和霍瑟恩(Hawthorne)的街道。

en: Another of North Oakland 's group of foodie spots , home to the city 's single Michelin - rated restaurant and many others ; cafes , ice cream , coffee shops and pleasant walks complete the vision of this interesting and quiet neighborhood .
zh: 北奥克兰的另一组美食胜地,是该市唯一的Michelin级餐馆和其他许多;咖啡馆、冰淇淋、咖啡店和愉快的散步完成这个有趣的和安静的社区的愿景。

en: Grand Lake and Lakeshore both share a friendly , suburban sort of feel .
zh: 格兰德湖和湖岸都分享一个友好的, 郊区的那种感觉.

en: The Grand Lake Theater stands at the entrance to the neighborhood that bears its name , a matter of a few hundred feet from Lakeshore Avenue – both are diverse neighborhoods no matter what your budget , be it burgers or sandwiches or a full romantic evening , either of these twin - sister neighborhoods will make a pleasant time , by day or night .
zh: 格兰德莱克剧院位于它的名字命名的社区入口处,距离湖岸大道几百英尺 — — 两者都是不同的社区,不管你的预算如何,不管是汉堡还是三明治,还是一个浪漫的夜晚,这两个双胞胎姐妹社区都会带来愉快的时光,白天或夜晚。

en: West Oakland was once a burgeoning working - class neighborhood with its roots tracing as far back as the opening decades of the 19th century .
zh: 西奥克兰曾经是一个新兴的工人阶级社区,其根源可以追溯到19世纪的开端年代。

en: It has seen a period of decline between the 1960s and the more recent past .
zh: 它经历了1960年代和最近的过去之间的衰退时期。

en: Strangely , twice in its history the neighborhood has seen benefits from major earthquakes .
zh: 奇怪的是, 这个地区历史上有两次从大地震中获益.

en: After the 1906 earthquake , many San Franciscans relocated there , and the industrial development of the 20s and 30s saw its population in the hundreds of thousands .
zh: 在1906年地震后,许多圣弗朗西斯克人搬到了那里,20世纪30年代的工业发展使其人口达到数以百计。

en: With Loma Prieta in 1989 , the effective barrier of the Cypress Street Overpass was destroyed , and the decades since have seen the rebuilding and refurbishing of many of the neighborhood 's original Victorian houses , and there is a burgeoning performing arts community growing near the center of the neighborhood .
zh: 1989年,洛马普里塔(Loma Prieta)被摧毁,塞普里斯街过桥的有效屏障被摧毁,数十年来,该地区许多原先的维多利亚风格的房屋进行了重建和翻新,并且在该地区中心附近兴起了一个新兴的表演艺术社区。

en: Though there are a few draws for the traveler , West Oakland is dominantly a very poor working - class residential neighborhood with a less than spectacular reputation .
zh: 尽管旅游者有一些吸引力, 西奥克兰主要是一个非常贫穷的工人阶级住宅区,其声誉还不如壮观.

en: Founded in 1871 , it has become the region 's primary political , cultural , economic , and transportation center .
zh: 建于1871年, 成为该地区的主要政治 、 文化 、 经济和交通中心.

en: At an elevation of 1100 ft  , it is situated in the biologically unique Sonoran Desert .
zh: 海拔1100英尺, 它位于生物学上独一无二的索诺兰沙漠.

en: Over time it has merged with the neighboring cities of Scottsdale , Tempe , Glendale , Peoria , Chandler , and Gilbert to form the Greater Phoenix Metropolitan Area .
zh: 它与邻近城市斯科茨代尔、特门、格伦代尔、皮奥里亚、钱德勒和吉尔伯特合并形成大费尼克斯大都会区。

en: Currently exurbs such as Apache Junction , Fountain Hills , Queen Creek , and Sun City are becoming part of this metropolitan area as well .
zh: 目前,阿帕奇街区、喷泉山、皇后溪和太阳城等郊区也成为这个大都会区的一部分。

en: The Salt and Verde Rivers of central Arizona were exploited for large - scale agriculture by Native Americans as early as the 11th century .
zh: 亚利桑那州中部的盐河和绿河早在11世纪就被美洲原住民用作大规模农业.

en: The area that now encompasses Phoenix was a center of the Hohokam culture , which built large canal systems and a network of towns and villages , whose remains may be viewed in the city to this day .
zh: 现在包括菲尼克斯的地区是霍霍坎文化中心,它建造了大型运河系统和城镇和村庄的网络,其遗迹可以追溯到今天。

en: White settlers discovered the remnants of the Hohokam culture in the 19th century .
zh: 白人移民在19世纪发现了霍霍坎文化遗迹。

en: The city 's name reflects its history as a city " reborn from the ashes " of the previous settlement .
zh: 这个城市的名字反映了它的历史,它是“从以前的定居点的灰烬中复活的”城市。

en: European - American settlement of the area commenced in the 1860s , and in 1911 the completion of the first of several large reservoirs in the mountains north and east of Phoenix insured its success as a center for irrigation - based agriculture .
zh: 该地区的欧洲 - 美洲定居始于1860年代, 1911年在费尼克斯东北部的几座大型水库中修建的第一座水库确保了该地区成为一个以灌溉为基础的农业中心的成功。

en: Many tens of thousands of acres were planted in citrus and cotton and other crops , and for many years , intensive , year - round irrigated agriculture formed the basis of the economy .
zh: 数以万计的公顷的柑橘和棉花和其他作物被种植,多年来, 密集 、 全年灌溉农业构成了经济的基础.

en: Recent years are seeing a revival , and trendy hotels , bars , shops and restaurants are making it a place to be again .
zh: 近年来出现了复兴,时尚的旅馆、酒吧、商店和餐馆正在使它成为一个可以再次成为的地方。

en: Warm and sunny winter weather also ensured a thriving tourism industry , and encouraged many Easterners and Midwesterners to relocate to Phoenix .
zh: 温暖和阳光的冬季天气也确保了繁荣的旅游业,并鼓励了许多复活节和中西部人迁往费尼克斯。

en: High - tech industry began to flourish after World War II , and since that time the growth of Phoenix has been explosive .
zh: 第二次世界大战后, 高科技工业开始蓬勃发展, 自那时起, 凤凰城的增长已经爆炸性.

en: As a result , a population of just over 100,000 in 1950 has given way to a 2014 estimate of 1,537,058  .
It has the highest average temperature of any metropolitan area in the States .
zh: 它拥有美国任何大都市地区的最高平均温度。

en: The weather varies enormously from one season to the next .
zh: 从一个季节到另一个季节,天气变化很大。

en: While it 's not as cold as in the northern states during the winter , it does freeze sometimes , and temperatures in the 30s ° F  are not unheard of .
zh: 虽然冬天并不像北部州那样寒冷,但有时会冻结,而30摄氏度的温度也不难听见。

en: Monsoon rains with lightning occur regularly from July to September during the late afternoon and evening , occasionally overnight also .
zh: 从7月到9月,在晚间和晚上,经常有雷雨,有时甚至在一夜之间。

en: English is the dominant language in Phoenix .
zh: 英语是凤凰城的主导语言。

en: However , like much of the Southwest with a large Hispanic population , Spanish is very widely spoken in Phoenix .
zh: 然而,与西南部人口众多的西班牙人一样,西班牙语在凤凰城非常广泛地使用。

en: Spanish is a language often used for day - to - day discourse in many places , although English is the language of preference , especially when dealing with businesses and government .
zh: 西班牙语是许多地方经常用来进行日常对话的语言,尽管英语是优先的语言,特别是在处理企业和政府时。

en: It is at the southeast end of Downtown .
zh: 位于市中心的东南端。

en: It is a hub for American Airlines and Southwest Airlines .
zh: 它是美国航空公司和西南航空公司的枢纽。

en: There is no Terminal 1 .
zh: 没有 Terminal 1 。

en: Valley Metro #13 goes west to S 75th Ave along S Buckeye  from Terminal 2 .
zh: 谷地铁13号从2号车站往西行至S75街大道沿S巴克叶。

en: Likewise one can take the PHX skytrain over to the nearby 44th & Washington St Station to catch the #1  ; #44 bus  ; and the light rail  via downtown in the other direction ) .
zh: 同样,你可以乘PHX的天线到附近的44号华盛顿圣站去接上#44号巴士;以及通过市中心的轻轨(另一条方向)。

en: Due to its remarkable biodiversity , with over a third of the local plant species found nowhere else , Socotra has been designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site .
zh: 由于其显著的生物多样性,超过三分之一的当地植物种在其他地方都找不到,索科特拉被指定为教科文组织世界遗产。

en: The Island is new to tourism , so if you are looking for a luxurious vacation this is not the right destination .
zh: 这个岛对旅游业来说是新颖的,所以如果你正在寻找豪华的假期,这并不是正确的目的地。

en: Socotra takes pride in their eco - tourism and values their spectacular plant and wildlife that may sometimes be only found on this island .
zh: 索科特拉对生态旅游感到自豪,并珍视它们的壮观的植物和野生动物,它们有时只能在这个岛上找到。

en: Although the lodging and facilities may not be the same as more modern and developed locations , Socotra is a beautiful and magnificent destination choice .
zh: 虽然住宿和设施可能与更现代化和发达的地点不同,索科特拉是一个美丽的和壮观的目的地选择。

en: Socotra is an eco - tourism system with limited infrastructure and new to the international tourist market , and therefore the hotel accommodations are not quite like other destinations .
zh: 索科特拉是一个生态旅游系统,基础设施有限,对国际旅游市场新颖,因此酒店的住宿并不像其他目的地。

en: However there are four hotels in Hadibo : Taj Socotra Hotel , Hafijj Hotel , Socotra Hotel , and Summer land Hotel .
zh: 然而哈迪博有四个酒店:塔吉索科特拉酒店,哈菲兹酒店,索科特拉酒店,和夏季土地酒店。

en: These hotels may not be the most luxerious , but they do provide air - conditionting , televisions , and refrigerators in all of the rooms .
zh: 这些旅馆也许不是最豪华的, 但它们确实提供空调 、 电视和冰箱在所有房间.

en: Most of the rooms at these hotels have their own bathroom , but there are a few rooms at the Hafijj Hotel and Socotra Hotel that must share bathrooms .
zh: 这些旅馆的大多数房间都有自己的浴室,但哈菲兹旅馆和索科特拉旅馆有一些房间必须共享浴室。

en: Fortunately , there is a restaurant in each of the hotels with simple yet delicious cuisine .
zh: 幸运的是,每个旅馆都有一个简单而美味的餐厅。

en: Considering Socotra is a fairly new eco - tourism destination , their facilities are decent .
zh: 考虑到索科特拉是一个相当新的生态旅游胜地, 他们的设施是适当的.

en: In addition , there is also another hotel at the airport as well as multiple guest houses around the island .
zh: 此外,机场还有另一家酒店,以及岛上多个宾馆。

en: There are several campsites that allow tourists to barbeque on the beach with beautiful mountain views in the background .
zh: 有几个营地让游客在海滩上烧烤,背景有美丽的山景。

en: Tourists can choose to purchase camping tour packages which include a driver or guide that will show tourists around the beaches as well as provide meals during their stay .
zh: 游客可以选择购买营地旅游包,其中包括一名司机或导游,他们将向游客展示海滩周围以及在他们的逗留期间提供膳食。

en: It is a fantastic way to enjoy the beauty and wildlife of the island .
zh: 这是享受该岛的美丽和野生动物的绝佳方式。

en: A runway that provides fairly regular airline transportation was only constructed in 1999 .
zh: 一个提供相当正规的航空公司运输的跑道仅于1999年建成。

en: Like everything else , infrastructure and transportation has only just begun in recent years .
zh: 像其他所有事情一样,基础设施和交通在近几年才刚刚开始。

en: There are also plans for new harbor facilities that will allow fisherman to sell and catch more easily and make importing food and fuel simpler .
zh: 还有新的港口设施的计划,这些设施将使渔民更容易销售和捕鱼,并简化食品和燃料的进口。

en: In addition , there are also two information centers located at the airport and Hadibo .
zh: 此外,机场还有两个信息中心和哈迪博。

en: When to go : Climate is an important consideration .
zh: 什么时候去:气候是一个重要的考虑。

en: And this depends on your interest .
zh: 这取决于你的兴趣。

en: The monsoon occurs in July till mid-August  .
zh: 季风在7月至8月中旬发生。

en: Generally , wildlife and natural viewing is best from the end of January through May .
zh: 一般来说, 野生动物和自然观光最好从1月底到5月.

en: There are flights from Sana'a via Al Mukalla .
zh: 有从萨那飞往穆卡拉的航班。

en: Yemenia Airlines offers one flight per week on Thursday morning .
zh: Yemenia Airlines每周四上午提供一次航班。

en: Felix Airways offers two flights per week on Wednesday afternoon and Saturday morning .
zh: 费利克斯航空公司每周在星期三下午和星期六上午提供两班航班。

en: There are also flights from Sharjah via Al Mukalla .
zh: 还有从沙尔贾通过穆卡拉的航班。

en: There is a public bus from the airport to Hadibo and from Hadibo to Qalansia .
zh: 有公共巴士从机场到哈迪博和哈迪博到卡兰西亚。

en: Beside these two buses , there is no public transport , but car rental with driver is available .
zh: 除了这两个公共汽车外,没有公共交通工具,但有司机的汽车租车。

en: There is a lot of walking and hiking along with camel back rides available .
zh: 有大量的步行和徒步以及骆驼回游可行。

en: Socotra is considered the jewel of biodiversity in the Arabian Sea .
zh: 索科特拉被认为是阿拉伯海生物多样性的宝石。

en: Although the region is small , it is characterized by unique land and marine biodiversity .
zh: 该地区虽然很小,但具有独特的陆地和海洋生物多样性。

en: The interior of the island is dominated by the beautiful and green Hagghier mountains and limestone plateau .
zh: 岛内以美丽的绿色的哈格伊尔山脉和石灰岩高原为主导。

en: Socotra Island is very rich and is home to many rare spectacular species of reefs , fish , birds , plants , and trees which are not found anywhere else in the world .
zh: 索科特拉岛非常富裕,是许多罕见的壮观的珊瑚礁、鱼类、鸟类、植物和树木的家园,它们在世界上其他地方都找不到。

en: The limestone plateau and the Hagghier Mountains are the richest areas for endemic plant species , but endemics are found throughout the island in every type of vegetation .
zh: 石灰岩高原和哈格里尔山脉是特种植物最富饶的地区,但特种在整个岛上都有各种类型的植被。

en: One of the most famous plants is the dragon 's blood tree “ dracaena cinnabara ” which exists only on Socotra and nowhere else on the Earth .
zh: 最著名的植物之一是龙的血树 “ dracaena cinnabara ”,它只存在于索科特拉和地球其他地方。

en: The tree got its name because if any damage is made to the bark then a dark red liquid oozes out .
zh: 树名是因为如果树皮受到任何伤害,就会流出一种暗红色的液体。

en: The dragon 's blood tree thrives in Socotra 's arid climate
zh: 龙的血树在苏科特拉的干旱气候中蓬勃发展

en: There is also the Desert Rose  which looks like a blooming elephant leg .
zh: 还有沙漠玫瑰,看起来像一只开花的象腿。

en: Also found in Socotra 's landscape is the ever - strange and extremely rare Cucumber Tree .
zh: 在索科特拉的景观中还发现一种非常奇怪的非常罕见的瓜树.

en: In addition there are over 120 species of birds and about 190 species of butterflies .
zh: 此外还有超过120种鸟类和约190种蝴蝶。

en: There is so much beauty all around the island , it is difficult not the appreciate to magnificent scenery and wildlife .
zh: 整个岛上有许多美丽的景色,难以欣赏壮丽的风景和野生动物。

en: Sydfynske Øhav , the South Funen Archipelago , is located south of the Danish island of Funen , comprising 55 islands and islets , at the mouth of the Baltic Sea , with a bit more than 20,000 inhabitants in total .
zh: Sydfynske Øhav,南芬兰群岛,位于丹麦芬兰岛南部,包含55个岛屿和小岛,位于波罗的海口,总人口约有20,000人。

en: It is one of Denmark 's most scenic areas , and should be a top destination of anyone taking the time to explore Denmark outside the capital .
zh: 它是丹麦最风景区之一,应该成为任何在首都以外探险丹麦的人最理想的目的地。

en: The islands were formed during the last ice age , by ice sliding over the area from the south , only the ancient hilltops was spared from submersion , and forms the many islands and islets peaking above the sea everywhere .
zh: 这些岛屿是在最后的冰河时代形成的,由冰从南面滑过这个地区,只有古代的山顶没有被淹没,形成的许多岛屿和小岛都在海面上达到顶点。

en: The area has a milder climate than the country 's average , and because of this , is home to flora and fauna not seen anywhere else in Denmark .
zh: 该地区气候比全国平均温和,因此,是丹麦其他地方没有的植物和动物的家园。

en: There are strong local movements to convert the area into a National Park .
zh: 当地有强烈的运动将该地区转变为国家公园。

en: The area is one of the most diverse natural environments in the country , and is designated as an international wildlife protection area , as it is home of several rare and protected species .
zh: 该地区是该国最多样的自然环境之一,并被指定为国际野生动物保护区,因为它是数种稀有和受保护的物种的家园。

en: If you are interested ornithology the many shallow waters around the islands and islets is a treat with thousands of birds and colonies , one of the more notable is the Arctic Tern , which migrates to Antarctica and back  every year .
zh: 如果你对鸟类学感兴趣的话,群岛和小岛周围的许多浅水是一个与数千鸟类和殖民地的赏赐,其中一个更引人注目的是北极尾巴,它每年迁往南极洲和回返。

en: This is the longest regular migration by any known animal .
zh: 这是所有已知的动物最长的定期迁徙。

en: You also find Shore Crabs , Beach Otters and - rare for Denmark - Seals in the shallow waters and beaches .
zh: 在浅海和海滩上,你还发现海岸 Crabs 、 Beach Otters 和 - 丹麦罕见的 - Seals 。

en: On dry land , up on the many islands you can find badgers , stoats and several types of deer .
zh: 在干燥的土地上,在许多岛屿上,你可以找到 badgers 、 stoats 和几种类型的鹿。

en: While possibly the most exciting animals are found beneath the water : the Harbour Porpoise , Denmark 's only resident whale population .
zh: 虽然可能最令人兴奋的动物是在水下发现:海港海豚,丹麦唯一居住的鲸鱼数量。

en: Tåsinge , Langeland and a few of the smaller islands are connected with bridges , but to most of the islands transportation is done with tiny ferries ploughing through the island sea several times per day .
zh: 托辛格 、 朗格兰岛和一些较小的岛屿都与桥梁连接,但大部分岛屿的运输由小渡轮每天数次穿过岛屿海进行。

en: The main entry points are Svendborg which is easily reach both by highway , bus and train - and Faaborg , which is best reached by bus from Odense .
zh: 主要的入站点是苏丹堡,以公路、公共汽车和火车可以轻易到达,以及法博尔格(Faaborg),以巴士从奥登斯堡最方便到达。

en: From Langeland there are ferries to some other islands .
zh: 从朗格兰岛上乘船到其他一些岛屿。

en: For easy reference ferries are listed under the individual islands .
zh: 为方便参考,船只在个别岛屿下列出。

en: From Spodsbjerg on Langeland there is a ferry connection across the great belt to Tårs on Lolland .
zh: 从兰格兰的波德斯伯格尔( Spodsbjerg)到洛兰(Lolland)的Tårs(Tårs)之间有渡轮连接。

en: Bringing a car to the islands serves little point but to rob your wallet of your hard earned cash , and you will be much better served by bringing or renting a bike in Svendborg or Faaborg , or just simply walk since the islands are generally small enough to make this feasible .
zh: 带一辆汽车到群岛服务一点也不重要,但要抢走你的钱包,你就会比带或租一辆自行车在苏本格勒或法博尔格更好,或者只是步行,因为群岛一般是足够小以使这变得可行的。

en: While some islands are connected by the same ferry , you will generally have to go back to the mainland to pass between the islands , if you rely on public transportation .
zh: 虽然一些岛屿是通过同样的渡轮连接的,如果你依靠公共交通工具,你通常必须回到大陆来穿越岛屿之间。

en: There are several mapped routes in the area , but remember to be realistic about your fitness , as some of these routes take you a fair bit away from land .
zh: 该地区有几条地图路线,但记住要对你的降保持现实,因为有些路线让你离陆路相当远。

en: Several rental places also gives you the option of trained guide , which can both provide information about the sights you visit , and make sure you are safe .
zh: 一些租车地点还提供训练导游的选项,可以提供关于您参观的景点的信息,并确保您安全。

en: It is also possible to rent Smack Dinghies with sails to ease the strain , or larger cattle barges if you are in a group at Øhavet 's smakkecenter on Strynø .
zh: 也可以租用帆船的Smack Dinghies,以缓解应变,或更大的牲畜船只,如果你是一群在斯特林的 Øhavet's smakkecenter。

en: Smack Dinghies : 225 DKK per hour / 825 DKK per day , Sea Kayak : 125 DKK per hour / 350 DKK per day , 1 hour instruction : 450 DKK .
zh: 餐具:每小时225 DKK / 每日825 DKK, 海游艇:每小时125 DKK / 每日350 DKK, 1小时指导:450 DKK 。

en: The archipelago trail  is a 220 km hiking trail connected by ferries that circles the entire area .
zh: 该群岛小径是一条由渡轮连接的220公里的徒步小径,环绕整个地区。

en: Completed in 2008 the trail is well marked with regular signs set on wooden poles .
zh: 在2008年完成后,这条路由木柱上设置的定期标志标明。

en: Allow 4 - 7 days for the whole trail depending on experience and your desired pace , but it is also possible do to day trips along the route .
zh: 根据经验和你所希望的步速,允许4-7天的整个行程,但也可以做日游沿途。

en: The local tourist offices in Svendborg and Faaborg can arrange baggage forwarding between your chosen camps or accommodations during peak season .
zh: 苏本格勒和法博尔格的当地旅游局可以在高峰季节安排您选择的营地或旅馆之间运送行李。

en: Pre arranged package tours are also available from Travel Heels in Taasinge or Vagabond Tours in Tranekær , in cooperation with the local tourist authority .
zh: 预安排的旅游包也可以由旅游鞋在塔辛格或瓦加邦旅游在特兰尼尔,与当地旅游局合作。

en: If you choose to do the trek individually be mindful that substantial part of the trails crosses private property , so be considerate .
zh: 如果你选择单身徒步旅行,要记住大部分的徒步路线是私人财产横跨的,所以要小心。

en: A comprehensive guidebook with excellent maps is available in Danish only for 150 Kr at most tourist offices in the region .
zh: 在该地区大多数旅游办事处只有150克的丹麦语提供一份完整的指南,并提供很好的地图。

en: Pamphlets with maps , tips and points of interest in English , broken up into 7 parts is available at the tourist offices as well and as pdf files on the introductory link , it is sometimes also available at parking lots along the route , but these are only restocked a couple of times throughout the year , so you may be out of luck .
zh: 带有地图的小型张,英文提示和兴趣点,分成7个部分,在旅游局和介绍链接上的PDF文件,有时在沿途的停车场也有,但这些只是在一年内几次修复,所以你可能没有运气。

en: Islands in the archipelago listed in east to west order ; note that there are many more islands and islets in the area , but these are the ones with ferry traffic that are possible to visit without making special arrangements .
zh: 群岛列表以东至西顺序列出的岛屿;注意,该地区有许多岛屿和小岛,但这些是有渡轮运输的岛屿,可以在不作特别安排的情况下访问。

en: Most other islands are closed during much of the year for the protection of local wildlife .
zh: 大多数其他岛屿在一年大部分时间都关闭,以保护当地的野生动物。

en: For the remainder of the year , short stays are permitted , which is interpreted by the authorities as a day or a night .
zh: 全年的剩余时间,允许短期逗留,由当局解释为一天或一夜。

en: While you are normally not allowed to set up a tent , you are permitted to sleep on the beach in a sleeping bag , if necessary under a primitive cover like a tarpaulin .
zh: 虽然你通常不允许设置帐篷,但是你可以在海滩上睡在睡袋里,如果必要的话,你可以用一种原始的遮蔽物,如木板。

en: Birkholm Is only 1 km ² and home of a stubborn but loving 8 people , making it one of the smallest populated islands in the country , how long the island can sustain a full year population remains to be seen , but permanent life on the island will probably be a thing of the past in a not too distant future .
zh: 伯克霍尔姆只有1公里2英里,是一个顽固但热爱8人的家庭,使它成为全国最小人口的岛屿之一。

en: There are some nice beaches and good fishing once you 've toured the island .
zh: 一旦您参观了这个岛屿,就可以看到一些美丽的海滩和很好的捕鱼。

en: If you are a hunter , you might be lucky to run into the yearly Pheasant or hare hunts - you can even rest assured your " evil deeds " does some good , as it supports life on the island .
zh: 如果你是一个猎人,你可能会幸运地遭遇到每年的农场或野兔狩猎——你甚至可以放心你的“邪恶行为”会带来一些好处,因为它支持岛上的生活。

en: Thais are a polite people and , while remarkably tolerant of foreigners gallivanting on their beaches and with their women , you ll find that you will get more respect if you in turn treat them and their customs with respect .
zh: 泰国人是一个礼貌的民族,尽管他们对外国人在海滩上和她们的女人们挥舞姿态非常宽容,但你会发现,如果你反过来尊重他们和他们的习俗,你会得到更多的尊重。

en: The traditional greeting known as the wai , where you press your hands together as is in prayer and bow slightly , is derived from the Hindu cultural influence from India , and still widely practised .
zh: 传统的问候,称为“wai”,即你按手如祈祷时那样,并轻而易举地鞠躬,源自印度的印度文化影响,至今仍被广泛应用。

en: Among Thais , there are strict rules of hierarchy that dictate how and when the wai should be given .
zh: 在泰国人中,有严格的等级规则,规定如何和什么时候应给予豁免。

en: You should not wai service people or street vendors .
zh: 你不应该拒绝服务人员或街头卖家。

en: The higher your hands go , the more respectful you are .
zh: 你的双手越高,你越有尊重。

en: You will also often see Thais doing a wai as they walk past temples and spirit houses .
zh: 你会经常看到泰国人在走过寺庙和灵房时做礼拜。

en: while you 're unlikely to cause offense if you do , you may well look slightly strange .
zh: 如果你这样做,你不太可能造成伤害,你可能看起来有点奇怪。

en: If somebody makes a wai to you , a slight bow alone is more than sufficient for ordinary occasions , and for business , most Thais will shake hands with foreigners instead of waiing anyway .
zh: 如果有人向你道歉,那么仅仅一个轻微的鞠躬就足以满足日常的需要,而且对于商业而言,大多数泰国人会和外国人握手,而不是道歉。

en: You will find that dressing appropriately means that you are shown more respect in return .
zh: 你会发现穿得合适意味着你得到更多的尊重。

en: This translates in many ways , even sometimes lowering initial offering prices at markets .
zh: 这在许多方面都有意义,甚至有时会降低市场初盘价格。

en: While some allowance is made for the differing customs of foreigners , Thais respond more positively to well - dressed Westerners .
zh: 尽管对外国人的习俗有所不同,但泰国人对洋服的西方人更积极。

en: At a minimum your clothes should be neat , clean , and free from holes or tears .
zh: 至少你的衣服应该整洁、干净、无裂缝或泪水。

en: Except at the beach or at sacred sites normal western dress is acceptable for both men and women , except that you should avoid clothing showing a lot of skin .
zh: 除了在海滩或神圣地点,普通西式服装对男女都可接受,但你应该避免暴露大量皮肤的服装。

en: Men 's shorts should be knee length or more , if worn at all .
zh: 男士的短裤应该是膝盖长或更长,如果穿的话。

en: Taking off one 's shoes at temples and private homes is mandatory etiquette , and this may even be requested at some shops .
zh: 在寺庙和私人住宅上脱鞋是强制性的礼仪,甚至在一些商店可以要求。

en: Wear shoes that slip on and off easily .
zh: 穿易滑的鞋。

en: only in the most top - end establishments are shoes required .
zh: 只有在最高级的机构里才需要鞋子。

en: It is best to play it safe with wats and other sacred sites in Thailand ;
zh: 最好在泰国和其它神圣地点玩得安全;

en: your dress should be unambiguously modest and cover your entire torso and most of your limbs .
zh: 你的裙子应该毫不含糊地谦虚,覆盖你的整个躯体和大部分肢体。

en: on top , t - shirts are acceptable , though a button - front or polo shirt would be best .
zh: 顶部的T恤是可接受的, 尽管一个按钮前部或 polo 衬衫是最好的.

en: you should make sure that your clothing covers at least your shoulders and your knees and some places may require that you wear ankle - length pants or skirts and long sleeved tops .
zh: 你应该确保你的衣服至少覆盖你的肩膀和膝盖,有些地方可能需要你穿脚踝长裤或裙子和长袖顶。

en: The rules are even more strict for foreign visitors , so even if you see a local in shorts it 's not OK for everyone .
zh: 对外国游客来说,规则甚至更严格,所以即使你看到当地人穿着短裤,也不适合每个人。

en: Topless sunbathing is common by Western women at many tourist beaches .
zh: 西式妇女在许多旅游海滩上经常不戴顶头晒太阳。

en: Monks are an integral part of Buddhism in Thailand , and Thai men are generally expected to spend a certain amount of time living as a monk at least once in their lifetime .
zh: 泰国僧侣是佛教的组成部分,一般认为泰国男性在一生中至少要过一段时间作为僧侣。

en: Buddhist monks are meant to avoid sexual temptations , and in particular they do not touch women or take things from women 's hands .
zh: 佛教僧侣的目的是避免性诱惑,特别是他们不碰女人,也不从女人手中拿东西。

en: Women should make every effort to make way for monks on the street and give them room so they do not have to make contact with you .
zh: 女人应该尽一切努力让路边的修道士们进路,让路边的修道士们有空间,这样他们就不会与你打交道。

en: Women should avoid offering anything to a monk with their hands .
zh: 女人应该避免用手向一个修道士提供任何东西。

en: Objects or donations should be placed in front of a monk so he can pick it up , or place it on a special cloth he carries with him .
zh: 物品或捐赠应该放在一个修道士面前,以便他能拿起,或放在他带的特殊布上。

en: Monks will sometimes be aided by a layman who will accept things from women merit - makers on their behalf .
zh: 僧侣们有时会得到一个为他们而接受女性造福者的东西的素人帮助.

en: Theravada Buddhist monks are also supposed to avoid material temptations and as such , are not allowed to touch money , so offering money to a monk is considered to be a sign of disrespect in most Theravada Buddhist cultures .
zh: 佛陀的僧侣也应该避免物质诱惑,因此不允许碰钱,因此向僧侣提供钱被认为是大多数佛陀文化中不尊重的迹象。

en: Therefore , should you wish to donate to a monk , you should only offer food , and put your monetary donation in the appropriate donation box at the temple .
zh: 因此,如果你想捐赠给一个修道士,你应该只提供食物,并把钱捐入神庙的适当捐赠箱里。

en: Those monks that accept money are almost always fakes .
zh: 那些接受钱的僧侣几乎都是假的。

en: Tulsa is in the Green Country region of Oklahoma .
zh: 图尔萨位于俄克拉荷马州绿地地区。

en: It is also called “ T - town ” by the locals and has been called the " Oil Capital of the World " .
zh: 当地人也称它为“ T - 镇 ”,并被称为“ 世界石油首都 ” 。

en: The Tulsa Bartlesville Combined area had 988,000 in the 2010 census .
zh: 在2010年人口普查中,图尔萨巴特尔斯维尔联合区共有988,000人。

en: Tulsa lies in northeastern Oklahoma , at the convergence of the Great Plains and the Ozark Plateau , and receives an average of 40 inches of precipitation each year , both of which account for its abundant beautiful rolling green terrain .
zh: 塔尔萨位于俄克拉荷马东北部,位于大平原和奥扎克高原的汇合处,每年平均降水40英寸,两者都为其丰富的美丽的滚动绿地提供了依据。

en: As a result , Tulsa breaks the Oklahoma stereotype of being nothing but a flat , arid dust bowl .
zh: 结果, 图尔萨打破了奥克拉荷马的陈腐观念,认为它只是一个平坦的、干燥的尘土碗.

en: The winters are considered to be very mild .
zh: 冬季被认为是非常温和的。

en: There is not much snow , just a few inches each year , typically , although in 2007 and again in 2008 there were rather large " ice storms " .
zh: 雪很少,每年只有几英寸,虽然在2007年和2008年也有相当大的“冰暴”。

en: Tulsa has over 225 days of sunshine annually .
zh: 塔尔萨每年有超过225天的阳光。

en: In Tulsa you will find old west charm as well as a cosmopolitan atmosphere .
zh: 在图尔萨,你会发现旧西风的魅力以及一个 kosmopolitan气氛。

en: You will find the people of Tulsa love their city and they have that southern charm , so they are willing to help you find your way around .
zh: 你会发现图尔萨的人们爱着他们的城市,他们拥有南方的魅力,所以他们愿意帮助你找到你周围的路。

en: Tulsa has one of the largest concentrations of Art Deco in the nation , having been a booming city during the 1920s when the architecture was first built by rich oil barons who built stately mansions and turned the Downtown area into a treasure trove of art .
zh: 塔尔萨是全国最大的艺术装饰中心之一,它是20世纪20年代兴旺的城市,当时建筑由富有的石油贵族建造,他们建造了庄严的豪宅,把市中心地区变成了艺术宝库。

en: It has major airlines with direct flights to major cities in the U.S.
zh: 它有主要航空公司直航到美国主要城市。

en: The airport offers free short term parking  .
zh: 机场提供免费短期停车。

en: Most Tulsans drive almost everywhere , although bus , bike , and pedestrian routes are starting to catch on .
zh: 大部分的塔尔桑人开车几乎到处,虽然公共汽车、自行车和行人路线开始追赶。

en: The world 's former largest McDonalds spans the roadway near Vinita , OK .
zh: 世界前最大的麦当劳位于维尼塔附近的公路上.

en: For the slow scenic route from Northeast or Southwest come in on old Route 66 .
zh: 往东北或西南的慢景路线,乘旧66号公路。

en: Thanks to urban planning , the major city streets are placed in a grid layout .
zh: 由于城市规划,主要城市街道都设置成网格布局。

en: Almost all major intersections are one mile from each other , and exactly in a straight line .
zh: 几乎所有的主要交界点彼此距离一英里,并且完全是一条直线。

en: That makes it much easier to find places than in cities where streets go every which way .
zh: 这使得找到地方比在那些街道通往任何方向的城市更容易。

en: The major exception is downtown , which is slanted at almost a 45 degree angle to the rest of the grid .
zh: 主要的例外是市中心,它几乎以45度角向网格的其他部分倾斜。

en: Several freeways and bypasses can be used to easily get around the Tulsa Metro area : I - 244 , I - 44 , US 169  , US 75 , Hwy 51  , Creek Turnpike .
zh: 多条高速公路和绕道可用来绕过塔尔萨地铁区: I-244, I-44, US 169, US 75, Hwy 51, Creek Turnpike。

en: The streets and avenues are planned on a 1 mile by 1 mile grid system , with the main arterials running on each mile .
zh: 街道和大道是计划在1英里以1英里的网格系统上,主要动脉在每个英里上运行。

en: In the core of the city , named avenues run north / south and are named after US cities , generally in repeating alphabetical order  .
zh: 在城市的核心,命名的大道以北/南运行,并以美国城市命名,一般按字母顺序重复。

en: In the mid-town area the names are taken from colleges and college towns .
zh: 在市中心,这些名字来自大学和大学城镇。

en: In the parts of the city farther from downtown , north - south streets are numbered .
zh: 在离市中心更远的地区, 北南的街道是编号的.

en: It is important to recognize that the specific format of the north - south numbered street names is North / South 145th East / West Avenue .
zh: 必须认识到,北南编号的街道名称的特定形式是北/南145街东/西大道。

en: Numbered streets run East / West with Main Street and the Arkansas River as the dividing line .
zh: 沿着大街和阿肯萨斯河的分界线,沿着 East / West 的街道编号。

en: Watch out for Place , Street , Avenue designation , e.g. 47th Place , 47th Street , or Florence Place , Florence Avenue .
zh: 注意广场 、 街道 、 大道名称,例如第47广场 、 第47街 、 佛罗伦萨广场 、 佛罗伦萨大道 。

en: In some parts of the city , numbered streets intersect , so the distinction is important .
zh: 在城市某些地区,数码街道交汇,所以区分是很重要的。

en: Although rare , one east - west numbered street may even intersect with a street of the same number running north - south .
zh: 虽然稀有, 一个东西编号的街道甚至可以与沿着南北相同编号的街道相交.

en: Downtown streets were originally platted parallel to the Frisco railroad tracks .
zh: 市中心的街道最初是平行于弗里斯科铁路的轨道铺设的。

en: When Tulsa expanded beyond the bounds of its original plat , the expanded areas were platted in alignment with the points of the compass .
zh: 当图尔萨扩展到原来的板块的边界之外时,扩展的区域与指南针的点相一致。

en: Tulsa Transit provides bus service for the Tulsa Metro area .
zh: 塔尔萨交通公司为塔尔萨地铁区提供公共汽车服务。

en: They do not run that often , especially to the outer towns like Broken Arrow .
zh: 他们并不经常跑,特别是到外围的城镇,如 Broken Arrow。

en: It is usually a means of travel for those who are without their own motor vehicle .
zh: 它通常是那些没有自己的汽车的旅行工具。

en: Tulsa has an extensive interconnected paved bike trail system .
zh: 图尔萨有一个广泛的相互连接的铺设自行车道系统。

en: Rivertrail follows the Arkansas River from downtown Tulsa south to the suburbs .
zh: 河道沿着阿肯萨斯河从图尔萨市中心南到郊区。

en: The Katy Trail runs west to Sand Springs .
zh: 凯蒂径向西延伸到沙泉。

en: The Creek Trail connects Rivertrail and continues east through Broken Arrow to the NSU - Broken Arrow campus .
zh: 溪道连接河道,继续东经 Broken Arrow 到北大 - Broken Arrow 校园。

en: Riders accustomed to flat terrain may find Tulsa 's rolling land to be a bit more challenging , particularly during the heat of summer .
zh: 习惯于平坦的地形的骑车者可能会发现图尔萨的滚动地形比以前更加挑战性,特别是在夏天的炎热中。

en: If you are looking for a good workout , the Creek Turnpike Trail follows the land 's original contours .
zh: 如果您正在寻找一个良好的训练,溪转pike小径遵循土地的原始曲线。

en: Tulsa has an active bicycling community .
zh: 塔尔萨有一个积极的自行车社区。

en: Vava’u is a group of more than 50 islands in Tonga , about 150 miles north of Tongatapu .
zh: 瓦瓦乌(Vava’u)是 Tonga 的50多个岛屿,位于 Tongatapu 以北约150英里。

en: The waters of the islands are known for their clarity , it being said that you can see the bottom at 40 metres .
zh: 群岛的海水以其透明度而闻名,据说你可以看到40米的底部。

en: The area attracts many humpback whales between June and November and there are lots of companies organising tours to see them .
zh: 该地区在6月至11月期间吸引了许多海龟,有许多公司组织参观它们。

en: There are numerous places to stay to suit most budgets .
zh: 很多地方适合大多数预算的住宿。

en: Findings of Lapita pottery suggest that early - Polynesians were on these islands close to 3000 years ago .
zh: 拉皮塔陶器的发现表明,早期波利尼西亚人居住在这些岛屿上大约3000年前。

en: These days there are around 20000 people living in the Group .
zh: 如今,该集团有大约20000人居住。

en: Neiafu and surrounding villages are home to about a third of the Group ’s overall population of around 20000 , with the majority of the population living in small villages on the other islands .
zh: 尼亚府和周边村庄占该集团总人口的三分之一左右,大部分人口居住在其他岛屿的小村庄。

en: Neiafu is the official port of entry for yachts coming to Vava'u , which attracts over 500 yachts every winter sailing season between June and October .
zh: 尼雅福是前往瓦瓦乌的游艇的官方入境港,每年6月至10月期间,它吸引了超过500艘游艇。

en: A string of islands and reefs along the eastern edge of the Group shelters the area from strong winds and ocean swellS and humpback whales come to these protected waters to give birth .
zh: 群岛东边的一系列岛屿和珊瑚礁保护该地区免受强风和海洋潮汐的侵袭。

en: between December and April few people visit and many tour companies and restaurants close down .
zh: 在12月至4月间,很少有人参观,许多旅游公司和餐馆关闭。

en: It is on the southern point of the main island of Utu Vava'u and has an attractive setting on one of the world 's most beautiful harbours .
zh: 它位于主要岛屿乌图瓦瓦乌的南端,在世界最美丽的港口中有一个引人注目的环境。

en: Neiafu offers all the usual amenities including banks , schools , tour companies , restaurants , cafes and bars , supermarkets , a market and a hospital .
zh: Neiafu提供银行、学校、旅游公司、餐馆、咖啡馆和酒吧、超市、市场和医院等日常设施。

en: It does n't have a beach but boats to one of the nearby coral atolls with superb sandy beaches are easily available .
zh: 它没有一个海滩,但是船到附近的珊瑚礁,那里有美丽的沙滩是很容易的。

en: Vava'u has a tropical climate with average temperatures up to 29 º C in January and down to 24 º C in June .
zh: 瓦瓦乌的气候是热带气候,1月份的平均气温高达29摄氏度,6月份的平均气温则降至24摄氏度。

en: From May to September there are southeast trade winds but during the summer months the winds are from the northeast .
zh: 从5月到9月,东南地区有贸易风,但夏季的风是东北方向的。

en: This is the largest island , where Neiafu is found .
zh: 这是最大的岛屿, 这里是尼雅福的发现.

en: It is a limestone island with heights up to 213 m in the west .
zh: 它是一座石灰岩岛,西面海拔高达213米。

en: The island provides a home to eleven indigenous bird species and contains Mt. Talau national park , with some of the limited remaining native vegetation .
zh: 该岛为11种土著鸟类提供了家园,包括塔拉乌山国家公园,还有一些有限的本土植被。

en: Tropical vegetation includes the pandanus or screw pine , the casuarina , and the mulberry tree , the bark of which is used to make tapa cloth .
zh: 热带植物包括松树或螺杆松,松树和松树,它们的树皮用于制成塔巴布。

en: This is the second largest island in the Group .
zh: 它是该集团第二大岛屿。

en: It can be seen across the water from Neiafu and is connected by land bridge at the most southern point of ‘Utu Vava’u .
zh: 它可以从尼雅福望 across the water and is connected by land bridge at the most southern point of 'Utu Vava'u 。

en: There are some good beaches and plenty of secluded cove beaches and protected bays with good snorkelling .
zh: 这里有一些好的海滩,还有许多孤立的海湾和带有好的 snorkelling的保护湾。

en: The island lies in deep water and has sheltered waters and bays which provide a resting place for humpbacks with calves .
zh: 该岛位于深海,有保护的水域和湾区,为野兔和小牛提供休息的地方。

en: York is an ancient cathedral city with a history that dates back to before Roman times .
zh: 约克是一个古老的教堂城市,历史可以追溯到罗马时代以前。

en: It is situated in Yorkshire , North Yorkshire , England with some of the best preserved historical buildings and structures in Europe .
zh: 它位于英格兰约克郡北约克郡,拥有欧洲保存最好的历史建筑和建筑。

en: As of the 2001 census , the population of York was 181,000 .
zh: 根据2001年人口普查,约克的人口为181,000人。

en: York is frequently ranked  the second most visited city in England after London .
zh: 伦敦之后,约克经常被评为英国第二位最受访的城市。

en: York was known as Eboracum by the Romans , who founded the fortress city on the River Ouse in the year 71 .
zh: 约克被罗马人称为埃博拉库姆(Eboracum),他们于71年在乌斯河上的堡垒城市建立。

en: York quickly became one of the most important cities in Roman Britain , and after 211 became the capital of the province Britannia Inferior .
zh: 约克 quickly became one of the most important cities in Roman Britain, and after 211 became the capital of the province Britannia Inferior 。

en: Constantine the Great - later responsible for making Christianity the official religion of the Roman Empire - was first proclaimed Emperor in the city .
zh: 君士坦丁大帝--后来负责使基督教成为罗马帝国的官方宗教--首次在该市宣布为皇帝。

en: Captured by the Vikings 866 , the city quickly took on a new identity as Jorvik  and experienced a major urban revival as a centre of Viking trade and settlement in northern England .
zh: 该市被维京人占领了866年,并迅速成为约尔维克,成为北英格兰维京贸易和定居中心。

en: The Coppergate excavations of the 1970s revealed much of this Viking past .
zh: 1970年代的铜门挖掘揭示了这个维京人的过去。

en: York is a fairly small city - four days is enough to see the major sights although York is a city that reveals its charms to explorers with curiosity and patience .
zh: 约克是一个很小的城市-四天是足够看主要的景点,尽管约克是一个城市,它以好奇心和耐心向探险者揭示它的魅力。

en: York is known as England 's " City of Festivals " as there are regular cultural festivals every year .
zh: 约克被称为英格兰的“ 节日城市 ”,因为每年有定期的文化节日。

en: It 's a romantic city for a weekend break .
zh: 这是一个浪漫的城市周末休息。

en: Most travellers will arrive in York by road  or rail from other parts of the UK or an airport .
zh: 大多数旅行者将从英国其他地区或机场乘车或铁路抵达约克。

en: Although York is not directly on any of the main north - south motorways , the connections are reasonably good .
zh: 尽管约克不是直通任何主要的南北高速公路, 但连接相当良好.

en: From the south , the quickest route is probably to take the M1 northbound to junction 32 , then the M18 eastbound to junction 2 , the A1M northbound to junction 44 and finally the A64 eastbound to the York Outer Ring Road  .
zh: 从南面,最快速的路线可能是乘M1北行至32号路口,然后乘M18东行至2号路口,乘A1M北行至44号路口,最后乘A64东行至约克外环路。

en: Alternatively , you can take the M1 all the way to the A64 , but the upper reaches of the M1 around Sheffield and Leeds can get very congested , especially in the rush hours .
zh: 另外,你可以乘M1一直到A64,但是Sheffield和Leeds周围的M1的上游可能非常拥挤,特别是在高峰时段。

en: From the west , the A59 and the M62 provide connections from Liverpool and Manchester , and from the north the A1 and the A19 link York with Tyneside , Northumberland and south - eastern Scotland .
zh: 从西面, A59和M62提供从利物浦和曼彻斯特的连接,从北面, A1和A19连接约克与泰尼赛德, 诺森伯兰和苏格兰东南部.

en: Traffic congestion on the main arterial roads serving the city  can get very bad , especially during the rush hours and on Saturday mornings .
zh: 城市主要动脉道路的交通拥挤情况会非常严重,特别是在高峰时间和星期六早晨。

en: The remodelling of some roads near bottleneck junctions to accommodate bicycle lanes has made traffic jams even worse still in recent years , and parking in the city centre is very expensive .
zh: 近年来,由于一些路段改建为自行车道附近的瓶颈交界点,交通堵塞更加严重,市中心的停车非常昂贵。

en: If you are just visiting York for the day , using a Park and Ride  costs a lot less than trying to park in or near the city centre , and there are five sites dotted around the Outer Ring Road .
zh: 如果您只是在约克停留一天,使用公园和骑车的费用比试图在市中心或附近停车要低得多,并且有五个地点点在外环路周围。

en: However , the last buses from the city centre leave at around 8 pm in the evenings and you are not allowed to leave your car in a Park and Ride overnight .
zh: 然而,从市中心的最后的公共汽车在晚上8点左右离开,你不能在公园和骑车停留一夜。

en: Therefore , if you are staying overnight in York and arriving by car , make sure that your hotel offers parking before you book .
zh: 因此,如果您在约克停留一夜,并乘车到达,请在预订之前确保您的酒店提供停车。

en: If you are only visiting for the day but staying until late evening , you will need to use a city centre car park .
zh: 如果您只是在一天来访,但停留到晚间,您需要使用市中心的停车场。

en: Do you always seem to cross paths with people who are stuck on themselves , intolerant of people different from them , rude or downright arrogant ?
zh: 你似乎总是和那些固执于自己、不容忍与他们不同的人、粗鲁或绝对傲慢的人交道吗?

en: These people can be a great source of potential pain , and this article is here to help you sort the arrogant from the not - so - arrogant .
zh: 这些人可能是潜在的痛苦的源泉,这篇文章是为了帮助你将傲慢的人从不那么傲慢的人区分出来。

en: Pay attention to their conversations .
zh: 注意他们的谈话。

en: Do n't eavesdrop , but when they 're talking to you or to those around you , listen to them .
zh: 不要倾听,但当他们和你或周围的人说话时,要听他们说话。

en: Do they get mad or irritated if the centre of attention moves to someone else ?
zh: 如果注意力集中在别人身上,他们会发疯 吗?

en: Arrogance and smugness is often a reflection of limited life experience , and feeling concerned that those with greater life experience " have got something over them " .
zh: 傲慢和自私往往是有限的生活经历的反映,并担心那些拥有更大的生活经验的人“ 已经过上他们了 ”。

en: Rather than seeking to find out more through questions and learning  , arrogant people tend to generalize from their limited , narrow life experiences and try to impose their small worldview on others .
zh: 傲慢的人倾向于从他们有限的、狭隘的生活经历中概括,并试图将自己的小世界观强加于他人,而不是通过问题和学习来寻找更多。

en: Jealousy of your achievements or seeming lifestyle can cause another person to feel smug or arrogant about something they think they do better than you or own / have that you do n't .
zh: 嫉妒你所取得的成就或看上去的生活方式会使别人对他们认为自己比你做得更好或拥有/拥有你没有的东西感到自私或傲慢。

en: Arrogant people have an extremely strong need to look good .
zh: 傲慢的人非常需要看起来好。

en: When you make them look bad - even if it is the slightest offense - they will usually be very mad at you .
zh: 当你使他们看起来很坏,即使这是最轻微的侮辱,他们通常会对你非常生气。

en: This happens when you question  their appearance , intelligence , athletic abilities , or anything else relating to their self - image .
zh: 这发生在你质疑他们的外表 、 智力 、 运动能力, 或与他们 自我 形象有关的任何其他方面.

en: Challenge their worldview .
zh: 挑战他们的世界观。

en: If they get upset , gauge their anger .
zh: 如果他们生气, 就衡量他们的愤怒.

en: But if they 're enraged , then they may see you as questioning their ' perfect little world . '
zh: 但是如果他们生气的话, 他们可能认为你是对他们“ 完美的小世界”的质疑.

en: And having one of those is usually indicative of arrogance .
zh: 有这样的人通常表现为傲慢。

en: At some point or another , most people realize that the world does n't revolve around them .
zh: 在某种程度上,大多数人意识到世界并不围绕他们。

en: Arrogant people counteract this by creating an atmosphere that revolves around them , and get angry if they 're reminded of the real world .
zh: 傲慢的人通过创造一个围绕他们旋转的气氛来抵制这种现象,如果他们被提醒到现实世界,就会生气。

en: Ambiguity frightens arrogant people because it suggests imperfection , change and lack of certainty  .
zh: 模糊使傲慢的人害怕,因为它暗示了不完美、变化和缺乏确定。

en: As such , instead of accepting that the world behaves randomly and at times totally averse to one 's preferences , the arrogant person seeks to control everything and everyone , which of course , is an impossible mission .
zh: 因此,这个傲慢的人,不接受世界随机行事,有时完全厌恶自己的偏好,而是想控制一切和每个人,这当然是不可能的任务。

en: Reality hurts when it intrudes ; as such , an arrogant person is less likely than other people to self - reflect or analyse , thereby not seeing their own imperfections .
zh: 现实侵入时会伤害; 因此, 一个傲慢的人比其他人更不容易自我反思或分析, 因而不会看到自己的缺陷.

en: They may also give themselves undue credit for positive achievements instead of acknowledging the input of others or of circumstances .
zh: 他们还可能不承认他人或环境的投入而对自身取得的积极成就给予不正当的称赞。

en: Learn the quality of their friendships .
zh: 学习他们的友谊的品质。

en: Do n't be nosy or gossipy , but if they are happy with someone one day and hateful with them the next , that 's a sign of them having a lot of fair weather friends .
zh: 不要开玩笑,但是如果有一天他们和某人在一起很开心,第二天又很恨他们,那就是他们有很多好天气的朋友的迹象。

en: That 's a sign of arrogance , since it is very hard to be a truly good friend to someone who 's stuck on themselves .
zh: 这是一种傲慢的迹象,因为对一个固执于自己的人来说,成为真正的好朋友是很困难的。

en: Since being a good friend to someone usually means helping them , they often ca n't stand the thought of a good friendship .
zh: 因为对某人做好朋友通常意味着帮助他们,所以他们往往不能忍受一个好朋友的想法。

en: Ironically , arrogant people often ca n't understand why they do n't have any reliable and supportive friends .
zh: 讽刺的是, 傲慢的人往往不能理解为什么他们没有可靠和支持的朋友.

en: How do they treat those not like themselves ?
zh: 他们如何对待那些不像他们自己的人?

en: In other words , how do they treat those with different beliefs , cultural backgrounds and ways of seeing the world ?
zh: 换句话说, 他们如何对待那些有着不同信仰 、 文化背景和看世界的方式的人?

en: If it 's inherently negative , then they 're either over - zealous , ignorant of other people or what to avoid those that contradict their fantasy land that caters to them and them only .
zh: 如果它本质上是消极的, 那么他们要么是过度狂热的, 对别人无知,要么什么才能避免那些与他们 fantasy 的土地相抵触的,只顾他们和他们。

en: Determine this based on their general personality and the people they 're interacting with .
zh: 根据他们的总体个性和他们与人交往的对象来确定。

en: This is simply a protective mechanism for their false image or their fantasy land .
zh: 这是他们虚构的形象或虚构的土地的保护机制。

en: What 's their personality like ?
zh: 他们的性格怎么样?

en: Take note of how they act , talk , and use their social status .
zh: 注意他们的行为,说话,以及使用他们的社会地位。

en: Do they have a general sense of ' coolness ? '
zh: 他们有“凉爽”的普遍感 吗?

en: Do they act like they own the place , or act like the ' big dog ? '
zh: 他们表现得好像是自己的地方, 还是像大狗一样?

en: Are they very keen on their self - image ?
zh: 他们对 自我 形象 很感兴趣 吗?

en: Many arrogant people have a false charm that no one seems to see through .
zh: 许多傲慢的人有一种虚伪的魅力,似乎没有人能透视。

en: But the arrogant person is usually more than happy to show their cruel side to those that they do n't like .
zh: 但傲慢的人通常更乐于向那些不喜欢他的人展示他残酷的一面。

en: When they are cruel , their friends will usually ignore it or not do anything to stop it since they 're afraid that they 'll be treated badly by their ' friend . '
zh: 当他们是残忍的, 他们的朋友通常会忽略它,或者不做任何事情来阻止它,因为他们担心他们会受到朋友的虐待.

en: Mention people you know that they do n't like .
zh: 提到你认识的人,他们不喜欢。

en: This is n't meant to begin a conflict , but to gauge their rivalries , annoyances and enmities .
zh: 这并不是为了开始冲突,而是为了衡量他们之间的竞争、烦恼和仇恨。

en: If their condemnation seems to be reasonable , they probably are n't hubristic .
zh: 如果他们的谴责似乎是合理的, 他们可能不是自私的.

en: For the most part , arrogant people see people that they do n't like as threats to their perfect little world .
zh: 大多数傲慢的人把他们不喜欢的人看作是对他们完美的小世界的威胁。

en: The more they hate someone , the more dangerous that person is to their fantasy land .
zh: 他们越恨某人,那人对他们幻想的土地就越危险。

en: Ask around to see what they 've been saying about you .
zh: 问一下周围的人,看看他们对你说了些什么。

en: If they have been saying bad things about you , they may simply not like you .
zh: 如果他们一直在说你坏话,他们可能根本不喜欢你。

en: If they 're nice to your face , but talk bad about you behind your back like it 's their favourite hobby , then they probably have a problem with pride .
zh: 如果他们对你的面孔很友好,但背后说你坏话,好像这是他们最喜欢的爱好,那么他们可能有骄傲的问题。

en: Arrogant people often subconsciously know that they do n't have any good friends .
zh: 傲慢的人常常无意识地知道他们没有好朋友。

en: They compensate for this by creating the impression that they have a lot of friends - they have a ' quantity , not quality ' mentality .
zh: 他们通过创造他们有很多朋友的印象来弥补这一点--他们有一个‘数量,而不是质量’的心态。

en: Then they simply insult their trophy friends when they are n't looking .
zh: 然后他们只是在不看的时候侮辱他们的奖杯朋友。

en: Ballet began in royal courts in the early 1600's , and early forms of this elegant and sophisticated art involved long skirts and wooden clogs .
zh: 芭蕾舞始于公元1600年代早期的宫廷,早期的这种优雅而精致的艺术形式包括长裙和木制的围裙。

en: Dancing ballet is extremely popular throughout the world , and studying ballet can help develop strong bodies , spatial and temporal awareness , and improve coordination .
zh: 舞蹈芭蕾在全世界非常流行,学习芭蕾可以帮助培养强壮的身体、空间和时间意识,并改善协调。

en: People who study ballet also retain flexibility throughout their adult lives , making this technique the basis of training for all types of dance .
zh: 学习芭蕾的人们在整个成年生活都保持了灵活性,使这种技巧成为所有类型的舞蹈训练的基础。

en: While dancing ballet takes dedication and requires serious training , you can learn the basics to prepare yourself for further study .
zh: 舞蹈芭蕾需要献身,需要认真的训练,你可以学习基本,为进一步学习做好准备。

en: Learn to get ready for practicing , the basic positions , and some of the first techniques you 're likely to encounter in ballet .
zh: 学会准备练习,基本的姿势,以及一些你可能遇到的芭蕾舞技巧。

en: Stretch your muscles thoroughly .
zh: 彻底地伸展肌肉。

en: Stretching is important to loosen muscles , strengthen muscles and to elongate your posture .
zh: 伸展是放松肌肉,增强肌肉和延长你的姿势的重要。

en: It is vital that it is done at the beginning of each ballet session , including before a performance .
zh: 必须在每次芭蕾舞会开始前,包括在表演前进行。

en: You should also stretch to " wind down " at the end of ballet dancing .
zh: 你应该在芭蕾舞结束时伸展到“ 风下 ” 。

en: Always wear ballet slippers .
zh: 总是穿芭蕾舞鞋。

en: There are different styles and types of shoes , so ask your ballet teacher or a salesman at the store for advice , given your intentions for dancing .
zh: 有不同的风格和类型的鞋子,所以请你的芭蕾老师或商店的推销员咨询,因为你打算跳舞。

en: Do n't buy shoes to grow into , because your feet will seem flexed when you pointe and will look flat .
zh: 不要买鞋来长大,因为你指着脚时你的脚会显得弯曲,看起来平坦。

en: You should fit them to where the drawstring is tied slightly loose .
zh: 你应该把它们贴在拉伸绳被绑得有点松弛的地方。

en: If your drawstring is longer than your pinkie then you should cut it off till it is roughly the size of your fingernail .
zh: 如果你的抽筋长于你的粉红色,那么你应该切开它,直到它大约是你的指甲的大小。

en: If you ca n't buy ballet shoes , that it is okay .
zh: 如果你不能买芭蕾舞鞋,那没关系。

en: The most important thing is that you are comfortable , and that you 're not wearing baggy or loose fitting clothing so you can make sure you 're forming and moving correctly in the mirror .
zh: 最重要的是你舒适,而且你不穿紧身或松散的适合衣服,这样你就可以确定你在镜子里正形成和移动。

en: A plain black leotard and pink tights are usually a safe bet .
zh: 简单的黑色领带和粉红色的紧身裤通常是安全的赌注。

en: Pink or black ballet slippers are also appropriate .
zh: 粉红色或黑色的芭蕾鞋也是合适的。

en: If you 're signed up for a class , check with your instructor to find out if there is a dress code at the school .
zh: 如果你已经报名参加一门课,请与你的老师查一下学校是否有礼服守则。

en: Some schools may have students wear the same thing and others may just require any type of leotard and tights and sometimes ballet skirts .
zh: 有些学校可能有学生穿同样的东西,而另一些学校可能需要任何类型的 leotard和紧身裤,有时还有芭蕾裙。

en: Mostly they require tight fitting clothing so they can see that your muscles are working properly and so on .
zh: 他们通常需要紧凑的服装,以便他们能看到你的肌肉正常工作,等等。

en: Find an appropriate space to practice .
zh: 寻找适当的练习空间。

en: For this reason , it 's always better to practice ballet in a ballet studio under the guidance of a good instructor , who will be able to correct your positioning and make sure that you 're dancing properly .
zh: 因此,最好在一个芭蕾舞厅里训练芭蕾舞,由一位好的教练指导,他能纠正你的姿势,确保你跳舞得恰当。

en: A dancing studio is equipped with mirrors for correcting your positioning and seeing what you 're doing accurately , and a barre for practicing .
zh: 舞厅装有镜子来调整你的姿势,看你正做些什么,还有练习用的桶。

en: If you want to practice at home , make sure you 've got enough open space to move freely , preferably on a hard wood floor .
zh: 如果你想在家练习,请确保你有足够的空位可以自由移动,最好在硬木地板上。

en: The back of a chair can replace the need for a bar .
zh: 椅子的背部可以代替酒吧的需要。

en: Position a large mirror so you can check your positioning and see what you 're doing .
zh: 定位一个大镜子,这样你可以检查你的定位,看看你在做什么。

en: This article outlines how to plant and harvest basil .
zh: 本文概述了如何种植和收获盆栽。

en: 1 Choose the kind of basil you wish to grow .
zh: 选择你想要种植的盆栽。

en: Basil comes in many different varieties , each of which have a unique flavor and smell .
zh: Basil是多种品种的, 每个品种都有独特的味道和气味.

en: Read up on different types of basil and pick out one - or several - that appeal to you , then order the seeds or buy them at a garden store .
zh: 阅读不同类型的盆栽,然后选择一个或几个你感兴趣的盆栽,然后 Order the seeds or buy them at a garden store。

en: Cinnamon basil really does smell like the sweet spice , and it also has unusually beautiful and fragrant flowers .
zh: 西红柿真闻起来像甜味香料,而且它也有异常美丽的香气的花朵。

en: Lemon basil actually contains citral , an aromatic compound found in citrus fruit , and smells very lemony .
zh: 柠檬basil实际上含有柠檬,一种在柑橘水果中发现的芳香化合物,并且非常柠檬味。

en: Purple basil is often grown for decoration , as well as its scent and flowers .
zh: 紫杉常用于装饰, 还有它的香味和花朵.

en: There are perennial basils which come back year after year , like African Blue Basil  and Thai Basil , while most other varieties are annuals , which you 'll have to plant year after year .
zh: 有多年生盆栽,年复一年,如非洲蓝盆栽和泰国盆栽,而大多数其他品种都是年产的,你必须年复一年种。

en: Globe and Greek basil are much more difficult to grow , but form pretty little bushes which stay well - contained .
zh: 球体和希腊盆栽的生长非常困难, 但形成相当小的灌木, 保持良好.

en: 2 Start seed indoors four to six weeks before last frost .
zh: 在最后的霜冻前四至六个星期内开始播种。

en: Basil needs warm air and sun to do well , so it 's often easiest to start the seeds indoors instead of risking that they 'll get damaged by frost .
zh: Basil需要温暖的空气和阳光来做好,所以通常最容易在室内开始种子,而不是冒风险,因为它们会受到霜冻的伤害。

en: If you live in a hot climate , you can start the seeds outside instead .
zh: 如果你生活在一个炎热的气候中,你可以在外面开始播种。

en: To figure out when the last frost will be , consult an almanac or talk with other gardeners in your area .
zh: 要确定最后的霜期是什么时候,请咨询一份日记或与你所在地区的其他园丁谈谈。

en: 3 Prepare seed containers .
zh: 3准备种子容器。

en: Fill flats or individual seed containers with a mixture of equal parts perlite , vermiculite , and peat .
zh: 用平坦的或单独的种子容器填满平坦的或单独的种子容器,用平坦的平坦的或单独的种子容器填满平坦的或单独的种子容器。

en: Press the mixture slightly to eliminate air pockets .
zh: 轻轻按混合物去除空气袋。

en: Dampen the mixture with water so it 's ready to provide the right environment for the basil seeds to germinate .
zh: 用水堵塞混合物,使它能够为盆栽种子 germinate提供合适的环境。

en: Drop one to two seeds into each container .
zh: 将一到两个种子放进每个容器中。

en: Cover them lightly with soil .
zh: 用土壤轻轻地盖住它们。

en: Leave the containers in a sunny window .
zh: 把容器放在阳光灿烂的窗子里。

en: Twice daily , remove the plastic wrap and sprinkle the containers with more water .
zh: 每天两次,拆掉塑料包装并用更多的水喷洒容器。

en: 5 Remove the plastic wrap when the sprouts emerge .
zh: 5在芽生时,把塑料包装移开。
